GV01rv_hn10u:1: RV_10,001.01a agre bṛhann uṣasām ūrdhvo asthān nirjaganvān tamaso jyotiṣāgāt |
GV01rv_hn10u:2: RV_10,001.01c agnir bhānunā ruśatā svaṅga ā jāto viśvā sadmāny aprāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3: RV_10,001.02a sa jāto garbho asi rodasyor agne cārur vibhṛta oṣadhīṣu |
GV01rv_hn10u:4: RV_10,001.02c citraḥ śiśuḥ pari tamāṃsy aktūn pra mātṛbhyo adhi kanikradad gāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:5: RV_10,001.03a viṣṇur itthā paramam asya vidvāñ jāto bṛhann abhi pāti tṛtīyam |
GV01rv_hn10u:6: RV_10,001.03c āsā yad asya payo akrata svaṃ sacetaso abhy arcanty atra ||
GV01rv_hn10u:7: RV_10,001.04a ata u tvā pitubhṛto janitrīr annāvṛdham prati caranty annaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:8: RV_10,001.04c tā īm praty eṣi punar anyarūpā asi tvaṃ vikṣu mānuṣīṣu hotā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:9: RV_10,001.05a hotāraṃ citraratham adhvarasya yajñasya-yajñasya ketuṃ ruśantam |
GV01rv_hn10u:10: RV_10,001.05c pratyardhiṃ devasya-devasya mahnā śriyā tv agnim atithiṃ janānām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:11: RV_10,001.06a sa tu vastrāṇy adha peśanāni vasāno agnir nābhā pṛthivyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:12: RV_10,001.06c aruṣo jātaḥ pada iḷāyāḥ purohito rājan yakṣīha devān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:13: RV_10,001.07a ā hi dyāvāpṛthivī agna ubhe sadā putro na mātarā tatantha |
GV01rv_hn10u:14: RV_10,001.07c pra yāhy acchośato yaviṣṭhāthā vaha sahasyeha devān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:15: RV_10,002.01a piprīhi devāṃ uśato yaviṣṭha vidvāṃ ṛtūṃr ṛtupate yajeha |
GV01rv_hn10u:16: RV_10,002.01c ye daivyā ṛtvijas tebhir agne tvaṃ hotṝṇām asy āyajiṣṭhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:17: RV_10,002.02a veṣi hotram uta potraṃ janānām mandhātāsi draviṇodā ṛtāvā |
GV01rv_hn10u:18: RV_10,002.02c svāhā vayaṃ kṛṇavāmā havīṃṣi devo devān yajatv agnir arhan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:19: RV_10,002.03a ā devānām api panthām aganma yac chaknavāma tad anu pravoḷhum |
GV01rv_hn10u:20: RV_10,002.03c agnir vidvān sa yajāt sed u hotā so adhvarān sa ṛtūn kalpayāti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:21: RV_10,002.04a yad vo vayam pramināma vratāni viduṣāṃ devā aviduṣṭarāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:22: RV_10,002.04c agniṣ ṭad viśvam ā pṛṇāti vidvān yebhir devāṃ ṛtubhiḥ kalpayāti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:23: RV_10,002.05a yat pākatrā manasā dīnadakṣā na yajñasya manvate martyāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:24: RV_10,002.05c agniṣ ṭad dhotā kratuvid vijānan yajiṣṭho devāṃ ṛtuśo yajāti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:25: RV_10,002.06a viśveṣāṃ hy adhvarāṇām anīkaṃ citraṃ ketuṃ janitā tvā jajāna |
GV01rv_hn10u:26: RV_10,002.06c sa ā yajasva nṛvatīr anu kṣā spārhā iṣaḥ kṣumatīr viśvajanyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:27: RV_10,002.07a yaṃ tvā dyāvāpṛthivī yaṃ tvāpas tvaṣṭā yaṃ tvā sujanimā jajāna |
GV01rv_hn10u:28: RV_10,002.07c panthām anu pravidvān pitṛyāṇaṃ dyumad agne samidhāno vi bhāhi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:29: RV_10,003.01a ino rājann aratiḥ samiddho raudro dakṣāya suṣumāṃ adarśi |
GV01rv_hn10u:30: RV_10,003.01c cikid vi bhāti bhāsā bṛhatāsiknīm eti ruśatīm apājan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:31: RV_10,003.02a kṛṣṇāṃ yad enīm abhi varpasā bhūj janayan yoṣām bṛhataḥ pitur jām |
GV01rv_hn10u:32: RV_10,003.02c ūrdhvam bhānuṃ sūryasya stabhāyan divo vasubhir aratir vi bhāti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:33: RV_10,003.03a bhadro bhadrayā sacamāna āgāt svasāraṃ jāro abhy eti paścāt |
GV01rv_hn10u:34: RV_10,003.03c supraketair dyubhir agnir vitiṣṭhan ruśadbhir varṇair abhi rāmam asthāt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:35: RV_10,003.04a asya yāmāso bṛhato na vagnūn indhānā agneḥ sakhyuḥ śivasya |
GV01rv_hn10u:36: RV_10,003.04c īḍyasya vṛṣṇo bṛhataḥ svāso bhāmāso yāmann aktavaś cikitre ||
GV01rv_hn10u:37: RV_10,003.05a svanā na yasya bhāmāsaḥ pavante rocamānasya bṛhataḥ sudivaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:38: RV_10,003.05c jyeṣṭhebhir yas tejiṣṭhaiḥ krīḷumadbhir varṣiṣṭhebhir bhānubhir nakṣati dyām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:39: RV_10,003.06a asya śuṣmāso dadṛśānapaver jehamānasya svanayan niyudbhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:40: RV_10,003.06c pratnebhir yo ruśadbhir devatamo vi rebhadbhir aratir bhāti vibhvā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:41: RV_10,003.07a sa ā vakṣi mahi na ā ca satsi divaspṛthivyor aratir yuvatyoḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:42: RV_10,003.07c agniḥ sutukaḥ sutukebhir aśvai rabhasvadbhī rabhasvāṃ eha gamyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:43: RV_10,004.01a pra te yakṣi pra ta iyarmi manma bhuvo yathā vandyo no haveṣu |
GV01rv_hn10u:44: RV_10,004.01c dhanvann iva prapā asi tvam agna iyakṣave pūrave pratna rājan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:45: RV_10,004.02a yaṃ tvā janāso abhi saṃcaranti gāva uṣṇam iva vrajaṃ yaviṣṭha |
GV01rv_hn10u:46: RV_10,004.02c dūto devānām asi martyānām antar mahāṃś carasi rocanena ||
GV01rv_hn10u:47: RV_10,004.03a śiśuṃ na tvā jenyaṃ vardhayantī mātā bibharti sacanasyamānā |
GV01rv_hn10u:48: RV_10,004.03c dhanor adhi pravatā yāsi haryañ jigīṣase paśur ivāvasṛṣṭaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:49: RV_10,004.04a mūrā amūra na vayaṃ cikitvo mahitvam agne tvam aṅga vitse |
GV01rv_hn10u:50: RV_10,004.04c śaye vavriś carati jihvayādan rerihyate yuvatiṃ viśpatiḥ san ||
GV01rv_hn10u:51: RV_10,004.05a kūcij jāyate sanayāsu navyo vane tasthau palito dhūmaketuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:52: RV_10,004.05c asnātāpo vṛṣabho na pra veti sacetaso yam praṇayanta martāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:53: RV_10,004.06a tanūtyajeva taskarā vanargū raśanābhir daśabhir abhy adhītām |
GV01rv_hn10u:54: RV_10,004.06c iyaṃ te agne navyasī manīṣā yukṣvā rathaṃ na śucayadbhir aṅgaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:55: RV_10,004.07a brahma ca te jātavedo namaś ceyaṃ ca gīḥ sadam id vardhanī bhūt |
GV01rv_hn10u:56: RV_10,004.07c rakṣā ṇo agne tanayāni tokā rakṣota nas tanvo aprayucchan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:57: RV_10,005.01a ekaḥ samudro dharuṇo rayīṇām asmad dhṛdo bhūrijanmā vi caṣṭe |
GV01rv_hn10u:58: RV_10,005.01c siṣakty ūdhar niṇyor upastha utsasya madhye nihitam padaṃ veḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:59: RV_10,005.02a samānaṃ nīḷaṃ vṛṣaṇo vasānāḥ saṃ jagmire mahiṣā arvatībhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:60: RV_10,005.02c ṛtasya padaṃ kavayo ni pānti guhā nāmāni dadhire parāṇi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:61: RV_10,005.03a ṛtāyinī māyinī saṃ dadhāte mitvā śiśuṃ jajñatur vardhayantī |
GV01rv_hn10u:62: RV_10,005.03c viśvasya nābhiṃ carato dhruvasya kaveś cit tantum manasā viyantaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:63: RV_10,005.04a ṛtasya hi vartanayaḥ sujātam iṣo vājāya pradivaḥ sacante |
GV01rv_hn10u:64: RV_10,005.04c adhīvāsaṃ rodasī vāvasāne ghṛtair annair vāvṛdhāte madhūnām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:65: RV_10,005.05a sapta svasṝr aruṣīr vāvaśāno vidvān madhva uj jabhārā dṛśe kam |
GV01rv_hn10u:66: RV_10,005.05c antar yeme antarikṣe purājā icchan vavrim avidat pūṣaṇasya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:67: RV_10,005.06a sapta maryādāḥ kavayas tatakṣus tāsām ekām id abhy aṃhuro gāt |
GV01rv_hn10u:68: RV_10,005.06c āyor ha skambha upamasya nīḷe pathāṃ visarge dharuṇeṣu tasthau ||
GV01rv_hn10u:69: RV_10,005.07a asac ca sac ca parame vyoman dakṣasya janmann aditer upasthe |
GV01rv_hn10u:70: RV_10,005.07c agnir ha naḥ prathamajā ṛtasya pūrva āyuni vṛṣabhaś ca dhenuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:71: RV_10,006.01a ayaṃ sa yasya śarmann avobhir agner edhate jaritābhiṣṭau |
GV01rv_hn10u:72: RV_10,006.01c jyeṣṭhebhir yo bhānubhir ṛṣūṇām paryeti parivīto vibhāvā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:73: RV_10,006.02a yo bhānubhir vibhāvā vibhāty agnir devebhir ṛtāvājasraḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:74: RV_10,006.02c ā yo vivāya sakhyā sakhibhyo 'parihvṛto atyo na saptiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:75: RV_10,006.03a īśe yo viśvasyā devavīter īśe viśvāyur uṣaso vyuṣṭau |
GV01rv_hn10u:76: RV_10,006.03c ā yasmin manā havīṃṣy agnāv ariṣṭaratha skabhnāti śūṣaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:77: RV_10,006.04a śūṣebhir vṛdho juṣāṇo arkair devāṃ acchā raghupatvā jigāti |
GV01rv_hn10u:78: RV_10,006.04c mandro hotā sa juhvā yajiṣṭhaḥ sammiślo agnir ā jigharti devān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:79: RV_10,006.05a tam usrām indraṃ na rejamānam agniṃ gīrbhir namobhir ā kṛṇudhvam |
GV01rv_hn10u:80: RV_10,006.05c ā yaṃ viprāso matibhir gṛṇanti jātavedasaṃ juhvaṃ sahānām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:81: RV_10,006.06a saṃ yasmin viśvā vasūni jagmur vāje nāśvāḥ saptīvanta evaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:82: RV_10,006.06c asme ūtīr indravātatamā arvācīnā agna ā kṛṇuṣva ||
GV01rv_hn10u:83: RV_10,006.07a adhā hy agne mahnā niṣadyā sadyo jajñāno havyo babhūtha |
GV01rv_hn10u:84: RV_10,006.07c taṃ te devāso anu ketam āyann adhāvardhanta prathamāsa ūmāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:85: RV_10,007.01a svasti no divo agne pṛthivyā viśvāyur dhehi yajathāya deva |
GV01rv_hn10u:86: RV_10,007.01c sacemahi tava dasma praketair uruṣyā ṇa urubhir deva śaṃsaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:87: RV_10,007.02a imā agne matayas tubhyaṃ jātā gobhir aśvair abhi gṛṇanti rādhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:88: RV_10,007.02c yadā te marto anu bhogam ānaḍ vaso dadhāno matibhiḥ sujāta ||
GV01rv_hn10u:89: RV_10,007.03a agnim manye pitaram agnim āpim agnim bhrātaraṃ sadam it sakhāyam |
GV01rv_hn10u:90: RV_10,007.03c agner anīkam bṛhataḥ saparyaṃ divi śukraṃ yajataṃ sūryasya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:91: RV_10,007.04a sidhrā agne dhiyo asme sanutrīr yaṃ trāyase dama ā nityahotā |
GV01rv_hn10u:92: RV_10,007.04c ṛtāvā sa rohidaśvaḥ purukṣur dyubhir asmā ahabhir vāmam astu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:93: RV_10,007.05a dyubhir hitam mitram iva prayogam pratnam ṛtvijam adhvarasya jāram |
GV01rv_hn10u:94: RV_10,007.05c bāhubhyām agnim āyavo 'jananta vikṣu hotāraṃ ny asādayanta ||
GV01rv_hn10u:95: RV_10,007.06a svayaṃ yajasva divi deva devān kiṃ te pākaḥ kṛṇavad apracetāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:96: RV_10,007.06c yathāyaja ṛtubhir deva devān evā yajasva tanvaṃ sujāta ||
GV01rv_hn10u:97: RV_10,007.07a bhavā no agne 'vitota gopā bhavā vayaskṛd uta no vayodhāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:98: RV_10,007.07c rāsvā ca naḥ sumaho havyadātiṃ trāsvota nas tanvo aprayucchan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:99: RV_10,008.01a pra ketunā bṛhatā yāty agnir ā rodasī vṛṣabho roravīti |
GV01rv_hn10u:100: RV_10,008.01c divaś cid antāṃ upamāṃ ud ānaḷ apām upasthe mahiṣo vavardha ||
GV01rv_hn10u:101: RV_10,008.02a mumoda garbho vṛṣabhaḥ kakudmān asremā vatsaḥ śimīvāṃ arāvīt |
GV01rv_hn10u:102: RV_10,008.02c sa devatāty udyatāni kṛṇvan sveṣu kṣayeṣu prathamo jigāti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:103: RV_10,008.03a ā yo mūrdhānam pitror arabdha ny adhvare dadhire sūro arṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:104: RV_10,008.03c asya patmann aruṣīr aśvabudhnā ṛtasya yonau tanvo juṣanta ||
GV01rv_hn10u:105: RV_10,008.04a uṣa-uṣo hi vaso agram eṣi tvaṃ yamayor abhavo vibhāvā |
GV01rv_hn10u:106: RV_10,008.04c ṛtāya sapta dadhiṣe padāni janayan mitraṃ tanve svāyai ||
GV01rv_hn10u:107: RV_10,008.05a bhuvaś cakṣur maha ṛtasya gopā bhuvo varuṇo yad ṛtāya veṣi |
GV01rv_hn10u:108: RV_10,008.05c bhuvo apāṃ napāj jātavedo bhuvo dūto yasya havyaṃ jujoṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:109: RV_10,008.06a bhuvo yajñasya rajasaś ca netā yatrā niyudbhiḥ sacase śivābhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:110: RV_10,008.06c divi mūrdhānaṃ dadhiṣe svarṣāṃ jihvām agne cakṛṣe havyavāham ||
GV01rv_hn10u:111: RV_10,008.07a asya tritaḥ kratunā vavre antar icchan dhītim pitur evaiḥ parasya |
GV01rv_hn10u:112: RV_10,008.07c sacasyamānaḥ pitror upasthe jāmi bruvāṇa āyudhāni veti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:113: RV_10,008.08a sa pitryāṇy āyudhāni vidvān indreṣita āptyo abhy ayudhyat |
GV01rv_hn10u:114: RV_10,008.08c triśīrṣāṇaṃ saptaraśmiṃ jaghanvān tvāṣṭrasya cin niḥ sasṛje trito gāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:115: RV_10,008.09a bhūrīd indra udinakṣantam ojo 'vābhinat satpatir manyamānam |
GV01rv_hn10u:116: RV_10,008.09c tvāṣṭrasya cid viśvarūpasya gonām ācakrāṇas trīṇi śīrṣā parā vark ||
GV01rv_hn10u:117: RV_10,009.01a āpo hi ṣṭhā mayobhuvas tā na ūrje dadhātana |
GV01rv_hn10u:119: RV_10,009.02a yo vaḥ śivatamo rasas tasya bhājayateha naḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:121: RV_10,009.03a tasmā araṃ gamāma vo yasya kṣayāya jinvatha |
GV01rv_hn10u:123: RV_10,009.04a śaṃ no devīr abhiṣṭaya āpo bhavantu pītaye |
GV01rv_hn10u:124: RV_10,009.04c śaṃ yor abhi sravantu naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:127: RV_10,009.06a apsu me somo abravīd antar viśvāni bheṣajā |
GV01rv_hn10u:129: RV_10,009.07a āpaḥ pṛṇīta bheṣajaṃ varūthaṃ tanve mama |
GV01rv_hn10u:131: RV_10,009.08a idam āpaḥ pra vahata yat kiṃ ca duritam mayi |
GV01rv_hn10u:132: RV_10,009.08c yad vāham abhidudroha yad vā śepa utānṛtam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:133: RV_10,009.09a āpo adyānv acāriṣaṃ rasena sam agasmahi |
GV01rv_hn10u:134: RV_10,009.09c payasvān agna ā gahi tam mā saṃ sṛja varcasā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:135: RV_10,010.01a o cit sakhāyaṃ sakhyā vavṛtyāṃ tiraḥ purū cid arṇavaṃ jaganvān |
GV01rv_hn10u:136: RV_10,010.01c pitur napātam ā dadhīta vedhā adhi kṣami prataraṃ dīdhyānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:137: RV_10,010.02a na te sakhā sakhyaṃ vaṣṭy etat salakṣmā yad viṣurūpā bhavāti |
GV01rv_hn10u:138: RV_10,010.02c mahas putrāso asurasya vīrā divo dhartāra urviyā pari khyan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:139: RV_10,010.03a uśanti ghā te amṛtāsa etad ekasya cit tyajasam martyasya |
GV01rv_hn10u:140: RV_10,010.03c ni te mano manasi dhāyy asme janyuḥ patis tanvam ā viviśyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:141: RV_10,010.04a na yat purā cakṛmā kad dha nūnam ṛtā vadanto anṛtaṃ rapema |
GV01rv_hn10u:142: RV_10,010.04c gandharvo apsv apyā ca yoṣā sā no nābhiḥ paramaṃ jāmi tan nau ||
GV01rv_hn10u:143: RV_10,010.05a garbhe nu nau janitā dampatī kar devas tvaṣṭā savitā viśvarūpaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:144: RV_10,010.05c nakir asya pra minanti vratāni veda nāv asya pṛthivī uta dyauḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:145: RV_10,010.06a ko asya veda prathamasyāhnaḥ ka īṃ dadarśa ka iha pra vocat |
GV01rv_hn10u:146: RV_10,010.06c bṛhan mitrasya varuṇasya dhāma kad u brava āhano vīcyā nṝn ||
GV01rv_hn10u:147: RV_10,010.07a yamasya mā yamyaṃ kāma āgan samāne yonau sahaśeyyāya |
GV01rv_hn10u:148: RV_10,010.07c jāyeva patye tanvaṃ riricyāṃ vi cid vṛheva rathyeva cakrā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:149: RV_10,010.08a na tiṣṭhanti na ni miṣanty ete devānāṃ spaśa iha ye caranti |
GV01rv_hn10u:150: RV_10,010.08c anyena mad āhano yāhi tūyaṃ tena vi vṛha rathyeva cakrā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:151: RV_10,010.09a rātrībhir asmā ahabhir daśasyet sūryasya cakṣur muhur un mimīyāt |
GV01rv_hn10u:152: RV_10,010.09c divā pṛthivyā mithunā sabandhū yamīr yamasya bibhṛyād ajāmi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:153: RV_10,010.10a ā ghā tā gacchān uttarā yugāni yatra jāmayaḥ kṛṇavann ajāmi |
GV01rv_hn10u:154: RV_10,010.10c upa barbṛhi vṛṣabhāya bāhum anyam icchasva subhage patim mat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:155: RV_10,010.11a kim bhrātāsad yad anātham bhavāti kim u svasā yan nirṛtir nigacchāt |
GV01rv_hn10u:156: RV_10,010.11c kāmamūtā bahv etad rapāmi tanvā me tanvaṃ sam pipṛgdhi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:157: RV_10,010.12a na vā u te tanvā tanvaṃ sam papṛcyām pāpam āhur yaḥ svasāraṃ nigacchāt |
GV01rv_hn10u:158: RV_10,010.12c anyena mat pramudaḥ kalpayasva na te bhrātā subhage vaṣṭy etat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:159: RV_10,010.13a bato batāsi yama naiva te mano hṛdayaṃ cāvidāma |
GV01rv_hn10u:160: RV_10,010.13c anyā kila tvāṃ kakṣyeva yuktam pari ṣvajāte libujeva vṛkṣam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:161: RV_10,010.14a anyam ū ṣu tvaṃ yamy anya u tvām pari ṣvajāte libujeva vṛkṣam |
GV01rv_hn10u:162: RV_10,010.14c tasya vā tvam mana icchā sa vā tavādhā kṛṇuṣva saṃvidaṃ subhadrām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:163: RV_10,011.01a vṛṣā vṛṣṇe duduhe dohasā divaḥ payāṃsi yahvo aditer adābhyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:164: RV_10,011.01c viśvaṃ sa veda varuṇo yathā dhiyā sa yajñiyo yajatu yajñiyāṃ ṛtūn ||
GV01rv_hn10u:165: RV_10,011.02a rapad gandharvīr apyā ca yoṣaṇā nadasya nāde pari pātu me manaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:166: RV_10,011.02c iṣṭasya madhye aditir ni dhātu no bhrātā no jyeṣṭhaḥ prathamo vi vocati ||
GV01rv_hn10u:167: RV_10,011.03a so cin nu bhadrā kṣumatī yaśasvaty uṣā uvāsa manave svarvatī |
GV01rv_hn10u:168: RV_10,011.03c yad īm uśantam uśatām anu kratum agniṃ hotāraṃ vidathāya jījanan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:169: RV_10,011.04a adha tyaṃ drapsaṃ vibhvaṃ vicakṣaṇaṃ vir ābharad iṣitaḥ śyeno adhvare |
GV01rv_hn10u:170: RV_10,011.04c yadī viśo vṛṇate dasmam āryā agniṃ hotāram adha dhīr ajāyata ||
GV01rv_hn10u:171: RV_10,011.05a sadāsi raṇvo yavaseva puṣyate hotrābhir agne manuṣaḥ svadhvaraḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:172: RV_10,011.05c viprasya vā yac chaśamāna ukthyaṃ vājaṃ sasavāṃ upayāsi bhūribhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:173: RV_10,011.06a ud īraya pitarā jāra ā bhagam iyakṣati haryato hṛtta iṣyati |
GV01rv_hn10u:174: RV_10,011.06c vivakti vahniḥ svapasyate makhas taviṣyate asuro vepate matī ||
GV01rv_hn10u:175: RV_10,011.07a yas te agne sumatim marto akṣat sahasaḥ sūno ati sa pra śṛṇve |
GV01rv_hn10u:176: RV_10,011.07c iṣaṃ dadhāno vahamāno aśvair ā sa dyumāṃ amavān bhūṣati dyūn ||
GV01rv_hn10u:177: RV_10,011.08a yad agna eṣā samitir bhavāti devī deveṣu yajatā yajatra |
GV01rv_hn10u:178: RV_10,011.08c ratnā ca yad vibhajāsi svadhāvo bhāgaṃ no atra vasumantaṃ vītāt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:179: RV_10,011.09a śrudhī no agne sadane sadhasthe yukṣvā ratham amṛtasya dravitnum |
GV01rv_hn10u:180: RV_10,011.09c ā no vaha rodasī devaputre mākir devānām apa bhūr iha syāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:181: RV_10,012.01a dyāvā ha kṣāmā prathame ṛtenābhiśrāve bhavataḥ satyavācā |
GV01rv_hn10u:182: RV_10,012.01c devo yan martān yajathāya kṛṇvan sīdad dhotā pratyaṅ svam asuṃ yan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:183: RV_10,012.02a devo devān paribhūr ṛtena vahā no havyam prathamaś cikitvān |
GV01rv_hn10u:184: RV_10,012.02c dhūmaketuḥ samidhā bhāṛjīko mandro hotā nityo vācā yajīyān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:185: RV_10,012.03a svāvṛg devasyāmṛtaṃ yadī gor ato jātāso dhārayanta urvī |
GV01rv_hn10u:186: RV_10,012.03c viśve devā anu tat te yajur gur duhe yad enī divyaṃ ghṛtaṃ vāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:187: RV_10,012.04a arcāmi vāṃ vardhāyāpo ghṛtasnū dyāvābhūmī śṛṇutaṃ rodasī me |
GV01rv_hn10u:188: RV_10,012.04c ahā yad dyāvo 'sunītim ayan madhvā no atra pitarā śiśītām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:189: RV_10,012.05a kiṃ svin no rājā jagṛhe kad asyāti vrataṃ cakṛmā ko vi veda |
GV01rv_hn10u:190: RV_10,012.05c mitraś cid dhi ṣmā juhurāṇo devāñ chloko na yātām api vājo asti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:191: RV_10,012.06a durmantv atrāmṛtasya nāma salakṣmā yad viṣurūpā bhavāti |
GV01rv_hn10u:192: RV_10,012.06c yamasya yo manavate sumantv agne tam ṛṣva pāhy aprayucchan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:193: RV_10,012.07a yasmin devā vidathe mādayante vivasvataḥ sadane dhārayante |
GV01rv_hn10u:194: RV_10,012.07c sūrye jyotir adadhur māsy aktūn pari dyotaniṃ carato ajasrā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:195: RV_10,012.08a yasmin devā manmani saṃcaranty apīcye na vayam asya vidma |
GV01rv_hn10u:196: RV_10,012.08c mitro no atrāditir anāgān savitā devo varuṇāya vocat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:197: RV_10,012.09a śrudhī no agne sadane sadhasthe yukṣvā ratham amṛtasya dravitnum |
GV01rv_hn10u:198: RV_10,012.09c ā no vaha rodasī devaputre mākir devānām apa bhūr iha syāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:199: RV_10,013.01a yuje vām brahma pūrvyaṃ namobhir vi śloka etu pathyeva sūreḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:200: RV_10,013.01c śṛṇvantu viśve amṛtasya putrā ā ye dhāmāni divyāni tasthuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:201: RV_10,013.02a yame iva yatamāne yad aitam pra vām bharan mānuṣā devayantaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:202: RV_10,013.02c ā sīdataṃ svam u lokaṃ vidāne svāsasthe bhavatam indave naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:203: RV_10,013.03a pañca padāni rupo anv arohaṃ catuṣpadīm anv emi vratena |
GV01rv_hn10u:204: RV_10,013.03c akṣareṇa prati mima etām ṛtasya nābhāv adhi sam punāmi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:205: RV_10,013.04a devebhyaḥ kam avṛṇīta mṛtyum prajāyai kam amṛtaṃ nāvṛṇīta |
GV01rv_hn10u:206: RV_10,013.04c bṛhaspatiṃ yajñam akṛṇvata ṛṣim priyāṃ yamas tanvam prārirecīt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:207: RV_10,013.05a sapta kṣaranti śiśave marutvate pitre putrāso apy avīvatann ṛtam |
GV01rv_hn10u:208: RV_10,013.05c ubhe id asyobhayasya rājata ubhe yatete ubhayasya puṣyataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:209: RV_10,014.01a pareyivāṃsam pravato mahīr anu bahubhyaḥ panthām anupaspaśānam |
GV01rv_hn10u:210: RV_10,014.01c vaivasvataṃ saṃgamanaṃ janānāṃ yamaṃ rājānaṃ haviṣā duvasya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:211: RV_10,014.02a yamo no gātum prathamo viveda naiṣā gavyūtir apabhartavā u |
GV01rv_hn10u:212: RV_10,014.02c yatrā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ pareyur enā jajñānāḥ pathyā anu svāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:213: RV_10,014.03a mātalī kavyair yamo aṅgirobhir bṛhaspatir ṛkvabhir vāvṛdhānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:214: RV_10,014.03c yāṃś ca devā vāvṛdhur ye ca devān svāhānye svadhayānye madanti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:215: RV_10,014.04a imaṃ yama prastaram ā hi sīdāṅgirobhiḥ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:216: RV_10,014.04c ā tvā mantrāḥ kaviśastā vahantv enā rājan haviṣā mādayasva ||
GV01rv_hn10u:217: RV_10,014.05a aṅgirobhir ā gahi yajñiyebhir yama vairūpair iha mādayasva |
GV01rv_hn10u:218: RV_10,014.05c vivasvantaṃ huve yaḥ pitā te 'smin yajñe barhiṣy ā niṣadya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:219: RV_10,014.06a aṅgiraso naḥ pitaro navagvā atharvāṇo bhṛgavaḥ somyāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:220: RV_10,014.06c teṣāṃ vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyānām api bhadre saumanase syāma ||
GV01rv_hn10u:221: RV_10,014.07a prehi prehi pathibhiḥ pūrvyebhir yatrā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ pareyuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:222: RV_10,014.07c ubhā rājānā svadhayā madantā yamam paśyāsi varuṇaṃ ca devam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:223: RV_10,014.08a saṃ gacchasva pitṛbhiḥ saṃ yameneṣṭāpūrtena parame vyoman |
GV01rv_hn10u:224: RV_10,014.08c hitvāyāvadyam punar astam ehi saṃ gacchasva tanvā suvarcāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:225: RV_10,014.09a apeta vīta vi ca sarpatāto 'smā etam pitaro lokam akran |
GV01rv_hn10u:226: RV_10,014.09c ahobhir adbhir aktubhir vyaktaṃ yamo dadāty avasānam asmai ||
GV01rv_hn10u:227: RV_10,014.10a ati drava sārameyau śvānau caturakṣau śabalau sādhunā pathā |
GV01rv_hn10u:228: RV_10,014.10c athā pitṝn suvidatrāṃ upehi yamena ye sadhamādam madanti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:229: RV_10,014.11a yau te śvānau yama rakṣitārau caturakṣau pathirakṣī nṛcakṣasau |
GV01rv_hn10u:230: RV_10,014.11c tābhyām enam pari dehi rājan svasti cāsmā anamīvaṃ ca dhehi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:231: RV_10,014.12a urūṇasāv asutṛpā udumbalau yamasya dūtau carato janāṃ anu |
GV01rv_hn10u:232: RV_10,014.12c tāv asmabhyaṃ dṛśaye sūryāya punar dātām asum adyeha bhadram ||
GV01rv_hn10u:233: RV_10,014.13a yamāya somaṃ sunuta yamāya juhutā haviḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:234: RV_10,014.13c yamaṃ ha yajño gacchaty agnidūto araṅkṛtaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:235: RV_10,014.14a yamāya ghṛtavad dhavir juhota pra ca tiṣṭhata |
GV01rv_hn10u:236: RV_10,014.14c sa no deveṣv ā yamad dīrgham āyuḥ pra jīvase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:237: RV_10,014.15a yamāya madhumattamaṃ rājñe havyaṃ juhotana |
GV01rv_hn10u:238: RV_10,014.15c idaṃ nama ṛṣibhyaḥ pūrvajebhyaḥ pūrvebhyaḥ pathikṛdbhyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:239: RV_10,014.16a trikadrukebhiḥ patati ṣaḷ urvīr ekam id bṛhat |
GV01rv_hn10u:240: RV_10,014.16c triṣṭub gāyatrī chandāṃsi sarvā tā yama āhitā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:241: RV_10,015.01a ud īratām avara ut parāsa un madhyamāḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:242: RV_10,015.01c asuṃ ya īyur avṛkā ṛtajñās te no 'vantu pitaro haveṣu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:243: RV_10,015.02a idam pitṛbhyo namo astv adya ye pūrvāso ya uparāsa īyuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:244: RV_10,015.02c ye pārthive rajasy ā niṣattā ye vā nūnaṃ suvṛjanāsu vikṣu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:245: RV_10,015.03a āham pitṝn suvidatrāṃ avitsi napātaṃ ca vikramaṇaṃ ca viṣṇoḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:246: RV_10,015.03c barhiṣado ye svadhayā sutasya bhajanta pitvas ta ihāgamiṣṭhāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:247: RV_10,015.04a barhiṣadaḥ pitara ūty arvāg imā vo havyā cakṛmā juṣadhvam |
GV01rv_hn10u:248: RV_10,015.04c ta ā gatāvasā śantamenāthā naḥ śaṃ yor arapo dadhāta ||
GV01rv_hn10u:249: RV_10,015.05a upahūtāḥ pitaraḥ somyāso barhiṣyeṣu nidhiṣu priyeṣu |
GV01rv_hn10u:250: RV_10,015.05c ta ā gamantu ta iha śruvantv adhi bruvantu te 'vantv asmān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:251: RV_10,015.06a ācyā jānu dakṣiṇato niṣadyemaṃ yajñam abhi gṛṇīta viśve |
GV01rv_hn10u:252: RV_10,015.06c mā hiṃsiṣṭa pitaraḥ kena cin no yad va āgaḥ puruṣatā karāma ||
GV01rv_hn10u:253: RV_10,015.07a āsīnāso aruṇīnām upasthe rayiṃ dhatta dāśuṣe martyāya |
GV01rv_hn10u:254: RV_10,015.07c putrebhyaḥ pitaras tasya vasvaḥ pra yacchata ta ihorjaṃ dadhāta ||
GV01rv_hn10u:255: RV_10,015.08a ye naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ somyāso 'nūhire somapīthaṃ vasiṣṭhāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:256: RV_10,015.08c tebhir yamaḥ saṃrarāṇo havīṃṣy uśann uśadbhiḥ pratikāmam attu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:257: RV_10,015.09a ye tātṛṣur devatrā jehamānā hotrāvida stomataṣṭāso arkaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:258: RV_10,015.09c āgne yāhi suvidatrebhir arvāṅ satyaiḥ kavyaiḥ pitṛbhir gharmasadbhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:259: RV_10,015.10a ye satyāso havirado haviṣpā indreṇa devaiḥ sarathaṃ dadhānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:260: RV_10,015.10c āgne yāhi sahasraṃ devavandaiḥ paraiḥ pūrvaiḥ pitṛbhir gharmasadbhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:261: RV_10,015.11a agniṣvāttāḥ pitara eha gacchata sadaḥ-sadaḥ sadata supraṇītayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:262: RV_10,015.11c attā havīṃṣi prayatāni barhiṣy athā rayiṃ sarvavīraṃ dadhātana ||
GV01rv_hn10u:263: RV_10,015.12a tvam agna īḷito jātavedo 'vāḍ ḍhavyāni surabhīṇi kṛtvī |
GV01rv_hn10u:264: RV_10,015.12c prādāḥ pitṛbhyaḥ svadhayā te akṣann addhi tvaṃ deva prayatā havīṃṣi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:265: RV_10,015.13a ye ceha pitaro ye ca neha yāṃś ca vidma yāṃ u ca na pravidma |
GV01rv_hn10u:266: RV_10,015.13c tvaṃ vettha yati te jātavedaḥ svadhābhir yajñaṃ sukṛtaṃ juṣasva ||
GV01rv_hn10u:267: RV_10,015.14a ye agnidagdhā ye anagnidagdhā madhye divaḥ svadhayā mādayante |
GV01rv_hn10u:268: RV_10,015.14c tebhiḥ svarāḷ asunītim etāṃ yathāvaśaṃ tanvaṃ kalpayasva ||
GV01rv_hn10u:269: RV_10,016.01a mainam agne vi daho mābhi śoco māsya tvacaṃ cikṣipo mā śarīram |
GV01rv_hn10u:270: RV_10,016.01c yadā śṛtaṃ kṛṇavo jātavedo 'them enam pra hiṇutāt pitṛbhyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:271: RV_10,016.02a śṛtaṃ yadā karasi jātavedo 'them enam pari dattāt pitṛbhyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:272: RV_10,016.02c yadā gacchāty asunītim etām athā devānāṃ vaśanīr bhavāti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:273: RV_10,016.03a sūryaṃ cakṣur gacchatu vātam ātmā dyāṃ ca gaccha pṛthivīṃ ca dharmaṇā |
GV01rv_hn10u:274: RV_10,016.03c apo vā gaccha yadi tatra te hitam oṣadhīṣu prati tiṣṭhā śarīraiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:275: RV_10,016.04a ajo bhāgas tapasā taṃ tapasva taṃ te śocis tapatu taṃ te arciḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:276: RV_10,016.04c yās te śivās tanvo jātavedas tābhir vahainaṃ sukṛtām u lokam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:277: RV_10,016.05a ava sṛja punar agne pitṛbhyo yas ta āhutaś carati svadhābhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:278: RV_10,016.05c āyur vasāna upa vetu śeṣaḥ saṃ gacchatāṃ tanvā jātavedaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:279: RV_10,016.06a yat te kṛṣṇaḥ śakuna ātutoda pipīlaḥ sarpa uta vā śvāpadaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:280: RV_10,016.06c agniṣ ṭad viśvād agadaṃ kṛṇotu somaś ca yo brāhmaṇāṃ āviveśa ||
GV01rv_hn10u:281: RV_10,016.07a agner varma pari gobhir vyayasva sam prorṇuṣva pīvasā medasā ca |
GV01rv_hn10u:282: RV_10,016.07c net tvā dhṛṣṇur harasā jarhṛṣāṇo dadhṛg vidhakṣyan paryaṅkhayāte ||
GV01rv_hn10u:283: RV_10,016.08a imam agne camasam mā vi jihvaraḥ priyo devānām uta somyānām |
GV01rv_hn10u:284: RV_10,016.08c eṣa yaś camaso devapānas tasmin devā amṛtā mādayante ||
GV01rv_hn10u:285: RV_10,016.09a kravyādam agnim pra hiṇomi dūraṃ yamarājño gacchatu ripravāhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:286: RV_10,016.09c ihaivāyam itaro jātavedā devebhyo havyaṃ vahatu prajānan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:287: RV_10,016.10a yo agniḥ kravyāt praviveśa vo gṛham imam paśyann itaraṃ jātavedasam |
GV01rv_hn10u:288: RV_10,016.10c taṃ harāmi pitṛyajñāya devaṃ sa gharmam invāt parame sadhasthe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:289: RV_10,016.11a yo agniḥ kravyavāhanaḥ pitṝn yakṣad ṛtāvṛdhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:290: RV_10,016.11c pred u havyāni vocati devebhyaś ca pitṛbhya ā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:291: RV_10,016.12a uśantas tvā ni dhīmahy uśantaḥ sam idhīmahi |
GV01rv_hn10u:292: RV_10,016.12c uśann uśata ā vaha pitṝn haviṣe attave ||
GV01rv_hn10u:293: RV_10,016.13a yaṃ tvam agne samadahas tam u nir vāpayā punaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:294: RV_10,016.13c kiyāmbv atra rohatu pākadūrvā vyalkaśā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:296: RV_10,016.14c maṇḍūkyā su saṃ gama imaṃ sv agniṃ harṣaya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:297: RV_10,017.01a tvaṣṭā duhitre vahatuṃ kṛṇotītīdaṃ viśvam bhuvanaṃ sam eti |
GV01rv_hn10u:298: RV_10,017.01c yamasya mātā paryuhyamānā maho jāyā vivasvato nanāśa ||
GV01rv_hn10u:299: RV_10,017.02a apāgūhann amṛtām martyebhyaḥ kṛtvī savarṇām adadur vivasvate |
GV01rv_hn10u:300: RV_10,017.02c utāśvināv abharad yat tad āsīd ajahād u dvā mithunā saraṇyūḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:301: RV_10,017.03a pūṣā tvetaś cyāvayatu pra vidvān anaṣṭapaśur bhuvanasya gopāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:302: RV_10,017.03c sa tvaitebhyaḥ pari dadat pitṛbhyo 'gnir devebhyaḥ suvidatriyebhyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:303: RV_10,017.04a āyur viśvāyuḥ pari pāsati tvā pūṣā tvā pātu prapathe purastāt |
GV01rv_hn10u:304: RV_10,017.04c yatrāsate sukṛto yatra te yayus tatra tvā devaḥ savitā dadhātu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:305: RV_10,017.05a pūṣemā āśā anu veda sarvāḥ so asmāṃ abhayatamena neṣat |
GV01rv_hn10u:306: RV_10,017.05c svastidā āghṛṇiḥ sarvavīro 'prayucchan pura etu prajānan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:307: RV_10,017.06a prapathe pathām ajaniṣṭa pūṣā prapathe divaḥ prapathe pṛthivyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:308: RV_10,017.06c ubhe abhi priyatame sadhasthe ā ca parā ca carati prajānan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:309: RV_10,017.07a sarasvatīṃ devayanto havante sarasvatīm adhvare tāyamāne |
GV01rv_hn10u:310: RV_10,017.07c sarasvatīṃ sukṛto ahvayanta sarasvatī dāśuṣe vāryaṃ dāt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:311: RV_10,017.08a sarasvati yā sarathaṃ yayātha svadhābhir devi pitṛbhir madantī |
GV01rv_hn10u:312: RV_10,017.08c āsadyāsmin barhiṣi mādayasvānamīvā iṣa ā dhehy asme ||
GV01rv_hn10u:313: RV_10,017.09a sarasvatīṃ yām pitaro havante dakṣiṇā yajñam abhinakṣamāṇāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:314: RV_10,017.09c sahasrārgham iḷo atra bhāgaṃ rāyas poṣaṃ yajamāneṣu dhehi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:315: RV_10,017.10a āpo asmān mātaraḥ śundhayantu ghṛtena no ghṛtapvaḥ punantu |
GV01rv_hn10u:316: RV_10,017.10c viśvaṃ hi ripram pravahanti devīr ud id ābhyaḥ śucir ā pūta emi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:317: RV_10,017.11a drapsaś caskanda prathamāṃ anu dyūn imaṃ ca yonim anu yaś ca pūrvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:318: RV_10,017.11c samānaṃ yonim anu saṃcarantaṃ drapsaṃ juhomy anu sapta hotrāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:319: RV_10,017.12a yas te drapsa skandati yas te aṃśur bāhucyuto dhiṣaṇāyā upasthāt |
GV01rv_hn10u:320: RV_10,017.12c adhvaryor vā pari vā yaḥ pavitrāt taṃ te juhomi manasā vaṣaṭkṛtam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:321: RV_10,017.13a yas te drapsa skanno yas te aṃśur avaś ca yaḥ paraḥ srucā |
GV01rv_hn10u:322: RV_10,017.13c ayaṃ devo bṛhaspatiḥ saṃ taṃ siñcatu rādhase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:323: RV_10,017.14a payasvatīr oṣadhayaḥ payasvan māmakaṃ vacaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:324: RV_10,017.14c apām payasvad it payas tena mā saha śundhata ||
GV01rv_hn10u:325: RV_10,018.01a param mṛtyo anu parehi panthāṃ yas te sva itaro devayānāt |
GV01rv_hn10u:326: RV_10,018.01c cakṣuṣmate śṛṇvate te bravīmi mā naḥ prajāṃ rīriṣo mota vīrān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:327: RV_10,018.02a mṛtyoḥ padaṃ yopayanto yad aita drāghīya āyuḥ prataraṃ dadhānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:328: RV_10,018.02c āpyāyamānāḥ prajayā dhanena śuddhāḥ pūtā bhavata yajñiyāsaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:329: RV_10,018.03a ime jīvā vi mṛtair āvavṛtrann abhūd bhadrā devahūtir no adya |
GV01rv_hn10u:330: RV_10,018.03c prāñco agāma nṛtaye hasāya drāghīya āyuḥ prataraṃ dadhānāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:331: RV_10,018.04a imaṃ jīvebhyaḥ paridhiṃ dadhāmi maiṣāṃ nu gād aparo artham etam |
GV01rv_hn10u:332: RV_10,018.04c śataṃ jīvantu śaradaḥ purūcīr antar mṛtyuṃ dadhatām parvatena ||
GV01rv_hn10u:333: RV_10,018.05a yathāhāny anupūrvam bhavanti yatha ṛtava ṛtubhir yanti sādhu |
GV01rv_hn10u:334: RV_10,018.05c yathā na pūrvam aparo jahāty evā dhātar āyūṃṣi kalpayaiṣām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:335: RV_10,018.06a ā rohatāyur jarasaṃ vṛṇānā anupūrvaṃ yatamānā yati ṣṭha |
GV01rv_hn10u:336: RV_10,018.06c iha tvaṣṭā sujanimā sajoṣā dīrgham āyuḥ karati jīvase vaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:337: RV_10,018.07a imā nārīr avidhavāḥ supatnīr āñjanena sarpiṣā saṃ viśantu |
GV01rv_hn10u:338: RV_10,018.07c anaśravo 'namīvāḥ suratnā ā rohantu janayo yonim agre ||
GV01rv_hn10u:339: RV_10,018.08a ud īrṣva nāry abhi jīvalokaṃ gatāsum etam upa śeṣa ehi |
GV01rv_hn10u:340: RV_10,018.08c hastagrābhasya didhiṣos tavedam patyur janitvam abhi sam babhūtha ||
GV01rv_hn10u:341: RV_10,018.09a dhanur hastād ādadāno mṛtasyāsme kṣatrāya varcase balāya |
GV01rv_hn10u:342: RV_10,018.09c atraiva tvam iha vayaṃ suvīrā viśvā spṛdho abhimātīr jayema ||
GV01rv_hn10u:343: RV_10,018.10a upa sarpa mātaram bhūmim etām uruvyacasam pṛthivīṃ suśevām |
GV01rv_hn10u:344: RV_10,018.10c ūrṇamradā yuvatir dakṣiṇāvata eṣā tvā pātu nirṛter upasthāt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:345: RV_10,018.11a uc chvañcasva pṛthivi mā ni bādhathāḥ sūpāyanāsmai bhava sūpavañcanā |
GV01rv_hn10u:346: RV_10,018.11c mātā putraṃ yathā sicābhy enam bhūma ūrṇuhi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:347: RV_10,018.12a ucchvañcamānā pṛthivī su tiṣṭhatu sahasram mita upa hi śrayantām |
GV01rv_hn10u:348: RV_10,018.12c te gṛhāso ghṛtaścuto bhavantu viśvāhāsmai śaraṇāḥ santv atra ||
GV01rv_hn10u:349: RV_10,018.13a ut te stabhnāmi pṛthivīṃ tvat parīmaṃ logaṃ nidadhan mo ahaṃ riṣam |
GV01rv_hn10u:350: RV_10,018.13c etāṃ sthūṇām pitaro dhārayantu te 'trā yamaḥ sādanā te minotu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:351: RV_10,018.14a pratīcīne mām ahanīṣvāḥ parṇam ivā dadhuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:352: RV_10,018.14c pratīcīṃ jagrabhā vācam aśvaṃ raśanayā yathā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:353: RV_10,019.01a ni vartadhvam mānu gātāsmān siṣakta revatīḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:354: RV_10,019.01c agnīṣomā punarvasū asme dhārayataṃ rayim ||
GV01rv_hn10u:355: RV_10,019.02a punar enā ni vartaya punar enā ny ā kuru |
GV01rv_hn10u:356: RV_10,019.02c indra eṇā ni yacchatv agnir enā upājatu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:357: RV_10,019.03a punar etā ni vartantām asmin puṣyantu gopatau |
GV01rv_hn10u:358: RV_10,019.03c ihaivāgne ni dhārayeha tiṣṭhatu yā rayiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:359: RV_10,019.04a yan niyānaṃ nyayanaṃ saṃjñānaṃ yat parāyaṇam |
GV01rv_hn10u:360: RV_10,019.04c āvartanaṃ nivartanaṃ yo gopā api taṃ huve ||
GV01rv_hn10u:361: RV_10,019.05a ya udānaḍ vyayanaṃ ya udānaṭ parāyaṇam |
GV01rv_hn10u:362: RV_10,019.05c āvartanaṃ nivartanam api gopā ni vartatām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:363: RV_10,019.06a ā nivarta ni vartaya punar na indra gā dehi |
GV01rv_hn10u:365: RV_10,019.07a pari vo viśvato dadha ūrjā ghṛtena payasā |
GV01rv_hn10u:366: RV_10,019.07c ye devāḥ ke ca yajñiyās te rayyā saṃ sṛjantu naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:367: RV_10,019.08a ā nivartana vartaya ni nivartana vartaya |
GV01rv_hn10u:368: RV_10,019.08c bhūmyāś catasraḥ pradiśas tābhya enā ni vartaya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:369: RV_10,020.01a bhadraṃ no api vātaya manaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:370: RV_10,020.02a agnim īḷe bhujāṃ yaviṣṭhaṃ śāsā mitraṃ durdharītum |
GV01rv_hn10u:371: RV_10,020.02c yasya dharman svar enīḥ saparyanti mātur ūdhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:372: RV_10,020.03a yam āsā kṛpanīḷam bhāsāketuṃ vardhayanti |
GV01rv_hn10u:374: RV_10,020.04a aryo viśāṃ gātur eti pra yad ānaḍ divo antān |
GV01rv_hn10u:376: RV_10,020.05a juṣad dhavyā mānuṣasyordhvas tasthāv ṛbhvā yajñe |
GV01rv_hn10u:378: RV_10,020.06a sa hi kṣemo havir yajñaḥ śruṣṭīd asya gātur eti |
GV01rv_hn10u:380: RV_10,020.07a yajñāsāhaṃ duva iṣe 'gnim pūrvasya śevasya |
GV01rv_hn10u:382: RV_10,020.08a naro ye ke cāsmad ā viśvet te vāma ā syuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:384: RV_10,020.09a kṛṣṇaḥ śveto 'ruṣo yāmo asya bradhna ṛjra uta śoṇo yaśasvān |
GV01rv_hn10u:386: RV_10,020.10a evā te agne vimado manīṣām ūrjo napād amṛtebhiḥ sajoṣāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:387: RV_10,020.10c gira ā vakṣat sumatīr iyāna iṣam ūrjaṃ sukṣitiṃ viśvam ābhāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:388: RV_10,021.01a āgniṃ na svavṛktibhir hotāraṃ tvā vṛṇīmahe |
GV01rv_hn10u:389: RV_10,021.01c yajñāya stīrṇabarhiṣe vi vo made śīram pāvakaśociṣaṃ vivakṣase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:390: RV_10,021.02a tvām u te svābhuvaḥ śumbhanty aśvarādhasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:391: RV_10,021.02c veti tvām upasecanī vi vo mada ṛjītir agna āhutir vivakṣase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:392: RV_10,021.03a tve dharmāṇa āsate juhūbhiḥ siñcatīr iva |
GV01rv_hn10u:393: RV_10,021.03c kṛṣṇā rūpāṇy arjunā vi vo made viśvā adhi śriyo dhiṣe vivakṣase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:394: RV_10,021.04a yam agne manyase rayiṃ sahasāvann amartya |
GV01rv_hn10u:395: RV_10,021.04c tam ā no vājasātaye vi vo made yajñeṣu citram ā bharā vivakṣase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:396: RV_10,021.05a agnir jāto atharvaṇā vidad viśvāni kāvyā |
GV01rv_hn10u:397: RV_10,021.05c bhuvad dūto vivasvato vi vo made priyo yamasya kāmyo vivakṣase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:398: RV_10,021.06a tvāṃ yajñeṣv īḷate 'gne prayaty adhvare |
GV01rv_hn10u:399: RV_10,021.06c tvaṃ vasūni kāmyā vi vo made viśvā dadhāsi dāśuṣe vivakṣase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:400: RV_10,021.07a tvāṃ yajñeṣv ṛtvijaṃ cārum agne ni ṣedire |
GV01rv_hn10u:401: RV_10,021.07c ghṛtapratīkam manuṣo vi vo made śukraṃ cetiṣṭham akṣabhir vivakṣase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:402: RV_10,021.08a agne śukreṇa śociṣoru prathayase bṛhat |
GV01rv_hn10u:403: RV_10,021.08c abhikrandan vṛṣāyase vi vo made garbhaṃ dadhāsi jāmiṣu vivakṣase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:404: RV_10,022.01a kuha śruta indraḥ kasminn adya jane mitro na śrūyate |
GV01rv_hn10u:405: RV_10,022.01c ṛṣīṇāṃ vā yaḥ kṣaye guhā vā carkṛṣe girā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:406: RV_10,022.02a iha śruta indro asme adya stave vajry ṛcīṣamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:407: RV_10,022.02c mitro na yo janeṣv ā yaśaś cakre asāmy ā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:408: RV_10,022.03a maho yas patiḥ śavaso asāmy ā maho nṛmṇasya tūtujiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:409: RV_10,022.03c bhartā vajrasya dhṛṣṇoḥ pitā putram iva priyam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:410: RV_10,022.04a yujāno aśvā vātasya dhunī devo devasya vajrivaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:411: RV_10,022.04c syantā pathā virukmatā sṛjāna stoṣy adhvanaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:412: RV_10,022.05a tvaṃ tyā cid vātasyāśvāgā ṛjrā tmanā vahadhyai |
GV01rv_hn10u:413: RV_10,022.05c yayor devo na martyo yantā nakir vidāyyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:414: RV_10,022.06a adha gmantośanā pṛcchate vāṃ kadarthā na ā gṛham |
GV01rv_hn10u:415: RV_10,022.06c ā jagmathuḥ parākād divaś ca gmaś ca martyam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:416: RV_10,022.07a ā na indra pṛkṣase 'smākam brahmodyatam |
GV01rv_hn10u:417: RV_10,022.07c tat tvā yācāmahe 'vaḥ śuṣṇaṃ yad dhann amānuṣam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:418: RV_10,022.08a akarmā dasyur abhi no amantur anyavrato amānuṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:419: RV_10,022.08c tvaṃ tasyāmitrahan vadhar dāsasya dambhaya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:420: RV_10,022.09a tvaṃ na indra śūra śūrair uta tvotāso barhaṇā |
GV01rv_hn10u:421: RV_10,022.09c purutrā te vi pūrtayo navanta kṣoṇayo yathā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:422: RV_10,022.10a tvaṃ tān vṛtrahatye codayo nṝn kārpāṇe śūra vajrivaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:423: RV_10,022.10c guhā yadī kavīnāṃ viśāṃ nakṣatraśavasām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:424: RV_10,022.11a makṣū tā ta indra dānāpnasa ākṣāṇe śūra vajrivaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:425: RV_10,022.11c yad dha śuṣṇasya dambhayo jātaṃ viśvaṃ sayāvabhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:426: RV_10,022.12a mākudhryag indra śūra vasvīr asme bhūvann abhiṣṭayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:427: RV_10,022.12c vayaṃ-vayaṃ ta āsāṃ sumne syāma vajrivaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:428: RV_10,022.13a asme tā ta indra santu satyāhiṃsantīr upaspṛśaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:429: RV_10,022.13c vidyāma yāsām bhujo dhenūnāṃ na vajrivaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:430: RV_10,022.14a ahastā yad apadī vardhata kṣāḥ śacībhir vedyānām |
GV01rv_hn10u:431: RV_10,022.14c śuṣṇam pari pradakṣiṇid viśvāyave ni śiśnathaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:432: RV_10,022.15a pibā-pibed indra śūra somam mā riṣaṇyo vasavāna vasuḥ san |
GV01rv_hn10u:433: RV_10,022.15c uta trāyasva gṛṇato maghono mahaś ca rāyo revatas kṛdhī naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:434: RV_10,023.01a yajāmaha indraṃ vajradakṣiṇaṃ harīṇāṃ rathyaṃ vivratānām |
GV01rv_hn10u:435: RV_10,023.01c pra śmaśru dodhuvad ūrdhvathā bhūd vi senābhir dayamāno vi rādhasā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:436: RV_10,023.02a harī nv asya yā vane vide vasv indro maghair maghavā vṛtrahā bhuvat |
GV01rv_hn10u:437: RV_10,023.02c ṛbhur vāja ṛbhukṣāḥ patyate śavo 'va kṣṇaumi dāsasya nāma cit ||
GV01rv_hn10u:438: RV_10,023.03a yadā vajraṃ hiraṇyam id athā rathaṃ harī yam asya vahato vi sūribhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:439: RV_10,023.03c ā tiṣṭhati maghavā sanaśruta indro vājasya dīrghaśravasas patiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:440: RV_10,023.04a so cin nu vṛṣṭir yūthyā svā sacāṃ indraḥ śmaśrūṇi haritābhi pruṣṇute |
GV01rv_hn10u:441: RV_10,023.04c ava veti sukṣayaṃ sute madhūd id dhūnoti vāto yathā vanam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:442: RV_10,023.05a yo vācā vivāco mṛdhravācaḥ purū sahasrāśivā jaghāna |
GV01rv_hn10u:443: RV_10,023.05c tat-tad id asya pauṃsyaṃ gṛṇīmasi piteva yas taviṣīṃ vāvṛdhe śavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:444: RV_10,023.06a stomaṃ ta indra vimadā ajījanann apūrvyam purutamaṃ sudānave |
GV01rv_hn10u:445: RV_10,023.06c vidmā hy asya bhojanam inasya yad ā paśuṃ na gopāḥ karāmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:446: RV_10,023.07a mākir na enā sakhyā vi yauṣus tava cendra vimadasya ca ṛṣeḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:447: RV_10,023.07c vidmā hi te pramatiṃ deva jāmivad asme te santu sakhyā śivāni ||
GV01rv_hn10u:448: RV_10,024.01a indra somam imam piba madhumantaṃ camū sutam |
GV01rv_hn10u:449: RV_10,024.01c asme rayiṃ ni dhāraya vi vo made sahasriṇam purūvaso vivakṣase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:450: RV_10,024.02a tvāṃ yajñebhir ukthair upa havyebhir īmahe |
GV01rv_hn10u:451: RV_10,024.02c śacīpate śacīnāṃ vi vo made śreṣṭhaṃ no dhehi vāryaṃ vivakṣase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:452: RV_10,024.03a yas patir vāryāṇām asi radhrasya coditā |
GV01rv_hn10u:453: RV_10,024.03c indra stotṝṇām avitā vi vo made dviṣo naḥ pāhy aṃhaso vivakṣase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:454: RV_10,024.04a yuvaṃ śakrā māyāvinā samīcī nir amanthatam |
GV01rv_hn10u:455: RV_10,024.04c vimadena yad īḷitā nāsatyā niramanthatam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:456: RV_10,024.05a viśve devā akṛpanta samīcyor niṣpatantyoḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:457: RV_10,024.05c nāsatyāv abruvan devāḥ punar ā vahatād iti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:458: RV_10,024.06a madhuman me parāyaṇam madhumat punar āyanam |
GV01rv_hn10u:459: RV_10,024.06c tā no devā devatayā yuvam madhumatas kṛtam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:460: RV_10,025.01a bhadraṃ no api vātaya mano dakṣam uta kratum |
GV01rv_hn10u:461: RV_10,025.01c adhā te sakhye andhaso vi vo made raṇan gāvo na yavase vivakṣase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:462: RV_10,025.02a hṛdispṛśas ta āsate viśveṣu soma dhāmasu |
GV01rv_hn10u:463: RV_10,025.02c adhā kāmā ime mama vi vo made vi tiṣṭhante vasūyavo vivakṣase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:464: RV_10,025.03a uta vratāni soma te prāham mināmi pākyā |
GV01rv_hn10u:465: RV_10,025.03c adhā piteva sūnave vi vo made mṛḷā no abhi cid vadhād vivakṣase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:466: RV_10,025.04a sam u pra yanti dhītayaḥ sargāso 'vatāṃ iva |
GV01rv_hn10u:467: RV_10,025.04c kratuṃ naḥ soma jīvase vi vo made dhārayā camasāṃ iva vivakṣase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:468: RV_10,025.05a tava tye soma śaktibhir nikāmāso vy ṛṇvire |
GV01rv_hn10u:469: RV_10,025.05c gṛtsasya dhīrās tavaso vi vo made vrajaṃ gomantam aśvinaṃ vivakṣase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:470: RV_10,025.06a paśuṃ naḥ soma rakṣasi purutrā viṣṭhitaṃ jagat |
GV01rv_hn10u:471: RV_10,025.06c samākṛṇoṣi jīvase vi vo made viśvā sampaśyan bhuvanā vivakṣase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:472: RV_10,025.07a tvaṃ naḥ soma viśvato gopā adābhyo bhava |
GV01rv_hn10u:473: RV_10,025.07c sedha rājann apa sridho vi vo made mā no duḥśaṃsa īśatā vivakṣase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:474: RV_10,025.08a tvaṃ naḥ soma sukratur vayodheyāya jāgṛhi |
GV01rv_hn10u:475: RV_10,025.08c kṣetravittaro manuṣo vi vo made druho naḥ pāhy aṃhaso vivakṣase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:476: RV_10,025.09a tvaṃ no vṛtrahantamendrasyendo śivaḥ sakhā |
GV01rv_hn10u:477: RV_10,025.09c yat sīṃ havante samithe vi vo made yudhyamānās tokasātau vivakṣase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:478: RV_10,025.10a ayaṃ gha sa turo mada indrasya vardhata priyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:479: RV_10,025.10c ayaṃ kakṣīvato maho vi vo made matiṃ viprasya vardhayad vivakṣase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:480: RV_10,025.11a ayaṃ viprāya dāśuṣe vājāṃ iyarti gomataḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:481: RV_10,025.11c ayaṃ saptabhya ā varaṃ vi vo made prāndhaṃ śroṇaṃ ca tāriṣad vivakṣase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:482: RV_10,026.01a pra hy acchā manīṣā spārhā yanti niyutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:483: RV_10,026.01c pra dasrā niyudrathaḥ pūṣā aviṣṭu māhinaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:484: RV_10,026.02a yasya tyan mahitvaṃ vātāpyam ayaṃ janaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:485: RV_10,026.02c vipra ā vaṃsad dhītibhiś ciketa suṣṭutīnām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:486: RV_10,026.03a sa veda suṣṭutīnām indur na pūṣā vṛṣā |
GV01rv_hn10u:487: RV_10,026.03c abhi psuraḥ pruṣāyati vrajaṃ na ā pruṣāyati ||
GV01rv_hn10u:488: RV_10,026.04a maṃsīmahi tvā vayam asmākaṃ deva pūṣan |
GV01rv_hn10u:489: RV_10,026.04c matīnāṃ ca sādhanaṃ viprāṇāṃ cādhavam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:491: RV_10,026.05c ṛṣiḥ sa yo manurhito viprasya yāvayatsakhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:492: RV_10,026.06a ādhīṣamāṇāyāḥ patiḥ śucāyāś ca śucasya ca |
GV01rv_hn10u:494: RV_10,026.07a ino vājānām patir inaḥ puṣṭīnāṃ sakhā |
GV01rv_hn10u:495: RV_10,026.07c pra śmaśru haryato dūdhod vi vṛthā yo adābhyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:496: RV_10,026.08a ā te rathasya pūṣann ajā dhuraṃ vavṛtyuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:498: RV_10,026.09a asmākam ūrjā ratham pūṣā aviṣṭu māhinaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:499: RV_10,026.09c bhuvad vājānāṃ vṛdha imaṃ naḥ śṛṇavad dhavam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:500: RV_10,027.01a asat su me jaritaḥ sābhivego yat sunvate yajamānāya śikṣam |
GV01rv_hn10u:501: RV_10,027.01c anāśīrdām aham asmi prahantā satyadhvṛtaṃ vṛjināyantam ābhum ||
GV01rv_hn10u:502: RV_10,027.02a yadīd ahaṃ yudhaye saṃnayāny adevayūn tanvā śūśujānān |
GV01rv_hn10u:503: RV_10,027.02c amā te tumraṃ vṛṣabham pacāni tīvraṃ sutam pañcadaśaṃ ni ṣiñcam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:504: RV_10,027.03a nāhaṃ taṃ veda ya iti bravīty adevayūn samaraṇe jaghanvān |
GV01rv_hn10u:505: RV_10,027.03c yadāvākhyat samaraṇam ṛghāvad ād id dha me vṛṣabhā pra bruvanti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:506: RV_10,027.04a yad ajñāteṣu vṛjaneṣv āsaṃ viśve sato maghavāno ma āsan |
GV01rv_hn10u:507: RV_10,027.04c jināmi vet kṣema ā santam ābhum pra taṃ kṣiṇām parvate pādagṛhya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:508: RV_10,027.05a na vā u māṃ vṛjane vārayante na parvatāso yad aham manasye |
GV01rv_hn10u:509: RV_10,027.05c mama svanāt kṛdhukarṇo bhayāta eved anu dyūn kiraṇaḥ sam ejāt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:510: RV_10,027.06a darśan nv atra śṛtapāṃ anindrān bāhukṣadaḥ śarave patyamānān |
GV01rv_hn10u:511: RV_10,027.06c ghṛṣuṃ vā ye niniduḥ sakhāyam adhy ū nv eṣu pavayo vavṛtyuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:512: RV_10,027.07a abhūr v aukṣīr vy u āyur ānaḍ darṣan nu pūrvo aparo nu darṣat |
GV01rv_hn10u:513: RV_10,027.07c dve pavaste pari taṃ na bhūto yo asya pāre rajaso viveṣa ||
GV01rv_hn10u:514: RV_10,027.08a gāvo yavam prayutā aryo akṣan tā apaśyaṃ sahagopāś carantīḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:515: RV_10,027.08c havā id aryo abhitaḥ sam āyan kiyad āsu svapatiś chandayāte ||
GV01rv_hn10u:516: RV_10,027.09a saṃ yad vayaṃ yavasādo janānām ahaṃ yavāda urvajre antaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:517: RV_10,027.09c atrā yukto 'vasātāram icchād atho ayuktaṃ yunajad vavanvān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:518: RV_10,027.10a atred u me maṃsase satyam uktaṃ dvipāc ca yac catuṣpāt saṃsṛjāni |
GV01rv_hn10u:519: RV_10,027.10c strībhir yo atra vṛṣaṇam pṛtanyād ayuddho asya vi bhajāni vedaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:520: RV_10,027.11a yasyānakṣā duhitā jātv āsa kas tāṃ vidvāṃ abhi manyāte andhām |
GV01rv_hn10u:521: RV_10,027.11c kataro menim prati tam mucāte ya īṃ vahāte ya īṃ vā vareyāt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:522: RV_10,027.12a kiyatī yoṣā maryato vadhūyoḥ pariprītā panyasā vāryeṇa |
GV01rv_hn10u:523: RV_10,027.12c bhadrā vadhūr bhavati yat supeśāḥ svayaṃ sā mitraṃ vanute jane cit ||
GV01rv_hn10u:524: RV_10,027.13a patto jagāra pratyañcam atti śīrṣṇā śiraḥ prati dadhau varūtham |
GV01rv_hn10u:525: RV_10,027.13c āsīna ūrdhvām upasi kṣiṇāti nyaṅṅ uttānām anv eti bhūmim ||
GV01rv_hn10u:526: RV_10,027.14a bṛhann acchāyo apalāśo arvā tasthau mātā viṣito atti garbhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:527: RV_10,027.14c anyasyā vatsaṃ rihatī mimāya kayā bhuvā ni dadhe dhenur ūdhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:528: RV_10,027.15a sapta vīrāso adharād ud āyann aṣṭottarāttāt sam ajagmiran te |
GV01rv_hn10u:529: RV_10,027.15c nava paścātāt sthivimanta āyan daśa prāk sānu vi tiranty aśnaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:530: RV_10,027.16a daśānām ekaṃ kapilaṃ samānaṃ taṃ hinvanti kratave pāryāya |
GV01rv_hn10u:531: RV_10,027.16c garbham mātā sudhitaṃ vakṣaṇāsv avenantaṃ tuṣayantī bibharti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:532: RV_10,027.17a pīvānam meṣam apacanta vīrā nyuptā akṣā anu dīva āsan |
GV01rv_hn10u:533: RV_10,027.17c dvā dhanum bṛhatīm apsv antaḥ pavitravantā carataḥ punantā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:534: RV_10,027.18a vi krośanāso viṣvañca āyan pacāti nemo nahi pakṣad ardhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:535: RV_10,027.18c ayam me devaḥ savitā tad āha drvanna id vanavat sarpirannaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:536: RV_10,027.19a apaśyaṃ grāmaṃ vahamānam ārād acakrayā svadhayā vartamānam |
GV01rv_hn10u:537: RV_10,027.19c siṣakty aryaḥ pra yugā janānāṃ sadyaḥ śiśnā pramināno navīyān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:538: RV_10,027.20a etau me gāvau pramarasya yuktau mo ṣu pra sedhīr muhur in mamandhi |
GV01rv_hn10u:539: RV_10,027.20c āpaś cid asya vi naśanty arthaṃ sūraś ca marka uparo babhūvān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:540: RV_10,027.21a ayaṃ yo vajraḥ purudhā vivṛtto 'vaḥ sūryasya bṛhataḥ purīṣāt |
GV01rv_hn10u:541: RV_10,027.21c śrava id enā paro anyad asti tad avyathī jarimāṇas taranti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:542: RV_10,027.22a vṛkṣe-vṛkṣe niyatā mīmayad gaus tato vayaḥ pra patān pūruṣādaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:543: RV_10,027.22c athedaṃ viśvam bhuvanam bhayāta indrāya sunvad ṛṣaye ca śikṣat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:544: RV_10,027.23a devānām māne prathamā atiṣṭhan kṛntatrād eṣām uparā ud āyan |
GV01rv_hn10u:545: RV_10,027.23c trayas tapanti pṛthivīm anūpā dvā bṛbūkaṃ vahataḥ purīṣam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:546: RV_10,027.24a sā te jīvātur uta tasya viddhi mā smaitādṛg apa gūhaḥ samarye |
GV01rv_hn10u:547: RV_10,027.24c āviḥ svaḥ kṛṇute gūhate busaṃ sa pādur asya nirṇijo na mucyate ||
GV01rv_hn10u:548: RV_10,028.01a viśvo hy anyo arir ājagāma mamed aha śvaśuro nā jagāma |
GV01rv_hn10u:549: RV_10,028.01c jakṣīyād dhānā uta somam papīyāt svāśitaḥ punar astaṃ jagāyāt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:550: RV_10,028.02a sa roruvad vṛṣabhas tigmaśṛṅgo varṣman tasthau varimann ā pṛthivyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:551: RV_10,028.02c viśveṣv enaṃ vṛjaneṣu pāmi yo me kukṣī sutasomaḥ pṛṇāti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:552: RV_10,028.03a adriṇā te mandina indra tūyān sunvanti somān pibasi tvam eṣām |
GV01rv_hn10u:553: RV_10,028.03c pacanti te vṛṣabhāṃ atsi teṣām pṛkṣeṇa yan maghavan hūyamānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:554: RV_10,028.04a idaṃ su me jaritar ā cikiddhi pratīpaṃ śāpaṃ nadyo vahanti |
GV01rv_hn10u:555: RV_10,028.04c lopāśaḥ siṃham pratyañcam atsāḥ kroṣṭā varāhaṃ nir atakta kakṣāt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:556: RV_10,028.05a kathā ta etad aham ā ciketaṃ gṛtsasya pākas tavaso manīṣām |
GV01rv_hn10u:557: RV_10,028.05c tvaṃ no vidvāṃ ṛtuthā vi voco yam ardhaṃ te maghavan kṣemyā dhūḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:558: RV_10,028.06a evā hi māṃ tavasaṃ vardhayanti divaś cin me bṛhata uttarā dhūḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:559: RV_10,028.06c purū sahasrā ni śiśāmi sākam aśatruṃ hi mā janitā jajāna ||
GV01rv_hn10u:560: RV_10,028.07a evā hi māṃ tavasaṃ jajñur ugraṃ karman-karman vṛṣaṇam indra devāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:561: RV_10,028.07c vadhīṃ vṛtraṃ vajreṇa mandasāno 'pa vrajam mahinā dāśuṣe vam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:562: RV_10,028.08a devāsa āyan paraśūṃr abibhran vanā vṛścanto abhi viḍbhir āyan |
GV01rv_hn10u:563: RV_10,028.08c ni sudrvaṃ dadhato vakṣaṇāsu yatrā kṛpīṭam anu tad dahanti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:564: RV_10,028.09a śaśaḥ kṣuram pratyañcaṃ jagārādriṃ logena vy abhedam ārāt |
GV01rv_hn10u:565: RV_10,028.09c bṛhantaṃ cid ṛhate randhayāni vayad vatso vṛṣabhaṃ śūśuvānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:566: RV_10,028.10a suparṇa itthā nakham ā siṣāyāvaruddhaḥ paripadaṃ na siṃhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:567: RV_10,028.10c niruddhaś cin mahiṣas tarṣyāvān godhā tasmā ayathaṃ karṣad etat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:568: RV_10,028.11a tebhyo godhā ayathaṃ karṣad etad ye brahmaṇaḥ pratipīyanty annaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:569: RV_10,028.11c sima ukṣṇo 'vasṛṣṭāṃ adanti svayam balāni tanvaḥ śṛṇānāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:570: RV_10,028.12a ete śamībhiḥ suśamī abhūvan ye hinvire tanvaḥ soma ukthaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:571: RV_10,028.12c nṛvad vadann upa no māhi vājān divi śravo dadhiṣe nāma vīraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:572: RV_10,029.01a vane na vā yo ny adhāyi cākañ chucir vāṃ stomo bhuraṇāv ajīgaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:573: RV_10,029.01c yasyed indraḥ purudineṣu hotā nṛṇāṃ naryo nṛtamaḥ kṣapāvān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:574: RV_10,029.02a pra te asyā uṣasaḥ prāparasyā nṛtau syāma nṛtamasya nṛṇām |
GV01rv_hn10u:575: RV_10,029.02c anu triśokaḥ śatam āvahan nṝn kutsena ratho yo asat sasavān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:576: RV_10,029.03a kas te mada indra rantyo bhūd duro giro abhy ugro vi dhāva |
GV01rv_hn10u:577: RV_10,029.03c kad vāho arvāg upa mā manīṣā ā tvā śakyām upamaṃ rādho annaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:578: RV_10,029.04a kad u dyumnam indra tvāvato nṝn kayā dhiyā karase kan na āgan |
GV01rv_hn10u:579: RV_10,029.04c mitro na satya urugāya bhṛtyā anne samasya yad asan manīṣāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:580: RV_10,029.05a preraya sūro arthaṃ na pāraṃ ye asya kāmaṃ janidhā iva gman |
GV01rv_hn10u:581: RV_10,029.05c giraś ca ye te tuvijāta pūrvīr nara indra pratiśikṣanty annaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:582: RV_10,029.06a mātre nu te sumite indra pūrvī dyaur majmanā pṛthivī kāvyena |
GV01rv_hn10u:583: RV_10,029.06c varāya te ghṛtavantaḥ sutāsaḥ svādman bhavantu pītaye madhūni ||
GV01rv_hn10u:584: RV_10,029.07a ā madhvo asmā asicann amatram indrāya pūrṇaṃ sa hi satyarādhāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:585: RV_10,029.07c sa vāvṛdhe varimann ā pṛthivyā abhi kratvā naryaḥ pauṃsyaiś ca ||
GV01rv_hn10u:586: RV_10,029.08a vy ānaḷ indraḥ pṛtanāḥ svojā āsmai yatante sakhyāya pūrvīḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:587: RV_10,029.08c ā smā rathaṃ na pṛtanāsu tiṣṭha yam bhadrayā sumatyā codayāse ||
GV01rv_hn10u:588: RV_10,030.01a pra devatrā brahmaṇe gātur etv apo acchā manaso na prayukti |
GV01rv_hn10u:589: RV_10,030.01c mahīm mitrasya varuṇasya dhāsim pṛthujrayase rīradhā suvṛktim ||
GV01rv_hn10u:590: RV_10,030.02a adhvaryavo haviṣmanto hi bhūtācchāpa itośatīr uśantaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:591: RV_10,030.02c ava yāś caṣṭe aruṇaḥ suparṇas tam āsyadhvam ūrmim adyā suhastāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:592: RV_10,030.03a adhvaryavo 'pa itā samudram apāṃ napātaṃ haviṣā yajadhvam |
GV01rv_hn10u:593: RV_10,030.03c sa vo dadad ūrmim adyā supūtaṃ tasmai somam madhumantaṃ sunota ||
GV01rv_hn10u:594: RV_10,030.04a yo anidhmo dīdayad apsv antar yaṃ viprāsa īḷate adhvareṣu |
GV01rv_hn10u:595: RV_10,030.04c apāṃ napān madhumatīr apo dā yābhir indro vāvṛdhe vīryāya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:596: RV_10,030.05a yābhiḥ somo modate harṣate ca kalyāṇībhir yuvatibhir na maryaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:597: RV_10,030.05c tā adhvaryo apo acchā parehi yad āsiñcā oṣadhībhiḥ punītāt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:598: RV_10,030.06a eved yūne yuvatayo namanta yad īm uśann uśatīr ety accha |
GV01rv_hn10u:599: RV_10,030.06c saṃ jānate manasā saṃ cikitre 'dhvaryavo dhiṣaṇāpaś ca devīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:600: RV_10,030.07a yo vo vṛtābhyo akṛṇod u lokaṃ yo vo mahyā abhiśaster amuñcat |
GV01rv_hn10u:601: RV_10,030.07c tasmā indrāya madhumantam ūrmiṃ devamādanam pra hiṇotanāpaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:602: RV_10,030.08a prāsmai hinota madhumantam ūrmiṃ garbho yo vaḥ sindhavo madhva utsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:603: RV_10,030.08c ghṛtapṛṣṭham īḍyam adhvareṣv āpo revatīḥ śṛṇutā havam me ||
GV01rv_hn10u:604: RV_10,030.09a taṃ sindhavo matsaram indrapānam ūrmim pra heta ya ubhe iyarti |
GV01rv_hn10u:605: RV_10,030.09c madacyutam auśānaṃ nabhojām pari tritantuṃ vicarantam utsam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:606: RV_10,030.10a āvarvṛtatīr adha nu dvidhārā goṣuyudho na niyavaṃ carantīḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:607: RV_10,030.10c ṛṣe janitrīr bhuvanasya patnīr apo vandasva savṛdhaḥ sayonīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:608: RV_10,030.11a hinotā no adhvaraṃ devayajyā hinota brahma sanaye dhanānām |
GV01rv_hn10u:609: RV_10,030.11c ṛtasya yoge vi ṣyadhvam ūdhaḥ śruṣṭīvarīr bhūtanāsmabhyam āpaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:610: RV_10,030.12a āpo revatīḥ kṣayathā hi vasvaḥ kratuṃ ca bhadram bibhṛthāmṛtaṃ ca |
GV01rv_hn10u:611: RV_10,030.12c rāyaś ca stha svapatyasya patnīḥ sarasvatī tad gṛṇate vayo dhāt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:612: RV_10,030.13a prati yad āpo adṛśram āyatīr ghṛtam payāṃsi bibhratīr madhūni |
GV01rv_hn10u:613: RV_10,030.13c adhvaryubhir manasā saṃvidānā indrāya somaṃ suṣutam bharantīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:614: RV_10,030.14a emā agman revatīr jīvadhanyā adhvaryavaḥ sādayatā sakhāyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:615: RV_10,030.14c ni barhiṣi dhattana somyāso 'pāṃ naptrā saṃvidānāsa enāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:616: RV_10,030.15a āgmann āpa uśatīr barhir edaṃ ny adhvare asadan devayantīḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:617: RV_10,030.15c adhvaryavaḥ sunutendrāya somam abhūd u vaḥ suśakā devayajyā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:618: RV_10,031.01a ā no devānām upa vetu śaṃso viśvebhis turair avase yajatraḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:619: RV_10,031.01c tebhir vayaṃ suṣakhāyo bhavema taranto viśvā duritā syāma ||
GV01rv_hn10u:620: RV_10,031.02a pari cin marto draviṇam mamanyād ṛtasya pathā namasā vivāset |
GV01rv_hn10u:621: RV_10,031.02c uta svena kratunā saṃ vadeta śreyāṃsaṃ dakṣam manasā jagṛbhyāt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:622: RV_10,031.03a adhāyi dhītir asasṛgram aṃśās tīrthe na dasmam upa yanty ūmāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:623: RV_10,031.03c abhy ānaśma suvitasya śūṣaṃ navedaso amṛtānām abhūma ||
GV01rv_hn10u:624: RV_10,031.04a nityaś cākanyāt svapatir damūnā yasmā u devaḥ savitā jajāna |
GV01rv_hn10u:625: RV_10,031.04c bhago vā gobhir aryamem anajyāt so asmai cāruś chadayad uta syāt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:626: RV_10,031.05a iyaṃ sā bhūyā uṣasām iva kṣā yad dha kṣumantaḥ śavasā samāyan |
GV01rv_hn10u:627: RV_10,031.05c asya stutiṃ jaritur bhikṣamāṇā ā naḥ śagmāsa upa yantu vājāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:628: RV_10,031.06a asyed eṣā sumatiḥ paprathānābhavat pūrvyā bhūmanā gauḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:629: RV_10,031.06c asya sanīḷā asurasya yonau samāna ā bharaṇe bibhramāṇāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:630: RV_10,031.07a kiṃ svid vanaṃ ka u sa vṛkṣa āsa yato dyāvāpṛthivī niṣṭatakṣuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:631: RV_10,031.07c saṃtasthāne ajare itaūtī ahāni pūrvīr uṣaso jaranta ||
GV01rv_hn10u:632: RV_10,031.08a naitāvad enā paro anyad asty ukṣā sa dyāvāpṛthivī bibharti |
GV01rv_hn10u:633: RV_10,031.08c tvacam pavitraṃ kṛṇuta svadhāvān yad īṃ sūryaṃ na harito vahanti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:634: RV_10,031.09a stego na kṣām aty eti pṛthvīm mihaṃ na vāto vi ha vāti bhūma |
GV01rv_hn10u:635: RV_10,031.09c mitro yatra varuṇo ajyamāno 'gnir vane na vy asṛṣṭa śokam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:636: RV_10,031.10a starīr yat sūta sadyo ajyamānā vyathir avyathīḥ kṛṇuta svagopā |
GV01rv_hn10u:637: RV_10,031.10c putro yat pūrvaḥ pitror janiṣṭa śamyāṃ gaur jagāra yad dha pṛcchān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:638: RV_10,031.11a uta kaṇvaṃ nṛṣadaḥ putram āhur uta śyāvo dhanam ādatta vājī |
GV01rv_hn10u:639: RV_10,031.11c pra kṛṣṇāya ruśad apinvatodhar ṛtam atra nakir asmā apīpet ||
GV01rv_hn10u:640: RV_10,032.01a pra su gmantā dhiyasānasya sakṣaṇi varebhir varāṃ abhi ṣu prasīdataḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:641: RV_10,032.01c asmākam indra ubhayaṃ jujoṣati yat somyasyāndhaso bubodhati ||
GV01rv_hn10u:642: RV_10,032.02a vīndra yāsi divyāni rocanā vi pārthivāni rajasā puruṣṭuta |
GV01rv_hn10u:643: RV_10,032.02c ye tvā vahanti muhur adhvarāṃ upa te su vanvantu vagvanāṃ arādhasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:644: RV_10,032.03a tad in me chantsad vapuṣo vapuṣṭaram putro yaj jānam pitror adhīyati |
GV01rv_hn10u:645: RV_10,032.03c jāyā patiṃ vahati vagnunā sumat puṃsa id bhadro vahatuḥ pariṣkṛtaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:646: RV_10,032.04a tad it sadhastham abhi cāru dīdhaya gāvo yac chāsan vahatuṃ na dhenavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:647: RV_10,032.04c mātā yan mantur yūthasya pūrvyābhi vāṇasya saptadhātur ij janaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:648: RV_10,032.05a pra vo 'cchā ririce devayuṣ padam eko rudrebhir yāti turvaṇiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:649: RV_10,032.05c jarā vā yeṣv amṛteṣu dāvane pari va ūmebhyaḥ siñcatā madhu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:650: RV_10,032.06a nidhīyamānam apagūḷham apsu pra me devānāṃ vratapā uvāca |
GV01rv_hn10u:651: RV_10,032.06c indro vidvāṃ anu hi tvā cacakṣa tenāham agne anuśiṣṭa āgām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:652: RV_10,032.07a akṣetravit kṣetravidaṃ hy aprāṭ sa praiti kṣetravidānuśiṣṭaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:653: RV_10,032.07c etad vai bhadram anuśāsanasyota srutiṃ vindaty añjasīnām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:654: RV_10,032.08a adyed u prāṇīd amamann imāhāpīvṛto adhayan mātur ūdhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:655: RV_10,032.08c em enam āpa jarimā yuvānam aheḷan vasuḥ sumanā babhūva ||
GV01rv_hn10u:656: RV_10,032.09a etāni bhadrā kalaśa kriyāma kuruśravaṇa dadato maghāni |
GV01rv_hn10u:657: RV_10,032.09c dāna id vo maghavānaḥ so astv ayaṃ ca somo hṛdi yam bibharmi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:658: RV_10,033.01a pra mā yuyujre prayujo janānāṃ vahāmi sma pūṣaṇam antareṇa |
GV01rv_hn10u:659: RV_10,033.01c viśve devāso adha mām arakṣan duḥśāsur āgād iti ghoṣa āsīt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:660: RV_10,033.02a sam mā tapanty abhitaḥ sapatnīr iva parśavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:661: RV_10,033.02c ni bādhate amatir nagnatā jasur ver na vevīyate matiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:662: RV_10,033.03a mūṣo na śiśnā vy adanti mādhya stotāraṃ te śatakrato |
GV01rv_hn10u:663: RV_10,033.03c sakṛt su no maghavann indra mṛḷayādhā piteva no bhava ||
GV01rv_hn10u:666: RV_10,033.05a yasya mā harito rathe tisro vahanti sādhuyā |
GV01rv_hn10u:668: RV_10,033.06a yasya prasvādaso gira upamaśravasaḥ pituḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:670: RV_10,033.07a adhi putropamaśravo napān mitrātither ihi |
GV01rv_hn10u:672: RV_10,033.08a yad īśīyāmṛtānām uta vā martyānām |
GV01rv_hn10u:674: RV_10,033.09a na devānām ati vrataṃ śatātmā cana jīvati |
GV01rv_hn10u:676: RV_10,034.01a prāvepā mā bṛhato mādayanti pravātejā iriṇe varvṛtānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:677: RV_10,034.01c somasyeva maujavatasya bhakṣo vibhīdako jāgṛvir mahyam acchān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:678: RV_10,034.02a na mā mimetha na jihīḷa eṣā śivā sakhibhya uta mahyam āsīt |
GV01rv_hn10u:679: RV_10,034.02c akṣasyāham ekaparasya hetor anuvratām apa jāyām arodham ||
GV01rv_hn10u:680: RV_10,034.03a dveṣṭi śvaśrūr apa jāyā ruṇaddhi na nāthito vindate marḍitāram |
GV01rv_hn10u:681: RV_10,034.03c aśvasyeva jarato vasnyasya nāhaṃ vindāmi kitavasya bhogam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:682: RV_10,034.04a anye jāyām pari mṛśanty asya yasyāgṛdhad vedane vājy akṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:683: RV_10,034.04c pitā mātā bhrātara enam āhur na jānīmo nayatā baddham etam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:684: RV_10,034.05a yad ādīdhye na daviṣāṇy ebhiḥ parāyadbhyo 'va hīye sakhibhyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:685: RV_10,034.05c nyuptāś ca babhravo vācam akrataṃ emīd eṣāṃ niṣkṛtaṃ jāriṇīva ||
GV01rv_hn10u:686: RV_10,034.06a sabhām eti kitavaḥ pṛcchamāno jeṣyāmīti tanvā śūśujānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:687: RV_10,034.06c akṣāso asya vi tiranti kāmam pratidīvne dadhata ā kṛtāni ||
GV01rv_hn10u:688: RV_10,034.07a akṣāsa id aṅkuśino nitodino nikṛtvānas tapanās tāpayiṣṇavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:689: RV_10,034.07c kumāradeṣṇā jayataḥ punarhaṇo madhvā sampṛktāḥ kitavasya barhaṇā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:690: RV_10,034.08a tripañcāśaḥ krīḷati vrāta eṣāṃ deva iva savitā satyadharmā |
GV01rv_hn10u:691: RV_10,034.08c ugrasya cin manyave nā namante rājā cid ebhyo nama it kṛṇoti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:692: RV_10,034.09a nīcā vartanta upari sphuranty ahastāso hastavantaṃ sahante |
GV01rv_hn10u:693: RV_10,034.09c divyā aṅgārā iriṇe nyuptāḥ śītāḥ santo hṛdayaṃ nir dahanti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:694: RV_10,034.10a jāyā tapyate kitavasya hīnā mātā putrasya carataḥ kva svit |
GV01rv_hn10u:695: RV_10,034.10c ṛṇāvā bibhyad dhanam icchamāno 'nyeṣām astam upa naktam eti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:696: RV_10,034.11a striyaṃ dṛṣṭvāya kitavaṃ tatāpānyeṣāṃ jāyāṃ sukṛtaṃ ca yonim |
GV01rv_hn10u:697: RV_10,034.11c pūrvāhṇe aśvān yuyuje hi babhrūn so agner ante vṛṣalaḥ papāda ||
GV01rv_hn10u:698: RV_10,034.12a yo vaḥ senānīr mahato gaṇasya rājā vrātasya prathamo babhūva |
GV01rv_hn10u:699: RV_10,034.12c tasmai kṛṇomi na dhanā ruṇadhmi daśāham prācīs tad ṛtaṃ vadāmi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:700: RV_10,034.13a akṣair mā dīvyaḥ kṛṣim it kṛṣasva vitte ramasva bahu manyamānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:701: RV_10,034.13c tatra gāvaḥ kitava tatra jāyā tan me vi caṣṭe savitāyam aryaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:702: RV_10,034.14a mitraṃ kṛṇudhvaṃ khalu mṛḷatā no mā no ghoreṇa caratābhi dhṛṣṇu |
GV01rv_hn10u:703: RV_10,034.14c ni vo nu manyur viśatām arātir anyo babhrūṇām prasitau nv astu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:704: RV_10,035.01a abudhram u tya indravanto agnayo jyotir bharanta uṣaso vyuṣṭiṣu |
GV01rv_hn10u:705: RV_10,035.01c mahī dyāvāpṛthivī cetatām apo 'dyā devānām ava ā vṛṇīmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:706: RV_10,035.02a divaspṛthivyor ava ā vṛṇīmahe mātṝn sindhūn parvatāñ charyaṇāvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:707: RV_10,035.02c anāgāstvaṃ sūryam uṣāsam īmahe bhadraṃ somaḥ suvāno adyā kṛṇotu naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:708: RV_10,035.03a dyāvā no adya pṛthivī anāgaso mahī trāyetāṃ suvitāya mātarā |
GV01rv_hn10u:709: RV_10,035.03c uṣā ucchanty apa bādhatām aghaṃ svasty agniṃ samidhānam īmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:710: RV_10,035.04a iyaṃ na usrā prathamā sudevyaṃ revat sanibhyo revatī vy ucchatu |
GV01rv_hn10u:711: RV_10,035.04c āre manyuṃ durvidatrasya dhīmahi svasty agniṃ samidhānam īmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:712: RV_10,035.05a pra yāḥ sisrate sūryasya raśmibhir jyotir bharantīr uṣaso vyuṣṭiṣu |
GV01rv_hn10u:713: RV_10,035.05c bhadrā no adya śravase vy ucchata svasty agniṃ samidhānam īmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:714: RV_10,035.06a anamīvā uṣasa ā carantu na ud agnayo jihatāṃ jyotiṣā bṛhat |
GV01rv_hn10u:715: RV_10,035.06c āyukṣātām aśvinā tūtujiṃ rathaṃ svasty agniṃ samidhānam īmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:716: RV_10,035.07a śreṣṭhaṃ no adya savitar vareṇyam bhāgam ā suva sa hi ratnadhā asi |
GV01rv_hn10u:717: RV_10,035.07c rāyo janitrīṃ dhiṣaṇām upa bruve svasty agniṃ samidhānam īmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:718: RV_10,035.08a pipartu mā tad ṛtasya pravācanaṃ devānāṃ yan manuṣyā amanmahi |
GV01rv_hn10u:719: RV_10,035.08c viśvā id usrā spaḷ ud eti sūryaḥ svasty agniṃ samidhānam īmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:720: RV_10,035.09a adveṣo adya barhiṣa starīmaṇi grāvṇāṃ yoge manmanaḥ sādha īmahe |
GV01rv_hn10u:721: RV_10,035.09c ādityānāṃ śarmaṇi sthā bhuraṇyasi svasty agniṃ samidhānam īmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:722: RV_10,035.10a ā no barhiḥ sadhamāde bṛhad divi devāṃ īḷe sādayā sapta hotṝn |
GV01rv_hn10u:723: RV_10,035.10c indram mitraṃ varuṇaṃ sātaye bhagaṃ svasty agniṃ samidhānam īmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:724: RV_10,035.11a ta ādityā ā gatā sarvatātaye vṛdhe no yajñam avatā sajoṣasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:725: RV_10,035.11c bṛhaspatim pūṣaṇam aśvinā bhagaṃ svasty agniṃ samidhānam īmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:726: RV_10,035.12a tan no devā yacchata supravācanaṃ chardir ādityāḥ subharaṃ nṛpāyyam |
GV01rv_hn10u:727: RV_10,035.12c paśve tokāya tanayāya jīvase svasty agniṃ samidhānam īmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:728: RV_10,035.13a viśve adya maruto viśva ūtī viśve bhavantv agnayaḥ samiddhāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:729: RV_10,035.13c viśve no devā avasā gamantu viśvam astu draviṇaṃ vājo asme ||
GV01rv_hn10u:730: RV_10,035.14a yaṃ devāso 'vatha vājasātau yaṃ trāyadhve yam pipṛthāty aṃhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:731: RV_10,035.14c yo vo gopīthe na bhayasya veda te syāma devavītaye turāsaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:732: RV_10,036.01a uṣāsānaktā bṛhatī supeśasā dyāvākṣāmā varuṇo mitro aryamā |
GV01rv_hn10u:733: RV_10,036.01c indraṃ huve marutaḥ parvatāṃ apa ādityān dyāvāpṛthivī apaḥ svaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:734: RV_10,036.02a dyauś ca naḥ pṛthivī ca pracetasa ṛtāvarī rakṣatām aṃhaso riṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:735: RV_10,036.02c mā durvidatrā nirṛtir na īśata tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:736: RV_10,036.03a viśvasmān no aditiḥ pātv aṃhaso mātā mitrasya varuṇasya revataḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:737: RV_10,036.03c svarvaj jyotir avṛkaṃ naśīmahi tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:738: RV_10,036.04a grāvā vadann apa rakṣāṃsi sedhatu duṣṣvapnyaṃ nirṛtiṃ viśvam atriṇam |
GV01rv_hn10u:739: RV_10,036.04c ādityaṃ śarma marutām aśīmahi tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:740: RV_10,036.05a endro barhiḥ sīdatu pinvatām iḷā bṛhaspatiḥ sāmabhir ṛkvo arcatu |
GV01rv_hn10u:741: RV_10,036.05c supraketaṃ jīvase manma dhīmahi tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:742: RV_10,036.06a divispṛśaṃ yajñam asmākam aśvinā jīrādhvaraṃ kṛṇutaṃ sumnam iṣṭaye |
GV01rv_hn10u:743: RV_10,036.06c prācīnaraśmim āhutaṃ ghṛtena tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:744: RV_10,036.07a upa hvaye suhavam mārutaṃ gaṇam pāvakam ṛṣvaṃ sakhyāya śambhuvam |
GV01rv_hn10u:745: RV_10,036.07c rāyas poṣaṃ sauśravasāya dhīmahi tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:746: RV_10,036.08a apām peruṃ jīvadhanyam bharāmahe devāvyaṃ suhavam adhvaraśriyam |
GV01rv_hn10u:747: RV_10,036.08c suraśmiṃ somam indriyaṃ yamīmahi tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:748: RV_10,036.09a sanema tat susanitā sanitvabhir vayaṃ jīvā jīvaputrā anāgasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:749: RV_10,036.09c brahmadviṣo viṣvag eno bharerata tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:750: RV_10,036.10a ye sthā manor yajñiyās te śṛṇotana yad vo devā īmahe tad dadātana |
GV01rv_hn10u:751: RV_10,036.10c jaitraṃ kratuṃ rayimad vīravad yaśas tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:752: RV_10,036.11a mahad adya mahatām ā vṛṇīmahe 'vo devānām bṛhatām anarvaṇām |
GV01rv_hn10u:753: RV_10,036.11c yathā vasu vīrajātaṃ naśāmahai tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:754: RV_10,036.12a maho agneḥ samidhānasya śarmaṇy anāgā mitre varuṇe svastaye |
GV01rv_hn10u:755: RV_10,036.12c śreṣṭhe syāma savituḥ savīmani tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:756: RV_10,036.13a ye savituḥ satyasavasya viśve mitrasya vrate varuṇasya devāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:757: RV_10,036.13c te saubhagaṃ vīravad gomad apno dadhātana draviṇaṃ citram asme ||
GV01rv_hn10u:758: RV_10,036.14a savitā paścātāt savitā purastāt savitottarāttāt savitādharāttāt |
GV01rv_hn10u:759: RV_10,036.14c savitā naḥ suvatu sarvatātiṃ savitā no rāsatāṃ dīrgham āyuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:760: RV_10,037.01a namo mitrasya varuṇasya cakṣase maho devāya tad ṛtaṃ saparyata |
GV01rv_hn10u:761: RV_10,037.01c dūredṛśe devajātāya ketave divas putrāya sūryāya śaṃsata ||
GV01rv_hn10u:762: RV_10,037.02a sā mā satyoktiḥ pari pātu viśvato dyāvā ca yatra tatanann ahāni ca |
GV01rv_hn10u:763: RV_10,037.02c viśvam anyan ni viśate yad ejati viśvāhāpo viśvāhod eti sūryaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:764: RV_10,037.03a na te adevaḥ pradivo ni vāsate yad etaśebhiḥ patarai ratharyasi |
GV01rv_hn10u:765: RV_10,037.03c prācīnam anyad anu vartate raja ud anyena jyotiṣā yāsi sūrya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:766: RV_10,037.04a yena sūrya jyotiṣā bādhase tamo jagac ca viśvam udiyarṣi bhānunā |
GV01rv_hn10u:767: RV_10,037.04c tenāsmad viśvām anirām anāhutim apāmīvām apa duṣṣvapnyaṃ suva ||
GV01rv_hn10u:768: RV_10,037.05a viśvasya hi preṣito rakṣasi vratam aheḷayann uccarasi svadhā anu |
GV01rv_hn10u:769: RV_10,037.05c yad adya tvā sūryopabravāmahai taṃ no devā anu maṃsīrata kratum ||
GV01rv_hn10u:770: RV_10,037.06a taṃ no dyāvāpṛthivī tan na āpa indraḥ śṛṇvantu maruto havaṃ vacaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:771: RV_10,037.06c mā śūne bhūma sūryasya saṃdṛśi bhadraṃ jīvanto jaraṇām aśīmahi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:772: RV_10,037.07a viśvāhā tvā sumanasaḥ sucakṣasaḥ prajāvanto anamīvā anāgasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:773: RV_10,037.07c udyantaṃ tvā mitramaho dive-dive jyog jīvāḥ prati paśyema sūrya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:774: RV_10,037.08a mahi jyotir bibhrataṃ tvā vicakṣaṇa bhāsvantaṃ cakṣuṣe-cakṣuṣe mayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:775: RV_10,037.08c ārohantam bṛhataḥ pājasas pari vayaṃ jīvāḥ prati paśyema sūrya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:776: RV_10,037.09a yasya te viśvā bhuvanāni ketunā pra cerate ni ca viśante aktubhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:777: RV_10,037.09c anāgāstvena harikeśa sūryāhnāhnā no vasyasā-vasyasod ihi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:778: RV_10,037.10a śaṃ no bhava cakṣasā śaṃ no ahnā śam bhānunā śaṃ himā śaṃ ghṛṇena |
GV01rv_hn10u:779: RV_10,037.10c yathā śam adhvañ cham asad duroṇe tat sūrya draviṇaṃ dhehi citram ||
GV01rv_hn10u:780: RV_10,037.11a asmākaṃ devā ubhayāya janmane śarma yacchata dvipade catuṣpade |
GV01rv_hn10u:781: RV_10,037.11c adat pibad ūrjayamānam āśitaṃ tad asme śaṃ yor arapo dadhātana ||
GV01rv_hn10u:782: RV_10,037.12a yad vo devāś cakṛma jihvayā guru manaso vā prayutī devaheḷanam |
GV01rv_hn10u:783: RV_10,037.12c arāvā yo no abhi ducchunāyate tasmin tad eno vasavo ni dhetana ||
GV01rv_hn10u:784: RV_10,038.01a asmin na indra pṛtsutau yaśasvati śimīvati krandasi prāva sātaye |
GV01rv_hn10u:785: RV_10,038.01c yatra goṣātā dhṛṣiteṣu khādiṣu viṣvak patanti didyavo nṛṣāhye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:786: RV_10,038.02a sa naḥ kṣumantaṃ sadane vy ūrṇuhi goarṇasaṃ rayim indra śravāyyam |
GV01rv_hn10u:787: RV_10,038.02c syāma te jayataḥ śakra medino yathā vayam uśmasi tad vaso kṛdhi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:788: RV_10,038.03a yo no dāsa āryo vā puruṣṭutādeva indra yudhaye ciketati |
GV01rv_hn10u:789: RV_10,038.03c asmābhiṣ ṭe suṣahāḥ santu śatravas tvayā vayaṃ tān vanuyāma saṃgame ||
GV01rv_hn10u:790: RV_10,038.04a yo dabhrebhir havyo yaś ca bhūribhir yo abhīke varivovin nṛṣāhye |
GV01rv_hn10u:791: RV_10,038.04c taṃ vikhāde sasnim adya śrutaṃ naram arvāñcam indram avase karāmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:792: RV_10,038.05a svavṛjaṃ hi tvām aham indra śuśravānānudaṃ vṛṣabha radhracodanam |
GV01rv_hn10u:793: RV_10,038.05c pra muñcasva pari kutsād ihā gahi kim u tvāvān muṣkayor baddha āsate ||
GV01rv_hn10u:794: RV_10,039.01a yo vām parijmā suvṛd aśvinā ratho doṣām uṣāso havyo haviṣmatā |
GV01rv_hn10u:795: RV_10,039.01c śaśvattamāsas tam u vām idaṃ vayam pitur na nāma suhavaṃ havāmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:796: RV_10,039.02a codayataṃ sūnṛtāḥ pinvataṃ dhiya ut purandhīr īrayataṃ tad uśmasi |
GV01rv_hn10u:797: RV_10,039.02c yaśasam bhāgaṃ kṛṇutaṃ no aśvinā somaṃ na cārum maghavatsu nas kṛtam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:798: RV_10,039.03a amājuraś cid bhavatho yuvam bhago 'nāśoś cid avitārāpamasya cit |
GV01rv_hn10u:799: RV_10,039.03c andhasya cin nāsatyā kṛśasya cid yuvām id āhur bhiṣajā rutasya cit ||
GV01rv_hn10u:800: RV_10,039.04a yuvaṃ cyavānaṃ sanayaṃ yathā ratham punar yuvānaṃ carathāya takṣathuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:801: RV_10,039.04c niṣ ṭaugryam ūhathur adbhyas pari viśvet tā vāṃ savaneṣu pravācyā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:802: RV_10,039.05a purāṇā vāṃ vīryā pra bravā jane 'tho hāsathur bhiṣajā mayobhuvā |
GV01rv_hn10u:803: RV_10,039.05c tā vāṃ nu navyāv avase karāmahe 'yaṃ nāsatyā śrad arir yathā dadhat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:804: RV_10,039.06a iyaṃ vām ahve śṛṇutam me aśvinā putrāyeva pitarā mahyaṃ śikṣatam |
GV01rv_hn10u:805: RV_10,039.06c anāpir ajñā asajātyāmatiḥ purā tasyā abhiśaster ava spṛtam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:806: RV_10,039.07a yuvaṃ rathena vimadāya śundhyuvaṃ ny ūhathuḥ purumitrasya yoṣaṇām |
GV01rv_hn10u:807: RV_10,039.07c yuvaṃ havaṃ vadhrimatyā agacchataṃ yuvaṃ suṣutiṃ cakrathuḥ purandhaye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:808: RV_10,039.08a yuvaṃ viprasya jaraṇām upeyuṣaḥ punaḥ kaler akṛṇutaṃ yuvad vayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:809: RV_10,039.08c yuvaṃ vandanam ṛśyadād ud ūpathur yuvaṃ sadyo viśpalām etave kṛthaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:810: RV_10,039.09a yuvaṃ ha rebhaṃ vṛṣaṇā guhā hitam ud airayatam mamṛvāṃsam aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn10u:811: RV_10,039.09c yuvam ṛbīsam uta taptam atraya omanvantaṃ cakrathuḥ saptavadhraye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:812: RV_10,039.10a yuvaṃ śvetam pedave 'śvināśvaṃ navabhir vājair navatī ca vājinam |
GV01rv_hn10u:813: RV_10,039.10c carkṛtyaṃ dadathur drāvayatsakham bhagaṃ na nṛbhyo havyam mayobhuvam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:814: RV_10,039.11a na taṃ rājānāv adite kutaś cana nāṃho aśnoti duritaṃ nakir bhayam |
GV01rv_hn10u:815: RV_10,039.11c yam aśvinā suhavā rudravartanī purorathaṃ kṛṇuthaḥ patnyā saha ||
GV01rv_hn10u:816: RV_10,039.12a ā tena yātam manaso javīyasā rathaṃ yaṃ vām ṛbhavaś cakrur aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn10u:817: RV_10,039.12c yasya yoge duhitā jāyate diva ubhe ahanī sudine vivasvataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:818: RV_10,039.13a tā vartir yātaṃ jayuṣā vi parvatam apinvataṃ śayave dhenum aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn10u:819: RV_10,039.13c vṛkasya cid vartikām antar āsyād yuvaṃ śacībhir grasitām amuñcatam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:820: RV_10,039.14a etaṃ vāṃ stomam aśvināv akarmātakṣāma bhṛgavo na ratham |
GV01rv_hn10u:821: RV_10,039.14c ny amṛkṣāma yoṣaṇāṃ na marye nityaṃ na sūnuṃ tanayaṃ dadhānāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:822: RV_10,040.01a rathaṃ yāntaṃ kuha ko ha vāṃ narā prati dyumantaṃ suvitāya bhūṣati |
GV01rv_hn10u:823: RV_10,040.01c prātaryāvāṇaṃ vibhvaṃ viśe-viśe vastor-vastor vahamānaṃ dhiyā śami ||
GV01rv_hn10u:824: RV_10,040.02a kuha svid doṣā kuha vastor aśvinā kuhābhipitvaṃ karataḥ kuhoṣatuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:825: RV_10,040.02c ko vāṃ śayutrā vidhaveva devaram maryaṃ na yoṣā kṛṇute sadhastha ā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:826: RV_10,040.03a prātar jarethe jaraṇeva kāpayā vastor-vastor yajatā gacchatho gṛham |
GV01rv_hn10u:827: RV_10,040.03c kasya dhvasrā bhavathaḥ kasya vā narā rājaputreva savanāva gacchathaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:828: RV_10,040.04a yuvām mṛgeva vāraṇā mṛgaṇyavo doṣā vastor haviṣā ni hvayāmahe |
GV01rv_hn10u:829: RV_10,040.04c yuvaṃ hotrām ṛtuthā juhvate nareṣaṃ janāya vahathaḥ śubhas patī ||
GV01rv_hn10u:830: RV_10,040.05a yuvāṃ ha ghoṣā pary aśvinā yatī rājña ūce duhitā pṛcche vāṃ narā |
GV01rv_hn10u:831: RV_10,040.05c bhūtam me ahna uta bhūtam aktave 'śvāvate rathine śaktam arvate ||
GV01rv_hn10u:832: RV_10,040.06a yuvaṃ kavī ṣṭhaḥ pary aśvinā rathaṃ viśo na kutso jaritur naśāyathaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:833: RV_10,040.06c yuvor ha makṣā pary aśvinā madhv āsā bharata niṣkṛtaṃ na yoṣaṇā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:834: RV_10,040.07a yuvaṃ ha bhujyuṃ yuvam aśvinā vaśaṃ yuvaṃ śiñjāram uśanām upārathuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:835: RV_10,040.07c yuvo rarāvā pari sakhyam āsate yuvor aham avasā sumnam ā cake ||
GV01rv_hn10u:836: RV_10,040.08a yuvaṃ ha kṛśaṃ yuvam aśvinā śayuṃ yuvaṃ vidhantaṃ vidhavām uruṣyathaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:837: RV_10,040.08c yuvaṃ sanibhya stanayantam aśvināpa vrajam ūrṇuthaḥ saptāsyam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:838: RV_10,040.09a janiṣṭa yoṣā patayat kanīnako vi cāruhan vīrudho daṃsanā anu |
GV01rv_hn10u:839: RV_10,040.09c āsmai rīyante nivaneva sindhavo 'smā ahne bhavati tat patitvanam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:840: RV_10,040.10a jīvaṃ rudanti vi mayante adhvare dīrghām anu prasitiṃ dīdhiyur naraḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:841: RV_10,040.10c vāmam pitṛbhyo ya idaṃ samerire mayaḥ patibhyo janayaḥ pariṣvaje ||
GV01rv_hn10u:842: RV_10,040.11a na tasya vidma tad u ṣu pra vocata yuvā ha yad yuvatyāḥ kṣeti yoniṣu |
GV01rv_hn10u:843: RV_10,040.11c priyosriyasya vṛṣabhasya retino gṛhaṃ gamemāśvinā tad uśmasi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:844: RV_10,040.12a ā vām agan sumatir vājinīvasū ny aśvinā hṛtsu kāmā ayaṃsata |
GV01rv_hn10u:845: RV_10,040.12c abhūtaṃ gopā mithunā śubhas patī priyā aryamṇo duryāṃ aśīmahi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:846: RV_10,040.13a tā mandasānā manuṣo duroṇa ā dhattaṃ rayiṃ sahavīraṃ vacasyave |
GV01rv_hn10u:847: RV_10,040.13c kṛtaṃ tīrthaṃ suprapāṇaṃ śubhas patī sthāṇum patheṣṭhām apa durmatiṃ hatam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:848: RV_10,040.14a kva svid adya katamāsv aśvinā vikṣu dasrā mādayete śubhas patī |
GV01rv_hn10u:849: RV_10,040.14c ka īṃ ni yeme katamasya jagmatur viprasya vā yajamānasya vā gṛham ||
GV01rv_hn10u:850: RV_10,041.01a samānam u tyam puruhūtam ukthyaṃ rathaṃ tricakraṃ savanā ganigmatam |
GV01rv_hn10u:851: RV_10,041.01c parijmānaṃ vidathyaṃ suvṛktibhir vayaṃ vyuṣṭā uṣaso havāmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:852: RV_10,041.02a prātaryujaṃ nāsatyādhi tiṣṭhathaḥ prātaryāvāṇam madhuvāhanaṃ ratham |
GV01rv_hn10u:853: RV_10,041.02c viśo yena gacchatho yajvarīr narā kīreś cid yajñaṃ hotṛmantam aśvinā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:854: RV_10,041.03a adhvaryuṃ vā madhupāṇiṃ suhastyam agnidhaṃ vā dhṛtadakṣaṃ damūnasam |
GV01rv_hn10u:855: RV_10,041.03c viprasya vā yat savanāni gacchatho 'ta ā yātam madhupeyam aśvinā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:856: RV_10,042.01a asteva su prataraṃ lāyam asyan bhūṣann iva pra bharā stomam asmai |
GV01rv_hn10u:857: RV_10,042.01c vācā viprās tarata vācam aryo ni rāmaya jaritaḥ soma indram ||
GV01rv_hn10u:858: RV_10,042.02a dohena gām upa śikṣā sakhāyam pra bodhaya jaritar jāram indram |
GV01rv_hn10u:859: RV_10,042.02c kośaṃ na pūrṇaṃ vasunā nyṛṣṭam ā cyāvaya maghadeyāya śūram ||
GV01rv_hn10u:860: RV_10,042.03a kim aṅga tvā maghavan bhojam āhuḥ śiśīhi mā śiśayaṃ tvā śṛṇomi |
GV01rv_hn10u:861: RV_10,042.03c apnasvatī mama dhīr astu śakra vasuvidam bhagam indrā bharā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:862: RV_10,042.04a tvāṃ janā mamasatyeṣv indra saṃtasthānā vi hvayante samīke |
GV01rv_hn10u:863: RV_10,042.04c atrā yujaṃ kṛṇute yo haviṣmān nāsunvatā sakhyaṃ vaṣṭi śūraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:864: RV_10,042.05a dhanaṃ na syandram bahulaṃ yo asmai tīvrān somāṃ āsunoti prayasvān |
GV01rv_hn10u:865: RV_10,042.05c tasmai śatrūn sutukān prātar ahno ni svaṣṭrān yuvati hanti vṛtram ||
GV01rv_hn10u:866: RV_10,042.06a yasmin vayaṃ dadhimā śaṃsam indre yaḥ śiśrāya maghavā kāmam asme |
GV01rv_hn10u:867: RV_10,042.06c ārāc cit san bhayatām asya śatrur ny asmai dyumnā janyā namantām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:868: RV_10,042.07a ārāc chatrum apa bādhasva dūram ugro yaḥ śambaḥ puruhūta tena |
GV01rv_hn10u:869: RV_10,042.07c asme dhehi yavamad gomad indra kṛdhī dhiyaṃ jaritre vājaratnām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:870: RV_10,042.08a pra yam antar vṛṣasavāso agman tīvrāḥ somā bahulāntāsa indram |
GV01rv_hn10u:871: RV_10,042.08c nāha dāmānam maghavā ni yaṃsan ni sunvate vahati bhūri vāmam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:872: RV_10,042.09a uta prahām atidīvyā jayāti kṛtaṃ yac chvaghnī vicinoti kāle |
GV01rv_hn10u:873: RV_10,042.09c yo devakāmo na dhanā ruṇaddhi sam it taṃ rāyā sṛjati svadhāvān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:874: RV_10,042.10a gobhiṣ ṭaremāmatiṃ durevāṃ yavena kṣudham puruhūta viśvām |
GV01rv_hn10u:875: RV_10,042.10c vayaṃ rājabhiḥ prathamā dhanāny asmākena vṛjanenā jayema ||
GV01rv_hn10u:876: RV_10,042.11a bṛhaspatir naḥ pari pātu paścād utottarasmād adharād aghāyoḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:877: RV_10,042.11c indraḥ purastād uta madhyato naḥ sakhā sakhibhyo varivaḥ kṛṇotu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:878: RV_10,043.01a acchā ma indram matayaḥ svarvidaḥ sadhrīcīr viśvā uśatīr anūṣata |
GV01rv_hn10u:879: RV_10,043.01c pari ṣvajante janayo yathā patim maryaṃ na śundhyum maghavānam ūtaye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:880: RV_10,043.02a na ghā tvadrig apa veti me manas tve it kāmam puruhūta śiśraya |
GV01rv_hn10u:881: RV_10,043.02c rājeva dasma ni ṣado 'dhi barhiṣy asmin su some 'vapānam astu te ||
GV01rv_hn10u:882: RV_10,043.03a viṣūvṛd indro amater uta kṣudhaḥ sa id rāyo maghavā vasva īśate |
GV01rv_hn10u:883: RV_10,043.03c tasyed ime pravaṇe sapta sindhavo vayo vardhanti vṛṣabhasya śuṣmiṇaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:884: RV_10,043.04a vayo na vṛkṣaṃ supalāśam āsadan somāsa indram mandinaś camūṣadaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:885: RV_10,043.04c praiṣām anīkaṃ śavasā davidyutad vidat svar manave jyotir āryam ||
