GV01rv_hn10u:886: RV_10,043.05a kṛtaṃ na śvaghnī vi cinoti devane saṃvargaṃ yan maghavā sūryaṃ jayat |
GV01rv_hn10u:887: RV_10,043.05c na tat te anyo anu vīryaṃ śakan na purāṇo maghavan nota nūtanaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:888: RV_10,043.06a viśaṃ-viśam maghavā pary aśāyata janānāṃ dhenā avacākaśad vṛṣā |
GV01rv_hn10u:889: RV_10,043.06c yasyāha śakraḥ savaneṣu raṇyati sa tīvraiḥ somaiḥ sahate pṛtanyataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:890: RV_10,043.07a āpo na sindhum abhi yat samakṣaran somāsa indraṃ kulyā iva hradam |
GV01rv_hn10u:891: RV_10,043.07c vardhanti viprā maho asya sādane yavaṃ na vṛṣṭir divyena dānunā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:892: RV_10,043.08a vṛṣā na kruddhaḥ patayad rajassv ā yo aryapatnīr akṛṇod imā apaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:893: RV_10,043.08c sa sunvate maghavā jīradānave 'vindaj jyotir manave haviṣmate ||
GV01rv_hn10u:894: RV_10,043.09a uj jāyatām paraśur jyotiṣā saha bhūyā ṛtasya sudughā purāṇavat |
GV01rv_hn10u:895: RV_10,043.09c vi rocatām aruṣo bhānunā śuciḥ svar ṇa śukraṃ śuśucīta satpatiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:896: RV_10,043.10a gobhiṣ ṭaremāmatiṃ durevāṃ yavena kṣudham puruhūta viśvām |
GV01rv_hn10u:897: RV_10,043.10c vayaṃ rājabhiḥ prathamā dhanāny asmākena vṛjanenā jayema ||
GV01rv_hn10u:898: RV_10,043.11a bṛhaspatir naḥ pari pātu paścād utottarasmād adharād aghāyoḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:899: RV_10,043.11c indraḥ purastād uta madhyato naḥ sakhā sakhibhyo varivaḥ kṛṇotu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:900: RV_10,044.01a ā yātv indraḥ svapatir madāya yo dharmaṇā tūtujānas tuviṣmān |
GV01rv_hn10u:901: RV_10,044.01c pratvakṣāṇo ati viśvā sahāṃsy apāreṇa mahatā vṛṣṇyena ||
GV01rv_hn10u:902: RV_10,044.02a suṣṭhāmā rathaḥ suyamā harī te mimyakṣa vajro nṛpate gabhastau |
GV01rv_hn10u:903: RV_10,044.02c śībhaṃ rājan supathā yāhy arvāṅ vardhāma te papuṣo vṛṣṇyāni ||
GV01rv_hn10u:904: RV_10,044.03a endravāho nṛpatiṃ vajrabāhum ugram ugrāsas taviṣāsa enam |
GV01rv_hn10u:905: RV_10,044.03c pratvakṣasaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ satyaśuṣmam em asmatrā sadhamādo vahantu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:906: RV_10,044.04a evā patiṃ droṇasācaṃ sacetasam ūrja skambhaṃ dharuṇa ā vṛṣāyase |
GV01rv_hn10u:907: RV_10,044.04c ojaḥ kṛṣva saṃ gṛbhāya tve apy aso yathā kenipānām ino vṛdhe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:908: RV_10,044.05a gamann asme vasūny ā hi śaṃsiṣaṃ svāśiṣam bharam ā yāhi sominaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:909: RV_10,044.05c tvam īśiṣe sāsminn ā satsi barhiṣy anādhṛṣyā tava pātrāṇi dharmaṇā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:910: RV_10,044.06a pṛthak prāyan prathamā devahūtayo 'kṛṇvata śravasyāni duṣṭarā |
GV01rv_hn10u:911: RV_10,044.06c na ye śekur yajñiyāṃ nāvam āruham īrmaiva te ny aviśanta kepayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:912: RV_10,044.07a evaivāpāg apare santu dūḍhyo 'śvā yeṣāṃ duryuja āyuyujre |
GV01rv_hn10u:913: RV_10,044.07c itthā ye prāg upare santi dāvane purūṇi yatra vayunāni bhojanā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:914: RV_10,044.08a girīṃr ajrān rejamānāṃ adhārayad dyauḥ krandad antarikṣāṇi kopayat |
GV01rv_hn10u:915: RV_10,044.08c samīcīne dhiṣaṇe vi ṣkabhāyati vṛṣṇaḥ pītvā mada ukthāni śaṃsati ||
GV01rv_hn10u:916: RV_10,044.09a imam bibharmi sukṛtaṃ te aṅkuśaṃ yenārujāsi maghavañ chaphārujaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:917: RV_10,044.09c asmin su te savane astv okyaṃ suta iṣṭau maghavan bodhy ābhagaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:918: RV_10,044.10a gobhiṣ ṭaremāmatiṃ durevāṃ yavena kṣudham puruhūta viśvām |
GV01rv_hn10u:919: RV_10,044.10c vayaṃ rājabhiḥ prathamā dhanāny asmākena vṛjanenā jayema ||
GV01rv_hn10u:920: RV_10,044.11a bṛhaspatir naḥ pari pātu paścād utottarasmād adharād aghāyoḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:921: RV_10,044.11c indraḥ purastād uta madhyato naḥ sakhā sakhibhyo varivaḥ kṛṇotu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:922: RV_10,045.01a divas pari prathamaṃ jajñe agnir asmad dvitīyam pari jātavedāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:923: RV_10,045.01c tṛtīyam apsu nṛmaṇā ajasram indhāna enaṃ jarate svādhīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:924: RV_10,045.02a vidmā te agne tredhā trayāṇi vidmā te dhāma vibhṛtā purutrā |
GV01rv_hn10u:925: RV_10,045.02c vidmā te nāma paramaṃ guhā yad vidmā tam utsaṃ yata ājagantha ||
GV01rv_hn10u:926: RV_10,045.03a samudre tvā nṛmaṇā apsv antar nṛcakṣā īdhe divo agna ūdhan |
GV01rv_hn10u:927: RV_10,045.03c tṛtīye tvā rajasi tasthivāṃsam apām upasthe mahiṣā avardhan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:928: RV_10,045.04a akrandad agni stanayann iva dyauḥ kṣāmā rerihad vīrudhaḥ samañjan |
GV01rv_hn10u:929: RV_10,045.04c sadyo jajñāno vi hīm iddho akhyad ā rodasī bhānunā bhāty antaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:930: RV_10,045.05a śrīṇām udāro dharuṇo rayīṇām manīṣāṇām prārpaṇaḥ somagopāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:931: RV_10,045.05c vasuḥ sūnuḥ sahaso apsu rājā vi bhāty agra uṣasām idhānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:932: RV_10,045.06a viśvasya ketur bhuvanasya garbha ā rodasī apṛṇāj jāyamānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:933: RV_10,045.06c vīḷuṃ cid adrim abhinat parāyañ janā yad agnim ayajanta pañca ||
GV01rv_hn10u:934: RV_10,045.07a uśik pāvako aratiḥ sumedhā marteṣv agnir amṛto ni dhāyi |
GV01rv_hn10u:935: RV_10,045.07c iyarti dhūmam aruṣam bharibhrad uc chukreṇa śociṣā dyām inakṣan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:936: RV_10,045.08a dṛśāno rukma urviyā vy adyaud durmarṣam āyuḥ śriye rucānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:937: RV_10,045.08c agnir amṛto abhavad vayobhir yad enaṃ dyaur janayat suretāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:938: RV_10,045.09a yas te adya kṛṇavad bhadraśoce 'pūpaṃ deva ghṛtavantam agne |
GV01rv_hn10u:939: RV_10,045.09c pra taṃ naya prataraṃ vasyo acchābhi sumnaṃ devabhaktaṃ yaviṣṭha ||
GV01rv_hn10u:940: RV_10,045.10a ā tam bhaja sauśravaseṣv agna uktha-uktha ā bhaja śasyamāne |
GV01rv_hn10u:941: RV_10,045.10c priyaḥ sūrye priyo agnā bhavāty uj jātena bhinadad uj janitvaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:942: RV_10,045.11a tvām agne yajamānā anu dyūn viśvā vasu dadhire vāryāṇi |
GV01rv_hn10u:943: RV_10,045.11c tvayā saha draviṇam icchamānā vrajaṃ gomantam uśijo vi vavruḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:944: RV_10,045.12a astāvy agnir narāṃ suśevo vaiśvānara ṛṣibhiḥ somagopāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:945: RV_10,045.12c adveṣe dyāvāpṛthivī huvema devā dhatta rayim asme suvīram ||
GV01rv_hn10u:946: RV_10,046.01a pra hotā jāto mahān nabhovin nṛṣadvā sīdad apām upasthe |
GV01rv_hn10u:947: RV_10,046.01c dadhir yo dhāyi sa te vayāṃsi yantā vasūni vidhate tanūpāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:948: RV_10,046.02a imaṃ vidhanto apāṃ sadhasthe paśuṃ na naṣṭam padair anu gman |
GV01rv_hn10u:949: RV_10,046.02c guhā catantam uśijo namobhir icchanto dhīrā bhṛgavo 'vindan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:950: RV_10,046.03a imaṃ trito bhūry avindad icchan vaibhūvaso mūrdhany aghnyāyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:951: RV_10,046.03c sa śevṛdho jāta ā harmyeṣu nābhir yuvā bhavati rocanasya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:952: RV_10,046.04a mandraṃ hotāram uśijo namobhiḥ prāñcaṃ yajñaṃ netāram adhvarāṇām |
GV01rv_hn10u:953: RV_10,046.04c viśām akṛṇvann aratim pāvakaṃ havyavāhaṃ dadhato mānuṣeṣu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:954: RV_10,046.05a pra bhūr jayantam mahāṃ vipodhām mūrā amūram purāṃ darmāṇam |
GV01rv_hn10u:955: RV_10,046.05c nayanto garbhaṃ vanāṃ dhiyaṃ dhur hiriśmaśruṃ nārvāṇaṃ dhanarcam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:956: RV_10,046.06a ni pastyāsu trita stabhūyan parivīto yonau sīdad antaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:957: RV_10,046.06c ataḥ saṃgṛbhyā viśāṃ damūnā vidharmaṇāyantrair īyate nṝn ||
GV01rv_hn10u:958: RV_10,046.07a asyājarāso damām aritrā arcaddhūmāso agnayaḥ pāvakāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:959: RV_10,046.07c śvitīcayaḥ śvātrāso bhuraṇyavo vanarṣado vāyavo na somāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:960: RV_10,046.08a pra jihvayā bharate vepo agniḥ pra vayunāni cetasā pṛthivyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:961: RV_10,046.08c tam āyavaḥ śucayantam pāvakam mandraṃ hotāraṃ dadhire yajiṣṭham ||
GV01rv_hn10u:962: RV_10,046.09a dyāvā yam agnim pṛthivī janiṣṭām āpas tvaṣṭā bhṛgavo yaṃ sahobhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:963: RV_10,046.09c īḷenyam prathamam mātariśvā devās tatakṣur manave yajatram ||
GV01rv_hn10u:964: RV_10,046.10a yaṃ tvā devā dadhire havyavāham puruspṛho mānuṣāso yajatram |
GV01rv_hn10u:965: RV_10,046.10c sa yāmann agne stuvate vayo dhāḥ pra devayan yaśasaḥ saṃ hi pūrvīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:966: RV_10,047.01a jagṛbhmā te dakṣiṇam indra hastaṃ vasūyavo vasupate vasūnām |
GV01rv_hn10u:967: RV_10,047.01c vidmā hi tvā gopatiṃ śūra gonām asmabhyaṃ citraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:968: RV_10,047.02a svāyudhaṃ svavasaṃ sunīthaṃ catuḥsamudraṃ dharuṇaṃ rayīṇām |
GV01rv_hn10u:969: RV_10,047.02c carkṛtyaṃ śaṃsyam bhūrivāram asmabhyaṃ citraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:970: RV_10,047.03a subrahmāṇaṃ devavantam bṛhantam uruṃ gabhīram pṛthubudhnam indra |
GV01rv_hn10u:971: RV_10,047.03c śrutaṛṣim ugram abhimātiṣāham asmabhyaṃ citraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:972: RV_10,047.04a sanadvājaṃ vipravīraṃ tarutraṃ dhanaspṛtaṃ śūśuvāṃsaṃ sudakṣam |
GV01rv_hn10u:973: RV_10,047.04c dasyuhanam pūrbhidam indra satyam asmabhyaṃ citraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:974: RV_10,047.05a aśvāvantaṃ rathinaṃ vīravantaṃ sahasriṇaṃ śatinaṃ vājam indra |
GV01rv_hn10u:975: RV_10,047.05c bhadravrātaṃ vipravīraṃ svarṣām asmabhyaṃ citraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:976: RV_10,047.06a pra saptagum ṛtadhītiṃ sumedhām bṛhaspatim matir acchā jigāti |
GV01rv_hn10u:977: RV_10,047.06c ya āṅgiraso namasopasadyo 'smabhyaṃ citraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:978: RV_10,047.07a vanīvāno mama dūtāsa indraṃ stomāś caranti sumatīr iyānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:979: RV_10,047.07c hṛdispṛśo manasā vacyamānā asmabhyaṃ citraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:980: RV_10,047.08a yat tvā yāmi daddhi tan na indra bṛhantaṃ kṣayam asamaṃ janānām |
GV01rv_hn10u:981: RV_10,047.08c abhi tad dyāvāpṛthivī gṛṇītām asmabhyaṃ citraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:982: RV_10,048.01a aham bhuvaṃ vasunaḥ pūrvyas patir ahaṃ dhanāni saṃ jayāmi śaśvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:983: RV_10,048.01c māṃ havante pitaraṃ na jantavo 'haṃ dāśuṣe vi bhajāmi bhojanam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:984: RV_10,048.02a aham indro rodho vakṣo atharvaṇas tritāya gā ajanayam aher adhi |
GV01rv_hn10u:985: RV_10,048.02c ahaṃ dasyubhyaḥ pari nṛmṇam ā dade gotrā śikṣan dadhīce mātariśvane ||
GV01rv_hn10u:986: RV_10,048.03a mahyaṃ tvaṣṭā vajram atakṣad āyasam mayi devāso 'vṛjann api kratum |
GV01rv_hn10u:987: RV_10,048.03c mamānīkaṃ sūryasyeva duṣṭaram mām āryanti kṛtena kartvena ca ||
GV01rv_hn10u:988: RV_10,048.04a aham etaṃ gavyayam aśvyam paśum purīṣiṇaṃ sāyakenā hiraṇyayam |
GV01rv_hn10u:989: RV_10,048.04c purū sahasrā ni śiśāmi dāśuṣe yan mā somāsa ukthino amandiṣuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:990: RV_10,048.05a aham indro na parā jigya id dhanaṃ na mṛtyave 'va tasthe kadā cana |
GV01rv_hn10u:991: RV_10,048.05c somam in mā sunvanto yācatā vasu na me pūravaḥ sakhye riṣāthana ||
GV01rv_hn10u:992: RV_10,048.06a aham etāñ chāśvasato dvā-dvendraṃ ye vajraṃ yudhaye 'kṛṇvata |
GV01rv_hn10u:993: RV_10,048.06c āhvayamānāṃ ava hanmanāhanaṃ dṛḷhā vadann anamasyur namasvinaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:994: RV_10,048.07a abhīdam ekam eko asmi niṣṣāḷ abhī dvā kim u trayaḥ karanti |
GV01rv_hn10u:995: RV_10,048.07c khale na parṣān prati hanmi bhūri kim mā nindanti śatravo 'nindrāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:996: RV_10,048.08a ahaṃ guṅgubhyo atithigvam iṣkaram iṣaṃ na vṛtraturaṃ vikṣu dhārayam |
GV01rv_hn10u:997: RV_10,048.08c yat parṇayaghna uta vā karañjahe prāham mahe vṛtrahatye aśuśravi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:998: RV_10,048.09a pra me namī sāpya iṣe bhuje bhūd gavām eṣe sakhyā kṛṇuta dvitā |
GV01rv_hn10u:999: RV_10,048.09c didyuṃ yad asya samitheṣu maṃhayam ād id enaṃ śaṃsyam ukthyaṃ karam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1000: RV_10,048.10a pra nemasmin dadṛśe somo antar gopā nemam āvir asthā kṛṇoti |
GV01rv_hn10u:1001: RV_10,048.10c sa tigmaśṛṅgaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ yuyutsan druhas tasthau bahule baddho antaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1002: RV_10,048.11a ādityānāṃ vasūnāṃ rudriyāṇāṃ devo devānāṃ na mināmi dhāma |
GV01rv_hn10u:1003: RV_10,048.11c te mā bhadrāya śavase tatakṣur aparājitam astṛtam aṣāḷham ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1004: RV_10,049.01a ahaṃ dāṃ gṛṇate pūrvyaṃ vasv aham brahma kṛṇavam mahyaṃ vardhanam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1005: RV_10,049.01c aham bhuvaṃ yajamānasya coditāyajvanaḥ sākṣi viśvasmin bhare ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1006: RV_10,049.02a māṃ dhur indraṃ nāma devatā divaś ca gmaś cāpāṃ ca jantavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1007: RV_10,049.02c ahaṃ harī vṛṣaṇā vivratā raghū ahaṃ vajraṃ śavase dhṛṣṇv ā dade ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1008: RV_10,049.03a aham atkaṃ kavaye śiśnathaṃ hathair ahaṃ kutsam āvam ābhir ūtibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1009: RV_10,049.03c ahaṃ śuṣṇasya śnathitā vadhar yamaṃ na yo rara āryaṃ nāma dasyave ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1010: RV_10,049.04a aham piteva vetasūṃr abhiṣṭaye tugraṃ kutsāya smadibhaṃ ca randhayam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1011: RV_10,049.04c aham bhuvaṃ yajamānasya rājani pra yad bhare tujaye na priyādhṛṣe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1012: RV_10,049.05a ahaṃ randhayam mṛgayaṃ śrutarvaṇe yan mājihīta vayunā canānuṣak |
GV01rv_hn10u:1013: RV_10,049.05c ahaṃ veśaṃ namram āyave 'karam ahaṃ savyāya paḍgṛbhim arandhayam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1014: RV_10,049.06a ahaṃ sa yo navavāstvam bṛhadrathaṃ saṃ vṛtreva dāsaṃ vṛtrahārujam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1015: RV_10,049.06c yad vardhayantam prathayantam ānuṣag dūre pāre rajaso rocanākaram ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1016: RV_10,049.07a ahaṃ sūryasya pari yāmy āśubhiḥ praitaśebhir vahamāna ojasā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1017: RV_10,049.07c yan mā sāvo manuṣa āha nirṇija ṛdhak kṛṣe dāsaṃ kṛtvyaṃ hathaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1018: RV_10,049.08a ahaṃ saptahā nahuṣo nahuṣṭaraḥ prāśrāvayaṃ śavasā turvaśaṃ yadum |
GV01rv_hn10u:1019: RV_10,049.08c ahaṃ ny anyaṃ sahasā sahas karaṃ nava vrādhato navatiṃ ca vakṣayam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1020: RV_10,049.09a ahaṃ sapta sravato dhārayaṃ vṛṣā dravitnvaḥ pṛthivyāṃ sīrā adhi |
GV01rv_hn10u:1021: RV_10,049.09c aham arṇāṃsi vi tirāmi sukratur yudhā vidam manave gātum iṣṭaye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1022: RV_10,049.10a ahaṃ tad āsu dhārayaṃ yad āsu na devaś cana tvaṣṭādhārayad ruśat |
GV01rv_hn10u:1023: RV_10,049.10c spārhaṃ gavām ūdhassu vakṣaṇāsv ā madhor madhu śvātryaṃ somam āśiram ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1024: RV_10,049.11a evā devāṃ indro vivye nṝn pra cyautnena maghavā satyarādhāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1025: RV_10,049.11c viśvet tā te harivaḥ śacīvo 'bhi turāsaḥ svayaśo gṛṇanti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1026: RV_10,050.01a pra vo mahe mandamānāyāndhaso 'rcā viśvānarāya viśvābhuve |
GV01rv_hn10u:1027: RV_10,050.01c indrasya yasya sumakhaṃ saho mahi śravo nṛmṇaṃ ca rodasī saparyataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1028: RV_10,050.02a so cin nu sakhyā narya ina stutaś carkṛtya indro māvate nare |
GV01rv_hn10u:1029: RV_10,050.02c viśvāsu dhūrṣu vājakṛtyeṣu satpate vṛtre vāpsv abhi śūra mandase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1030: RV_10,050.03a ke te nara indra ye ta iṣe ye te sumnaṃ sadhanyam iyakṣān |
GV01rv_hn10u:1031: RV_10,050.03c ke te vājāyāsuryāya hinvire ke apsu svāsūrvarāsu pauṃsye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1032: RV_10,050.04a bhuvas tvam indra brahmaṇā mahān bhuvo viśveṣu savaneṣu yajñiyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1033: RV_10,050.04c bhuvo nṝṃś cyautno viśvasmin bhare jyeṣṭhaś ca mantro viśvacarṣaṇe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1034: RV_10,050.05a avā nu kaṃ jyāyān yajñavanaso mahīṃ ta omātrāṃ kṛṣṭayo viduḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1035: RV_10,050.05c aso nu kam ajaro vardhāś ca viśved etā savanā tūtumā kṛṣe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1036: RV_10,050.06a etā viśvā savanā tūtumā kṛṣe svayaṃ sūno sahaso yāni dadhiṣe |
GV01rv_hn10u:1037: RV_10,050.06c varāya te pātraṃ dharmaṇe tanā yajño mantro brahmodyataṃ vacaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1038: RV_10,050.07a ye te vipra brahmakṛtaḥ sute sacā vasūnāṃ ca vasunaś ca dāvane |
GV01rv_hn10u:1039: RV_10,050.07c pra te sumnasya manasā pathā bhuvan made sutasya somyasyāndhasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1040: RV_10,051.01a mahat tad ulbaṃ sthaviraṃ tad āsīd yenāviṣṭitaḥ praviveśithāpaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1041: RV_10,051.01c viśvā apaśyad bahudhā te agne jātavedas tanvo deva ekaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1042: RV_10,051.02a ko mā dadarśa katamaḥ sa devo yo me tanvo bahudhā paryapaśyat |
GV01rv_hn10u:1043: RV_10,051.02c kvāha mitrāvaruṇā kṣiyanty agner viśvāḥ samidho devayānīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1044: RV_10,051.03a aicchāma tvā bahudhā jātavedaḥ praviṣṭam agne apsv oṣadhīṣu |
GV01rv_hn10u:1045: RV_10,051.03c taṃ tvā yamo acikec citrabhāno daśāntaruṣyād atirocamānam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1046: RV_10,051.04a hotrād ahaṃ varuṇa bibhyad āyaṃ ned eva mā yunajann atra devāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1047: RV_10,051.04c tasya me tanvo bahudhā niviṣṭā etam arthaṃ na ciketāham agniḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1048: RV_10,051.05a ehi manur devayur yajñakāmo 'raṅkṛtyā tamasi kṣeṣy agne |
GV01rv_hn10u:1049: RV_10,051.05c sugān pathaḥ kṛṇuhi devayānān vaha havyāni sumanasyamānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1050: RV_10,051.06a agneḥ pūrve bhrātaro artham etaṃ rathīvādhvānam anv āvarīvuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1051: RV_10,051.06c tasmād bhiyā varuṇa dūram āyaṃ gauro na kṣepnor avije jyāyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1052: RV_10,051.07a kurmas ta āyur ajaraṃ yad agne yathā yukto jātavedo na riṣyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1053: RV_10,051.07c athā vahāsi sumanasyamāno bhāgaṃ devebhyo haviṣaḥ sujāta ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1054: RV_10,051.08a prayājān me anuyājāṃś ca kevalān ūrjasvantaṃ haviṣo datta bhāgam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1055: RV_10,051.08c ghṛtaṃ cāpām puruṣaṃ cauṣadhīnām agneś ca dīrgham āyur astu devāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1056: RV_10,051.09a tava prayājā anuyājāś ca kevala ūrjasvanto haviṣaḥ santu bhāgāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1057: RV_10,051.09c tavāgne yajño 'yam astu sarvas tubhyaṃ namantām pradiśaś catasraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1058: RV_10,052.01a viśve devāḥ śāstana mā yatheha hotā vṛto manavai yan niṣadya |
GV01rv_hn10u:1059: RV_10,052.01c pra me brūta bhāgadheyaṃ yathā vo yena pathā havyam ā vo vahāni ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1060: RV_10,052.02a ahaṃ hotā ny asīdaṃ yajīyān viśve devā maruto mā junanti |
GV01rv_hn10u:1061: RV_10,052.02c ahar-ahar aśvinādhvaryavaṃ vām brahmā samid bhavati sāhutir vām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1062: RV_10,052.03a ayaṃ yo hotā kir u sa yamasya kam apy ūhe yat samañjanti devāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1063: RV_10,052.03c ahar-ahar jāyate māsi-māsy athā devā dadhire havyavāham ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1064: RV_10,052.04a māṃ devā dadhire havyavāham apamluktam bahu kṛcchrā carantam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1065: RV_10,052.04c agnir vidvān yajñaṃ naḥ kalpayāti pañcayāmaṃ trivṛtaṃ saptatantum ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1066: RV_10,052.05a ā vo yakṣy amṛtatvaṃ suvīraṃ yathā vo devā varivaḥ karāṇi |
GV01rv_hn10u:1067: RV_10,052.05c ā bāhvor vajram indrasya dheyām athemā viśvāḥ pṛtanā jayāti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1068: RV_10,052.06a trīṇi śatā trī sahasrāṇy agniṃ triṃśac ca devā nava cāsaparyan |
GV01rv_hn10u:1069: RV_10,052.06c aukṣan ghṛtair astṛṇan barhir asmā ād id dhotāraṃ ny asādayanta ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1070: RV_10,053.01a yam aicchāma manasā so 'yam āgād yajñasya vidvān paruṣaś cikitvān |
GV01rv_hn10u:1071: RV_10,053.01c sa no yakṣad devatātā yajīyān ni hi ṣatsad antaraḥ pūrvo asmat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1072: RV_10,053.02a arādhi hotā niṣadā yajīyān abhi prayāṃsi sudhitāni hi khyat |
GV01rv_hn10u:1073: RV_10,053.02c yajāmahai yajñiyān hanta devāṃ īḷāmahā īḍyāṃ ājyena ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1074: RV_10,053.03a sādhvīm akar devavītiṃ no adya yajñasya jihvām avidāma guhyām |
GV01rv_hn10u:1075: RV_10,053.03c sa āyur āgāt surabhir vasāno bhadrām akar devahūtiṃ no adya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1076: RV_10,053.04a tad adya vācaḥ prathamam masīya yenāsurāṃ abhi devā asāma |
GV01rv_hn10u:1077: RV_10,053.04c ūrjāda uta yajñiyāsaḥ pañca janā mama hotraṃ juṣadhvam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1078: RV_10,053.05a pañca janā mama hotraṃ juṣantāṃ gojātā uta ye yajñiyāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1079: RV_10,053.05c pṛthivī naḥ pārthivāt pātv aṃhaso 'ntarikṣaṃ divyāt pātv asmān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1080: RV_10,053.06a tantuṃ tanvan rajaso bhānum anv ihi jyotiṣmataḥ patho rakṣa dhiyā kṛtān |
GV01rv_hn10u:1081: RV_10,053.06c anulbaṇaṃ vayata joguvām apo manur bhava janayā daivyaṃ janam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1082: RV_10,053.07a akṣānaho nahyatanota somyā iṣkṛṇudhvaṃ raśanā ota piṃśata |
GV01rv_hn10u:1083: RV_10,053.07c aṣṭāvandhuraṃ vahatābhito rathaṃ yena devāso anayann abhi priyam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1084: RV_10,053.08a aśmanvatī rīyate saṃ rabhadhvam ut tiṣṭhata pra taratā sakhāyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1085: RV_10,053.08c atrā jahāma ye asann aśevāḥ śivān vayam ut taremābhi vājān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1086: RV_10,053.09a tvaṣṭā māyā ved apasām apastamo bibhrat pātrā devapānāni śantamā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1087: RV_10,053.09c śiśīte nūnam paraśuṃ svāyasaṃ yena vṛścād etaśo brahmaṇas patiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1088: RV_10,053.10a sato nūnaṃ kavayaḥ saṃ śiśīta vāśībhir yābhir amṛtāya takṣatha |
GV01rv_hn10u:1089: RV_10,053.10c vidvāṃsaḥ padā guhyāni kartana yena devāso amṛtatvam ānaśuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1090: RV_10,053.11a garbhe yoṣām adadhur vatsam āsany apīcyena manasota jihvayā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1091: RV_10,053.11c sa viśvāhā sumanā yogyā abhi siṣāsanir vanate kāra ij jitim ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1092: RV_10,054.01a tāṃ su te kīrtim maghavan mahitvā yat tvā bhīte rodasī ahvayetām |
GV01rv_hn10u:1093: RV_10,054.01c prāvo devāṃ ātiro dāsam ojaḥ prajāyai tvasyai yad aśikṣa indra ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1094: RV_10,054.02a yad acaras tanvā vāvṛdhāno balānīndra prabruvāṇo janeṣu |
GV01rv_hn10u:1095: RV_10,054.02c māyet sā te yāni yuddhāny āhur nādya śatruṃ nanu purā vivitse ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1096: RV_10,054.03a ka u nu te mahimanaḥ samasyāsmat pūrva ṛṣayo 'ntam āpuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1097: RV_10,054.03c yan mātaraṃ ca pitaraṃ ca sākam ajanayathās tanvaḥ svāyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1098: RV_10,054.04a catvāri te asuryāṇi nāmādābhyāni mahiṣasya santi |
GV01rv_hn10u:1099: RV_10,054.04c tvam aṅga tāni viśvāni vitse yebhiḥ karmāṇi maghavañ cakartha ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1100: RV_10,054.05a tvaṃ viśvā dadhiṣe kevalāni yāny āvir yā ca guhā vasūni |
GV01rv_hn10u:1101: RV_10,054.05c kāmam in me maghavan mā vi tārīs tvam ājñātā tvam indrāsi dātā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1102: RV_10,054.06a yo adadhāj jyotiṣi jyotir antar yo asṛjan madhunā sam madhūni |
GV01rv_hn10u:1103: RV_10,054.06c adha priyaṃ śūṣam indrāya manma brahmakṛto bṛhadukthād avāci ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1104: RV_10,055.01a dūre tan nāma guhyam parācair yat tvā bhīte ahvayetāṃ vayodhai |
GV01rv_hn10u:1105: RV_10,055.01c ud astabhnāḥ pṛthivīṃ dyām abhīke bhrātuḥ putrān maghavan titviṣāṇaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1106: RV_10,055.02a mahat tan nāma guhyam puruspṛg yena bhūtaṃ janayo yena bhavyam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1107: RV_10,055.02c pratnaṃ jātaṃ jyotir yad asya priyam priyāḥ sam aviśanta pañca ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1108: RV_10,055.03a ā rodasī apṛṇād ota madhyam pañca devāṃ ṛtuśaḥ sapta-sapta |
GV01rv_hn10u:1109: RV_10,055.03c catustriṃśatā purudhā vi caṣṭe sarūpeṇa jyotiṣā vivratena ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1110: RV_10,055.04a yad uṣa aucchaḥ prathamā vibhānām ajanayo yena puṣṭasya puṣṭam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1111: RV_10,055.04c yat te jāmitvam avaram parasyā mahan mahatyā asuratvam ekam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1112: RV_10,055.05a vidhuṃ dadrāṇaṃ samane bahūnāṃ yuvānaṃ santam palito jagāra |
GV01rv_hn10u:1113: RV_10,055.05c devasya paśya kāvyam mahitvādyā mamāra sa hyaḥ sam āna ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1114: RV_10,055.06a śākmanā śāko aruṇaḥ suparṇa ā yo mahaḥ śūraḥ sanād anīḷaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1115: RV_10,055.06c yac ciketa satyam it tan na moghaṃ vasu spārham uta jetota dātā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1116: RV_10,055.07a aibhir dade vṛṣṇyā pauṃsyāni yebhir aukṣad vṛtrahatyāya vajrī |
GV01rv_hn10u:1117: RV_10,055.07c ye karmaṇaḥ kriyamāṇasya mahna ṛtekarmam udajāyanta devāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1118: RV_10,055.08a yujā karmāṇi janayan viśvaujā aśastihā viśvamanās turāṣāṭ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1119: RV_10,055.08c pītvī somasya diva ā vṛdhānaḥ śūro nir yudhādhamad dasyūn ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1120: RV_10,056.01a idaṃ ta ekam para ū ta ekaṃ tṛtīyena jyotiṣā saṃ viśasva |
GV01rv_hn10u:1121: RV_10,056.01c saṃveśane tanvaś cārur edhi priyo devānām parame janitre ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1122: RV_10,056.02a tanūṣ ṭe vājin tanvaṃ nayantī vāmam asmabhyaṃ dhātu śarma tubhyam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1123: RV_10,056.02c ahruto maho dharuṇāya devān divīva jyotiḥ svam ā mimīyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1124: RV_10,056.03a vājy asi vājinenā suvenīḥ suvita stomaṃ suvito divaṃ gāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1125: RV_10,056.03c suvito dharma prathamānu satyā suvito devān suvito 'nu patma ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1126: RV_10,056.04a mahimna eṣām pitaraś caneśire devā deveṣv adadhur api kratum |
GV01rv_hn10u:1127: RV_10,056.04c sam avivyacur uta yāny atviṣur aiṣāṃ tanūṣu ni viviśuḥ punaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1128: RV_10,056.05a sahobhir viśvam pari cakramū rajaḥ pūrvā dhāmāny amitā mimānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1129: RV_10,056.05c tanūṣu viśvā bhuvanā ni yemire prāsārayanta purudha prajā anu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1130: RV_10,056.06a dvidhā sūnavo 'suraṃ svarvidam āsthāpayanta tṛtīyena karmaṇā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1131: RV_10,056.06c svām prajām pitaraḥ pitryaṃ saha āvareṣv adadhus tantum ātatam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1132: RV_10,056.07a nāvā na kṣodaḥ pradiśaḥ pṛthivyāḥ svastibhir ati durgāṇi viśvā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1133: RV_10,056.07c svām prajām bṛhaduktho mahitvāvareṣv adadhād ā pareṣu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1134: RV_10,057.01a mā pra gāma patho vayam mā yajñād indra sominaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1136: RV_10,057.02a yo yajñasya prasādhanas tantur deveṣv ātataḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1138: RV_10,057.03a mano nv ā huvāmahe nārāśaṃsena somena |
GV01rv_hn10u:1140: RV_10,057.04a ā ta etu manaḥ punaḥ kratve dakṣāya jīvase |
GV01rv_hn10u:1142: RV_10,057.05a punar naḥ pitaro mano dadātu daivyo janaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1144: RV_10,057.06a vayaṃ soma vrate tava manas tanūṣu bibhrataḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1146: RV_10,058.01a yat te yamaṃ vaivasvatam mano jagāma dūrakam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1147: RV_10,058.01c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1148: RV_10,058.02a yat te divaṃ yat pṛthivīm mano jagāma dūrakam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1149: RV_10,058.02c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1150: RV_10,058.03a yat te bhūmiṃ caturbhṛṣṭim mano jagāma dūrakam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1151: RV_10,058.03c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1152: RV_10,058.04a yat te catasraḥ pradiśo mano jagāma dūrakam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1153: RV_10,058.04c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1154: RV_10,058.05a yat te samudram arṇavam mano jagāma dūrakam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1155: RV_10,058.05c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1156: RV_10,058.06a yat te marīcīḥ pravato mano jagāma dūrakam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1157: RV_10,058.06c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1158: RV_10,058.07a yat te apo yad oṣadhīr mano jagāma dūrakam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1159: RV_10,058.07c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1160: RV_10,058.08a yat te sūryaṃ yad uṣasam mano jagāma dūrakam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1161: RV_10,058.08c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1162: RV_10,058.09a yat te parvatān bṛhato mano jagāma dūrakam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1163: RV_10,058.09c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1164: RV_10,058.10a yat te viśvam idaṃ jagan mano jagāma dūrakam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1165: RV_10,058.10c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1166: RV_10,058.11a yat te parāḥ parāvato mano jagāma dūrakam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1167: RV_10,058.11c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1168: RV_10,058.12a yat te bhūtaṃ ca bhavyaṃ ca mano jagāma dūrakam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1169: RV_10,058.12c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1170: RV_10,059.01a pra tāry āyuḥ prataraṃ navīya sthātāreva kratumatā rathasya |
GV01rv_hn10u:1171: RV_10,059.01c adha cyavāna ut tavīty artham parātaraṃ su nirṛtir jihītām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1172: RV_10,059.02a sāman nu rāye nidhiman nv annaṃ karāmahe su purudha śravāṃsi |
GV01rv_hn10u:1173: RV_10,059.02c tā no viśvāni jaritā mamattu parātaraṃ su nirṛtir jihītām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1174: RV_10,059.03a abhī ṣv aryaḥ pauṃsyair bhavema dyaur na bhūmiṃ girayo nājrān |
GV01rv_hn10u:1175: RV_10,059.03c tā no viśvāni jaritā ciketa parātaraṃ su nirṛtir jihītām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1176: RV_10,059.04a mo ṣu ṇaḥ soma mṛtyave parā dāḥ paśyema nu sūryam uccarantam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1177: RV_10,059.04c dyubhir hito jarimā sū no astu parātaraṃ su nirṛtir jihītām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1178: RV_10,059.05a asunīte mano asmāsu dhāraya jīvātave su pra tirā na āyuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1179: RV_10,059.05c rārandhi naḥ sūryasya saṃdṛśi ghṛtena tvaṃ tanvaṃ vardhayasva ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1180: RV_10,059.06a asunīte punar asmāsu cakṣuḥ punaḥ prāṇam iha no dhehi bhogam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1181: RV_10,059.06c jyok paśyema sūryam uccarantam anumate mṛḷayā naḥ svasti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1182: RV_10,059.07a punar no asum pṛthivī dadātu punar dyaur devī punar antarikṣam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1183: RV_10,059.07c punar naḥ somas tanvaṃ dadātu punaḥ pūṣā pathyāṃ yā svastiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1184: RV_10,059.08a śaṃ rodasī subandhave yahvī ṛtasya mātarā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1185: RV_10,059.08c bharatām apa yad rapo dyauḥ pṛthivi kṣamā rapo mo ṣu te kiṃ canāmamat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1186: RV_10,059.09a ava dvake ava trikā divaś caranti bheṣajā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1188: 059.09c kṣamā cariṣṇv ekakam bharatām apa yad rapo dyauḥ pṛthivi kṣamā rapo mo ṣu te kiṃ canāmamat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1189: RV_10,059.10a sam indreraya gām anaḍvāhaṃ ya āvahad uśīnarāṇyā anaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1190: RV_10,059.10c bharatām apa yad rapo dyauḥ pṛthivi kṣamā rapo mo ṣu te kiṃ canāmamat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1191: RV_10,060.01a ā janaṃ tveṣasaṃdṛśam māhīnānām upastutam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1193: RV_10,060.02a asamātiṃ nitośanaṃ tveṣaṃ niyayinaṃ ratham |
GV01rv_hn10u:1195: RV_10,060.03a yo janān mahiṣāṃ ivātitasthau pavīravān |
GV01rv_hn10u:1197: RV_10,060.04a yasyekṣvākur upa vrate revān marāyy edhate |
GV01rv_hn10u:1201: RV_10,060.06a agastyasya nadbhyaḥ saptī yunakṣi rohitā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1202: RV_10,060.06c paṇīn ny akramīr abhi viśvān rājann arādhasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1203: RV_10,060.07a ayam mātāyam pitāyaṃ jīvātur āgamat |
GV01rv_hn10u:1204: RV_10,060.07c idaṃ tava prasarpaṇaṃ subandhav ehi nir ihi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1205: RV_10,060.08a yathā yugaṃ varatrayā nahyanti dharuṇāya kam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1206: RV_10,060.08c evā dādhāra te mano jīvātave na mṛtyave 'tho ariṣṭatātaye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1207: RV_10,060.09a yatheyam pṛthivī mahī dādhāremān vanaspatīn |
GV01rv_hn10u:1208: RV_10,060.09c evā dādhāra te mano jīvātave na mṛtyave 'tho ariṣṭatātaye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1209: RV_10,060.10a yamād ahaṃ vaivasvatāt subandhor mana ābharam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1211: RV_10,060.11a nyag vāto 'va vāti nyak tapati sūryaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1212: RV_10,060.11c nīcīnam aghnyā duhe nyag bhavatu te rapaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1213: RV_10,060.12a ayam me hasto bhagavān ayam me bhagavattaraḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1215: RV_10,061.01a idam itthā raudraṃ gūrtavacā brahma kratvā śacyām antar ājau |
GV01rv_hn10u:1216: RV_10,061.01c krāṇā yad asya pitarā maṃhaneṣṭhāḥ parṣat pakthe ahann ā sapta hotṝn ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1217: RV_10,061.02a sa id dānāya dabhyāya vanvañ cyavānaḥ sūdair amimīta vedim |
GV01rv_hn10u:1218: RV_10,061.02c tūrvayāṇo gūrtavacastamaḥ kṣodo na reta itaūti siñcat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1219: RV_10,061.03a mano na yeṣu havaneṣu tigmaṃ vipaḥ śacyā vanutho dravantā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1220: RV_10,061.03c ā yaḥ śaryābhis tuvinṛmṇo asyāśrīṇītādiśaṃ gabhastau ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1221: RV_10,061.04a kṛṣṇā yad goṣv aruṇīṣu sīdad divo napātāśvinā huve vām |
GV01rv_hn10u:1222: RV_10,061.04c vītam me yajñam ā gatam me annaṃ vavanvāṃsā neṣam asmṛtadhrū ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1223: RV_10,061.05a prathiṣṭa yasya vīrakarmam iṣṇad anuṣṭhitaṃ nu naryo apauhat |
GV01rv_hn10u:1224: RV_10,061.05c punas tad ā vṛhati yat kanāyā duhitur ā anubhṛtam anarvā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1225: RV_10,061.06a madhyā yat kartvam abhavad abhīke kāmaṃ kṛṇvāne pitari yuvatyām |
GV01rv_hn10u:1226: RV_10,061.06c manānag reto jahatur viyantā sānau niṣiktaṃ sukṛtasya yonau ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1227: RV_10,061.07a pitā yat svāṃ duhitaram adhiṣkan kṣmayā retaḥ saṃjagmāno ni ṣiñcat |
GV01rv_hn10u:1228: RV_10,061.07c svādhyo 'janayan brahma devā vāstoṣ patiṃ vratapāṃ nir atakṣan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1229: RV_10,061.08a sa īṃ vṛṣā na phenam asyad ājau smad ā paraid apa dabhracetāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1230: RV_10,061.08c sarat padā na dakṣiṇā parāvṛṅ na tā nu me pṛśanyo jagṛbhre ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1231: RV_10,061.09a makṣū na vahniḥ prajāyā upabdir agniṃ na nagna upa sīdad ūdhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1232: RV_10,061.09c sanitedhmaṃ sanitota vājaṃ sa dhartā jajñe sahasā yavīyut ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1233: RV_10,061.10a makṣū kanāyāḥ sakhyaṃ navagvā ṛtaṃ vadanta ṛtayuktim agman |
GV01rv_hn10u:1234: RV_10,061.10c dvibarhaso ya upa gopam āgur adakṣiṇāso acyutā dudukṣan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1235: RV_10,061.11a makṣū kanāyāḥ sakhyaṃ navīyo rādho na reta ṛtam it turaṇyan |
GV01rv_hn10u:1236: RV_10,061.11c śuci yat te rekṇa āyajanta sabardughāyāḥ paya usriyāyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1237: RV_10,061.12a paśvā yat paścā viyutā budhanteti bravīti vaktarī rarāṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1238: RV_10,061.12c vasor vasutvā kāravo 'nehā viśvaṃ viveṣṭi draviṇam upa kṣu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1239: RV_10,061.13a tad in nv asya pariṣadvāno agman purū sadanto nārṣadam bibhitsan |
GV01rv_hn10u:1240: RV_10,061.13c vi śuṣṇasya saṃgrathitam anarvā vidat puruprajātasya guhā yat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1241: RV_10,061.14a bhargo ha nāmota yasya devāḥ svar ṇa ye triṣadhasthe niṣeduḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1242: RV_10,061.14c agnir ha nāmota jātavedāḥ śrudhī no hotar ṛtasya hotādhruk ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1243: RV_10,061.15a uta tyā me raudrāv arcimantā nāsatyāv indra gūrtaye yajadhyai |
GV01rv_hn10u:1244: RV_10,061.15c manuṣvad vṛktabarhiṣe rarāṇā mandū hitaprayasā vikṣu yajyū ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1245: RV_10,061.16a ayaṃ stuto rājā vandi vedhā apaś ca vipras tarati svasetuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1246: RV_10,061.16c sa kakṣīvantaṃ rejayat so agniṃ nemiṃ na cakram arvato raghudru ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1247: RV_10,061.17a sa dvibandhur vaitaraṇo yaṣṭā sabardhuṃ dhenum asvaṃ duhadhyai |
GV01rv_hn10u:1248: RV_10,061.17c saṃ yan mitrāvaruṇā vṛñja ukthair jyeṣṭhebhir aryamaṇaṃ varūthaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1249: RV_10,061.18a tadbandhuḥ sūrir divi te dhiyandhā nābhānediṣṭho rapati pra venan |
GV01rv_hn10u:1250: RV_10,061.18c sā no nābhiḥ paramāsya vā ghāhaṃ tat paścā katithaś cid āsa ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1251: RV_10,061.19a iyam me nābhir iha me sadhastham ime me devā ayam asmi sarvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1252: RV_10,061.19c dvijā aha prathamajā ṛtasyedaṃ dhenur aduhaj jāyamānā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1253: RV_10,061.20a adhāsu mandro aratir vibhāvāva syati dvivartanir vaneṣāṭ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1254: RV_10,061.20c ūrdhvā yac chreṇir na śiśur dan makṣū sthiraṃ śevṛdhaṃ sūta mātā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1255: RV_10,061.21a adhā gāva upamātiṃ kanāyā anu śvāntasya kasya cit pareyuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1256: RV_10,061.21c śrudhi tvaṃ sudraviṇo nas tvaṃ yāḷ āśvaghnasya vāvṛdhe sūnṛtābhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1257: RV_10,061.22a adha tvam indra viddhy asmān maho rāye nṛpate vajrabāhuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1258: RV_10,061.22c rakṣā ca no maghonaḥ pāhi sūrīn anehasas te harivo abhiṣṭau ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1259: RV_10,061.23a adha yad rājānā gaviṣṭau sarat saraṇyuḥ kārave jaraṇyuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1260: RV_10,061.23c vipraḥ preṣṭhaḥ sa hy eṣām babhūva parā ca vakṣad uta parṣad enān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1261: RV_10,061.24a adhā nv asya jenyasya puṣṭau vṛthā rebhanta īmahe tad ū nu |
GV01rv_hn10u:1262: RV_10,061.24c saraṇyur asya sūnur aśvo vipraś cāsi śravasaś ca sātau ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1263: RV_10,061.25a yuvor yadi sakhyāyāsme śardhāya stomaṃ jujuṣe namasvān |
GV01rv_hn10u:1264: RV_10,061.25c viśvatra yasminn ā giraḥ samīcīḥ pūrvīva gātur dāśat sūnṛtāyai ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1265: RV_10,061.26a sa gṛṇāno adbhir devavān iti subandhur namasā sūktaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1266: RV_10,061.26c vardhad ukthair vacobhir ā hi nūnaṃ vy adhvaiti payasa usriyāyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1267: RV_10,061.27a ta ū ṣu ṇo maho yajatrā bhūta devāsa ūtaye sajoṣāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1268: RV_10,061.27c ye vājāṃ anayatā viyanto ye sthā nicetāro amūrāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1269: RV_10,062.01a ye yajñena dakṣiṇayā samaktā indrasya sakhyam amṛtatvam ānaśa |
GV01rv_hn10u:1270: RV_10,062.01c tebhyo bhadram aṅgiraso vo astu prati gṛbhṇīta mānavaṃ sumedhasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1271: RV_10,062.02a ya udājan pitaro gomayaṃ vasv ṛtenābhindan parivatsare valam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1272: RV_10,062.02c dīrghāyutvam aṅgiraso vo astu prati gṛbhṇīta mānavaṃ sumedhasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1273: RV_10,062.03a ya ṛtena sūryam ārohayan divy aprathayan pṛthivīm mātaraṃ vi |
GV01rv_hn10u:1274: RV_10,062.03c suprajāstvam aṅgiraso vo astu prati gṛbhṇīta mānavaṃ sumedhasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1275: RV_10,062.04a ayaṃ nābhā vadati valgu vo gṛhe devaputrā ṛṣayas tac chṛṇotana |
GV01rv_hn10u:1276: RV_10,062.04c subrahmaṇyam aṅgiraso vo astu prati gṛbhṇīta mānavaṃ sumedhasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1277: RV_10,062.05a virūpāsa id ṛṣayas ta id gambhīravepasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1278: RV_10,062.05c te aṅgirasaḥ sūnavas te agneḥ pari jajñire ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1279: RV_10,062.06a ye agneḥ pari jajñire virūpāso divas pari |
GV01rv_hn10u:1280: RV_10,062.06c navagvo nu daśagvo aṅgirastamo sacā deveṣu maṃhate ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1281: RV_10,062.07a indreṇa yujā niḥ sṛjanta vāghato vrajaṃ gomantam aśvinam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1282: RV_10,062.07c sahasram me dadato aṣṭakarṇyaḥ śravo deveṣv akrata ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1283: RV_10,062.08a pra nūnaṃ jāyatām ayam manus tokmeva rohatu |
GV01rv_hn10u:1284: RV_10,062.08c yaḥ sahasraṃ śatāśvaṃ sadyo dānāya maṃhate ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1285: RV_10,062.09a na tam aśnoti kaś cana diva iva sānv ārabham |
GV01rv_hn10u:1286: RV_10,062.09c sāvarṇyasya dakṣiṇā vi sindhur iva paprathe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1287: RV_10,062.10a uta dāsā pariviṣe smaddiṣṭī goparīṇasā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1289: RV_10,062.11a sahasradā grāmaṇīr mā riṣan manuḥ sūryeṇāsya yatamānaitu dakṣiṇā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1290: RV_10,062.11c sāvarṇer devāḥ pra tirantv āyur yasminn aśrāntā asanāma vājam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1291: RV_10,063.01a parāvato ye didhiṣanta āpyam manuprītāso janimā vivasvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1292: RV_10,063.01c yayāter ye nahuṣyasya barhiṣi devā āsate te adhi bruvantu naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1293: RV_10,063.02a viśvā hi vo namasyāni vandyā nāmāni devā uta yajñiyāni vaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1294: RV_10,063.02c ye stha jātā aditer adbhyas pari ye pṛthivyās te ma iha śrutā havam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1295: RV_10,063.03a yebhyo mātā madhumat pinvate payaḥ pīyūṣaṃ dyaur aditir adribarhāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1296: RV_10,063.03c ukthaśuṣmān vṛṣabharān svapnasas tāṃ ādityāṃ anu madā svastaye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1297: RV_10,063.04a nṛcakṣaso animiṣanto arhaṇā bṛhad devāso amṛtatvam ānaśuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1298: RV_10,063.04c jyotīrathā ahimāyā anāgaso divo varṣmāṇaṃ vasate svastaye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1299: RV_10,063.05a samrājo ye suvṛdho yajñam āyayur aparihvṛtā dadhire divi kṣayam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1300: RV_10,063.05c tāṃ ā vivāsa namasā suvṛktibhir maho ādityāṃ aditiṃ svastaye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1301: RV_10,063.06a ko va stomaṃ rādhati yaṃ jujoṣatha viśve devāso manuṣo yati ṣṭhana |
GV01rv_hn10u:1302: RV_10,063.06c ko vo 'dhvaraṃ tuvijātā araṃ karad yo naḥ parṣad aty aṃhaḥ svastaye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1303: RV_10,063.07a yebhyo hotrām prathamām āyeje manuḥ samiddhāgnir manasā sapta hotṛbhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1304: RV_10,063.07c ta ādityā abhayaṃ śarma yacchata sugā naḥ karta supathā svastaye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1305: RV_10,063.08a ya īśire bhuvanasya pracetaso viśvasya sthātur jagataś ca mantavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1306: RV_10,063.08c te naḥ kṛtād akṛtād enasas pary adyā devāsaḥ pipṛtā svastaye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1307: RV_10,063.09a bhareṣv indraṃ suhavaṃ havāmahe 'ṃhomucaṃ sukṛtaṃ daivyaṃ janam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1308: RV_10,063.09c agnim mitraṃ varuṇaṃ sātaye bhagaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī marutaḥ svastaye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1309: RV_10,063.10a sutrāmāṇam pṛthivīṃ dyām anehasaṃ suśarmāṇam aditiṃ supraṇītim |
GV01rv_hn10u:1310: RV_10,063.10c daivīṃ nāvaṃ svaritrām anāgasam asravantīm ā ruhemā svastaye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1311: RV_10,063.11a viśve yajatrā adhi vocatotaye trāyadhvaṃ no durevāyā abhihrutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1312: RV_10,063.11c satyayā vo devahūtyā huvema śṛṇvato devā avase svastaye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1313: RV_10,063.12a apāmīvām apa viśvām anāhutim apārātiṃ durvidatrām aghāyataḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1314: RV_10,063.12c āre devā dveṣo asmad yuyotanoru ṇaḥ śarma yacchatā svastaye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1315: RV_10,063.13a ariṣṭaḥ sa marto viśva edhate pra prajābhir jāyate dharmaṇas pari |
GV01rv_hn10u:1316: RV_10,063.13c yam ādityāso nayathā sunītibhir ati viśvāni duritā svastaye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1317: RV_10,063.14a yaṃ devāso 'vatha vājasātau yaṃ śūrasātā maruto hite dhane |
GV01rv_hn10u:1318: RV_10,063.14c prātaryāvāṇaṃ ratham indra sānasim ariṣyantam ā ruhemā svastaye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1319: RV_10,063.15a svasti naḥ pathyāsu dhanvasu svasty apsu vṛjane svarvati |
GV01rv_hn10u:1320: RV_10,063.15c svasti naḥ putrakṛtheṣu yoniṣu svasti rāye maruto dadhātana ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1321: RV_10,063.16a svastir id dhi prapathe śreṣṭhā rekṇasvaty abhi yā vāmam eti |
GV01rv_hn10u:1322: RV_10,063.16c sā no amā so araṇe ni pātu svāveśā bhavatu devagopā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1323: RV_10,063.17a evā plateḥ sūnur avīvṛdhad vo viśva ādityā adite manīṣī |
GV01rv_hn10u:1324: RV_10,063.17c īśānāso naro amartyenāstāvi jano divyo gayena ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1325: RV_10,064.01a kathā devānāṃ katamasya yāmani sumantu nāma śṛṇvatām manāmahe |
GV01rv_hn10u:1326: RV_10,064.01c ko mṛḷāti katamo no mayas karat katama ūtī abhy ā vavartati ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1327: RV_10,064.02a kratūyanti kratavo hṛtsu dhītayo venanti venāḥ patayanty ā diśaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1328: RV_10,064.02c na marḍitā vidyate anya ebhyo deveṣu me adhi kāmā ayaṃsata ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1329: RV_10,064.03a narā vā śaṃsam pūṣaṇam agohyam agniṃ deveddham abhy arcase girā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1330: RV_10,064.03c sūryāmāsā candramasā yamaṃ divi tritaṃ vātam uṣasam aktum aśvinā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1331: RV_10,064.04a kathā kavis tuvīravān kayā girā bṛhaspatir vāvṛdhate suvṛktibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1332: RV_10,064.04c aja ekapāt suhavebhir ṛkvabhir ahiḥ śṛṇotu budhnyo havīmani ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1333: RV_10,064.05a dakṣasya vādite janmani vrate rājānā mitrāvaruṇā vivāsasi |
GV01rv_hn10u:1334: RV_10,064.05c atūrtapanthāḥ pururatho aryamā saptahotā viṣurūpeṣu janmasu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1335: RV_10,064.06a te no arvanto havanaśruto havaṃ viśve śṛṇvantu vājino mitadravaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1336: RV_10,064.06c sahasrasā medhasātāv iva tmanā maho ye dhanaṃ samitheṣu jabhrire ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1337: RV_10,064.07a pra vo vāyuṃ rathayujam purandhiṃ stomaiḥ kṛṇudhvaṃ sakhyāya pūṣaṇam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1338: RV_10,064.07c te hi devasya savituḥ savīmani kratuṃ sacante sacitaḥ sacetasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1339: RV_10,064.08a triḥ sapta sasrā nadyo mahīr apo vanaspatīn parvatāṃ agnim ūtaye |
GV01rv_hn10u:1340: RV_10,064.08c kṛśānum astṝn tiṣyaṃ sadhastha ā rudraṃ rudreṣu rudriyaṃ havāmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1341: RV_10,064.09a sarasvatī sarayuḥ sindhur ūrmibhir maho mahīr avasā yantu vakṣaṇīḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1342: RV_10,064.09c devīr āpo mātaraḥ sūdayitnvo ghṛtavat payo madhuman no arcata ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1343: RV_10,064.10a uta mātā bṛhaddivā śṛṇotu nas tvaṣṭā devebhir janibhiḥ pitā vacaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1344: RV_10,064.10c ṛbhukṣā vājo rathaspatir bhago raṇvaḥ śaṃsaḥ śaśamānasya pātu naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1345: RV_10,064.11a raṇvaḥ saṃdṛṣṭau pitumāṃ iva kṣayo bhadrā rudrāṇām marutām upastutiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1346: RV_10,064.11c gobhiḥ ṣyāma yaśaso janeṣv ā sadā devāsa iḷayā sacemahi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1347: RV_10,064.12a yām me dhiyam maruta indra devā adadāta varuṇa mitra yūyam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1348: RV_10,064.12c tām pīpayata payaseva dhenuṃ kuvid giro adhi rathe vahātha ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1349: RV_10,064.13a kuvid aṅga prati yathā cid asya naḥ sajātyasya maruto bubodhatha |
GV01rv_hn10u:1350: RV_10,064.13c nābhā yatra prathamaṃ saṃnasāmahe tatra jāmitvam aditir dadhātu naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1351: RV_10,064.14a te hi dyāvāpṛthivī mātarā mahī devī devāñ janmanā yajñiye itaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1352: RV_10,064.14c ubhe bibhṛta ubhayam bharīmabhiḥ purū retāṃsi pitṛbhiś ca siñcataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1353: RV_10,064.15a vi ṣā hotrā viśvam aśnoti vāryam bṛhaspatir aramatiḥ panīyasī |
GV01rv_hn10u:1354: RV_10,064.15c grāvā yatra madhuṣud ucyate bṛhad avīvaśanta matibhir manīṣiṇaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1355: RV_10,064.16a evā kavis tuvīravāṃ ṛtajñā draviṇasyur draviṇasaś cakānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1356: RV_10,064.16c ukthebhir atra matibhiś ca vipro 'pīpayad gayo divyāni janma ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1357: RV_10,064.17a evā plateḥ sūnur avīvṛdhad vo viśva ādityā adite manīṣī |
GV01rv_hn10u:1358: RV_10,064.17c īśānāso naro amartyenāstāvi jano divyo gayena ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1359: RV_10,065.01a agnir indro varuṇo mitro aryamā vāyuḥ pūṣā sarasvatī sajoṣasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1360: RV_10,065.01c ādityā viṣṇur marutaḥ svar bṛhat somo rudro aditir brahmaṇas patiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1361: RV_10,065.02a indrāgnī vṛtrahatyeṣu satpatī mitho hinvānā tanvā samokasā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1362: RV_10,065.02c antarikṣam mahy ā paprur ojasā somo ghṛtaśrīr mahimānam īrayan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1363: RV_10,065.03a teṣāṃ hi mahnā mahatām anarvaṇāṃ stomāṃ iyarmy ṛtajñā ṛtāvṛdhām |
GV01rv_hn10u:1364: RV_10,065.03c ye apsavam arṇavaṃ citrarādhasas te no rāsantām mahaye sumitryāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1365: RV_10,065.04a svarṇaram antarikṣāṇi rocanā dyāvābhūmī pṛthivīṃ skambhur ojasā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1366: RV_10,065.04c pṛkṣā iva mahayantaḥ surātayo devā stavante manuṣāya sūrayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1367: RV_10,065.05a mitrāya śikṣa varuṇāya dāśuṣe yā samrājā manasā na prayucchataḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1368: RV_10,065.05c yayor dhāma dharmaṇā rocate bṛhad yayor ubhe rodasī nādhasī vṛtau ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1369: RV_10,065.06a yā gaur vartanim paryeti niṣkṛtam payo duhānā vratanīr avārataḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1370: RV_10,065.06c sā prabruvāṇā varuṇāya dāśuṣe devebhyo dāśad dhaviṣā vivasvate ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1371: RV_10,065.07a divakṣaso agnijihvā ṛtāvṛdha ṛtasya yoniṃ vimṛśanta āsate |
GV01rv_hn10u:1372: RV_10,065.07c dyāṃ skabhitvy apa ā cakrur ojasā yajñaṃ janitvī tanvī ni māmṛjuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1373: RV_10,065.08a parikṣitā pitarā pūrvajāvarī ṛtasya yonā kṣayataḥ samokasā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1374: RV_10,065.08c dyāvāpṛthivī varuṇāya savrate ghṛtavat payo mahiṣāya pinvataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1375: RV_10,065.09a parjanyāvātā vṛṣabhā purīṣiṇendravāyū varuṇo mitro aryamā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1376: RV_10,065.09c devāṃ ādityāṃ aditiṃ havāmahe ye pārthivāso divyāso apsu ye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1377: RV_10,065.10a tvaṣṭāraṃ vāyum ṛbhavo ya ohate daivyā hotārā uṣasaṃ svastaye |
GV01rv_hn10u:1378: RV_10,065.10c bṛhaspatiṃ vṛtrakhādaṃ sumedhasam indriyaṃ somaṃ dhanasā u īmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1379: RV_10,065.11a brahma gām aśvaṃ janayanta oṣadhīr vanaspatīn pṛthivīm parvatāṃ apaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1380: RV_10,065.11c sūryaṃ divi rohayantaḥ sudānava āryā vratā visṛjanto adhi kṣami ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1381: RV_10,065.12a bhujyum aṃhasaḥ pipṛtho nir aśvinā śyāvam putraṃ vadhrimatyā ajinvatam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1382: RV_10,065.12c kamadyuvaṃ vimadāyohathur yuvaṃ viṣṇāpvaṃ viśvakāyāva sṛjathaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1383: RV_10,065.13a pāvīravī tanyatur ekapād ajo divo dhartā sindhur āpaḥ samudriyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1384: RV_10,065.13c viśve devāsaḥ śṛṇavan vacāṃsi me sarasvatī saha dhībhiḥ purandhyā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1385: RV_10,065.14a viśve devāḥ saha dhībhiḥ purandhyā manor yajatrā amṛtā ṛtajñāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1386: RV_10,065.14c rātiṣāco abhiṣācaḥ svarvidaḥ svar giro brahma sūktaṃ juṣerata ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1387: RV_10,065.15a devān vasiṣṭho amṛtān vavande ye viśvā bhuvanābhi pratasthuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1388: RV_10,065.15c te no rāsantām urugāyam adya yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1389: RV_10,066.01a devān huve bṛhacchravasaḥ svastaye jyotiṣkṛto adhvarasya pracetasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1390: RV_10,066.01c ye vāvṛdhuḥ prataraṃ viśvavedasa indrajyeṣṭhāso amṛtā ṛtāvṛdhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1391: RV_10,066.02a indraprasūtā varuṇapraśiṣṭā ye sūryasya jyotiṣo bhāgam ānaśuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1392: RV_10,066.02c marudgaṇe vṛjane manma dhīmahi māghone yajñaṃ janayanta sūrayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1393: RV_10,066.03a indro vasubhiḥ pari pātu no gayam ādityair no aditiḥ śarma yacchatu |
GV01rv_hn10u:1394: RV_10,066.03c rudro rudrebhir devo mṛḷayāti nas tvaṣṭā no gnābhiḥ suvitāya jinvatu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1395: RV_10,066.04a aditir dyāvāpṛthivī ṛtam mahad indrāviṣṇū marutaḥ svar bṛhat |
GV01rv_hn10u:1396: RV_10,066.04c devāṃ ādityāṃ avase havāmahe vasūn rudrān savitāraṃ sudaṃsasam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1397: RV_10,066.05a sarasvān dhībhir varuṇo dhṛtavrataḥ pūṣā viṣṇur mahimā vāyur aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1398: RV_10,066.05c brahmakṛto amṛtā viśvavedasaḥ śarma no yaṃsan trivarūtham aṃhasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1399: RV_10,066.06a vṛṣā yajño vṛṣaṇaḥ santu yajñiyā vṛṣaṇo devā vṛṣaṇo haviṣkṛtaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1400: RV_10,066.06c vṛṣaṇā dyāvāpṛthivī ṛtāvarī vṛṣā parjanyo vṛṣaṇo vṛṣastubhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1401: RV_10,066.07a agnīṣomā vṛṣaṇā vājasātaye purupraśastā vṛṣaṇā upa bruve |
GV01rv_hn10u:1402: RV_10,066.07c yāv ījire vṛṣaṇo devayajyayā tā naḥ śarma trivarūthaṃ vi yaṃsataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1403: RV_10,066.08a dhṛtavratāḥ kṣatriyā yajñaniṣkṛto bṛhaddivā adhvarāṇām abhiśriyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1404: RV_10,066.08c agnihotāra ṛtasāpo adruho 'po asṛjann anu vṛtratūrye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1405: RV_10,066.09a dyāvāpṛthivī janayann abhi vratāpa oṣadhīr vanināni yajñiyā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1406: RV_10,066.09c antarikṣaṃ svar ā paprur ūtaye vaśaṃ devāsas tanvī ni māmṛjuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1407: RV_10,066.10a dhartāro diva ṛbhavaḥ suhastā vātāparjanyā mahiṣasya tanyatoḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1408: RV_10,066.10c āpa oṣadhīḥ pra tirantu no giro bhago rātir vājino yantu me havam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1409: RV_10,066.11a samudraḥ sindhū rajo antarikṣam aja ekapāt tanayitnur arṇavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1410: RV_10,066.11c ahir budhnyaḥ śṛṇavad vacāṃsi me viśve devāsa uta sūrayo mama ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1411: RV_10,066.12a syāma vo manavo devavītaye prāñcaṃ no yajñam pra ṇayata sādhuyā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1412: RV_10,066.12c ādityā rudrā vasavaḥ sudānava imā brahma śasyamānāni jinvata ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1413: RV_10,066.13a daivyā hotārā prathamā purohita ṛtasya panthām anv emi sādhuyā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1414: RV_10,066.13c kṣetrasya patim prativeśam īmahe viśvān devāṃ amṛtāṃ aprayucchataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1415: RV_10,066.14a vasiṣṭhāsaḥ pitṛvad vācam akrata devāṃ īḷānā ṛṣivat svastaye |
GV01rv_hn10u:1416: RV_10,066.14c prītā iva jñātayaḥ kāmam etyāsme devāso 'va dhūnutā vasu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1417: RV_10,066.15a devān vasiṣṭho amṛtān vavande ye viśvā bhuvanābhi pratasthuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1418: RV_10,066.15c te no rāsantām urugāyam adya yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1419: RV_10,067.01a imāṃ dhiyaṃ saptaśīrṣṇīm pitā na ṛtaprajātām bṛhatīm avindat |
GV01rv_hn10u:1420: RV_10,067.01c turīyaṃ svij janayad viśvajanyo 'yāsya uktham indrāya śaṃsan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1421: RV_10,067.02a ṛtaṃ śaṃsanta ṛju dīdhyānā divas putrāso asurasya vīrāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1422: RV_10,067.02c vipram padam aṅgiraso dadhānā yajñasya dhāma prathamam mananta ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1423: RV_10,067.03a haṃsair iva sakhibhir vāvadadbhir aśmanmayāni nahanā vyasyan |
GV01rv_hn10u:1424: RV_10,067.03c bṛhaspatir abhikanikradad gā uta prāstaud uc ca vidvāṃ agāyat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1425: RV_10,067.04a avo dvābhyām para ekayā gā guhā tiṣṭhantīr anṛtasya setau |
GV01rv_hn10u:1426: RV_10,067.04c bṛhaspatis tamasi jyotir icchann ud usrā ākar vi hi tisra āvaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1427: RV_10,067.05a vibhidyā puraṃ śayathem apācīṃ nis trīṇi sākam udadher akṛntat |
GV01rv_hn10u:1428: RV_10,067.05c bṛhaspatir uṣasaṃ sūryaṃ gām arkaṃ viveda stanayann iva dyauḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1429: RV_10,067.06a indro valaṃ rakṣitāraṃ dughānāṃ kareṇeva vi cakartā raveṇa |
GV01rv_hn10u:1430: RV_10,067.06c svedāñjibhir āśiram icchamāno 'rodayat paṇim ā gā amuṣṇāt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1431: RV_10,067.07a sa īṃ satyebhiḥ sakhibhiḥ śucadbhir godhāyasaṃ vi dhanasair adardaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1432: RV_10,067.07c brahmaṇas patir vṛṣabhir varāhair gharmasvedebhir draviṇaṃ vy ānaṭ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1433: RV_10,067.08a te satyena manasā gopatiṃ gā iyānāsa iṣaṇayanta dhībhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1434: RV_10,067.08c bṛhaspatir mithoavadyapebhir ud usriyā asṛjata svayugbhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1435: RV_10,067.09a taṃ vardhayanto matibhiḥ śivābhiḥ siṃham iva nānadataṃ sadhasthe |
GV01rv_hn10u:1436: RV_10,067.09c bṛhaspatiṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ śūrasātau bhare-bhare anu madema jiṣṇum ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1437: RV_10,067.10a yadā vājam asanad viśvarūpam ā dyām arukṣad uttarāṇi sadma |
GV01rv_hn10u:1438: RV_10,067.10c bṛhaspatiṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vardhayanto nānā santo bibhrato jyotir āsā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1439: RV_10,067.11a satyām āśiṣaṃ kṛṇutā vayodhai kīriṃ cid dhy avatha svebhir evaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1440: RV_10,067.11c paścā mṛdho apa bhavantu viśvās tad rodasī śṛṇutaṃ viśvaminve ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1441: RV_10,067.12a indro mahnā mahato arṇavasya vi mūrdhānam abhinad arbudasya |
GV01rv_hn10u:1442: RV_10,067.12c ahann ahim ariṇāt sapta sindhūn devair dyāvāpṛthivī prāvataṃ naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1443: RV_10,068.01a udapruto na vayo rakṣamāṇā vāvadato abhriyasyeva ghoṣāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1444: RV_10,068.01c giribhrajo normayo madanto bṛhaspatim abhy arkā anāvan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1445: RV_10,068.02a saṃ gobhir āṅgiraso nakṣamāṇo bhaga ived aryamaṇaṃ nināya |
GV01rv_hn10u:1446: RV_10,068.02c jane mitro na dampatī anakti bṛhaspate vājayāśūṃr ivājau ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1447: RV_10,068.03a sādhvaryā atithinīr iṣirā spārhāḥ suvarṇā anavadyarūpāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1448: RV_10,068.03c bṛhaspatiḥ parvatebhyo vitūryā nir gā ūpe yavam iva sthivibhyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1449: RV_10,068.04a āpruṣāyan madhuna ṛtasya yonim avakṣipann arka ulkām iva dyoḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1450: RV_10,068.04c bṛhaspatir uddharann aśmano gā bhūmyā udneva vi tvacam bibheda ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1451: RV_10,068.05a apa jyotiṣā tamo antarikṣād udnaḥ śīpālam iva vāta ājat |
GV01rv_hn10u:1452: RV_10,068.05c bṛhaspatir anumṛśyā valasyābhram iva vāta ā cakra ā gāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1453: RV_10,068.06a yadā valasya pīyato jasum bhed bṛhaspatir agnitapobhir arkaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1454: RV_10,068.06c dadbhir na jihvā pariviṣṭam ādad āvir nidhīṃr akṛṇod usriyāṇām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1455: RV_10,068.07a bṛhaspatir amata hi tyad āsāṃ nāma svarīṇāṃ sadane guhā yat |
GV01rv_hn10u:1456: RV_10,068.07c āṇḍeva bhittvā śakunasya garbham ud usriyāḥ parvatasya tmanājat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1457: RV_10,068.08a aśnāpinaddham madhu pary apaśyan matsyaṃ na dīna udani kṣiyantam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1458: RV_10,068.08c niṣ ṭaj jabhāra camasaṃ na vṛkṣād bṛhaspatir viraveṇā vikṛtya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1459: RV_10,068.09a soṣām avindat sa svaḥ so agniṃ so arkeṇa vi babādhe tamāṃsi |
GV01rv_hn10u:1460: RV_10,068.09c bṛhaspatir govapuṣo valasya nir majjānaṃ na parvaṇo jabhāra ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1461: RV_10,068.10a himeva parṇā muṣitā vanāni bṛhaspatinākṛpayad valo gāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1462: RV_10,068.10c anānukṛtyam apunaś cakāra yāt sūryāmāsā mitha uccarātaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1463: RV_10,068.11a abhi śyāvaṃ na kṛśanebhir aśvaṃ nakṣatrebhiḥ pitaro dyām apiṃśan |
GV01rv_hn10u:1464: RV_10,068.11c rātryāṃ tamo adadhur jyotir ahan bṛhaspatir bhinad adriṃ vidad gāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1465: RV_10,068.12a idam akarma namo abhriyāya yaḥ pūrvīr anv ānonavīti |
GV01rv_hn10u:1466: RV_10,068.12c bṛhaspatiḥ sa hi gobhiḥ so aśvaiḥ sa vīrebhiḥ sa nṛbhir no vayo dhāt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1467: RV_10,069.01a bhadrā agner vadhryaśvasya saṃdṛśo vāmī praṇītiḥ suraṇā upetayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1468: RV_10,069.01c yad īṃ sumitrā viśo agra indhate ghṛtenāhuto jarate davidyutat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1469: RV_10,069.02a ghṛtam agner vadhryaśvasya vardhanaṃ ghṛtam annaṃ ghṛtam v asya medanam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1470: RV_10,069.02c ghṛtenāhuta urviyā vi paprathe sūrya iva rocate sarpirāsutiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1471: RV_10,069.03a yat te manur yad anīkaṃ sumitraḥ samīdhe agne tad idaṃ navīyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1472: RV_10,069.03c sa revac choca sa giro juṣasva sa vājaṃ darṣi sa iha śravo dhāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1473: RV_10,069.04a yaṃ tvā pūrvam īḷito vadhryaśvaḥ samīdhe agne sa idaṃ juṣasva |
GV01rv_hn10u:1474: RV_10,069.04c sa na stipā uta bhavā tanūpā dātraṃ rakṣasva yad idaṃ te asme ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1475: RV_10,069.05a bhavā dyumnī vādhryaśvota gopā mā tvā tārīd abhimātir janānām |
GV01rv_hn10u:1476: RV_10,069.05c śūra iva dhṛṣṇuś cyavanaḥ sumitraḥ pra nu vocaṃ vādhryaśvasya nāma ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1477: RV_10,069.06a sam ajryā parvatyā vasūni dāsā vṛtrāṇy āryā jigetha |
GV01rv_hn10u:1478: RV_10,069.06c śūra iva dhṛṣṇuś cyavano janānāṃ tvam agne pṛtanāyūṃr abhi ṣyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1479: RV_10,069.07a dīrghatantur bṛhadukṣāyam agniḥ sahasrastarīḥ śatanītha ṛbhvā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1480: RV_10,069.07c dyumān dyumatsu nṛbhir mṛjyamānaḥ sumitreṣu dīdayo devayatsu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1481: RV_10,069.08a tve dhenuḥ sudughā jātavedo 'saścateva samanā sabardhuk |
GV01rv_hn10u:1482: RV_10,069.08c tvaṃ nṛbhir dakṣiṇāvadbhir agne sumitrebhir idhyase devayadbhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1483: RV_10,069.09a devāś cit te amṛtā jātavedo mahimānaṃ vādhryaśva pra vocan |
GV01rv_hn10u:1484: RV_10,069.09c yat sampṛccham mānuṣīr viśa āyan tvaṃ nṛbhir ajayas tvāvṛdhebhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1485: RV_10,069.10a piteva putram abibhar upasthe tvām agne vadhryaśvaḥ saparyan |
GV01rv_hn10u:1486: RV_10,069.10c juṣāṇo asya samidhaṃ yaviṣṭhota pūrvāṃ avanor vrādhataś cit ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1487: RV_10,069.11a śaśvad agnir vadhryaśvasya śatrūn nṛbhir jigāya sutasomavadbhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1488: RV_10,069.11c samanaṃ cid adahaś citrabhāno 'va vrādhantam abhinad vṛdhaś cit ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1489: RV_10,069.12a ayam agnir vadhryaśvasya vṛtrahā sanakāt preddho namasopavākyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1490: RV_10,069.12c sa no ajāmīṃr uta vā vijāmīn abhi tiṣṭha śardhato vādhryaśva ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1491: RV_10,070.01a imām me agne samidhaṃ juṣasveḷas pade prati haryā ghṛtācīm |
GV01rv_hn10u:1492: RV_10,070.01c varṣman pṛthivyāḥ sudinatve ahnām ūrdhvo bhava sukrato devayajyā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1493: RV_10,070.02a ā devānām agrayāveha yātu narāśaṃso viśvarūpebhir aśvaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1494: RV_10,070.02c ṛtasya pathā namasā miyedho devebhyo devatamaḥ suṣūdat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1495: RV_10,070.03a śaśvattamam īḷate dūtyāya haviṣmanto manuṣyāso agnim |
GV01rv_hn10u:1496: RV_10,070.03c vahiṣṭhair aśvaiḥ suvṛtā rathenā devān vakṣi ni ṣadeha hotā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1497: RV_10,070.04a vi prathatāṃ devajuṣṭaṃ tiraścā dīrghaṃ drāghmā surabhi bhūtv asme |
GV01rv_hn10u:1498: RV_10,070.04c aheḷatā manasā deva barhir indrajyeṣṭhāṃ uśato yakṣi devān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1499: RV_10,070.05a divo vā sānu spṛśatā varīyaḥ pṛthivyā vā mātrayā vi śrayadhvam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1500: RV_10,070.05c uśatīr dvāro mahinā mahadbhir devaṃ rathaṃ rathayur dhārayadhvam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1501: RV_10,070.06a devī divo duhitarā suśilpe uṣāsānaktā sadatāṃ ni yonau |
GV01rv_hn10u:1502: RV_10,070.06c ā vāṃ devāsa uśatī uśanta urau sīdantu subhage upasthe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1503: RV_10,070.07a ūrdhvo grāvā bṛhad agniḥ samiddhaḥ priyā dhāmāny aditer upasthe |
GV01rv_hn10u:1504: RV_10,070.07c purohitāv ṛtvijā yajñe asmin viduṣṭarā draviṇam ā yajethām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1505: RV_10,070.08a tisro devīr barhir idaṃ varīya ā sīdata cakṛmā vaḥ syonam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1506: RV_10,070.08c manuṣvad yajñaṃ sudhitā havīṃṣīḷā devī ghṛtapadī juṣanta ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1507: RV_10,070.09a deva tvaṣṭar yad dha cārutvam ānaḍ yad aṅgirasām abhavaḥ sacābhūḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1508: RV_10,070.09c sa devānām pātha upa pra vidvāṃ uśan yakṣi draviṇodaḥ suratnaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1509: RV_10,070.10a vanaspate raśanayā niyūyā devānām pātha upa vakṣi vidvān |
GV01rv_hn10u:1510: RV_10,070.10c svadāti devaḥ kṛṇavad dhavīṃṣy avatāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī havam me ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1511: RV_10,070.11a āgne vaha varuṇam iṣṭaye na indraṃ divo maruto antarikṣāt |
GV01rv_hn10u:1512: RV_10,070.11c sīdantu barhir viśva ā yajatrāḥ svāhā devā amṛtā mādayantām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1513: RV_10,071.01a bṛhaspate prathamaṃ vāco agraṃ yat prairata nāmadheyaṃ dadhānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1514: RV_10,071.01c yad eṣāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ yad aripram āsīt preṇā tad eṣāṃ nihitaṃ guhāviḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1515: RV_10,071.02a saktum iva titaunā punanto yatra dhīrā manasā vācam akrata |
GV01rv_hn10u:1516: RV_10,071.02c atrā sakhāyaḥ sakhyāni jānate bhadraiṣāṃ lakṣmīr nihitādhi vāci ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1517: RV_10,071.03a yajñena vācaḥ padavīyam āyan tām anv avindann ṛṣiṣu praviṣṭām |
GV01rv_hn10u:1518: RV_10,071.03c tām ābhṛtyā vy adadhuḥ purutrā tāṃ sapta rebhā abhi saṃ navante ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1519: RV_10,071.04a uta tvaḥ paśyan na dadarśa vācam uta tvaḥ śṛṇvan na śṛṇoty enām |
GV01rv_hn10u:1520: RV_10,071.04c uto tvasmai tanvaṃ vi sasre jāyeva patya uśatī suvāsāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1521: RV_10,071.05a uta tvaṃ sakhye sthirapītam āhur nainaṃ hinvanty api vājineṣu |
GV01rv_hn10u:1522: RV_10,071.05c adhenvā carati māyayaiṣa vācaṃ śuśruvāṃ aphalām apuṣpām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1523: RV_10,071.06a yas tityāja sacividaṃ sakhāyaṃ na tasya vācy api bhāgo asti |
GV01rv_hn10u:1524: RV_10,071.06c yad īṃ śṛṇoty alakaṃ śṛṇoti nahi praveda sukṛtasya panthām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1525: RV_10,071.07a akṣaṇvantaḥ karṇavantaḥ sakhāyo manojaveṣv asamā babhūvuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1526: RV_10,071.07c ādaghnāsa upakakṣāsa u tve hradā iva snātvā u tve dadṛśre ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1527: RV_10,071.08a hṛdā taṣṭeṣu manaso javeṣu yad brāhmaṇāḥ saṃyajante sakhāyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1528: RV_10,071.08c atrāha tvaṃ vi jahur vedyābhir ohabrahmāṇo vi caranty u tve ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1529: RV_10,071.09a ime ye nārvāṅ na paraś caranti na brāhmaṇāso na sutekarāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1530: RV_10,071.09c ta ete vācam abhipadya pāpayā sirīs tantraṃ tanvate aprajajñayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1531: RV_10,071.10a sarve nandanti yaśasāgatena sabhāsāhena sakhyā sakhāyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1532: RV_10,071.10c kilbiṣaspṛt pituṣaṇir hy eṣām araṃ hito bhavati vājināya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1533: RV_10,071.11a ṛcāṃ tvaḥ poṣam āste pupuṣvān gāyatraṃ tvo gāyati śakvarīṣu |
GV01rv_hn10u:1534: RV_10,071.11c brahmā tvo vadati jātavidyāṃ yajñasya mātrāṃ vi mimīta u tvaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1535: RV_10,072.01a devānāṃ nu vayaṃ jānā pra vocāma vipanyayā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1536: RV_10,072.01c uktheṣu śasyamāneṣu yaḥ paśyād uttare yuge ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1537: RV_10,072.02a brahmaṇas patir etā saṃ karmāra ivādhamat |
GV01rv_hn10u:1538: RV_10,072.02c devānām pūrvye yuge 'sataḥ sad ajāyata ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1539: RV_10,072.03a devānāṃ yuge prathame 'sataḥ sad ajāyata |
GV01rv_hn10u:1540: RV_10,072.03c tad āśā anv ajāyanta tad uttānapadas pari ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1541: RV_10,072.04a bhūr jajña uttānapado bhuva āśā ajāyanta |
GV01rv_hn10u:1542: RV_10,072.04c aditer dakṣo ajāyata dakṣād v aditiḥ pari ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1543: RV_10,072.05a aditir hy ajaniṣṭa dakṣa yā duhitā tava |
GV01rv_hn10u:1544: RV_10,072.05c tāṃ devā anv ajāyanta bhadrā amṛtabandhavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1545: RV_10,072.06a yad devā adaḥ salile susaṃrabdhā atiṣṭhata |
GV01rv_hn10u:1546: RV_10,072.06c atrā vo nṛtyatām iva tīvro reṇur apāyata ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1547: RV_10,072.07a yad devā yatayo yathā bhuvanāny apinvata |
GV01rv_hn10u:1548: RV_10,072.07c atrā samudra ā gūḷham ā sūryam ajabhartana ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1549: RV_10,072.08a aṣṭau putrāso aditer ye jātās tanvas pari |
GV01rv_hn10u:1550: RV_10,072.08c devāṃ upa prait saptabhiḥ parā mārtāṇḍam āsyat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1551: RV_10,072.09a saptabhiḥ putrair aditir upa prait pūrvyaṃ yugam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1552: RV_10,072.09c prajāyai mṛtyave tvat punar mārtāṇḍam ābharat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1553: RV_10,073.01a janiṣṭhā ugraḥ sahase turāya mandra ojiṣṭho bahulābhimānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1554: RV_10,073.01c avardhann indram marutaś cid atra mātā yad vīraṃ dadhanad dhaniṣṭhā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1555: RV_10,073.02a druho niṣattā pṛśanī cid evaiḥ purū śaṃsena vāvṛdhuṣ ṭa indram |
GV01rv_hn10u:1556: RV_10,073.02c abhīvṛteva tā mahāpadena dhvāntāt prapitvād ud aranta garbhāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1557: RV_10,073.03a ṛṣvā te pādā pra yaj jigāsy avardhan vājā uta ye cid atra |
GV01rv_hn10u:1558: RV_10,073.03c tvam indra sālāvṛkān sahasram āsan dadhiṣe aśvinā vavṛtyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1559: RV_10,073.04a samanā tūrṇir upa yāsi yajñam ā nāsatyā sakhyāya vakṣi |
GV01rv_hn10u:1560: RV_10,073.04c vasāvyām indra dhārayaḥ sahasrāśvinā śūra dadatur maghāni ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1561: RV_10,073.05a mandamāna ṛtād adhi prajāyai sakhibhir indra iṣirebhir artham |
GV01rv_hn10u:1562: RV_10,073.05c ābhir hi māyā upa dasyum āgān mihaḥ pra tamrā avapat tamāṃsi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1563: RV_10,073.06a sanāmānā cid dhvasayo ny asmā avāhann indra uṣaso yathānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1564: RV_10,073.06c ṛṣvair agacchaḥ sakhibhir nikāmaiḥ sākam pratiṣṭhā hṛdyā jaghantha ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1565: RV_10,073.07a tvaṃ jaghantha namucim makhasyuṃ dāsaṃ kṛṇvāna ṛṣaye vimāyam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1566: RV_10,073.07c tvaṃ cakartha manave syonān patho devatrāñjaseva yānān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1567: RV_10,073.08a tvam etāni papriṣe vi nāmeśāna indra dadhiṣe gabhastau |
GV01rv_hn10u:1568: RV_10,073.08c anu tvā devāḥ śavasā madanty uparibudhnān vaninaś cakartha ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1569: RV_10,073.09a cakraṃ yad asyāpsv ā niṣattam uto tad asmai madhv ic cacchadyāt |
GV01rv_hn10u:1570: RV_10,073.09c pṛthivyām atiṣitaṃ yad ūdhaḥ payo goṣv adadhā oṣadhīṣu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1571: RV_10,073.10a aśvād iyāyeti yad vadanty ojaso jātam uta manya enam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1572: RV_10,073.10c manyor iyāya harmyeṣu tasthau yataḥ prajajña indro asya veda ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1573: RV_10,073.11a vayaḥ suparṇā upa sedur indram priyamedhā ṛṣayo nādhamānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1574: RV_10,073.11c apa dhvāntam ūrṇuhi pūrdhi cakṣur mumugdhy asmān nidhayeva baddhān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1575: RV_10,074.01a vasūnāṃ vā carkṛṣa iyakṣan dhiyā vā yajñair vā rodasyoḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1576: RV_10,074.01c arvanto vā ye rayimantaḥ sātau vanuṃ vā ye suśruṇaṃ suśruto dhuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1577: RV_10,074.02a hava eṣām asuro nakṣata dyāṃ śravasyatā manasā niṃsata kṣām |
GV01rv_hn10u:1578: RV_10,074.02c cakṣāṇā yatra suvitāya devā dyaur na vārebhiḥ kṛṇavanta svaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1579: RV_10,074.03a iyam eṣām amṛtānāṃ gīḥ sarvatātā ye kṛpaṇanta ratnam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1580: RV_10,074.03c dhiyaṃ ca yajñaṃ ca sādhantas te no dhāntu vasavyam asāmi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1581: RV_10,074.04a ā tat ta indrāyavaḥ panantābhi ya ūrvaṃ gomantaṃ titṛtsān |
GV01rv_hn10u:1582: RV_10,074.04c sakṛtsvaṃ ye puruputrām mahīṃ sahasradhārām bṛhatīṃ dudukṣan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1583: RV_10,074.05a śacīva indram avase kṛṇudhvam anānataṃ damayantam pṛtanyūn |
GV01rv_hn10u:1584: RV_10,074.05c ṛbhukṣaṇam maghavānaṃ suvṛktim bhartā yo vajraṃ naryam purukṣuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1585: RV_10,074.06a yad vāvāna purutamam purāṣāḷ ā vṛtrahendro nāmāny aprāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1586: RV_10,074.06c aceti prāsahas patis tuviṣmān yad īm uśmasi kartave karat tat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1587: RV_10,075.01a pra su va āpo mahimānam uttamaṃ kārur vocāti sadane vivasvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1588: RV_10,075.01c pra sapta-sapta tredhā hi cakramuḥ pra sṛtvarīṇām ati sindhur ojasā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1589: RV_10,075.02a pra te 'radad varuṇo yātave pathaḥ sindho yad vājāṃ abhy adravas tvam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1590: RV_10,075.02c bhūmyā adhi pravatā yāsi sānunā yad eṣām agraṃ jagatām irajyasi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1591: RV_10,075.03a divi svano yatate bhūmyopary anantaṃ śuṣmam ud iyarti bhānunā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1592: RV_10,075.03c abhrād iva pra stanayanti vṛṣṭayaḥ sindhur yad eti vṛṣabho na roruvat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1593: RV_10,075.04a abhi tvā sindho śiśum in na mātaro vāśrā arṣanti payaseva dhenavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1594: RV_10,075.04c rājeva yudhvā nayasi tvam it sicau yad āsām agram pravatām inakṣasi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1595: RV_10,075.05a imam me gaṅge yamune sarasvati śutudri stomaṃ sacatā paruṣṇy ā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1596: RV_10,075.05c asiknyā marudvṛdhe vitastayārjīkīye śṛṇuhy ā suṣomayā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1597: RV_10,075.06a tṛṣṭāmayā prathamaṃ yātave sajūḥ susartvā rasayā śvetyā tyā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1598: RV_10,075.06c tvaṃ sindho kubhayā gomatīṃ krumum mehatnvā sarathaṃ yābhir īyase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1599: RV_10,075.07a ṛjīty enī ruśatī mahitvā pari jrayāṃsi bharate rajāṃsi |
GV01rv_hn10u:1600: RV_10,075.07c adabdhā sindhur apasām apastamāśvā na citrā vapuṣīva darśatā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1601: RV_10,075.08a svaśvā sindhuḥ surathā suvāsā hiraṇyayī sukṛtā vājinīvatī |
GV01rv_hn10u:1602: RV_10,075.08c ūrṇāvatī yuvatiḥ sīlamāvaty utādhi vaste subhagā madhuvṛdham ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1603: RV_10,075.09a sukhaṃ rathaṃ yuyuje sindhur aśvinaṃ tena vājaṃ saniṣad asminn ājau |
GV01rv_hn10u:1604: RV_10,075.09c mahān hy asya mahimā panasyate 'dabdhasya svayaśaso virapśinaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1605: RV_10,076.01a ā va ṛñjasa ūrjāṃ vyuṣṭiṣv indram maruto rodasī anaktana |
GV01rv_hn10u:1606: RV_10,076.01c ubhe yathā no ahanī sacābhuvā sadaḥ-sado varivasyāta udbhidā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1607: RV_10,076.02a tad u śreṣṭhaṃ savanaṃ sunotanātyo na hastayato adriḥ sotari |
GV01rv_hn10u:1608: RV_10,076.02c vidad dhy aryo abhibhūti pauṃsyam maho rāye cit tarute yad arvataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1609: RV_10,076.03a tad id dhy asya savanaṃ viver apo yathā purā manave gātum aśret |
GV01rv_hn10u:1610: RV_10,076.03c goarṇasi tvāṣṭre aśvanirṇiji prem adhvareṣv adhvarāṃ aśiśrayuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1611: RV_10,076.04a apa hata rakṣaso bhaṅgurāvata skabhāyata nirṛtiṃ sedhatāmatim |
GV01rv_hn10u:1612: RV_10,076.04c ā no rayiṃ sarvavīraṃ sunotana devāvyam bharata ślokam adrayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1613: RV_10,076.05a divaś cid ā vo 'mavattarebhyo vibhvanā cid āśvapastarebhyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1614: RV_10,076.05c vāyoś cid ā somarabhastarebhyo 'gneś cid arca pitukṛttarebhyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1615: RV_10,076.06a bhurantu no yaśasaḥ sotv andhaso grāvāṇo vācā divitā divitmatā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1616: RV_10,076.06c naro yatra duhate kāmyam madhv āghoṣayanto abhito mithasturaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1617: RV_10,076.07a sunvanti somaṃ rathirāso adrayo nir asya rasaṃ gaviṣo duhanti te |
GV01rv_hn10u:1618: RV_10,076.07c duhanty ūdhar upasecanāya kaṃ naro havyā na marjayanta āsabhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1619: RV_10,076.08a ete naraḥ svapaso abhūtana ya indrāya sunutha somam adrayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1620: RV_10,076.08c vāmaṃ-vāmaṃ vo divyāya dhāmne vasu-vasu vaḥ pārthivāya sunvate ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1621: RV_10,077.01a abhrapruṣo na vācā pruṣā vasu haviṣmanto na yajñā vijānuṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1622: RV_10,077.01c sumārutaṃ na brahmāṇam arhase gaṇam astoṣy eṣāṃ na śobhase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1623: RV_10,077.02a śriye maryāso añjīṃr akṛṇvata sumārutaṃ na pūrvīr ati kṣapaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1624: RV_10,077.02c divas putrāsa etā na yetira ādityāsas te akrā na vāvṛdhuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1625: RV_10,077.03a pra ye divaḥ pṛthivyā na barhaṇā tmanā riricre abhrān na sūryaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1626: RV_10,077.03c pājasvanto na vīrāḥ panasyavo riśādaso na maryā abhidyavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1627: RV_10,077.04a yuṣmākam budhne apāṃ na yāmani vithuryati na mahī śratharyati |
GV01rv_hn10u:1628: RV_10,077.04c viśvapsur yajño arvāg ayaṃ su vaḥ prayasvanto na satrāca ā gata ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1629: RV_10,077.05a yūyaṃ dhūrṣu prayujo na raśmibhir jyotiṣmanto na bhāsā vyuṣṭiṣu |
GV01rv_hn10u:1630: RV_10,077.05c śyenāso na svayaśaso riśādasaḥ pravāso na prasitāsaḥ paripruṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1631: RV_10,077.06a pra yad vahadhve marutaḥ parākād yūyam mahaḥ saṃvaraṇasya vasvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1632: RV_10,077.06c vidānāso vasavo rādhyasyārāc cid dveṣaḥ sanutar yuyota ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1633: RV_10,077.07a ya udṛci yajñe adhvareṣṭhā marudbhyo na mānuṣo dadāśat |
GV01rv_hn10u:1634: RV_10,077.07c revat sa vayo dadhate suvīraṃ sa devānām api gopīthe astu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1635: RV_10,077.08a te hi yajñeṣu yajñiyāsa ūmā ādityena nāmnā śambhaviṣṭhāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1636: RV_10,077.08c te no 'vantu rathatūr manīṣām mahaś ca yāmann adhvare cakānāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1637: RV_10,078.01a viprāso na manmabhiḥ svādhyo devāvyo na yajñaiḥ svapnasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1638: RV_10,078.01c rājāno na citrāḥ susaṃdṛśaḥ kṣitīnāṃ na maryā arepasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1639: RV_10,078.02a agnir na ye bhrājasā rukmavakṣaso vātāso na svayujaḥ sadyaūtayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1640: RV_10,078.02c prajñātāro na jyeṣṭhāḥ sunītayaḥ suśarmāṇo na somā ṛtaṃ yate ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1641: RV_10,078.03a vātāso na ye dhunayo jigatnavo 'gnīnāṃ na jihvā virokiṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1642: RV_10,078.03c varmaṇvanto na yodhāḥ śimīvantaḥ pitṝṇāṃ na śaṃsāḥ surātayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1643: RV_10,078.04a rathānāṃ na ye 'rāḥ sanābhayo jigīvāṃso na śūrā abhidyavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1644: RV_10,078.04c vareyavo na maryā ghṛtapruṣo 'bhisvartāro arkaṃ na suṣṭubhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1645: RV_10,078.05a aśvāso na ye jyeṣṭhāsa āśavo didhiṣavo na rathyaḥ sudānavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1646: RV_10,078.05c āpo na nimnair udabhir jigatnavo viśvarūpā aṅgiraso na sāmabhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1647: RV_10,078.06a grāvāṇo na sūrayaḥ sindhumātara ādardirāso adrayo na viśvahā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1648: RV_10,078.06c śiśūlā na krīḷayaḥ sumātaro mahāgrāmo na yāmann uta tviṣā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1649: RV_10,078.07a uṣasāṃ na ketavo 'dhvaraśriyaḥ śubhaṃyavo nāñjibhir vy aśvitan |
GV01rv_hn10u:1650: RV_10,078.07c sindhavo na yayiyo bhrājadṛṣṭayaḥ parāvato na yojanāni mamire ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1651: RV_10,078.08a subhāgān no devāḥ kṛṇutā suratnān asmān stotṝn maruto vāvṛdhānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1652: RV_10,078.08c adhi stotrasya sakhyasya gāta sanād dhi vo ratnadheyāni santi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1653: RV_10,079.01a apaśyam asya mahato mahitvam amartyasya martyāsu vikṣu |
GV01rv_hn10u:1654: RV_10,079.01c nānā hanū vibhṛte sam bharete asinvatī bapsatī bhūry attaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1655: RV_10,079.02a guhā śiro nihitam ṛdhag akṣī asinvann atti jihvayā vanāni |
GV01rv_hn10u:1656: RV_10,079.02c atrāṇy asmai paḍbhiḥ sam bharanty uttānahastā namasādhi vikṣu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1657: RV_10,079.03a pra mātuḥ prataraṃ guhyam icchan kumāro na vīrudhaḥ sarpad urvīḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1658: RV_10,079.03c sasaṃ na pakvam avidac chucantaṃ ririhvāṃsaṃ ripa upasthe antaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1659: RV_10,079.04a tad vām ṛtaṃ rodasī pra bravīmi jāyamāno mātarā garbho atti |
GV01rv_hn10u:1660: RV_10,079.04c nāhaṃ devasya martyaś ciketāgnir aṅga vicetāḥ sa pracetāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1661: RV_10,079.05a yo asmā annaṃ tṛṣv ādadhāty ājyair ghṛtair juhoti puṣyati |
GV01rv_hn10u:1662: RV_10,079.05c tasmai sahasram akṣabhir vi cakṣe 'gne viśvataḥ pratyaṅṅ asi tvam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1663: RV_10,079.06a kiṃ deveṣu tyaja enaś cakarthāgne pṛcchāmi nu tvām avidvān |
GV01rv_hn10u:1664: RV_10,079.06c akrīḷan krīḷan harir attave 'dan vi parvaśaś cakarta gām ivāsiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1665: RV_10,079.07a viṣūco aśvān yuyuje vanejā ṛjītibhī raśanābhir gṛbhītān |
GV01rv_hn10u:1666: RV_10,079.07c cakṣade mitro vasubhiḥ sujātaḥ sam ānṛdhe parvabhir vāvṛdhānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1667: RV_10,080.01a agniḥ saptiṃ vājambharaṃ dadāty agnir vīraṃ śrutyaṃ karmaniṣṭhām |
GV01rv_hn10u:1668: RV_10,080.01c agnī rodasī vi carat samañjann agnir nārīṃ vīrakukṣim purandhim ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1669: RV_10,080.02a agner apnasaḥ samid astu bhadrāgnir mahī rodasī ā viveśa |
GV01rv_hn10u:1670: RV_10,080.02c agnir ekaṃ codayat samatsv agnir vṛtrāṇi dayate purūṇi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1671: RV_10,080.03a agnir ha tyaṃ jarataḥ karṇam āvāgnir adbhyo nir adahaj jarūtham |
GV01rv_hn10u:1672: RV_10,080.03c agnir atriṃ gharma uruṣyad antar agnir nṛmedham prajayāsṛjat sam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1673: RV_10,080.04a agnir dād draviṇaṃ vīrapeśā agnir ṛṣiṃ yaḥ sahasrā sanoti |
GV01rv_hn10u:1674: RV_10,080.04c agnir divi havyam ā tatānāgner dhāmāni vibhṛtā purutrā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1675: RV_10,080.05a agnim ukthair ṛṣayo vi hvayante 'gniṃ naro yāmani bādhitāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1676: RV_10,080.05c agniṃ vayo antarikṣe patanto 'gniḥ sahasrā pari yāti gonām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1677: RV_10,080.06a agniṃ viśa īḷate mānuṣīr yā agnim manuṣo nahuṣo vi jātāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1678: RV_10,080.06c agnir gāndharvīm pathyām ṛtasyāgner gavyūtir ghṛta ā niṣattā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1679: RV_10,080.07a agnaye brahma ṛbhavas tatakṣur agnim mahām avocāmā suvṛktim |
GV01rv_hn10u:1680: RV_10,080.07c agne prāva jaritāraṃ yaviṣṭhāgne mahi draviṇam ā yajasva ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1681: RV_10,081.01a ya imā viśvā bhuvanāni juhvad ṛṣir hotā ny asīdat pitā naḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1682: RV_10,081.01c sa āśiṣā draviṇam icchamānaḥ prathamacchad avarāṃ ā viveśa ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1683: RV_10,081.02a kiṃ svid āsīd adhiṣṭhānam ārambhaṇaṃ katamat svit kathāsīt |
GV01rv_hn10u:1684: RV_10,081.02c yato bhūmiṃ janayan viśvakarmā vi dyām aurṇon mahinā viśvacakṣāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1685: RV_10,081.03a viśvataścakṣur uta viśvatomukho viśvatobāhur uta viśvataspāt |
GV01rv_hn10u:1686: RV_10,081.03c sam bāhubhyāṃ dhamati sam patatrair dyāvābhūmī janayan deva ekaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1687: RV_10,081.04a kiṃ svid vanaṃ ka u sa vṛkṣa āsa yato dyāvāpṛthivī niṣṭatakṣuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1688: RV_10,081.04c manīṣiṇo manasā pṛcchated u tad yad adhyatiṣṭhad bhuvanāni dhārayan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1689: RV_10,081.05a yā te dhāmāni paramāṇi yāvamā yā madhyamā viśvakarmann utemā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1690: RV_10,081.05c śikṣā sakhibhyo haviṣi svadhāvaḥ svayaṃ yajasva tanvaṃ vṛdhānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1691: RV_10,081.06a viśvakarman haviṣā vāvṛdhānaḥ svayaṃ yajasva pṛthivīm uta dyām |
GV01rv_hn10u:1692: RV_10,081.06c muhyantv anye abhito janāsa ihāsmākam maghavā sūrir astu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1693: RV_10,081.07a vācas patiṃ viśvakarmāṇam ūtaye manojuvaṃ vāje adyā huvema |
GV01rv_hn10u:1694: RV_10,081.07c sa no viśvāni havanāni joṣad viśvaśambhūr avase sādhukarmā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1695: RV_10,082.01a cakṣuṣaḥ pitā manasā hi dhīro ghṛtam ene ajanan nannamāne |
GV01rv_hn10u:1696: RV_10,082.01c yaded antā adadṛhanta pūrva ād id dyāvāpṛthivī aprathetām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1697: RV_10,082.02a viśvakarmā vimanā ād vihāyā dhātā vidhātā paramota saṃdṛk |
GV01rv_hn10u:1698: RV_10,082.02c teṣām iṣṭāni sam iṣā madanti yatrā saptaṛṣīn para ekam āhuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1699: RV_10,082.03a yo naḥ pitā janitā yo vidhātā dhāmāni veda bhuvanāni viśvā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1700: RV_10,082.03c yo devānāṃ nāmadhā eka eva taṃ sampraśnam bhuvanā yanty anyā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1701: RV_10,082.04a ta āyajanta draviṇaṃ sam asmā ṛṣayaḥ pūrve jaritāro na bhūnā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1702: RV_10,082.04c asūrte sūrte rajasi niṣatte ye bhūtāni samakṛṇvann imāni ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1703: RV_10,082.05a paro divā para enā pṛthivyā paro devebhir asurair yad asti |
GV01rv_hn10u:1704: RV_10,082.05c kaṃ svid garbham prathamaṃ dadhra āpo yatra devāḥ samapaśyanta viśve ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1705: RV_10,082.06a tam id garbham prathamaṃ dadhra āpo yatra devāḥ samagacchanta viśve |
GV01rv_hn10u:1706: RV_10,082.06c ajasya nābhāv adhy ekam arpitaṃ yasmin viśvāni bhuvanāni tasthuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1707: RV_10,082.07a na taṃ vidātha ya imā jajānānyad yuṣmākam antaram babhūva |
GV01rv_hn10u:1708: RV_10,082.07c nīhāreṇa prāvṛtā jalpyā cāsutṛpa ukthaśāsaś caranti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1709: RV_10,083.01a yas te manyo 'vidhad vajra sāyaka saha ojaḥ puṣyati viśvam ānuṣak |
GV01rv_hn10u:1710: RV_10,083.01c sāhyāma dāsam āryaṃ tvayā yujā sahaskṛtena sahasā sahasvatā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1711: RV_10,083.02a manyur indro manyur evāsa devo manyur hotā varuṇo jātavedāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1712: RV_10,083.02c manyuṃ viśa īḷate mānuṣīr yāḥ pāhi no manyo tapasā sajoṣāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1713: RV_10,083.03a abhīhi manyo tavasas tavīyān tapasā yujā vi jahi śatrūn |
GV01rv_hn10u:1714: RV_10,083.03c amitrahā vṛtrahā dasyuhā ca viśvā vasūny ā bharā tvaṃ naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1715: RV_10,083.04a tvaṃ hi manyo abhibhūtyojāḥ svayambhūr bhāmo abhimātiṣāhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1716: RV_10,083.04c viśvacarṣaṇiḥ sahuriḥ sahāvān asmāsv ojaḥ pṛtanāsu dhehi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1717: RV_10,083.05a abhāgaḥ sann apa pareto asmi tava kratvā taviṣasya pracetaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1718: RV_10,083.05c taṃ tvā manyo akratur jihīḷāhaṃ svā tanūr baladeyāya mehi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1719: RV_10,083.06a ayaṃ te asmy upa mehy arvāṅ pratīcīnaḥ sahure viśvadhāyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1720: RV_10,083.06c manyo vajrinn abhi mām ā vavṛtsva hanāva dasyūṃr uta bodhy āpeḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1721: RV_10,083.07a abhi prehi dakṣiṇato bhavā me 'dhā vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanāva bhūri |
GV01rv_hn10u:1722: RV_10,083.07c juhomi te dharuṇam madhvo agram ubhā upāṃśu prathamā pibāva ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1723: RV_10,084.01a tvayā manyo saratham ārujanto harṣamāṇāso dhṛṣitā marutvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1724: RV_10,084.01c tigmeṣava āyudhā saṃśiśānā abhi pra yantu naro agnirūpāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1725: RV_10,084.02a agnir iva manyo tviṣitaḥ sahasva senānīr naḥ sahure hūta edhi |
GV01rv_hn10u:1726: RV_10,084.02c hatvāya śatrūn vi bhajasva veda ojo mimāno vi mṛdho nudasva ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1727: RV_10,084.03a sahasva manyo abhimātim asme rujan mṛṇan pramṛṇan prehi śatrūn |
GV01rv_hn10u:1728: RV_10,084.03c ugraṃ te pājo nanv ā rurudhre vaśī vaśaṃ nayasa ekaja tvam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1729: RV_10,084.04a eko bahūnām asi manyav īḷito viśaṃ-viśaṃ yudhaye saṃ śiśādhi |
GV01rv_hn10u:1730: RV_10,084.04c akṛttaruk tvayā yujā vayaṃ dyumantaṃ ghoṣaṃ vijayāya kṛṇmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1731: RV_10,084.05a vijeṣakṛd indra ivānavabravo 'smākam manyo adhipā bhaveha |
GV01rv_hn10u:1732: RV_10,084.05c priyaṃ te nāma sahure gṛṇīmasi vidmā tam utsaṃ yata ābabhūtha ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1733: RV_10,084.06a ābhūtyā sahajā vajra sāyaka saho bibharṣy abhibhūta uttaram |
GV01rv_hn10u:1734: RV_10,084.06c kratvā no manyo saha medy edhi mahādhanasya puruhūta saṃsṛji ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1735: RV_10,084.07a saṃsṛṣṭaṃ dhanam ubhayaṃ samākṛtam asmabhyaṃ dattāṃ varuṇaś ca manyuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1736: RV_10,084.07c bhiyaṃ dadhānā hṛdayeṣu śatravaḥ parājitāso apa ni layantām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1738: RV_10,085.01c ṛtenādityās tiṣṭhanti divi somo adhi śritaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1739: RV_10,085.02a somenādityā balinaḥ somena pṛthivī mahī |
GV01rv_hn10u:1740: RV_10,085.02c atho nakṣatrāṇām eṣām upasthe soma āhitaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1741: RV_10,085.03a somam manyate papivān yat sampiṃṣanty oṣadhim |
GV01rv_hn10u:1742: RV_10,085.03c somaṃ yam brahmāṇo vidur na tasyāśnāti kaś cana ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1743: RV_10,085.04a ācchadvidhānair gupito bārhataiḥ soma rakṣitaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1744: RV_10,085.04c grāvṇām ic chṛṇvan tiṣṭhasi na te aśnāti pārthivaḥ ||
