GV01rv_hn10u:1745: RV_10,085.05a yat tvā deva prapibanti tata ā pyāyase punaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1746: RV_10,085.05c vāyuḥ somasya rakṣitā samānām māsa ākṛtiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1747: RV_10,085.06a raibhy āsīd anudeyī nārāśaṃsī nyocanī |
GV01rv_hn10u:1748: RV_10,085.06c sūryāyā bhadram id vāso gāthayaiti pariṣkṛtam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1749: RV_10,085.07a cittir ā upabarhaṇaṃ cakṣur ā abhyañjanam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1750: RV_10,085.07c dyaur bhūmiḥ kośa āsīd yad ayāt sūryā patim ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1751: RV_10,085.08a stomā āsan pratidhayaḥ kurīraṃ chanda opaśaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1752: RV_10,085.08c sūryāyā aśvinā varāgnir āsīt purogavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1753: RV_10,085.09a somo vadhūyur abhavad aśvināstām ubhā varā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1754: RV_10,085.09c sūryāṃ yat patye śaṃsantīm manasā savitādadāt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1755: RV_10,085.10a mano asyā ana āsīd dyaur āsīd uta cchadiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1756: RV_10,085.10c śukrāv anaḍvāhāv āstāṃ yad ayāt sūryā gṛham ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1757: RV_10,085.11a ṛksāmābhyām abhihitau gāvau te sāmanāv itaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1758: RV_10,085.11c śrotraṃ te cakre āstāṃ divi panthāś carācāraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1759: RV_10,085.12a śucī te cakre yātyā vyāno akṣa āhataḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1760: RV_10,085.12c ano manasmayaṃ sūryārohat prayatī patim ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1761: RV_10,085.13a sūryāyā vahatuḥ prāgāt savitā yam avāsṛjat |
GV01rv_hn10u:1762: RV_10,085.13c aghāsu hanyante gāvo 'rjunyoḥ pary uhyate ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1763: RV_10,085.14a yad aśvinā pṛcchamānāv ayātaṃ tricakreṇa vahatuṃ sūryāyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1764: RV_10,085.14c viśve devā anu tad vām ajānan putraḥ pitarāv avṛṇīta pūṣā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1765: RV_10,085.15a yad ayātaṃ śubhas patī vareyaṃ sūryām upa |
GV01rv_hn10u:1766: RV_10,085.15c kvaikaṃ cakraṃ vām āsīt kva deṣṭrāya tasthathuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1767: RV_10,085.16a dve te cakre sūrye brahmāṇa ṛtuthā viduḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1768: RV_10,085.16c athaikaṃ cakraṃ yad guhā tad addhātaya id viduḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1769: RV_10,085.17a sūryāyai devebhyo mitrāya varuṇāya ca |
GV01rv_hn10u:1770: RV_10,085.17c ye bhūtasya pracetasa idaṃ tebhyo 'karaṃ namaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1771: RV_10,085.18a pūrvāparaṃ carato māyayaitau śiśū krīḷantau pari yāto adhvaram |
GV01rv_hn10u:1772: RV_10,085.18c viśvāny anyo bhuvanābhicaṣṭa ṛtūṃr anyo vidadhaj jāyate punaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1773: RV_10,085.19a navo-navo bhavati jāyamāno 'hnāṃ ketur uṣasām ety agram |
GV01rv_hn10u:1774: RV_10,085.19c bhāgaṃ devebhyo vi dadhāty āyan pra candramās tirate dīrgham āyuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1775: RV_10,085.20a sukiṃśukaṃ śalmaliṃ viśvarūpaṃ hiraṇyavarṇaṃ suvṛtaṃ sucakram |
GV01rv_hn10u:1776: RV_10,085.20c ā roha sūrye amṛtasya lokaṃ syonam patye vahatuṃ kṛṇuṣva ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1777: RV_10,085.21a ud īrṣvātaḥ pativatī hy eṣā viśvāvasuṃ namasā gīrbhir īḷe |
GV01rv_hn10u:1778: RV_10,085.21c anyām iccha pitṛṣadaṃ vyaktāṃ sa te bhāgo januṣā tasya viddhi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1779: RV_10,085.22a ud īrṣvāto viśvāvaso namaseḷā mahe tvā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1780: RV_10,085.22c anyām iccha prapharvyaṃ saṃ jāyām patyā sṛja ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1781: RV_10,085.23a anṛkṣarā ṛjavaḥ santu panthā yebhiḥ sakhāyo yanti no vareyam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1782: RV_10,085.23c sam aryamā sam bhago no ninīyāt saṃ jāspatyaṃ suyamam astu devāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1783: RV_10,085.24a pra tvā muñcāmi varuṇasya pāśād yena tvābadhnāt savitā suśevaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1784: RV_10,085.24c ṛtasya yonau sukṛtasya loke 'riṣṭāṃ tvā saha patyā dadhāmi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1785: RV_10,085.25a preto muñcāmi nāmutaḥ subaddhām amutas karam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1786: RV_10,085.25c yatheyam indra mīḍhvaḥ suputrā subhagāsati ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1787: RV_10,085.26a pūṣā tveto nayatu hastagṛhyāśvinā tvā pra vahatāṃ rathena |
GV01rv_hn10u:1788: RV_10,085.26c gṛhān gaccha gṛhapatnī yathāso vaśinī tvaṃ vidatham ā vadāsi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1789: RV_10,085.27a iha priyam prajayā te sam ṛdhyatām asmin gṛhe gārhapatyāya jāgṛhi |
GV01rv_hn10u:1790: RV_10,085.27c enā patyā tanvaṃ saṃ sṛjasvādhā jivrī vidatham ā vadāthaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1791: RV_10,085.28a nīlalohitam bhavati kṛtyāsaktir vy ajyate |
GV01rv_hn10u:1792: RV_10,085.28c edhante asyā jñātayaḥ patir bandheṣu badhyate ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1793: RV_10,085.29a parā dehi śāmulyam brahmabhyo vi bhajā vasu |
GV01rv_hn10u:1794: RV_10,085.29c kṛtyaiṣā padvatī bhūtvy ā jāyā viśate patim ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1795: RV_10,085.30a aśrīrā tanūr bhavati ruśatī pāpayāmuyā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1796: RV_10,085.30c patir yad vadhvo vāsasā svam aṅgam abhidhitsate ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1797: RV_10,085.31a ye vadhvaś candraṃ vahatuṃ yakṣmā yanti janād anu |
GV01rv_hn10u:1798: RV_10,085.31c punas tān yajñiyā devā nayantu yata āgatāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1799: RV_10,085.32a mā vidan paripanthino ya āsīdanti dampatī |
GV01rv_hn10u:1800: RV_10,085.32c sugebhir durgam atītām apa drāntv arātayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1801: RV_10,085.33a sumaṅgalīr iyaṃ vadhūr imāṃ sameta paśyata |
GV01rv_hn10u:1802: RV_10,085.33c saubhāgyam asyai dattvāyāthāstaṃ vi paretana ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1803: RV_10,085.34a tṛṣṭam etat kaṭukam etad apāṣṭhavad viṣavan naitad attave |
GV01rv_hn10u:1804: RV_10,085.34c sūryāṃ yo brahmā vidyāt sa id vādhūyam arhati ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1806: RV_10,085.35c sūryāyāḥ paśya rūpāṇi tāni brahmā tu śundhati ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1807: RV_10,085.36a gṛbhṇāmi te saubhagatvāya hastam mayā patyā jaradaṣṭir yathāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1808: RV_10,085.36c bhago aryamā savitā purandhir mahyaṃ tvādur gārhapatyāya devāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1809: RV_10,085.37a tām pūṣañ chivatamām erayasva yasyām bījam manuṣyā vapanti |
GV01rv_hn10u:1810: RV_10,085.37c yā na ūrū uśatī viśrayāte yasyām uśantaḥ praharāma śepam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1811: RV_10,085.38a tubhyam agre pary avahan sūryāṃ vahatunā saha |
GV01rv_hn10u:1812: RV_10,085.38c punaḥ patibhyo jāyāṃ dā agne prajayā saha ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1813: RV_10,085.39a punaḥ patnīm agnir adād āyuṣā saha varcasā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1814: RV_10,085.39c dīrghāyur asyā yaḥ patir jīvāti śaradaḥ śatam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1815: RV_10,085.40a somaḥ prathamo vivide gandharvo vivida uttaraḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1816: RV_10,085.40c tṛtīyo agniṣ ṭe patis turīyas te manuṣyajāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1817: RV_10,085.41a somo dadad gandharvāya gandharvo dadad agnaye |
GV01rv_hn10u:1818: RV_10,085.41c rayiṃ ca putrāṃś cādād agnir mahyam atho imām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1819: RV_10,085.42a ihaiva stam mā vi yauṣṭaṃ viśvam āyur vy aśnutam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1820: RV_10,085.42c krīḷantau putrair naptṛbhir modamānau sve gṛhe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1821: RV_10,085.43a ā naḥ prajāṃ janayatu prajāpatir ājarasāya sam anaktv aryamā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1822: RV_10,085.43c adurmaṅgalīḥ patilokam ā viśa śaṃ no bhava dvipade śaṃ catuṣpade ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1823: RV_10,085.44a aghoracakṣur apatighny edhi śivā paśubhyaḥ sumanāḥ suvarcāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1824: RV_10,085.44c vīrasūr devakāmā syonā śaṃ no bhava dvipade śaṃ catuṣpade ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1825: RV_10,085.45a imāṃ tvam indra mīḍhvaḥ suputrāṃ subhagāṃ kṛṇu |
GV01rv_hn10u:1826: RV_10,085.45c daśāsyām putrān ā dhehi patim ekādaśaṃ kṛdhi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1827: RV_10,085.46a samrājñī śvaśure bhava samrājñī śvaśrvām bhava |
GV01rv_hn10u:1828: RV_10,085.46c nanāndari samrājñī bhava samrājñī adhi devṛṣu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1829: RV_10,085.47a sam añjantu viśve devāḥ sam āpo hṛdayāni nau |
GV01rv_hn10u:1830: RV_10,085.47c sam mātariśvā saṃ dhātā sam u deṣṭrī dadhātu nau ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1831: RV_10,086.01a vi hi sotor asṛkṣata nendraṃ devam amaṃsata |
GV01rv_hn10u:1832: RV_10,086.01c yatrāmadad vṛṣākapir aryaḥ puṣṭeṣu matsakhā viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1833: RV_10,086.02a parā hīndra dhāvasi vṛṣākaper ati vyathiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1834: RV_10,086.02c no aha pra vindasy anyatra somapītaye viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1835: RV_10,086.03a kim ayaṃ tvāṃ vṛṣākapiś cakāra harito mṛgaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1836: RV_10,086.03c yasmā irasyasīd u nv aryo vā puṣṭimad vasu viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1837: RV_10,086.04a yam imaṃ tvaṃ vṛṣākapim priyam indrābhirakṣasi |
GV01rv_hn10u:1838: RV_10,086.04c śvā nv asya jambhiṣad api karṇe varāhayur viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1839: RV_10,086.05a priyā taṣṭāni me kapir vyaktā vy adūduṣat |
GV01rv_hn10u:1840: RV_10,086.05c śiro nv asya rāviṣaṃ na sugaṃ duṣkṛte bhuvaṃ viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1841: RV_10,086.06a na mat strī subhasattarā na suyāśutarā bhuvat |
GV01rv_hn10u:1842: RV_10,086.06c na mat praticyavīyasī na sakthy udyamīyasī viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1843: RV_10,086.07a uve amba sulābhike yathevāṅga bhaviṣyati |
GV01rv_hn10u:1844: RV_10,086.07c bhasan me amba sakthi me śiro me vīva hṛṣyati viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1845: RV_10,086.08a kiṃ subāho svaṅgure pṛthuṣṭo pṛthujāghane |
GV01rv_hn10u:1846: RV_10,086.08c kiṃ śūrapatni nas tvam abhy amīṣi vṛṣākapiṃ viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1847: RV_10,086.09a avīrām iva mām ayaṃ śarārur abhi manyate |
GV01rv_hn10u:1848: RV_10,086.09c utāham asmi vīriṇīndrapatnī marutsakhā viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1849: RV_10,086.10a saṃhotraṃ sma purā nārī samanaṃ vāva gacchati |
GV01rv_hn10u:1850: RV_10,086.10c vedhā ṛtasya vīriṇīndrapatnī mahīyate viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1851: RV_10,086.11a indrāṇīm āsu nāriṣu subhagām aham aśravam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1852: RV_10,086.11c nahy asyā aparaṃ cana jarasā marate patir viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1853: RV_10,086.12a nāham indrāṇi rāraṇa sakhyur vṛṣākaper ṛte |
GV01rv_hn10u:1854: RV_10,086.12c yasyedam apyaṃ haviḥ priyaṃ deveṣu gacchati viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1855: RV_10,086.13a vṛṣākapāyi revati suputra ād u susnuṣe |
GV01rv_hn10u:1856: RV_10,086.13c ghasat ta indra ukṣaṇaḥ priyaṃ kācitkaraṃ havir viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1857: RV_10,086.14a ukṣṇo hi me pañcadaśa sākam pacanti viṃśatim |
GV01rv_hn10u:1858: RV_10,086.14c utāham admi pīva id ubhā kukṣī pṛṇanti me viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1859: RV_10,086.15a vṛṣabho na tigmaśṛṅgo 'ntar yūtheṣu roruvat |
GV01rv_hn10u:1860: RV_10,086.15c manthas ta indra śaṃ hṛde yaṃ te sunoti bhāvayur viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1861: RV_10,086.16a na seśe yasya rambate 'ntarā sakthyā kapṛt |
GV01rv_hn10u:1862: RV_10,086.16c sed īśe yasya romaśaṃ niṣeduṣo vijṛmbhate viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1863: RV_10,086.17a na seśe yasya romaśaṃ niṣeduṣo vijṛmbhate |
GV01rv_hn10u:1864: RV_10,086.17c sed īśe yasya rambate 'ntarā sakthyā kapṛd viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1865: RV_10,086.18a ayam indra vṛṣākapiḥ parasvantaṃ hataṃ vidat |
GV01rv_hn10u:1866: RV_10,086.18c asiṃ sūnāṃ navaṃ carum ād edhasyāna ācitaṃ viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1867: RV_10,086.19a ayam emi vicākaśad vicinvan dāsam āryam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1868: RV_10,086.19c pibāmi pākasutvano 'bhi dhīram acākaśaṃ viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1869: RV_10,086.20a dhanva ca yat kṛntatraṃ ca kati svit tā vi yojanā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1870: RV_10,086.20c nedīyaso vṛṣākape 'stam ehi gṛhāṃ upa viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1871: RV_10,086.21a punar ehi vṛṣākape suvitā kalpayāvahai |
GV01rv_hn10u:1872: RV_10,086.21c ya eṣa svapnanaṃśano 'stam eṣi pathā punar viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1873: RV_10,086.22a yad udañco vṛṣākape gṛham indrājagantana |
GV01rv_hn10u:1874: RV_10,086.22c kva sya pulvagho mṛgaḥ kam agañ janayopano viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1875: RV_10,086.23a parśur ha nāma mānavī sākaṃ sasūva viṃśatim |
GV01rv_hn10u:1876: RV_10,086.23c bhadram bhala tyasyā abhūd yasyā udaram āmayad viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1877: RV_10,087.01a rakṣohaṇaṃ vājinam ā jigharmi mitram prathiṣṭham upa yāmi śarma |
GV01rv_hn10u:1878: RV_10,087.01c śiśāno agniḥ kratubhiḥ samiddhaḥ sa no divā sa riṣaḥ pātu naktam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1879: RV_10,087.02a ayodaṃṣṭro arciṣā yātudhānān upa spṛśa jātavedaḥ samiddhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1880: RV_10,087.02c ā jihvayā mūradevān rabhasva kravyādo vṛktvy api dhatsvāsan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1881: RV_10,087.03a ubhobhayāvinn upa dhehi daṃṣṭrā hiṃsraḥ śiśāno 'varam paraṃ ca |
GV01rv_hn10u:1882: RV_10,087.03c utāntarikṣe pari yāhi rājañ jambhaiḥ saṃ dhehy abhi yātudhānān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1883: RV_10,087.04a yajñair iṣūḥ saṃnamamāno agne vācā śalyāṃ aśanibhir dihānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1884: RV_10,087.04c tābhir vidhya hṛdaye yātudhānān pratīco bāhūn prati bhaṅdhy eṣām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1885: RV_10,087.05a agne tvacaṃ yātudhānasya bhindhi hiṃsrāśanir harasā hantv enam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1886: RV_10,087.05c pra parvāṇi jātavedaḥ śṛṇīhi kravyāt kraviṣṇur vi cinotu vṛkṇam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1887: RV_10,087.06a yatredānīm paśyasi jātavedas tiṣṭhantam agna uta vā carantam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1888: RV_10,087.06c yad vāntarikṣe pathibhiḥ patantaṃ tam astā vidhya śarvā śiśānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1889: RV_10,087.07a utālabdhaṃ spṛṇuhi jātaveda ālebhānād ṛṣṭibhir yātudhānāt |
GV01rv_hn10u:1890: RV_10,087.07c agne pūrvo ni jahi śośucāna āmādaḥ kṣviṅkās tam adantv enīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1891: RV_10,087.08a iha pra brūhi yatamaḥ so agne yo yātudhāno ya idaṃ kṛṇoti |
GV01rv_hn10u:1892: RV_10,087.08c tam ā rabhasva samidhā yaviṣṭha nṛcakṣasaś cakṣuṣe randhayainam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1893: RV_10,087.09a tīkṣṇenāgne cakṣuṣā rakṣa yajñam prāñcaṃ vasubhyaḥ pra ṇaya pracetaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1894: RV_10,087.09c hiṃsraṃ rakṣāṃsy abhi śośucānam mā tvā dabhan yātudhānā nṛcakṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1895: RV_10,087.10a nṛcakṣā rakṣaḥ pari paśya vikṣu tasya trīṇi prati śṛṇīhy agrā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1896: RV_10,087.10c tasyāgne pṛṣṭīr harasā śṛṇīhi tredhā mūlaṃ yātudhānasya vṛśca ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1897: RV_10,087.11a trir yātudhānaḥ prasitiṃ ta etv ṛtaṃ yo agne anṛtena hanti |
GV01rv_hn10u:1898: RV_10,087.11c tam arciṣā sphūrjayañ jātavedaḥ samakṣam enaṃ gṛṇate ni vṛṅdhi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1899: RV_10,087.12a tad agne cakṣuḥ prati dhehi rebhe śaphārujaṃ yena paśyasi yātudhānam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1900: RV_10,087.12c atharvavaj jyotiṣā daivyena satyaṃ dhūrvantam acitaṃ ny oṣa ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1901: RV_10,087.13a yad agne adya mithunā śapāto yad vācas tṛṣṭaṃ janayanta rebhāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1902: RV_10,087.13c manyor manasaḥ śaravyā jāyate yā tayā vidhya hṛdaye yātudhānān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1903: RV_10,087.14a parā śṛṇīhi tapasā yātudhānān parāgne rakṣo harasā śṛṇīhi |
GV01rv_hn10u:1904: RV_10,087.14c parārciṣā mūradevāñ chṛṇīhi parāsutṛpo abhi śośucānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1905: RV_10,087.15a parādya devā vṛjinaṃ śṛṇantu pratyag enaṃ śapathā yantu tṛṣṭāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1906: RV_10,087.15c vācāstenaṃ śarava ṛcchantu marman viśvasyaitu prasitiṃ yātudhānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1907: RV_10,087.16a yaḥ pauruṣeyeṇa kraviṣā samaṅkte yo aśvyena paśunā yātudhānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1908: RV_10,087.16c yo aghnyāyā bharati kṣīram agne teṣāṃ śīrṣāṇi harasāpi vṛśca ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1909: RV_10,087.17a saṃvatsarīṇam paya usriyāyās tasya māśīd yātudhāno nṛcakṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1910: RV_10,087.17c pīyūṣam agne yatamas titṛpsāt tam pratyañcam arciṣā vidhya marman ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1911: RV_10,087.18a viṣaṃ gavāṃ yātudhānāḥ pibantv ā vṛścyantām aditaye durevāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1912: RV_10,087.18c parainān devaḥ savitā dadātu parā bhāgam oṣadhīnāṃ jayantām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1913: RV_10,087.19a sanād agne mṛṇasi yātudhānān na tvā rakṣāṃsi pṛtanāsu jigyuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1914: RV_10,087.19c anu daha sahamūrān kravyādo mā te hetyā mukṣata daivyāyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1915: RV_10,087.20a tvaṃ no agne adharād udaktāt tvam paścād uta rakṣā purastāt |
GV01rv_hn10u:1916: RV_10,087.20c prati te te ajarāsas tapiṣṭhā aghaśaṃsaṃ śośucato dahantu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1917: RV_10,087.21a paścāt purastād adharād udaktāt kaviḥ kāvyena pari pāhi rājan |
GV01rv_hn10u:1918: RV_10,087.21c sakhe sakhāyam ajaro jarimṇe 'gne martāṃ amartyas tvaṃ naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1919: RV_10,087.22a pari tvāgne puraṃ vayaṃ vipraṃ sahasya dhīmahi |
GV01rv_hn10u:1921: RV_10,087.23a viṣeṇa bhaṅgurāvataḥ prati ṣma rakṣaso daha |
GV01rv_hn10u:1922: RV_10,087.23c agne tigmena śociṣā tapuragrābhir ṛṣṭibhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1923: RV_10,087.24a praty agne mithunā daha yātudhānā kimīdinā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1924: RV_10,087.24c saṃ tvā śiśāmi jāgṛhy adabdhaṃ vipra manmabhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1925: RV_10,087.25a praty agne harasā haraḥ śṛṇīhi viśvataḥ prati |
GV01rv_hn10u:1926: RV_10,087.25c yātudhānasya rakṣaso balaṃ vi ruja vīryam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1927: RV_10,088.01a haviṣ pāntam ajaraṃ svarvidi divispṛśy āhutaṃ juṣṭam agnau |
GV01rv_hn10u:1928: RV_10,088.01c tasya bharmaṇe bhuvanāya devā dharmaṇe kaṃ svadhayā paprathanta ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1929: RV_10,088.02a gīrṇam bhuvanaṃ tamasāpagūḷham āviḥ svar abhavaj jāte agnau |
GV01rv_hn10u:1930: RV_10,088.02c tasya devāḥ pṛthivī dyaur utāpo 'raṇayann oṣadhīḥ sakhye asya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1931: RV_10,088.03a devebhir nv iṣito yajñiyebhir agniṃ stoṣāṇy ajaram bṛhantam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1932: RV_10,088.03c yo bhānunā pṛthivīṃ dyām utemām ātatāna rodasī antarikṣam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1933: RV_10,088.04a yo hotāsīt prathamo devajuṣṭo yaṃ samāñjann ājyenā vṛṇānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1934: RV_10,088.04c sa patatrītvaraṃ sthā jagad yac chvātram agnir akṛṇoj jātavedāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1935: RV_10,088.05a yaj jātavedo bhuvanasya mūrdhann atiṣṭho agne saha rocanena |
GV01rv_hn10u:1936: RV_10,088.05c taṃ tvāhema matibhir gīrbhir ukthaiḥ sa yajñiyo abhavo rodasiprāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1937: RV_10,088.06a mūrdhā bhuvo bhavati naktam agnis tataḥ sūryo jāyate prātar udyan |
GV01rv_hn10u:1938: RV_10,088.06c māyām ū tu yajñiyānām etām apo yat tūrṇiś carati prajānan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1939: RV_10,088.07a dṛśenyo yo mahinā samiddho 'rocata diviyonir vibhāvā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1940: RV_10,088.07c tasminn agnau sūktavākena devā havir viśva ājuhavus tanūpāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1941: RV_10,088.08a sūktavākam prathamam ād id agnim ād id dhavir ajanayanta devāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1942: RV_10,088.08c sa eṣāṃ yajño abhavat tanūpās taṃ dyaur veda tam pṛthivī tam āpaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1943: RV_10,088.09a yaṃ devāso 'janayantāgniṃ yasminn ājuhavur bhuvanāni viśvā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1944: RV_10,088.09c so arciṣā pṛthivīṃ dyām utemām ṛjūyamāno atapan mahitvā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1945: RV_10,088.10a stomena hi divi devāso agnim ajījanañ chaktibhī rodasiprām |
GV01rv_hn10u:1946: RV_10,088.10c tam ū akṛṇvan tredhā bhuve kaṃ sa oṣadhīḥ pacati viśvarūpāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1947: RV_10,088.11a yaded enam adadhur yajñiyāso divi devāḥ sūryam āditeyam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1948: RV_10,088.11c yadā cariṣṇū mithunāv abhūtām ād it prāpaśyan bhuvanāni viśvā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1949: RV_10,088.12a viśvasmā agnim bhuvanāya devā vaiśvānaraṃ ketum ahnām akṛṇvan |
GV01rv_hn10u:1950: RV_10,088.12c ā yas tatānoṣaso vibhātīr apo ūrṇoti tamo arciṣā yan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1951: RV_10,088.13a vaiśvānaraṃ kavayo yajñiyāso 'gniṃ devā ajanayann ajuryam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1952: RV_10,088.13c nakṣatram pratnam aminac cariṣṇu yakṣasyādhyakṣaṃ taviṣam bṛhantam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1953: RV_10,088.14a vaiśvānaraṃ viśvahā dīdivāṃsam mantrair agniṃ kavim acchā vadāmaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1954: RV_10,088.14c yo mahimnā paribabhūvorvī utāvastād uta devaḥ parastāt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1955: RV_10,088.15a dve srutī aśṛṇavam pitṝṇām ahaṃ devānām uta martyānām |
GV01rv_hn10u:1956: RV_10,088.15c tābhyām idaṃ viśvam ejat sam eti yad antarā pitaram mātaraṃ ca ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1957: RV_10,088.16a dve samīcī bibhṛtaś carantaṃ śīrṣato jātam manasā vimṛṣṭam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1958: RV_10,088.16c sa pratyaṅ viśvā bhuvanāni tasthāv aprayucchan taraṇir bhrājamānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1959: RV_10,088.17a yatrā vadete avaraḥ paraś ca yajñanyoḥ kataro nau vi veda |
GV01rv_hn10u:1960: RV_10,088.17c ā śekur it sadhamādaṃ sakhāyo nakṣanta yajñaṃ ka idaṃ vi vocat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1961: RV_10,088.18a katy agnayaḥ kati sūryāsaḥ katy uṣāsaḥ katy u svid āpaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1962: RV_10,088.18c nopaspijaṃ vaḥ pitaro vadāmi pṛcchāmi vaḥ kavayo vidmane kam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1963: RV_10,088.19a yāvanmātram uṣaso na pratīkaṃ suparṇyo vasate mātariśvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1964: RV_10,088.19c tāvad dadhāty upa yajñam āyan brāhmaṇo hotur avaro niṣīdan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1965: RV_10,089.01a indraṃ stavā nṛtamaṃ yasya mahnā vibabādhe rocanā vi jmo antān |
GV01rv_hn10u:1966: RV_10,089.01c ā yaḥ paprau carṣaṇīdhṛd varobhiḥ pra sindhubhyo riricāno mahitvā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1967: RV_10,089.02a sa sūryaḥ pary urū varāṃsy endro vavṛtyād rathyeva cakrā |
GV01rv_hn10u:1968: RV_10,089.02c atiṣṭhantam apasyaṃ na sargaṃ kṛṣṇā tamāṃsi tviṣyā jaghāna ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1969: RV_10,089.03a samānam asmā anapāvṛd arca kṣmayā divo asamam brahma navyam |
GV01rv_hn10u:1970: RV_10,089.03c vi yaḥ pṛṣṭheva janimāny arya indraś cikāya na sakhāyam īṣe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1971: RV_10,089.04a indrāya giro aniśitasargā apaḥ prerayaṃ sagarasya budhnāt |
GV01rv_hn10u:1972: RV_10,089.04c yo akṣeṇeva cakriyā śacībhir viṣvak tastambha pṛthivīm uta dyām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1973: RV_10,089.05a āpāntamanyus tṛpalaprabharmā dhuniḥ śimīvāñ charumāṃ ṛjīṣī |
GV01rv_hn10u:1974: RV_10,089.05c somo viśvāny atasā vanāni nārvāg indram pratimānāni debhuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1975: RV_10,089.06a na yasya dyāvāpṛthivī na dhanva nāntarikṣaṃ nādrayaḥ somo akṣāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1976: RV_10,089.06c yad asya manyur adhinīyamānaḥ śṛṇāti vīḷu rujati sthirāṇi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1977: RV_10,089.07a jaghāna vṛtraṃ svadhitir vaneva ruroja puro aradan na sindhūn |
GV01rv_hn10u:1978: RV_10,089.07c bibheda giriṃ navam in na kumbham ā gā indro akṛṇuta svayugbhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1979: RV_10,089.08a tvaṃ ha tyad ṛṇayā indra dhīro 'sir na parva vṛjinā śṛṇāsi |
GV01rv_hn10u:1980: RV_10,089.08c pra ye mitrasya varuṇasya dhāma yujaṃ na janā minanti mitram ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1981: RV_10,089.09a pra ye mitram prāryamaṇaṃ durevāḥ pra saṃgiraḥ pra varuṇam minanti |
GV01rv_hn10u:1982: RV_10,089.09c ny amitreṣu vadham indra tumraṃ vṛṣan vṛṣāṇam aruṣaṃ śiśīhi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1983: RV_10,089.10a indro diva indra īśe pṛthivyā indro apām indra it parvatānām |
GV01rv_hn10u:1984: RV_10,089.10c indro vṛdhām indra in medhirāṇām indraḥ kṣeme yoge havya indraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1985: RV_10,089.11a prāktubhya indraḥ pra vṛdho ahabhyaḥ prāntarikṣāt pra samudrasya dhāseḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1986: RV_10,089.11c pra vātasya prathasaḥ pra jmo antāt pra sindhubhyo ririce pra kṣitibhyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1987: RV_10,089.12a pra śośucatyā uṣaso na ketur asinvā te vartatām indra hetiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1988: RV_10,089.12c aśmeva vidhya diva ā sṛjānas tapiṣṭhena heṣasā droghamitrān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1989: RV_10,089.13a anv aha māsā anv id vanāny anv oṣadhīr anu parvatāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:1990: RV_10,089.13c anv indraṃ rodasī vāvaśāne anv āpo ajihata jāyamānam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1991: RV_10,089.14a karhi svit sā ta indra cetyāsad aghasya yad bhinado rakṣa eṣat |
GV01rv_hn10u:1992: RV_10,089.14c mitrakruvo yac chasane na gāvaḥ pṛthivyā āpṛg amuyā śayante ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1993: RV_10,089.15a śatrūyanto abhi ye nas tatasre mahi vrādhanta ogaṇāsa indra |
GV01rv_hn10u:1994: RV_10,089.15c andhenāmitrās tamasā sacantāṃ sujyotiṣo aktavas tāṃ abhi ṣyuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1995: RV_10,089.16a purūṇi hi tvā savanā janānām brahmāṇi mandan gṛṇatām ṛṣīṇām |
GV01rv_hn10u:1996: RV_10,089.16c imām āghoṣann avasā sahūtiṃ tiro viśvāṃ arcato yāhy arvāṅ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1997: RV_10,089.17a evā te vayam indra bhuñjatīnāṃ vidyāma sumatīnāṃ navānām |
GV01rv_hn10u:1998: RV_10,089.17c vidyāma vastor avasā gṛṇanto viśvāmitrā uta ta indra nūnam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:1999: RV_10,089.18a śunaṃ huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamaṃ vājasātau |
GV01rv_hn10u:2000: RV_10,089.18c śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi saṃjitaṃ dhanānām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2002: RV_10,090.01c sa bhūmiṃ viśvato vṛtvāty atiṣṭhad daśāṅgulam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2003: RV_10,090.02a puruṣa evedaṃ sarvaṃ yad bhūtaṃ yac ca bhavyam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2005: RV_10,090.03a etāvān asya mahimāto jyāyāṃś ca pūruṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2006: RV_10,090.03c pādo 'sya viśvā bhūtāni tripād asyāmṛtaṃ divi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2007: RV_10,090.04a tripād ūrdhva ud ait puruṣaḥ pādo 'syehābhavat punaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2008: RV_10,090.04c tato viṣvaṅ vy akrāmat sāśanānaśane abhi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2009: RV_10,090.05a tasmād virāḷ ajāyata virājo adhi pūruṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2010: RV_10,090.05c sa jāto aty aricyata paścād bhūmim atho puraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2011: RV_10,090.06a yat puruṣeṇa haviṣā devā yajñam atanvata |
GV01rv_hn10u:2012: RV_10,090.06c vasanto asyāsīd ājyaṃ grīṣma idhmaḥ śarad dhaviḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2013: RV_10,090.07a taṃ yajñam barhiṣi praukṣan puruṣaṃ jātam agrataḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2014: RV_10,090.07c tena devā ayajanta sādhyā ṛṣayaś ca ye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2015: RV_10,090.08a tasmād yajñāt sarvahutaḥ sambhṛtam pṛṣadājyam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2016: RV_10,090.08c paśūn tāṃś cakre vāyavyān āraṇyān grāmyāś ca ye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2017: RV_10,090.09a tasmād yajñāt sarvahuta ṛcaḥ sāmāni jajñire |
GV01rv_hn10u:2018: RV_10,090.09c chandāṃsi jajñire tasmād yajus tasmād ajāyata ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2019: RV_10,090.10a tasmād aśvā ajāyanta ye ke cobhayādataḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2020: RV_10,090.10c gāvo ha jajñire tasmāt tasmāj jātā ajāvayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2021: RV_10,090.11a yat puruṣaṃ vy adadhuḥ katidhā vy akalpayan |
GV01rv_hn10u:2022: RV_10,090.11c mukhaṃ kim asya kau bāhū kā ūrū pādā ucyete ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2023: RV_10,090.12a brāhmaṇo 'sya mukham āsīd bāhū rājanyaḥ kṛtaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2024: RV_10,090.12c ūrū tad asya yad vaiśyaḥ padbhyāṃ śūdro ajāyata ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2025: RV_10,090.13a candramā manaso jātaś cakṣoḥ sūryo ajāyata |
GV01rv_hn10u:2026: RV_10,090.13c mukhād indraś cāgniś ca prāṇād vāyur ajāyata ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2027: RV_10,090.14a nābhyā āsīd antarikṣaṃ śīrṣṇo dyauḥ sam avartata |
GV01rv_hn10u:2028: RV_10,090.14c padbhyām bhūmir diśaḥ śrotrāt tathā lokāṃ akalpayan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2029: RV_10,090.15a saptāsyāsan paridhayas triḥ sapta samidhaḥ kṛtāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2030: RV_10,090.15c devā yad yajñaṃ tanvānā abadhnan puruṣam paśum ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2031: RV_10,090.16a yajñena yajñam ayajanta devās tāni dharmāṇi prathamāny āsan |
GV01rv_hn10u:2032: RV_10,090.16c te ha nākam mahimānaḥ sacanta yatra pūrve sādhyāḥ santi devāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2033: RV_10,091.01a saṃ jāgṛvadbhir jaramāṇa idhyate dame damūnā iṣayann iḷas pade |
GV01rv_hn10u:2034: RV_10,091.01c viśvasya hotā haviṣo vareṇyo vibhur vibhāvā suṣakhā sakhīyate ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2035: RV_10,091.02a sa darśataśrīr atithir gṛhe-gṛhe vane-vane śiśriye takvavīr iva |
GV01rv_hn10u:2036: RV_10,091.02c janaṃ-janaṃ janyo nāti manyate viśa ā kṣeti viśyo viśaṃ-viśam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2037: RV_10,091.03a sudakṣo dakṣaiḥ kratunāsi sukratur agne kaviḥ kāvyenāsi viśvavit |
GV01rv_hn10u:2038: RV_10,091.03c vasur vasūnāṃ kṣayasi tvam eka id dyāvā ca yāni pṛthivī ca puṣyataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2039: RV_10,091.04a prajānann agne tava yonim ṛtviyam iḷāyās pade ghṛtavantam āsadaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2040: RV_10,091.04c ā te cikitra uṣasām ivetayo 'repasaḥ sūryasyeva raśmayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2041: RV_10,091.05a tava śriyo varṣyasyeva vidyutaś citrāś cikitra uṣasāṃ na ketavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2042: RV_10,091.05c yad oṣadhīr abhisṛṣṭo vanāni ca pari svayaṃ cinuṣe annam āsye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2043: RV_10,091.06a tam oṣadhīr dadhire garbham ṛtviyaṃ tam āpo agniṃ janayanta mātaraḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2044: RV_10,091.06c tam it samānaṃ vaninaś ca vīrudho 'ntarvatīś ca suvate ca viśvahā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2045: RV_10,091.07a vātopadhūta iṣito vaśāṃ anu tṛṣu yad annā veviṣad vitiṣṭhase |
GV01rv_hn10u:2046: RV_10,091.07c ā te yatante rathyo yathā pṛthak chardhāṃsy agne ajarāṇi dhakṣataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2047: RV_10,091.08a medhākāraṃ vidathasya prasādhanam agniṃ hotāram paribhūtamam matim |
GV01rv_hn10u:2048: RV_10,091.08c tam id arbhe haviṣy ā samānam it tam in mahe vṛṇate nānyaṃ tvat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2049: RV_10,091.09a tvām id atra vṛṇate tvāyavo hotāram agne vidatheṣu vedhasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2050: RV_10,091.09c yad devayanto dadhati prayāṃsi te haviṣmanto manavo vṛktabarhiṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2051: RV_10,091.10a tavāgne hotraṃ tava potram ṛtviyaṃ tava neṣṭraṃ tvam agnid ṛtāyataḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2052: RV_10,091.10c tava praśāstraṃ tvam adhvarīyasi brahmā cāsi gṛhapatiś ca no dame ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2053: RV_10,091.11a yas tubhyam agne amṛtāya martyaḥ samidhā dāśad uta vā haviṣkṛti |
GV01rv_hn10u:2054: RV_10,091.11c tasya hotā bhavasi yāsi dūtyam upa brūṣe yajasy adhvarīyasi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2055: RV_10,091.12a imā asmai matayo vāco asmad āṃ ṛco giraḥ suṣṭutayaḥ sam agmata |
GV01rv_hn10u:2056: RV_10,091.12c vasūyavo vasave jātavedase vṛddhāsu cid vardhano yāsu cākanat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2057: RV_10,091.13a imām pratnāya suṣṭutiṃ navīyasīṃ voceyam asmā uśate śṛṇotu naḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2058: RV_10,091.13c bhūyā antarā hṛdy asya nispṛśe jāyeva patya uśatī suvāsāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2059: RV_10,091.14a yasminn aśvāsa ṛṣabhāsa ukṣaṇo vaśā meṣā avasṛṣṭāsa āhutāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2060: RV_10,091.14c kīlālape somapṛṣṭhāya vedhase hṛdā matiṃ janaye cārum agnaye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2061: RV_10,091.15a ahāvy agne havir āsye te srucīva ghṛtaṃ camvīva somaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2062: RV_10,091.15c vājasaniṃ rayim asme suvīram praśastaṃ dhehi yaśasam bṛhantam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2063: RV_10,092.01a yajñasya vo rathyaṃ viśpatiṃ viśāṃ hotāram aktor atithiṃ vibhāvasum |
GV01rv_hn10u:2064: RV_10,092.01c śocañ chuṣkāsu hariṇīṣu jarbhurad vṛṣā ketur yajato dyām aśāyata ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2065: RV_10,092.02a imam añjaspām ubhaye akṛṇvata dharmāṇam agniṃ vidathasya sādhanam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2066: RV_10,092.02c aktuṃ na yahvam uṣasaḥ purohitaṃ tanūnapātam aruṣasya niṃsate ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2067: RV_10,092.03a baḷ asya nīthā vi paṇeś ca manmahe vayā asya prahutā āsur attave |
GV01rv_hn10u:2068: RV_10,092.03c yadā ghorāso amṛtatvam āśatād ij janasya daivyasya carkiran ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2069: RV_10,092.04a ṛtasya hi prasitir dyaur uru vyaco namo mahy aramatiḥ panīyasī |
GV01rv_hn10u:2070: RV_10,092.04c indro mitro varuṇaḥ saṃ cikitrire 'tho bhagaḥ savitā pūtadakṣasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2071: RV_10,092.05a pra rudreṇa yayinā yanti sindhavas tiro mahīm aramatiṃ dadhanvire |
GV01rv_hn10u:2072: RV_10,092.05c yebhiḥ parijmā pariyann uru jrayo vi roruvaj jaṭhare viśvam ukṣate ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2073: RV_10,092.06a krāṇā rudrā maruto viśvakṛṣṭayo divaḥ śyenāso asurasya nīḷayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2074: RV_10,092.06c tebhiś caṣṭe varuṇo mitro aryamendro devebhir arvaśebhir arvaśaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2075: RV_10,092.07a indre bhujaṃ śaśamānāsa āśata sūro dṛśīke vṛṣaṇaś ca pauṃsye |
GV01rv_hn10u:2076: RV_10,092.07c pra ye nv asyārhaṇā tatakṣire yujaṃ vajraṃ nṛṣadaneṣu kāravaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2077: RV_10,092.08a sūraś cid ā harito asya rīramad indrād ā kaś cid bhayate tavīyasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2078: RV_10,092.08c bhīmasya vṛṣṇo jaṭharād abhiśvaso dive-dive sahuri stann abādhitaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2079: RV_10,092.09a stomaṃ vo adya rudrāya śikvase kṣayadvīrāya namasā didiṣṭana |
GV01rv_hn10u:2080: RV_10,092.09c yebhiḥ śivaḥ svavāṃ evayāvabhir divaḥ siṣakti svayaśā nikāmabhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2081: RV_10,092.10a te hi prajāyā abharanta vi śravo bṛhaspatir vṛṣabhaḥ somajāmayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2082: RV_10,092.10c yajñair atharvā prathamo vi dhārayad devā dakṣair bhṛgavaḥ saṃ cikitrire ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2083: RV_10,092.11a te hi dyāvāpṛthivī bhūriretasā narāśaṃsaś caturaṅgo yamo 'ditiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2084: RV_10,092.11c devas tvaṣṭā draviṇodā ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ pra rodasī maruto viṣṇur arhire ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2085: RV_10,092.12a uta sya na uśijām urviyā kavir ahiḥ śṛṇotu budhnyo havīmani |
GV01rv_hn10u:2086: RV_10,092.12c sūryāmāsā vicarantā divikṣitā dhiyā śamīnahuṣī asya bodhatam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2087: RV_10,092.13a pra naḥ pūṣā carathaṃ viśvadevyo 'pāṃ napād avatu vāyur iṣṭaye |
GV01rv_hn10u:2088: RV_10,092.13c ātmānaṃ vasyo abhi vātam arcata tad aśvinā suhavā yāmani śrutam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2089: RV_10,092.14a viśām āsām abhayānām adhikṣitaṃ gīrbhir u svayaśasaṃ gṛṇīmasi |
GV01rv_hn10u:2090: RV_10,092.14c gnābhir viśvābhir aditim anarvaṇam aktor yuvānaṃ nṛmaṇā adhā patim ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2091: RV_10,092.15a rebhad atra januṣā pūrvo aṅgirā grāvāṇa ūrdhvā abhi cakṣur adhvaram |
GV01rv_hn10u:2092: RV_10,092.15c yebhir vihāyā abhavad vicakṣaṇaḥ pāthaḥ sumekaṃ svadhitir vananvati ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2093: RV_10,093.01a mahi dyāvāpṛthivī bhūtam urvī nārī yahvī na rodasī sadaṃ naḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2094: RV_10,093.01c tebhir naḥ pātaṃ sahyasa ebhir naḥ pātaṃ śūṣaṇi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2095: RV_10,093.02a yajñe-yajñe sa martyo devān saparyati |
GV01rv_hn10u:2096: RV_10,093.02c yaḥ sumnair dīrghaśruttama āvivāsaty enān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2097: RV_10,093.03a viśveṣām irajyavo devānāṃ vār mahaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2098: RV_10,093.03c viśve hi viśvamahaso viśve yajñeṣu yajñiyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2099: RV_10,093.04a te ghā rājāno amṛtasya mandrā aryamā mitro varuṇaḥ parijmā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2100: RV_10,093.04c kad rudro nṛṇāṃ stuto marutaḥ pūṣaṇo bhagaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2101: RV_10,093.05a uta no naktam apāṃ vṛṣaṇvasū sūryāmāsā sadanāya sadhanyā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2102: RV_10,093.05c sacā yat sādy eṣām ahir budhneṣu budhnyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2103: RV_10,093.06a uta no devāv aśvinā śubhas patī dhāmabhir mitrāvaruṇā uruṣyatām |
GV01rv_hn10u:2104: RV_10,093.06c mahaḥ sa rāya eṣate 'ti dhanveva duritā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2105: RV_10,093.07a uta no rudrā cin mṛḷatām aśvinā viśve devāso rathaspatir bhagaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2106: RV_10,093.07c ṛbhur vāja ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ parijmā viśvavedasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2107: RV_10,093.08a ṛbhur ṛbhukṣā ṛbhur vidhato mada ā te harī jūjuvānasya vājinā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2108: RV_10,093.08c duṣṭaraṃ yasya sāma cid ṛdhag yajño na mānuṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2109: RV_10,093.09a kṛdhī no ahrayo deva savitaḥ sa ca stuṣe maghonām |
GV01rv_hn10u:2110: RV_10,093.09c saho na indro vahnibhir ny eṣāṃ carṣaṇīnāṃ cakraṃ raśmiṃ na yoyuve ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2111: RV_10,093.10a aiṣu dyāvāpṛthivī dhātam mahad asme vīreṣu viśvacarṣaṇi śravaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2112: RV_10,093.10c pṛkṣaṃ vājasya sātaye pṛkṣaṃ rāyota turvaṇe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2113: RV_10,093.11a etaṃ śaṃsam indrāsmayuṣ ṭvaṃ kūcit santaṃ sahasāvann abhiṣṭaye |
GV01rv_hn10u:2114: RV_10,093.11c sadā pāhy abhiṣṭaye medatāṃ vedatā vaso ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2115: RV_10,093.12a etam me stomaṃ tanā na sūrye dyutadyāmānaṃ vāvṛdhanta nṛṇām |
GV01rv_hn10u:2117: RV_10,093.13a vāvarta yeṣāṃ rāyā yuktaiṣāṃ hiraṇyayī |
GV01rv_hn10u:2118: RV_10,093.13c nemadhitā na pauṃsyā vṛtheva viṣṭāntā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2119: RV_10,093.14a pra tad duḥśīme pṛthavāne vene pra rāme vocam asure maghavatsu |
GV01rv_hn10u:2120: RV_10,093.14c ye yuktvāya pañca śatāsmayu pathā viśrāvy eṣām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2121: RV_10,093.15a adhīn nv atra saptatiṃ ca sapta ca |
GV01rv_hn10u:2122: RV_10,093.15b sadyo didiṣṭa tānvaḥ sadyo didiṣṭa pārthyaḥ sadyo didiṣṭa māyavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2123: RV_10,094.01a praite vadantu pra vayaṃ vadāma grāvabhyo vācaṃ vadatā vadadbhyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2124: RV_10,094.01c yad adrayaḥ parvatāḥ sākam āśavaḥ ślokaṃ ghoṣam bharathendrāya sominaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2125: RV_10,094.02a ete vadanti śatavat sahasravad abhi krandanti haritebhir āsabhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2126: RV_10,094.02c viṣṭvī grāvāṇaḥ sukṛtaḥ sukṛtyayā hotuś cit pūrve haviradyam āśata ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2127: RV_10,094.03a ete vadanty avidann anā madhu ny ūṅkhayante adhi pakva āmiṣi |
GV01rv_hn10u:2128: RV_10,094.03c vṛkṣasya śākhām aruṇasya bapsatas te sūbharvā vṛṣabhāḥ prem arāviṣuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2129: RV_10,094.04a bṛhad vadanti madireṇa mandinendraṃ krośanto 'vidann anā madhu |
GV01rv_hn10u:2130: RV_10,094.04c saṃrabhyā dhīrāḥ svasṛbhir anartiṣur āghoṣayantaḥ pṛthivīm upabdibhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2131: RV_10,094.05a suparṇā vācam akratopa dyavy ākhare kṛṣṇā iṣirā anartiṣuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2132: RV_10,094.05c nyaṅ ni yanty uparasya niṣkṛtam purū reto dadhire sūryaśvitaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2133: RV_10,094.06a ugrā iva pravahantaḥ samāyamuḥ sākaṃ yuktā vṛṣaṇo bibhrato dhuraḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2134: RV_10,094.06c yac chvasanto jagrasānā arāviṣuḥ śṛṇva eṣām prothatho arvatām iva ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2136: RV_10,094.07c daśābhīśubhyo arcatājarebhyo daśa dhuro daśa yuktā vahadbhyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2137: RV_10,094.08a te adrayo daśayantrāsa āśavas teṣām ādhānam pary eti haryatam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2138: RV_10,094.08c ta ū sutasya somyasyāndhaso 'ṃśoḥ pīyūṣam prathamasya bhejire ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2139: RV_10,094.09a te somādo harī indrasya niṃsate 'ṃśuṃ duhanto adhy āsate gavi |
GV01rv_hn10u:2140: RV_10,094.09c tebhir dugdham papivān somyam madhv indro vardhate prathate vṛṣāyate ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2141: RV_10,094.10a vṛṣā vo aṃśur na kilā riṣāthaneḷāvantaḥ sadam it sthanāśitāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2142: RV_10,094.10c raivatyeva mahasā cārava sthana yasya grāvāṇo ajuṣadhvam adhvaram ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2143: RV_10,094.11a tṛdilā atṛdilāso adrayo 'śramaṇā aśṛthitā amṛtyavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2144: RV_10,094.11c anāturā ajarā sthāmaviṣṇavaḥ supīvaso atṛṣitā atṛṣṇajaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2145: RV_10,094.12a dhruvā eva vaḥ pitaro yuge-yuge kṣemakāmāsaḥ sadaso na yuñjate |
GV01rv_hn10u:2146: RV_10,094.12c ajuryāso hariṣāco haridrava ā dyāṃ raveṇa pṛthivīm aśuśravuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2147: RV_10,094.13a tad id vadanty adrayo vimocane yāmann añjaspā iva ghed upabdibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2148: RV_10,094.13c vapanto bījam iva dhānyākṛtaḥ pṛñcanti somaṃ na minanti bapsataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2149: RV_10,094.14a sute adhvare adhi vācam akratā krīḷayo na mātaraṃ tudantaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2150: RV_10,094.14c vi ṣū muñcā suṣuvuṣo manīṣāṃ vi vartantām adrayaś cāyamānāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2151: RV_10,095.01a haye jāye manasā tiṣṭha ghore vacāṃsi miśrā kṛṇavāvahai nu |
GV01rv_hn10u:2152: RV_10,095.01c na nau mantrā anuditāsa ete mayas karan paratare canāhan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2153: RV_10,095.02a kim etā vācā kṛṇavā tavāham prākramiṣam uṣasām agriyeva |
GV01rv_hn10u:2154: RV_10,095.02c purūravaḥ punar astam parehi durāpanā vāta ivāham asmi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2155: RV_10,095.03a iṣur na śriya iṣudher asanā goṣāḥ śatasā na raṃhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2156: RV_10,095.03c avīre kratau vi davidyutan norā na māyuṃ citayanta dhunayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2157: RV_10,095.04a sā vasu dadhatī śvaśurāya vaya uṣo yadi vaṣṭy antigṛhāt |
GV01rv_hn10u:2158: RV_10,095.04c astaṃ nanakṣe yasmiñ cākan divā naktaṃ śnathitā vaitasena ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2159: RV_10,095.05a triḥ sma māhnaḥ śnathayo vaitasenota sma me 'vyatyai pṛṇāsi |
GV01rv_hn10u:2160: RV_10,095.05c purūravo 'nu te ketam āyaṃ rājā me vīra tanvas tad āsīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2161: RV_10,095.06a yā sujūrṇiḥ śreṇiḥ sumnaāpir hradecakṣur na granthinī caraṇyuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2162: RV_10,095.06c tā añjayo 'ruṇayo na sasruḥ śriye gāvo na dhenavo 'navanta ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2163: RV_10,095.07a sam asmiñ jāyamāna āsata gnā utem avardhan nadyaḥ svagūrtāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2164: RV_10,095.07c mahe yat tvā purūravo raṇāyāvardhayan dasyuhatyāya devāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2165: RV_10,095.08a sacā yad āsu jahatīṣv atkam amānuṣīṣu mānuṣo niṣeve |
GV01rv_hn10u:2166: RV_10,095.08c apa sma mat tarasantī na bhujyus tā atrasan rathaspṛśo nāśvāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2167: RV_10,095.09a yad āsu marto amṛtāsu nispṛk saṃ kṣoṇībhiḥ kratubhir na pṛṅkte |
GV01rv_hn10u:2168: RV_10,095.09c tā ātayo na tanvaḥ śumbhata svā aśvāso na krīḷayo dandaśānāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2169: RV_10,095.10a vidyun na yā patantī davidyod bharantī me apyā kāmyāni |
GV01rv_hn10u:2170: RV_10,095.10c janiṣṭo apo naryaḥ sujātaḥ prorvaśī tirata dīrgham āyuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2171: RV_10,095.11a jajñiṣa itthā gopīthyāya hi dadhātha tat purūravo ma ojaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2172: RV_10,095.11c aśāsaṃ tvā viduṣī sasminn ahan na ma āśṛṇoḥ kim abhug vadāsi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2173: RV_10,095.12a kadā sūnuḥ pitaraṃ jāta icchāc cakran nāśru vartayad vijānan |
GV01rv_hn10u:2174: RV_10,095.12c ko dampatī samanasā vi yūyod adha yad agniḥ śvaśureṣu dīdayat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2175: RV_10,095.13a prati bravāṇi vartayate aśru cakran na krandad ādhye śivāyai |
GV01rv_hn10u:2176: RV_10,095.13c pra tat te hinavā yat te asme parehy astaṃ nahi mūra māpaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2177: RV_10,095.14a sudevo adya prapated anāvṛt parāvatam paramāṃ gantavā u |
GV01rv_hn10u:2178: RV_10,095.14c adhā śayīta nirṛter upasthe 'dhainaṃ vṛkā rabhasāso adyuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2179: RV_10,095.15a purūravo mā mṛthā mā pra papto mā tvā vṛkāso aśivāsa u kṣan |
GV01rv_hn10u:2180: RV_10,095.15c na vai straiṇāni sakhyāni santi sālāvṛkāṇāṃ hṛdayāny etā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2181: RV_10,095.16a yad virūpācaram martyeṣv avasaṃ rātrīḥ śaradaś catasraḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2182: RV_10,095.16c ghṛtasya stokaṃ sakṛd ahna āśnāṃ tād evedaṃ tātṛpāṇā carāmi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2183: RV_10,095.17a antarikṣaprāṃ rajaso vimānīm upa śikṣāmy urvaśīṃ vasiṣṭhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2184: RV_10,095.17c upa tvā rātiḥ sukṛtasya tiṣṭhān ni vartasva hṛdayaṃ tapyate me ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2185: RV_10,095.18a iti tvā devā ima āhur aiḷa yathem etad bhavasi mṛtyubandhuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2186: RV_10,095.18c prajā te devān haviṣā yajāti svarga u tvam api mādayāse ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2187: RV_10,096.01a pra te mahe vidathe śaṃsiṣaṃ harī pra te vanve vanuṣo haryatam madam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2188: RV_10,096.01c ghṛtaṃ na yo haribhiś cāru secata ā tvā viśantu harivarpasaṃ giraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2189: RV_10,096.02a hariṃ hi yonim abhi ye samasvaran hinvanto harī divyaṃ yathā sadaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2190: RV_10,096.02c ā yam pṛṇanti haribhir na dhenava indrāya śūṣaṃ harivantam arcata ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2191: RV_10,096.03a so asya vajro harito ya āyaso harir nikāmo harir ā gabhastyoḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2192: RV_10,096.03c dyumnī suśipro harimanyusāyaka indre ni rūpā haritā mimikṣire ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2193: RV_10,096.04a divi na ketur adhi dhāyi haryato vivyacad vajro harito na raṃhyā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2194: RV_10,096.04c tudad ahiṃ hariśipro ya āyasaḥ sahasraśokā abhavad dharimbharaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2195: RV_10,096.05a tvaṃ-tvam aharyathā upastutaḥ pūrvebhir indra harikeśa yajvabhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2196: RV_10,096.05c tvaṃ haryasi tava viśvam ukthyam asāmi rādho harijāta haryatam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2197: RV_10,096.06a tā vajriṇam mandinaṃ stomyam mada indraṃ rathe vahato haryatā harī |
GV01rv_hn10u:2198: RV_10,096.06c purūṇy asmai savanāni haryata indrāya somā harayo dadhanvire ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2199: RV_10,096.07a araṃ kāmāya harayo dadhanvire sthirāya hinvan harayo harī turā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2200: RV_10,096.07c arvadbhir yo haribhir joṣam īyate so asya kāmaṃ harivantam ānaśe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2201: RV_10,096.08a hariśmaśārur harikeśa āyasas turaspeye yo haripā avardhata |
GV01rv_hn10u:2202: RV_10,096.08c arvadbhir yo haribhir vājinīvasur ati viśvā duritā pāriṣad dharī ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2203: RV_10,096.09a sruveva yasya hariṇī vipetatuḥ śipre vājāya hariṇī davidhvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2204: RV_10,096.09c pra yat kṛte camase marmṛjad dharī pītvā madasya haryatasyāndhasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2205: RV_10,096.10a uta sma sadma haryatasya pastyor atyo na vājaṃ harivāṃ acikradat |
GV01rv_hn10u:2206: RV_10,096.10c mahī cid dhi dhiṣaṇāharyad ojasā bṛhad vayo dadhiṣe haryataś cid ā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2207: RV_10,096.11a ā rodasī haryamāṇo mahitvā navyaṃ-navyaṃ haryasi manma nu priyam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2208: RV_10,096.11c pra pastyam asura haryataṃ gor āviṣ kṛdhi haraye sūryāya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2209: RV_10,096.12a ā tvā haryantam prayujo janānāṃ rathe vahantu hariśipram indra |
GV01rv_hn10u:2210: RV_10,096.12c pibā yathā pratibhṛtasya madhvo haryan yajñaṃ sadhamāde daśoṇim ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2211: RV_10,096.13a apāḥ pūrveṣāṃ harivaḥ sutānām atho idaṃ savanaṃ kevalaṃ te |
GV01rv_hn10u:2212: RV_10,096.13c mamaddhi somam madhumantam indra satrā vṛṣañ jaṭhara ā vṛṣasva ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2213: RV_10,097.01a yā oṣadhīḥ pūrvā jātā devebhyas triyugam purā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2214: RV_10,097.01c manai nu babhrūṇām ahaṃ śataṃ dhāmāni sapta ca ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2215: RV_10,097.02a śataṃ vo amba dhāmāni sahasram uta vo ruhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2216: RV_10,097.02c adhā śatakratvo yūyam imam me agadaṃ kṛta ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2217: RV_10,097.03a oṣadhīḥ prati modadhvam puṣpavatīḥ prasūvarīḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2218: RV_10,097.03c aśvā iva sajitvarīr vīrudhaḥ pārayiṣṇvaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2219: RV_10,097.04a oṣadhīr iti mātaras tad vo devīr upa bruve |
GV01rv_hn10u:2220: RV_10,097.04c saneyam aśvaṃ gāṃ vāsa ātmānaṃ tava pūruṣa ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2221: RV_10,097.05a aśvatthe vo niṣadanam parṇe vo vasatiṣ kṛtā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2222: RV_10,097.05c gobhāja it kilāsatha yat sanavatha pūruṣam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2223: RV_10,097.06a yatrauṣadhīḥ samagmata rājānaḥ samitāv iva |
GV01rv_hn10u:2224: RV_10,097.06c vipraḥ sa ucyate bhiṣag rakṣohāmīvacātanaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2226: RV_10,097.07c āvitsi sarvā oṣadhīr asmā ariṣṭatātaye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2227: RV_10,097.08a uc chuṣmā oṣadhīnāṃ gāvo goṣṭhād iverate |
GV01rv_hn10u:2228: RV_10,097.08c dhanaṃ saniṣyantīnām ātmānaṃ tava pūruṣa ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2229: RV_10,097.09a iṣkṛtir nāma vo mātātho yūyaṃ stha niṣkṛtīḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2230: RV_10,097.09c sīrāḥ patatriṇī sthana yad āmayati niṣ kṛtha ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2231: RV_10,097.10a ati viśvāḥ pariṣṭhā stena iva vrajam akramuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2232: RV_10,097.10c oṣadhīḥ prācucyavur yat kiṃ ca tanvo rapaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2233: RV_10,097.11a yad imā vājayann aham oṣadhīr hasta ādadhe |
GV01rv_hn10u:2234: RV_10,097.11c ātmā yakṣmasya naśyati purā jīvagṛbho yathā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2236: RV_10,097.12c tato yakṣmaṃ vi bādhadhva ugro madhyamaśīr iva ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2237: RV_10,097.13a sākaṃ yakṣma pra pata cāṣeṇa kikidīvinā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2238: RV_10,097.13c sākaṃ vātasya dhrājyā sākaṃ naśya nihākayā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2239: RV_10,097.14a anyā vo anyām avatv anyānyasyā upāvata |
GV01rv_hn10u:2240: RV_10,097.14c tāḥ sarvāḥ saṃvidānā idam me prāvatā vacaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2241: RV_10,097.15a yāḥ phalinīr yā aphalā apuṣpā yāś ca puṣpiṇīḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2242: RV_10,097.15c bṛhaspatiprasūtās tā no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2243: RV_10,097.16a muñcantu mā śapathyād atho varuṇyād uta |
GV01rv_hn10u:2244: RV_10,097.16c atho yamasya paḍbīśāt sarvasmād devakilbiṣāt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2245: RV_10,097.17a avapatantīr avadan diva oṣadhayas pari |
GV01rv_hn10u:2246: RV_10,097.17c yaṃ jīvam aśnavāmahai na sa riṣyāti pūruṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2247: RV_10,097.18a yā oṣadhīḥ somarājñīr bahvīḥ śatavicakṣaṇāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2248: RV_10,097.18c tāsāṃ tvam asy uttamāraṃ kāmāya śaṃ hṛde ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2249: RV_10,097.19a yā oṣadhīḥ somarājñīr viṣṭhitāḥ pṛthivīm anu |
GV01rv_hn10u:2250: RV_10,097.19c bṛhaspatiprasūtā asyai saṃ datta vīryam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2251: RV_10,097.20a mā vo riṣat khanitā yasmai cāhaṃ khanāmi vaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2252: RV_10,097.20c dvipac catuṣpad asmākaṃ sarvam astv anāturam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2253: RV_10,097.21a yāś cedam upaśṛṇvanti yāś ca dūram parāgatāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2254: RV_10,097.21c sarvāḥ saṃgatya vīrudho 'syai saṃ datta vīryam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2255: RV_10,097.22a oṣadhayaḥ saṃ vadante somena saha rājñā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2256: RV_10,097.22c yasmai kṛṇoti brāhmaṇas taṃ rājan pārayāmasi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2257: RV_10,097.23a tvam uttamāsy oṣadhe tava vṛkṣā upastayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2258: RV_10,097.23c upastir astu so 'smākaṃ yo asmāṃ abhidāsati ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2259: RV_10,098.01a bṛhaspate prati me devatām ihi mitro vā yad varuṇo vāsi pūṣā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2260: RV_10,098.01c ādityair vā yad vasubhir marutvān sa parjanyaṃ śantanave vṛṣāya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2261: RV_10,098.02a ā devo dūto ajiraś cikitvān tvad devāpe abhi mām agacchat |
GV01rv_hn10u:2262: RV_10,098.02c pratīcīnaḥ prati mām ā vavṛtsva dadhāmi te dyumatīṃ vācam āsan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2263: RV_10,098.03a asme dhehi dyumatīṃ vācam āsan bṛhaspate anamīvām iṣirām |
GV01rv_hn10u:2264: RV_10,098.03c yayā vṛṣṭiṃ śantanave vanāva divo drapso madhumāṃ ā viveśa ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2265: RV_10,098.04a ā no drapsā madhumanto viśantv indra dehy adhirathaṃ sahasram |
GV01rv_hn10u:2266: RV_10,098.04c ni ṣīda hotram ṛtuthā yajasva devān devāpe haviṣā saparya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2267: RV_10,098.05a ārṣṭiṣeṇo hotram ṛṣir niṣīdan devāpir devasumatiṃ cikitvān |
GV01rv_hn10u:2268: RV_10,098.05c sa uttarasmād adharaṃ samudram apo divyā asṛjad varṣyā abhi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2269: RV_10,098.06a asmin samudre adhy uttarasminn āpo devebhir nivṛtā atiṣṭhan |
GV01rv_hn10u:2270: RV_10,098.06c tā adravann ārṣṭiṣeṇena sṛṣṭā devāpinā preṣitā mṛkṣiṇīṣu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2271: RV_10,098.07a yad devāpiḥ śantanave purohito hotrāya vṛtaḥ kṛpayann adīdhet |
GV01rv_hn10u:2272: RV_10,098.07c devaśrutaṃ vṛṣṭivaniṃ rarāṇo bṛhaspatir vācam asmā ayacchat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2273: RV_10,098.08a yaṃ tvā devāpiḥ śuśucāno agna ārṣṭiṣeṇo manuṣyaḥ samīdhe |
GV01rv_hn10u:2274: RV_10,098.08c viśvebhir devair anumadyamānaḥ pra parjanyam īrayā vṛṣṭimantam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2275: RV_10,098.09a tvām pūrva ṛṣayo gīrbhir āyan tvām adhvareṣu puruhūta viśve |
GV01rv_hn10u:2276: RV_10,098.09c sahasrāṇy adhirathāny asme ā no yajñaṃ rohidaśvopa yāhi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2277: RV_10,098.10a etāny agne navatir nava tve āhutāny adhirathā sahasrā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2278: RV_10,098.10c tebhir vardhasva tanvaḥ śūra pūrvīr divo no vṛṣṭim iṣito rirīhi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2279: RV_10,098.11a etāny agne navatiṃ sahasrā sam pra yaccha vṛṣṇa indrāya bhāgam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2280: RV_10,098.11c vidvān patha ṛtuśo devayānān apy aulānaṃ divi deveṣu dhehi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2281: RV_10,098.12a agne bādhasva vi mṛdho vi durgahāpāmīvām apa rakṣāṃsi sedha |
GV01rv_hn10u:2282: RV_10,098.12c asmāt samudrād bṛhato divo no 'pām bhūmānam upa naḥ sṛjeha ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2283: RV_10,099.01a kaṃ naś citram iṣaṇyasi cikitvān pṛthugmānaṃ vāśraṃ vāvṛdhadhyai |
GV01rv_hn10u:2284: RV_10,099.01c kat tasya dātu śavaso vyuṣṭau takṣad vajraṃ vṛtraturam apinvat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2285: RV_10,099.02a sa hi dyutā vidyutā veti sāma pṛthuṃ yonim asuratvā sasāda |
GV01rv_hn10u:2286: RV_10,099.02c sa sanīḷebhiḥ prasahāno asya bhrātur na ṛte saptathasya māyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2287: RV_10,099.03a sa vājaṃ yātāpaduṣpadā yan svarṣātā pari ṣadat saniṣyan |
GV01rv_hn10u:2288: RV_10,099.03c anarvā yac chatadurasya vedo ghnañ chiśnadevāṃ abhi varpasā bhūt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2289: RV_10,099.04a sa yahvyo 'vanīr goṣv arvā juhoti pradhanyāsu sasriḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2290: RV_10,099.04c apādo yatra yujyāso 'rathā droṇyaśvāsa īrate ghṛtaṃ vāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2291: RV_10,099.05a sa rudrebhir aśastavāra ṛbhvā hitvī gayam āreavadya āgāt |
GV01rv_hn10u:2292: RV_10,099.05c vamrasya manye mithunā vivavrī annam abhītyārodayan muṣāyan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2293: RV_10,099.06a sa id dāsaṃ tuvīravam patir dan ṣaḷakṣaṃ triśīrṣāṇaṃ damanyat |
GV01rv_hn10u:2294: RV_10,099.06c asya trito nv ojasā vṛdhāno vipā varāham ayoagrayā han ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2295: RV_10,099.07a sa druhvaṇe manuṣa ūrdhvasāna ā sāviṣad arśasānāya śarum |
GV01rv_hn10u:2296: RV_10,099.07c sa nṛtamo nahuṣo 'smat sujātaḥ puro 'bhinad arhan dasyuhatye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2297: RV_10,099.08a so abhriyo na yavasa udanyan kṣayāya gātuṃ vidan no asme |
GV01rv_hn10u:2298: RV_10,099.08c upa yat sīdad induṃ śarīraiḥ śyeno 'yopāṣṭir hanti dasyūn ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2299: RV_10,099.09a sa vrādhataḥ śavasānebhir asya kutsāya śuṣṇaṃ kṛpaṇe parādāt |
GV01rv_hn10u:2300: RV_10,099.09c ayaṃ kavim anayac chasyamānam atkaṃ yo asya sanitota nṛṇām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2301: RV_10,099.10a ayaṃ daśasyan naryebhir asya dasmo devebhir varuṇo na māyī |
GV01rv_hn10u:2302: RV_10,099.10c ayaṃ kanīna ṛtupā avedy amimītāraruṃ yaś catuṣpāt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2303: RV_10,099.11a asya stomebhir auśija ṛjiśvā vrajaṃ darayad vṛṣabheṇa piproḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2304: RV_10,099.11c sutvā yad yajato dīdayad gīḥ pura iyāno abhi varpasā bhūt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2305: RV_10,099.12a evā maho asura vakṣathāya vamrakaḥ paḍbhir upa sarpad indram |
GV01rv_hn10u:2306: RV_10,099.12c sa iyānaḥ karati svastim asmā iṣam ūrjaṃ sukṣitiṃ viśvam ābhāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2307: RV_10,100.01a indra dṛhya maghavan tvāvad id bhuja iha stutaḥ sutapā bodhi no vṛdhe |
GV01rv_hn10u:2308: RV_10,100.01c devebhir naḥ savitā prāvatu śrutam ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2309: RV_10,100.02a bharāya su bharata bhāgam ṛtviyam pra vāyave śucipe krandadiṣṭaye |
GV01rv_hn10u:2310: RV_10,100.02c gaurasya yaḥ payasaḥ pītim ānaśa ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2311: RV_10,100.03a ā no devaḥ savitā sāviṣad vaya ṛjūyate yajamānāya sunvate |
GV01rv_hn10u:2312: RV_10,100.03c yathā devān pratibhūṣema pākavad ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2313: RV_10,100.04a indro asme sumanā astu viśvahā rājā somaḥ suvitasyādhy etu naḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2314: RV_10,100.04c yathā-yathā mitradhitāni saṃdadhur ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2315: RV_10,100.05a indra ukthena śavasā parur dadhe bṛhaspate pratarītāsy āyuṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2316: RV_10,100.05c yajño manuḥ pramatir naḥ pitā hi kam ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2317: RV_10,100.06a indrasya nu sukṛtaṃ daivyaṃ saho 'gnir gṛhe jaritā medhiraḥ kaviḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2318: RV_10,100.06c yajñaś ca bhūd vidathe cārur antama ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2319: RV_10,100.07a na vo guhā cakṛma bhūri duṣkṛtaṃ nāviṣṭyaṃ vasavo devaheḷanam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2320: RV_10,100.07c mākir no devā anṛtasya varpasa ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2321: RV_10,100.08a apāmīvāṃ savitā sāviṣan nyag varīya id apa sedhantv adrayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2322: RV_10,100.08c grāvā yatra madhuṣud ucyate bṛhad ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2323: RV_10,100.09a ūrdhvo grāvā vasavo 'stu sotari viśvā dveṣāṃsi sanutar yuyota |
GV01rv_hn10u:2324: RV_10,100.09c sa no devaḥ savitā pāyur īḍya ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2325: RV_10,100.10a ūrjaṃ gāvo yavase pīvo attana ṛtasya yāḥ sadane kośe aṅgdhve |
GV01rv_hn10u:2326: RV_10,100.10c tanūr eva tanvo astu bheṣajam ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2327: RV_10,100.11a kratuprāvā jaritā śaśvatām ava indra id bhadrā pramatiḥ sutāvatām |
GV01rv_hn10u:2328: RV_10,100.11c pūrṇam ūdhar divyaṃ yasya siktaya ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2329: RV_10,100.12a citras te bhānuḥ kratuprā abhiṣṭiḥ santi spṛdho jaraṇiprā adhṛṣṭāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2330: RV_10,100.12c rajiṣṭhayā rajyā paśva ā gos tūtūrṣati pary agraṃ duvasyuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2331: RV_10,101.01a ud budhyadhvaṃ samanasaḥ sakhāyaḥ sam agnim indhvam bahavaḥ sanīḷāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2332: RV_10,101.01c dadhikrām agnim uṣasaṃ ca devīm indrāvato 'vase ni hvaye vaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2333: RV_10,101.02a mandrā kṛṇudhvaṃ dhiya ā tanudhvaṃ nāvam aritraparaṇīṃ kṛṇudhvam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2334: RV_10,101.02c iṣkṛṇudhvam āyudhāraṃ kṛṇudhvam prāñcaṃ yajñam pra ṇayatā sakhāyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2335: RV_10,101.03a yunakta sīrā vi yugā tanudhvaṃ kṛte yonau vapateha bījam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2336: RV_10,101.03c girā ca śruṣṭiḥ sabharā asan no nedīya it sṛṇyaḥ pakvam eyāt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2337: RV_10,101.04a sīrā yuñjanti kavayo yugā vi tanvate pṛthak |
GV01rv_hn10u:2339: RV_10,101.05a nir āhāvān kṛṇotana saṃ varatrā dadhātana |
GV01rv_hn10u:2340: RV_10,101.05c siñcāmahā avatam udriṇaṃ vayaṃ suṣekam anupakṣitam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2343: RV_10,101.07a prīṇītāśvān hitaṃ jayātha svastivāhaṃ ratham it kṛṇudhvam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2344: RV_10,101.07c droṇāhāvam avatam aśmacakram aṃsatrakośaṃ siñcatā nṛpāṇam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2345: RV_10,101.08a vrajaṃ kṛṇudhvaṃ sa hi vo nṛpāṇo varma sīvyadhvam bahulā pṛthūni |
GV01rv_hn10u:2346: RV_10,101.08c puraḥ kṛṇudhvam āyasīr adhṛṣṭā mā vaḥ susroc camaso dṛṃhatā tam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2347: RV_10,101.09a ā vo dhiyaṃ yajñiyāṃ varta ūtaye devā devīṃ yajatāṃ yajñiyām iha |
GV01rv_hn10u:2348: RV_10,101.09c sā no duhīyad yavaseva gatvī sahasradhārā payasā mahī gauḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2349: RV_10,101.10a ā tū ṣiñca harim īṃ dror upasthe vāśībhis takṣatāśmanmayībhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2350: RV_10,101.10c pari ṣvajadhvaṃ daśa kakṣyābhir ubhe dhurau prati vahniṃ yunakta ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2351: RV_10,101.11a ubhe dhurau vahnir āpibdamāno 'ntar yoneva carati dvijāniḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2352: RV_10,101.11c vanaspatiṃ vana āsthāpayadhvaṃ ni ṣū dadhidhvam akhananta utsam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2353: RV_10,101.12a kapṛn naraḥ kapṛtham ud dadhātana codayata khudata vājasātaye |
GV01rv_hn10u:2354: RV_10,101.12c niṣṭigryaḥ putram ā cyāvayotaya indraṃ sabādha iha somapītaye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2355: RV_10,102.01a pra te ratham mithūkṛtam indro 'vatu dhṛṣṇuyā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2356: RV_10,102.01c asminn ājau puruhūta śravāyye dhanabhakṣeṣu no 'va ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2357: RV_10,102.02a ut sma vāto vahati vāso 'syā adhirathaṃ yad ajayat sahasram |
GV01rv_hn10u:2358: RV_10,102.02c rathīr abhūn mudgalānī gaviṣṭau bhare kṛtaṃ vy aced indrasenā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2359: RV_10,102.03a antar yaccha jighāṃsato vajram indrābhidāsataḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2360: RV_10,102.03c dāsasya vā maghavann āryasya vā sanutar yavayā vadham ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2361: RV_10,102.04a udno hradam apibaj jarhṛṣāṇaḥ kūṭaṃ sma tṛṃhad abhimātim eti |
GV01rv_hn10u:2362: RV_10,102.04c pra muṣkabhāraḥ śrava icchamāno 'jiram bāhū abharat siṣāsan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2363: RV_10,102.05a ny akrandayann upayanta enam amehayan vṛṣabham madhya ājeḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2364: RV_10,102.05c tena sūbharvaṃ śatavat sahasraṃ gavām mudgalaḥ pradhane jigāya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2365: RV_10,102.06a kakardave vṛṣabho yukta āsīd avāvacīt sārathir asya keśī |
GV01rv_hn10u:2366: RV_10,102.06c dudher yuktasya dravataḥ sahānasa ṛcchanti ṣmā niṣpado mudgalānīm ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2367: RV_10,102.07a uta pradhim ud ahann asya vidvān upāyunag vaṃsagam atra śikṣan |
GV01rv_hn10u:2368: RV_10,102.07c indra ud āvat patim aghnyānām araṃhata padyābhiḥ kakudmān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2369: RV_10,102.08a śunam aṣṭrāvy acarat kapardī varatrāyāṃ dārv ānahyamānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2370: RV_10,102.08c nṛmṇāni kṛṇvan bahave janāya gāḥ paspaśānas taviṣīr adhatta ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2371: RV_10,102.09a imaṃ tam paśya vṛṣabhasya yuñjaṃ kāṣṭhāyā madhye drughaṇaṃ śayānam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2372: RV_10,102.09c yena jigāya śatavat sahasraṃ gavām mudgalaḥ pṛtanājyeṣu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2373: RV_10,102.10a āre aghā ko nv itthā dadarśa yaṃ yuñjanti tam v ā sthāpayanti |
GV01rv_hn10u:2374: RV_10,102.10c nāsmai tṛṇaṃ nodakam ā bharanty uttaro dhuro vahati pradediśat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2375: RV_10,102.11a parivṛkteva patividyam ānaṭ pīpyānā kūcakreṇeva siñcan |
GV01rv_hn10u:2376: RV_10,102.11c eṣaiṣyā cid rathyā jayema sumaṅgalaṃ sinavad astu sātam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2377: RV_10,102.12a tvaṃ viśvasya jagataś cakṣur indrāsi cakṣuṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2378: RV_10,102.12c vṛṣā yad ājiṃ vṛṣaṇā siṣāsasi codayan vadhriṇā yujā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2379: RV_10,103.01a āśuḥ śiśāno vṛṣabho na bhīmo ghanāghanaḥ kṣobhaṇaś carṣaṇīnām |
GV01rv_hn10u:2380: RV_10,103.01c saṃkrandano 'nimiṣa ekavīraḥ śataṃ senā ajayat sākam indraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2381: RV_10,103.02a saṃkrandanenānimiṣeṇa jiṣṇunā yutkāreṇa duścyavanena dhṛṣṇunā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2382: RV_10,103.02c tad indreṇa jayata tat sahadhvaṃ yudho nara iṣuhastena vṛṣṇā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2383: RV_10,103.03a sa iṣuhastaiḥ sa niṣaṅgibhir vaśī saṃsraṣṭā sa yudha indro gaṇena |
GV01rv_hn10u:2384: RV_10,103.03c saṃsṛṣṭajit somapā bāhuśardhy ugradhanvā pratihitābhir astā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2385: RV_10,103.04a bṛhaspate pari dīyā rathena rakṣohāmitrāṃ apabādhamānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2386: RV_10,103.04c prabhañjan senāḥ pramṛṇo yudhā jayann asmākam edhy avitā rathānām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2387: RV_10,103.05a balavijñāya sthaviraḥ pravīraḥ sahasvān vājī sahamāna ugraḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2388: RV_10,103.05c abhivīro abhisatvā sahojā jaitram indra ratham ā tiṣṭha govit ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2389: RV_10,103.06a gotrabhidaṃ govidaṃ vajrabāhuṃ jayantam ajma pramṛṇantam ojasā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2390: RV_10,103.06c imaṃ sajātā anu vīrayadhvam indraṃ sakhāyo anu saṃ rabhadhvam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2391: RV_10,103.07a abhi gotrāṇi sahasā gāhamāno 'dayo vīraḥ śatamanyur indraḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2392: RV_10,103.07c duścyavanaḥ pṛtanāṣāḷ ayudhyo 'smākaṃ senā avatu pra yutsu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2393: RV_10,103.08a indra āsāṃ netā bṛhaspatir dakṣiṇā yajñaḥ pura etu somaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2394: RV_10,103.08c devasenānām abhibhañjatīnāṃ jayantīnām maruto yantv agram ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2395: RV_10,103.09a indrasya vṛṣṇo varuṇasya rājña ādityānām marutāṃ śardha ugram |
GV01rv_hn10u:2396: RV_10,103.09c mahāmanasām bhuvanacyavānāṃ ghoṣo devānāṃ jayatām ud asthāt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2397: RV_10,103.10a ud dharṣaya maghavann āyudhāny ut satvanām māmakānām manāṃsi |
GV01rv_hn10u:2398: RV_10,103.10c ud vṛtrahan vājināṃ vājināny ud rathānāṃ jayatāṃ yantu ghoṣāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2399: RV_10,103.11a asmākam indraḥ samṛteṣu dhvajeṣv asmākaṃ yā iṣavas tā jayantu |
GV01rv_hn10u:2400: RV_10,103.11c asmākaṃ vīrā uttare bhavantv asmāṃ u devā avatā haveṣu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2401: RV_10,103.12a amīṣāṃ cittam pratilobhayantī gṛhāṇāṅgāny apve parehi |
GV01rv_hn10u:2402: RV_10,103.12c abhi prehi nir daha hṛtsu śokair andhenāmitrās tamasā sacantām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2403: RV_10,103.13a pretā jayatā nara indro vaḥ śarma yacchatu |
GV01rv_hn10u:2404: RV_10,103.13c ugrā vaḥ santu bāhavo 'nādhṛṣyā yathāsatha ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2405: RV_10,104.01a asāvi somaḥ puruhūta tubhyaṃ haribhyāṃ yajñam upa yāhi tūyam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2406: RV_10,104.01c tubhyaṃ giro vipravīrā iyānā dadhanvira indra pibā sutasya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2407: RV_10,104.02a apsu dhūtasya harivaḥ pibeha nṛbhiḥ sutasya jaṭharam pṛṇasva |
GV01rv_hn10u:2408: RV_10,104.02c mimikṣur yam adraya indra tubhyaṃ tebhir vardhasva madam ukthavāhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2409: RV_10,104.03a progrām pītiṃ vṛṣṇa iyarmi satyām prayai sutasya haryaśva tubhyam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2410: RV_10,104.03c indra dhenābhir iha mādayasva dhībhir viśvābhiḥ śacyā gṛṇānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2411: RV_10,104.04a ūtī śacīvas tava vīryeṇa vayo dadhānā uśija ṛtajñāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2412: RV_10,104.04c prajāvad indra manuṣo duroṇe tasthur gṛṇantaḥ sadhamādyāsaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2413: RV_10,104.05a praṇītibhiṣ ṭe haryaśva suṣṭoḥ suṣumnasya pururuco janāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2414: RV_10,104.05c maṃhiṣṭhām ūtiṃ vitire dadhānā stotāra indra tava sūnṛtābhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2415: RV_10,104.06a upa brahmāṇi harivo haribhyāṃ somasya yāhi pītaye sutasya |
GV01rv_hn10u:2416: RV_10,104.06c indra tvā yajñaḥ kṣamamāṇam ānaḍ dāśvāṃ asy adhvarasya praketaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2417: RV_10,104.07a sahasravājam abhimātiṣāhaṃ suteraṇam maghavānaṃ suvṛktim |
GV01rv_hn10u:2418: RV_10,104.07c upa bhūṣanti giro apratītam indraṃ namasyā jarituḥ pananta ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2419: RV_10,104.08a saptāpo devīḥ suraṇā amṛktā yābhiḥ sindhum atara indra pūrbhit |
GV01rv_hn10u:2420: RV_10,104.08c navatiṃ srotyā nava ca sravantīr devebhyo gātum manuṣe ca vindaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2421: RV_10,104.09a apo mahīr abhiśaster amuñco 'jāgar āsv adhi deva ekaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2422: RV_10,104.09c indra yās tvaṃ vṛtratūrye cakartha tābhir viśvāyus tanvam pupuṣyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2423: RV_10,104.10a vīreṇyaḥ kratur indraḥ suśastir utāpi dhenā puruhūtam īṭṭe |
GV01rv_hn10u:2424: RV_10,104.10c ārdayad vṛtram akṛṇod u lokaṃ sasāhe śakraḥ pṛtanā abhiṣṭiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2425: RV_10,104.11a śunaṃ huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamaṃ vājasātau |
GV01rv_hn10u:2426: RV_10,104.11c śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi saṃjitaṃ dhanānām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2427: RV_10,105.01a kadā vaso stotraṃ haryata āva śmaśā rudhad vāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2429: RV_10,105.02a harī yasya suyujā vivratā ver arvantānu śepā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2430: RV_10,105.02c ubhā rajī na keśinā patir dan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2431: RV_10,105.03a apa yor indraḥ pāpaja ā marto na śaśramāṇo bibhīvān |
GV01rv_hn10u:2433: RV_10,105.04a sacāyor indraś carkṛṣa āṃ upānasaḥ saparyan |
GV01rv_hn10u:2435: RV_10,105.05a adhi yas tasthau keśavantā vyacasvantā na puṣṭyai |
GV01rv_hn10u:2437: RV_10,105.06a prāstaud ṛṣvaujā ṛṣvebhis tatakṣa śūraḥ śavasā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2439: RV_10,105.07a vajraṃ yaś cakre suhanāya dasyave hirīmaśo hirīmān |
GV01rv_hn10u:2441: RV_10,105.08a ava no vṛjinā śiśīhy ṛcā vanemānṛcaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2442: RV_10,105.08c nābrahmā yajña ṛdhag joṣati tve ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2443: RV_10,105.09a ūrdhvā yat te tretinī bhūd yajñasya dhūrṣu sadman |
GV01rv_hn10u:2445: RV_10,105.10a śriye te pṛśnir upasecanī bhūc chriye darvir arepāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2446: RV_10,105.10c yayā sve pātre siñcasa ut ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2447: RV_10,105.11a śataṃ vā yad asurya prati tvā sumitra itthāstaud durmitra itthāstaut |
GV01rv_hn10u:2448: RV_10,105.11c āvo yad dasyuhatye kutsaputram prāvo yad dasyuhatye kutsavatsam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2449: RV_10,106.01a ubhā u nūnaṃ tad id arthayethe vi tanvāthe dhiyo vastrāpaseva |
GV01rv_hn10u:2450: RV_10,106.01c sadhrīcīnā yātave prem ajīgaḥ sudineva pṛkṣa ā taṃsayethe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2451: RV_10,106.02a uṣṭāreva pharvareṣu śrayethe prāyogeva śvātryā śāsur ethaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2452: RV_10,106.02c dūteva hi ṣṭho yaśasā janeṣu māpa sthātam mahiṣevāvapānāt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2453: RV_10,106.03a sākaṃyujā śakunasyeva pakṣā paśveva citrā yajur ā gamiṣṭam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2454: RV_10,106.03c agnir iva devayor dīdivāṃsā parijmāneva yajathaḥ purutrā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2455: RV_10,106.04a āpī vo asme pitareva putrogreva rucā nṛpatīva turyai |
GV01rv_hn10u:2456: RV_10,106.04c iryeva puṣṭyai kiraṇeva bhujyai śruṣṭīvāneva havam ā gamiṣṭam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2457: RV_10,106.05a vaṃsageva pūṣaryā śimbātā mitreva ṛtā śatarā śātapantā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2458: RV_10,106.05c vājevoccā vayasā gharmyeṣṭhā meṣeveṣā saparyā purīṣā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2459: RV_10,106.06a sṛṇyeva jarbharī turpharītū naitośeva turpharī parpharīkā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2460: RV_10,106.06c udanyajeva jemanā maderū tā me jarāyv ajaram marāyu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2461: RV_10,106.07a pajreva carcaraṃ jāram marāyu kṣadmevārtheṣu tartarītha ugrā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2462: RV_10,106.07c ṛbhū nāpat kharamajrā kharajrur vāyur na parpharat kṣayad rayīṇām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2463: RV_10,106.08a gharmeva madhu jaṭhare sanerū bhagevitā turpharī phārivāram |
GV01rv_hn10u:2464: RV_10,106.08c patareva cacarā candranirṇiṅ manaṛṅgā mananyā na jagmī ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2465: RV_10,106.09a bṛhanteva gambhareṣu pratiṣṭhām pādeva gādhaṃ tarate vidāthaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2466: RV_10,106.09c karṇeva śāsur anu hi smarātho 'ṃśeva no bhajataṃ citram apnaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2467: RV_10,106.10a āraṅgareva madhv erayethe sāragheva gavi nīcīnabāre |
GV01rv_hn10u:2468: RV_10,106.10c kīnāreva svedam āsiṣvidānā kṣāmevorjā sūyavasāt sacethe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2469: RV_10,106.11a ṛdhyāma stomaṃ sanuyāma vājam ā no mantraṃ sarathehopa yātam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2470: RV_10,106.11c yaśo na pakvam madhu goṣv antar ā bhūtāṃśo aśvinoḥ kāmam aprāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2471: RV_10,107.01a āvir abhūn mahi māghonam eṣāṃ viśvaṃ jīvaṃ tamaso nir amoci |
GV01rv_hn10u:2472: RV_10,107.01c mahi jyotiḥ pitṛbhir dattam āgād uruḥ panthā dakṣiṇāyā adarśi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2473: RV_10,107.02a uccā divi dakṣiṇāvanto asthur ye aśvadāḥ saha te sūryeṇa |
GV01rv_hn10u:2474: RV_10,107.02c hiraṇyadā amṛtatvam bhajante vāsodāḥ soma pra tiranta āyuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2475: RV_10,107.03a daivī pūrtir dakṣiṇā devayajyā na kavāribhyo nahi te pṛṇanti |
GV01rv_hn10u:2476: RV_10,107.03c athā naraḥ prayatadakṣiṇāso 'vadyabhiyā bahavaḥ pṛṇanti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2477: RV_10,107.04a śatadhāraṃ vāyum arkaṃ svarvidaṃ nṛcakṣasas te abhi cakṣate haviḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2478: RV_10,107.04c ye pṛṇanti pra ca yacchanti saṃgame te dakṣiṇāṃ duhate saptamātaram ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2479: RV_10,107.05a dakṣiṇāvān prathamo hūta eti dakṣiṇāvān grāmaṇīr agram eti |
GV01rv_hn10u:2480: RV_10,107.05c tam eva manye nṛpatiṃ janānāṃ yaḥ prathamo dakṣiṇām āvivāya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2481: RV_10,107.06a tam eva ṛṣiṃ tam u brahmāṇam āhur yajñanyaṃ sāmagām ukthaśāsam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2482: RV_10,107.06c sa śukrasya tanvo veda tisro yaḥ prathamo dakṣiṇayā rarādha ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2483: RV_10,107.07a dakṣiṇāśvaṃ dakṣiṇā gāṃ dadāti dakṣiṇā candram uta yad dhiraṇyam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2484: RV_10,107.07c dakṣiṇānnaṃ vanute yo na ātmā dakṣiṇāṃ varma kṛṇute vijānan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2485: RV_10,107.08a na bhojā mamrur na nyartham īyur na riṣyanti na vyathante ha bhojāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2486: RV_10,107.08c idaṃ yad viśvam bhuvanaṃ svaś caitat sarvaṃ dakṣiṇaibhyo dadāti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2487: RV_10,107.09a bhojā jigyuḥ surabhiṃ yonim agre bhojā jigyur vadhvaṃ yā suvāsāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2488: RV_10,107.09c bhojā jigyur antaḥpeyaṃ surāyā bhojā jigyur ye ahūtāḥ prayanti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2489: RV_10,107.10a bhojāyāśvaṃ sam mṛjanty āśum bhojāyāste kanyā śumbhamānā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2490: RV_10,107.10c bhojasyedam puṣkariṇīva veśma pariṣkṛtaṃ devamāneva citram ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2491: RV_10,107.11a bhojam aśvāḥ suṣṭhuvāho vahanti suvṛd ratho vartate dakṣiṇāyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2492: RV_10,107.11c bhojaṃ devāso 'vatā bhareṣu bhojaḥ śatrūn samanīkeṣu jetā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2493: RV_10,108.01a kim icchantī saramā predam ānaḍ dūre hy adhvā jaguriḥ parācaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2494: RV_10,108.01c kāsmehitiḥ kā paritakmyāsīt kathaṃ rasāyā ataraḥ payāṃsi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2495: RV_10,108.02a indrasya dūtīr iṣitā carāmi maha icchantī paṇayo nidhīn vaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2496: RV_10,108.02c atiṣkado bhiyasā tan na āvat tathā rasāyā ataram payāṃsi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2497: RV_10,108.03a kīdṛṅṅ indraḥ sarame kā dṛśīkā yasyedaṃ dūtīr asaraḥ parākāt |
GV01rv_hn10u:2498: RV_10,108.03c ā ca gacchān mitram enā dadhāmāthā gavāṃ gopatir no bhavāti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2499: RV_10,108.04a nāhaṃ taṃ veda dabhyaṃ dabhat sa yasyedaṃ dūtīr asaram parākāt |
GV01rv_hn10u:2500: RV_10,108.04c na taṃ gūhanti sravato gabhīrā hatā indreṇa paṇayaḥ śayadhve ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2501: RV_10,108.05a imā gāvaḥ sarame yā aicchaḥ pari divo antān subhage patantī |
GV01rv_hn10u:2502: RV_10,108.05c kas ta enā ava sṛjād ayudhvy utāsmākam āyudhā santi tigmā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2503: RV_10,108.06a asenyā vaḥ paṇayo vacāṃsy aniṣavyās tanvaḥ santu pāpīḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2504: RV_10,108.06c adhṛṣṭo va etavā astu panthā bṛhaspatir va ubhayā na mṛḷāt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2505: RV_10,108.07a ayaṃ nidhiḥ sarame adribudhno gobhir aśvebhir vasubhir nyṛṣṭaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2506: RV_10,108.07c rakṣanti tam paṇayo ye sugopā reku padam alakam ā jagantha ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2507: RV_10,108.08a eha gamann ṛṣayaḥ somaśitā ayāsyo aṅgiraso navagvāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2508: RV_10,108.08c ta etam ūrvaṃ vi bhajanta gonām athaitad vacaḥ paṇayo vamann it ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2509: RV_10,108.09a evā ca tvaṃ sarama ājagantha prabādhitā sahasā daivyena |
GV01rv_hn10u:2510: RV_10,108.09c svasāraṃ tvā kṛṇavai mā punar gā apa te gavāṃ subhage bhajāma ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2511: RV_10,108.10a nāhaṃ veda bhrātṛtvaṃ no svasṛtvam indro vidur aṅgirasaś ca ghorāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2512: RV_10,108.10c gokāmā me acchadayan yad āyam apāta ita paṇayo varīyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2513: RV_10,108.11a dūram ita paṇayo varīya ud gāvo yantu minatīr ṛtena |
GV01rv_hn10u:2514: RV_10,108.11c bṛhaspatir yā avindan nigūḷhāḥ somo grāvāṇa ṛṣayaś ca viprāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2515: RV_10,109.01a te 'vadan prathamā brahmakilbiṣe 'kūpāraḥ salilo mātariśvā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2516: RV_10,109.01c vīḷuharās tapa ugro mayobhūr āpo devīḥ prathamajā ṛtena ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2517: RV_10,109.02a somo rājā prathamo brahmajāyām punaḥ prāyacchad ahṛṇīyamānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2518: RV_10,109.02c anvartitā varuṇo mitra āsīd agnir hotā hastagṛhyā nināya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2519: RV_10,109.03a hastenaiva grāhya ādhir asyā brahmajāyeyam iti ced avocan |
GV01rv_hn10u:2520: RV_10,109.03c na dūtāya prahye tastha eṣā tathā rāṣṭraṃ gupitaṃ kṣatriyasya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2521: RV_10,109.04a devā etasyām avadanta pūrve saptaṛṣayas tapase ye niṣeduḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2522: RV_10,109.04c bhīmā jāyā brāhmaṇasyopanītā durdhāṃ dadhāti parame vyoman ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2523: RV_10,109.05a brahmacārī carati veviṣad viṣaḥ sa devānām bhavaty ekam aṅgam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2524: RV_10,109.05c tena jāyām anv avindad bṛhaspatiḥ somena nītāṃ juhvaṃ na devāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2525: RV_10,109.06a punar vai devā adaduḥ punar manuṣyā uta |
GV01rv_hn10u:2526: RV_10,109.06c rājānaḥ satyaṃ kṛṇvānā brahmajāyām punar daduḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2527: RV_10,109.07a punardāya brahmajāyāṃ kṛtvī devair nikilbiṣam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2529: RV_10,110.01a samiddho adya manuṣo duroṇe devo devān yajasi jātavedaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2530: RV_10,110.01c ā ca vaha mitramahaś cikitvān tvaṃ dūtaḥ kavir asi pracetāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2531: RV_10,110.02a tanūnapāt patha ṛtasya yānān madhvā samañjan svadayā sujihva |
GV01rv_hn10u:2532: RV_10,110.02c manmāni dhībhir uta yajñam ṛndhan devatrā ca kṛṇuhy adhvaraṃ naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2533: RV_10,110.03a ājuhvāna īḍyo vandyaś cā yāhy agne vasubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2534: RV_10,110.03c tvaṃ devānām asi yahva hotā sa enān yakṣīṣito yajīyān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2535: RV_10,110.04a prācīnam barhiḥ pradiśā pṛthivyā vastor asyā vṛjyate agre ahnām |
GV01rv_hn10u:2536: RV_10,110.04c vy u prathate vitaraṃ varīyo devebhyo aditaye syonam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2537: RV_10,110.05a vyacasvatīr urviyā vi śrayantām patibhyo na janayaḥ śumbhamānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2538: RV_10,110.05c devīr dvāro bṛhatīr viśvaminvā devebhyo bhavata suprāyaṇāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2539: RV_10,110.06a ā suṣvayantī yajate upāke uṣāsānaktā sadatāṃ ni yonau |
GV01rv_hn10u:2540: RV_10,110.06c divye yoṣaṇe bṛhatī surukme adhi śriyaṃ śukrapiśaṃ dadhāne ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2541: RV_10,110.07a daivyā hotārā prathamā suvācā mimānā yajñam manuṣo yajadhyai |
GV01rv_hn10u:2542: RV_10,110.07c pracodayantā vidatheṣu kārū prācīnaṃ jyotiḥ pradiśā diśantā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2543: RV_10,110.08a ā no yajñam bhāratī tūyam etv iḷā manuṣvad iha cetayantī |
GV01rv_hn10u:2544: RV_10,110.08c tisro devīr barhir edaṃ syonaṃ sarasvatī svapasaḥ sadantu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2545: RV_10,110.09a ya ime dyāvāpṛthivī janitrī rūpair apiṃśad bhuvanāni viśvā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2546: RV_10,110.09c tam adya hotar iṣito yajīyān devaṃ tvaṣṭāram iha yakṣi vidvān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2547: RV_10,110.10a upāvasṛja tmanyā samañjan devānām pātha ṛtuthā havīṃṣi |
GV01rv_hn10u:2548: RV_10,110.10c vanaspatiḥ śamitā devo agniḥ svadantu havyam madhunā ghṛtena ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2549: RV_10,110.11a sadyo jāto vy amimīta yajñam agnir devānām abhavat purogāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2550: RV_10,110.11c asya hotuḥ pradiśy ṛtasya vāci svāhākṛtaṃ havir adantu devāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2551: RV_10,111.01a manīṣiṇaḥ pra bharadhvam manīṣāṃ yathā-yathā matayaḥ santi nṛṇām |
GV01rv_hn10u:2552: RV_10,111.01c indraṃ satyair erayāmā kṛtebhiḥ sa hi vīro girvaṇasyur vidānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2553: RV_10,111.02a ṛtasya hi sadaso dhītir adyaut saṃ gārṣṭeyo vṛṣabho gobhir ānaṭ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2554: RV_10,111.02c ud atiṣṭhat taviṣeṇā raveṇa mahānti cit saṃ vivyācā rajāṃsi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2555: RV_10,111.03a indraḥ kila śrutyā asya veda sa hi jiṣṇuḥ pathikṛt sūryāya |
GV01rv_hn10u:2556: RV_10,111.03c ān menāṃ kṛṇvann acyuto bhuvad goḥ patir divaḥ sanajā apratītaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2557: RV_10,111.04a indro mahnā mahato arṇavasya vratāminād aṅgirobhir gṛṇānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2558: RV_10,111.04c purūṇi cin ni tatānā rajāṃsi dādhāra yo dharuṇaṃ satyatātā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2559: RV_10,111.05a indro divaḥ pratimānam pṛthivyā viśvā veda savanā hanti śuṣṇam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2560: RV_10,111.05c mahīṃ cid dyām ātanot sūryeṇa cāskambha cit kambhanena skabhīyān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2561: RV_10,111.06a vajreṇa hi vṛtrahā vṛtram astar adevasya śūśuvānasya māyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2562: RV_10,111.06c vi dhṛṣṇo atra dhṛṣatā jaghanthāthābhavo maghavan bāhvojāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2563: RV_10,111.07a sacanta yad uṣasaḥ sūryeṇa citrām asya ketavo rām avindan |
GV01rv_hn10u:2564: RV_10,111.07c ā yan nakṣatraṃ dadṛśe divo na punar yato nakir addhā nu veda ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2565: RV_10,111.08a dūraṃ kila prathamā jagmur āsām indrasya yāḥ prasave sasrur āpaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2566: RV_10,111.08c kva svid agraṃ kva budhna āsām āpo madhyaṃ kva vo nūnam antaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2567: RV_10,111.09a sṛjaḥ sindhūṃr ahinā jagrasānāṃ ād id etāḥ pra vivijre javena |
GV01rv_hn10u:2568: RV_10,111.09c mumukṣamāṇā uta yā mumucre 'dhed etā na ramante nitiktāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2569: RV_10,111.10a sadhrīcīḥ sindhum uśatīr ivāyan sanāj jāra āritaḥ pūrbhid āsām |
GV01rv_hn10u:2570: RV_10,111.10c astam ā te pārthivā vasūny asme jagmuḥ sūnṛtā indra pūrvīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2571: RV_10,112.01a indra piba pratikāmaṃ sutasya prātaḥsāvas tava hi pūrvapītiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2572: RV_10,112.01c harṣasva hantave śūra śatrūn ukthebhiṣ ṭe vīryā pra bravāma ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2573: RV_10,112.02a yas te ratho manaso javīyān endra tena somapeyāya yāhi |
GV01rv_hn10u:2574: RV_10,112.02c tūyam ā te harayaḥ pra dravantu yebhir yāsi vṛṣabhir mandamānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2575: RV_10,112.03a haritvatā varcasā sūryasya śreṣṭhai rūpais tanvaṃ sparśayasva |
GV01rv_hn10u:2576: RV_10,112.03c asmābhir indra sakhibhir huvānaḥ sadhrīcīno mādayasvā niṣadya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2577: RV_10,112.04a yasya tyat te mahimānam madeṣv ime mahī rodasī nāviviktām |
GV01rv_hn10u:2578: RV_10,112.04c tad oka ā haribhir indra yuktaiḥ priyebhir yāhi priyam annam accha ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2579: RV_10,112.05a yasya śaśvat papivāṃ indra śatrūn anānukṛtyā raṇyā cakartha |
GV01rv_hn10u:2580: RV_10,112.05c sa te purandhiṃ taviṣīm iyarti sa te madāya suta indra somaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2581: RV_10,112.06a idaṃ te pātraṃ sanavittam indra pibā somam enā śatakrato |
GV01rv_hn10u:2582: RV_10,112.06c pūrṇa āhāvo madirasya madhvo yaṃ viśva id abhiharyanti devāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2583: RV_10,112.07a vi hi tvām indra purudhā janāso hitaprayaso vṛṣabha hvayante |
GV01rv_hn10u:2584: RV_10,112.07c asmākaṃ te madhumattamānīmā bhuvan savanā teṣu harya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2585: RV_10,112.08a pra ta indra pūrvyāṇi pra nūnaṃ vīryā vocam prathamā kṛtāni |
GV01rv_hn10u:2586: RV_10,112.08c satīnamanyur aśrathāyo adriṃ suvedanām akṛṇor brahmaṇe gām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2587: RV_10,112.09a ni ṣu sīda gaṇapate gaṇeṣu tvām āhur vipratamaṃ kavīnām |
GV01rv_hn10u:2588: RV_10,112.09c na ṛte tvat kriyate kiṃ canāre mahām arkam maghavañ citram arca ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2589: RV_10,112.10a abhikhyā no maghavan nādhamānān sakhe bodhi vasupate sakhīnām |
GV01rv_hn10u:2590: RV_10,112.10c raṇaṃ kṛdhi raṇakṛt satyaśuṣmābhakte cid ā bhajā rāye asmān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2591: RV_10,113.01a tam asya dyāvāpṛthivī sacetasā viśvebhir devair anu śuṣmam āvatām |
GV01rv_hn10u:2592: RV_10,113.01c yad ait kṛṇvāno mahimānam indriyam pītvī somasya kratumāṃ avardhata ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2593: RV_10,113.02a tam asya viṣṇur mahimānam ojasāṃśuṃ dadhanvān madhuno vi rapśate |
GV01rv_hn10u:2594: RV_10,113.02c devebhir indro maghavā sayāvabhir vṛtraṃ jaghanvāṃ abhavad vareṇyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2595: RV_10,113.03a vṛtreṇa yad ahinā bibhrad āyudhā samasthithā yudhaye śaṃsam āvide |
GV01rv_hn10u:2596: RV_10,113.03c viśve te atra marutaḥ saha tmanāvardhann ugra mahimānam indriyam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2597: RV_10,113.04a jajñāna eva vy abādhata spṛdhaḥ prāpaśyad vīro abhi pauṃsyaṃ raṇam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2598: RV_10,113.04c avṛścad adrim ava sasyadaḥ sṛjad astabhnān nākaṃ svapasyayā pṛthum ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2599: RV_10,113.05a ād indraḥ satrā taviṣīr apatyata varīyo dyāvāpṛthivī abādhata |
GV01rv_hn10u:2600: RV_10,113.05c avābharad dhṛṣito vajram āyasaṃ śevam mitrāya varuṇāya dāśuṣe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2601: RV_10,113.06a indrasyātra taviṣībhyo virapśina ṛghāyato araṃhayanta manyave |
GV01rv_hn10u:2602: RV_10,113.06c vṛtraṃ yad ugro vy avṛścad ojasāpo bibhrataṃ tamasā parīvṛtam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2603: RV_10,113.07a yā vīryāṇi prathamāni kartvā mahitvebhir yatamānau samīyatuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2604: RV_10,113.07c dhvāntaṃ tamo 'va dadhvase hata indro mahnā pūrvahūtāv apatyata ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2605: RV_10,113.08a viśve devāso adha vṛṣṇyāni te 'vardhayan somavatyā vacasyayā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2606: RV_10,113.08c raddhaṃ vṛtram ahim indrasya hanmanāgnir na jambhais tṛṣv annam āvayat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2607: RV_10,113.09a bhūri dakṣebhir vacanebhir ṛkvabhiḥ sakhyebhiḥ sakhyāni pra vocata |
GV01rv_hn10u:2608: RV_10,113.09c indro dhuniṃ ca cumuriṃ ca dambhayañ chraddhāmanasyā śṛṇute dabhītaye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2609: RV_10,113.10a tvam purūṇy ā bharā svaśvyā yebhir maṃsai nivacanāni śaṃsan |
GV01rv_hn10u:2610: RV_10,113.10c sugebhir viśvā duritā tarema vido ṣu ṇa urviyā gādham adya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2611: RV_10,114.01a gharmā samantā trivṛtaṃ vy āpatus tayor juṣṭim mātariśvā jagāma |
GV01rv_hn10u:2612: RV_10,114.01c divas payo didhiṣāṇā aveṣan vidur devāḥ sahasāmānam arkam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2613: RV_10,114.02a tisro deṣṭrāya nirṛtīr upāsate dīrghaśruto vi hi jānanti vahnayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2614: RV_10,114.02c tāsāṃ ni cikyuḥ kavayo nidānam pareṣu yā guhyeṣu vrateṣu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2615: RV_10,114.03a catuṣkapardā yuvatiḥ supeśā ghṛtapratīkā vayunāni vaste |
GV01rv_hn10u:2616: RV_10,114.03c tasyāṃ suparṇā vṛṣaṇā ni ṣedatur yatra devā dadhire bhāgadheyam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2617: RV_10,114.04a ekaḥ suparṇaḥ sa samudram ā viveśa sa idaṃ viśvam bhuvanaṃ vi caṣṭe |
GV01rv_hn10u:2618: RV_10,114.04c tam pākena manasāpaśyam antitas tam mātā reḷhi sa u reḷhi mātaram ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2619: RV_10,114.05a suparṇaṃ viprāḥ kavayo vacobhir ekaṃ santam bahudhā kalpayanti |
GV01rv_hn10u:2620: RV_10,114.05c chandāṃsi ca dadhato adhvareṣu grahān somasya mimate dvādaśa ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2621: RV_10,114.06a ṣaṭtriṃśāṃś ca caturaḥ kalpayantaś chandāṃsi ca dadhata ādvādaśam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2622: RV_10,114.06c yajñaṃ vimāya kavayo manīṣa ṛksāmābhyām pra rathaṃ vartayanti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2623: RV_10,114.07a caturdaśānye mahimāno asya taṃ dhīrā vācā pra ṇayanti sapta |
GV01rv_hn10u:2624: RV_10,114.07c āpnānaṃ tīrthaṃ ka iha pra vocad yena pathā prapibante sutasya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2625: RV_10,114.08a sahasradhā pañcadaśāny ukthā yāvad dyāvāpṛthivī tāvad it tat |
