GV01rv_hn10u:2626: RV_10,114.08c sahasradhā mahimānaḥ sahasraṃ yāvad brahma viṣṭhitaṃ tāvatī vāk ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2627: RV_10,114.09a kaś chandasāṃ yogam ā veda dhīraḥ ko dhiṣṇyām prati vācam papāda |
GV01rv_hn10u:2628: RV_10,114.09c kam ṛtvijām aṣṭamaṃ śūram āhur harī indrasya ni cikāya kaḥ svit ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2629: RV_10,114.10a bhūmyā antam pary eke caranti rathasya dhūrṣu yuktāso asthuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2630: RV_10,114.10c śramasya dāyaṃ vi bhajanty ebhyo yadā yamo bhavati harmye hitaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2631: RV_10,115.01a citra ic chiśos taruṇasya vakṣatho na yo mātarāv apyeti dhātave |
GV01rv_hn10u:2632: RV_10,115.01c anūdhā yadi jījanad adhā ca nu vavakṣa sadyo mahi dūtyaṃ caran ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2633: RV_10,115.02a agnir ha nāma dhāyi dann apastamaḥ saṃ yo vanā yuvate bhasmanā datā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2634: RV_10,115.02c abhipramurā juhvā svadhvara ino na prothamāno yavase vṛṣā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2635: RV_10,115.03a taṃ vo viṃ na druṣadaṃ devam andhasa indum prothantam pravapantam arṇavam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2636: RV_10,115.03c āsā vahniṃ na śociṣā virapśinam mahivrataṃ na sarajantam adhvanaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2637: RV_10,115.04a vi yasya te jrayasānasyājara dhakṣor na vātāḥ pari santy acyutāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2638: RV_10,115.04c ā raṇvāso yuyudhayo na satvanaṃ tritaṃ naśanta pra śiṣanta iṣṭaye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2639: RV_10,115.05a sa id agniḥ kaṇvatamaḥ kaṇvasakhāryaḥ parasyāntarasya taruṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2640: RV_10,115.05c agniḥ pātu gṛṇato agniḥ sūrīn agnir dadātu teṣām avo naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2641: RV_10,115.06a vājintamāya sahyase supitrya tṛṣu cyavāno anu jātavedase |
GV01rv_hn10u:2642: RV_10,115.06c anudre cid yo dhṛṣatā varaṃ sate mahintamāya dhanvaned aviṣyate ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2643: RV_10,115.07a evāgnir martaiḥ saha sūribhir vasu ṣṭave sahasaḥ sūnaro nṛbhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2644: RV_10,115.07c mitrāso na ye sudhitā ṛtāyavo dyāvo na dyumnair abhi santi mānuṣān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2645: RV_10,115.08a ūrjo napāt sahasāvann iti tvopastutasya vandate vṛṣā vāk |
GV01rv_hn10u:2646: RV_10,115.08c tvāṃ stoṣāma tvayā suvīrā drāghīya āyuḥ prataraṃ dadhānāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2647: RV_10,115.09a iti tvāgne vṛṣṭihavyasya putrā upastutāsa ṛṣayo 'vocan |
GV01rv_hn10u:2649: 115.09c tāṃś ca pāhi gṛṇataś ca sūrīn vaṣaḍ vaṣaḷ ity ūrdhvāso anakṣan namo nama ity ūrdhvāso anakṣan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2650: RV_10,116.01a pibā somam mahata indriyāya pibā vṛtrāya hantave śaviṣṭha |
GV01rv_hn10u:2651: RV_10,116.01c piba rāye śavase hūyamānaḥ piba madhvas tṛpad indrā vṛṣasva ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2652: RV_10,116.02a asya piba kṣumataḥ prasthitasyendra somasya varam ā sutasya |
GV01rv_hn10u:2653: RV_10,116.02c svastidā manasā mādayasvārvācīno revate saubhagāya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2654: RV_10,116.03a mamattu tvā divyaḥ soma indra mamattu yaḥ sūyate pārthiveṣu |
GV01rv_hn10u:2655: RV_10,116.03c mamattu yena varivaś cakartha mamattu yena niriṇāsi śatrūn ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2656: RV_10,116.04a ā dvibarhā amino yātv indro vṛṣā haribhyām pariṣiktam andhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2657: RV_10,116.04c gavy ā sutasya prabhṛtasya madhvaḥ satrā khedām aruśahā vṛṣasva ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2658: RV_10,116.05a ni tigmāni bhrāśayan bhrāśyāny ava sthirā tanuhi yātujūnām |
GV01rv_hn10u:2659: RV_10,116.05c ugrāya te saho balaṃ dadāmi pratītyā śatrūn vigadeṣu vṛśca ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2660: RV_10,116.06a vy arya indra tanuhi śravāṃsy oja sthireva dhanvano 'bhimātīḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2661: RV_10,116.06c asmadryag vāvṛdhānaḥ sahobhir anibhṛṣṭas tanvaṃ vāvṛdhasva ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2662: RV_10,116.07a idaṃ havir maghavan tubhyaṃ rātam prati samrāḷ ahṛṇāno gṛbhāya |
GV01rv_hn10u:2663: RV_10,116.07c tubhyaṃ suto maghavan tubhyam pakvo 'ddhīndra piba ca prasthitasya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2664: RV_10,116.08a addhīd indra prasthitemā havīṃṣi cano dadhiṣva pacatota somam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2665: RV_10,116.08c prayasvantaḥ prati haryāmasi tvā satyāḥ santu yajamānasya kāmāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2666: RV_10,116.09a prendrāgnibhyāṃ suvacasyām iyarmi sindhāv iva prerayaṃ nāvam arkaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2667: RV_10,116.09c ayā iva pari caranti devā ye asmabhyaṃ dhanadā udbhidaś ca ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2668: RV_10,117.01a na vā u devāḥ kṣudham id vadhaṃ dadur utāśitam upa gacchanti mṛtyavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2669: RV_10,117.01c uto rayiḥ pṛṇato nopa dasyaty utāpṛṇan marḍitāraṃ na vindate ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2670: RV_10,117.02a ya ādhrāya cakamānāya pitvo 'nnavān san raphitāyopajagmuṣe |
GV01rv_hn10u:2671: RV_10,117.02c sthiram manaḥ kṛṇute sevate puroto cit sa marḍitāraṃ na vindate ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2672: RV_10,117.03a sa id bhojo yo gṛhave dadāty annakāmāya carate kṛśāya |
GV01rv_hn10u:2673: RV_10,117.03c aram asmai bhavati yāmahūtā utāparīṣu kṛṇute sakhāyam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2674: RV_10,117.04a na sa sakhā yo na dadāti sakhye sacābhuve sacamānāya pitvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2675: RV_10,117.04c apāsmāt preyān na tad oko asti pṛṇantam anyam araṇaṃ cid icchet ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2676: RV_10,117.05a pṛṇīyād in nādhamānāya tavyān drāghīyāṃsam anu paśyeta panthām |
GV01rv_hn10u:2677: RV_10,117.05c o hi vartante rathyeva cakrānyam-anyam upa tiṣṭhanta rāyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2678: RV_10,117.06a mogham annaṃ vindate apracetāḥ satyam bravīmi vadha it sa tasya |
GV01rv_hn10u:2679: RV_10,117.06c nāryamaṇam puṣyati no sakhāyaṃ kevalāgho bhavati kevalādī ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2680: RV_10,117.07a kṛṣann it phāla āśitaṃ kṛṇoti yann adhvānam apa vṛṅkte caritraiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2681: RV_10,117.07c vadan brahmāvadato vanīyān pṛṇann āpir apṛṇantam abhi ṣyāt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2682: RV_10,117.08a ekapād bhūyo dvipado vi cakrame dvipāt tripādam abhy eti paścāt |
GV01rv_hn10u:2683: RV_10,117.08c catuṣpād eti dvipadām abhisvare sampaśyan paṅktīr upatiṣṭhamānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2684: RV_10,117.09a samau cid dhastau na samaṃ viviṣṭaḥ sammātarā cin na samaṃ duhāte |
GV01rv_hn10u:2685: RV_10,117.09c yamayoś cin na samā vīryāṇi jñātī cit santau na samam pṛṇītaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2686: RV_10,118.01a agne haṃsi ny atriṇaṃ dīdyan martyeṣv ā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2688: RV_10,118.02a ut tiṣṭhasi svāhuto ghṛtāni prati modase |
GV01rv_hn10u:2690: RV_10,118.03a sa āhuto vi rocate 'gnir īḷenyo girā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2692: RV_10,118.04a ghṛtenāgniḥ sam ajyate madhupratīka āhutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2694: RV_10,118.05a jaramāṇaḥ sam idhyase devebhyo havyavāhana |
GV01rv_hn10u:2696: RV_10,118.06a tam martā amartyaṃ ghṛtenāgniṃ saparyata |
GV01rv_hn10u:2698: RV_10,118.07a adābhyena śociṣāgne rakṣas tvaṃ daha |
GV01rv_hn10u:2700: RV_10,118.08a sa tvam agne pratīkena praty oṣa yātudhānyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2702: RV_10,118.09a taṃ tvā gīrbhir urukṣayā havyavāhaṃ sam īdhire |
GV01rv_hn10u:2704: RV_10,119.01a iti vā iti me mano gām aśvaṃ sanuyām iti |
GV01rv_hn10u:2706: RV_10,119.02a pra vātā iva dodhata un mā pītā ayaṃsata |
GV01rv_hn10u:2708: RV_10,119.03a un mā pītā ayaṃsata ratham aśvā ivāśavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2710: RV_10,119.04a upa mā matir asthita vāśrā putram iva priyam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2712: RV_10,119.05a ahaṃ taṣṭeva vandhuram pary acāmi hṛdā matim |
GV01rv_hn10u:2714: RV_10,119.06a nahi me akṣipac canācchāntsuḥ pañca kṛṣṭayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2716: RV_10,119.07a nahi me rodasī ubhe anyam pakṣaṃ cana prati |
GV01rv_hn10u:2718: RV_10,119.08a abhi dyām mahinā bhuvam abhīmām pṛthivīm mahīm |
GV01rv_hn10u:2720: RV_10,119.09a hantāham pṛthivīm imāṃ ni dadhānīha veha vā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2722: RV_10,119.10a oṣam it pṛthivīm ahaṃ jaṅghanānīha veha vā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2724: RV_10,119.11a divi me anyaḥ pakṣo 'dho anyam acīkṛṣam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2728: RV_10,119.13a gṛho yāmy araṅkṛto devebhyo havyavāhanaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2730: RV_10,120.01a tad id āsa bhuvaneṣu jyeṣṭhaṃ yato jajña ugras tveṣanṛmṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2731: RV_10,120.01c sadyo jajñāno ni riṇāti śatrūn anu yaṃ viśve madanty ūmāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2732: RV_10,120.02a vāvṛdhānaḥ śavasā bhūryojāḥ śatrur dāsāya bhiyasaṃ dadhāti |
GV01rv_hn10u:2733: RV_10,120.02c avyanac ca vyanac ca sasni saṃ te navanta prabhṛtā madeṣu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2734: RV_10,120.03a tve kratum api vṛñjanti viśve dvir yad ete trir bhavanty ūmāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2735: RV_10,120.03c svādoḥ svādīyaḥ svādunā sṛjā sam adaḥ su madhu madhunābhi yodhīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2736: RV_10,120.04a iti cid dhi tvā dhanā jayantam made-made anumadanti viprāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2737: RV_10,120.04c ojīyo dhṛṣṇo sthiram ā tanuṣva mā tvā dabhan yātudhānā durevāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2738: RV_10,120.05a tvayā vayaṃ śāśadmahe raṇeṣu prapaśyanto yudhenyāni bhūri |
GV01rv_hn10u:2739: RV_10,120.05c codayāmi ta āyudhā vacobhiḥ saṃ te śiśāmi brahmaṇā vayāṃsi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2740: RV_10,120.06a stuṣeyyam puruvarpasam ṛbhvam inatamam āptyam āptyānām |
GV01rv_hn10u:2741: RV_10,120.06c ā darṣate śavasā sapta dānūn pra sākṣate pratimānāni bhūri ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2742: RV_10,120.07a ni tad dadhiṣe 'varam paraṃ ca yasminn āvithāvasā duroṇe |
GV01rv_hn10u:2743: RV_10,120.07c ā mātarā sthāpayase jigatnū ata inoṣi karvarā purūṇi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2744: RV_10,120.08a imā brahma bṛhaddivo vivaktīndrāya śūṣam agriyaḥ svarṣāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2745: RV_10,120.08c maho gotrasya kṣayati svarājo duraś ca viśvā avṛṇod apa svāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2746: RV_10,120.09a evā mahān bṛhaddivo atharvāvocat svāṃ tanvam indram eva |
GV01rv_hn10u:2747: RV_10,120.09c svasāro mātaribhvarīr ariprā hinvanti ca śavasā vardhayanti ca ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2748: RV_10,121.01a hiraṇyagarbhaḥ sam avartatāgre bhūtasya jātaḥ patir eka āsīt |
GV01rv_hn10u:2749: RV_10,121.01c sa dādhāra pṛthivīṃ dyām utemāṃ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2750: RV_10,121.02a ya ātmadā baladā yasya viśva upāsate praśiṣaṃ yasya devāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2751: RV_10,121.02c yasya chāyāmṛtaṃ yasya mṛtyuḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2752: RV_10,121.03a yaḥ prāṇato nimiṣato mahitvaika id rājā jagato babhūva |
GV01rv_hn10u:2753: RV_10,121.03c ya īśe asya dvipadaś catuṣpadaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2754: RV_10,121.04a yasyeme himavanto mahitvā yasya samudraṃ rasayā sahāhuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2755: RV_10,121.04c yasyemāḥ pradiśo yasya bāhū kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2756: RV_10,121.05a yena dyaur ugrā pṛthivī ca dṛḷhā yena sva stabhitaṃ yena nākaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2757: RV_10,121.05c yo antarikṣe rajaso vimānaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2758: RV_10,121.06a yaṃ krandasī avasā tastabhāne abhy aikṣetām manasā rejamāne |
GV01rv_hn10u:2759: RV_10,121.06c yatrādhi sūra udito vibhāti kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2760: RV_10,121.07a āpo ha yad bṛhatīr viśvam āyan garbhaṃ dadhānā janayantīr agnim |
GV01rv_hn10u:2761: RV_10,121.07c tato devānāṃ sam avartatāsur ekaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2762: RV_10,121.08a yaś cid āpo mahinā paryapaśyad dakṣaṃ dadhānā janayantīr yajñam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2763: RV_10,121.08c yo deveṣv adhi deva eka āsīt kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2764: RV_10,121.09a mā no hiṃsīj janitā yaḥ pṛthivyā yo vā divaṃ satyadharmā jajāna |
GV01rv_hn10u:2765: RV_10,121.09c yaś cāpaś candrā bṛhatīr jajāna kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2766: RV_10,121.10a prajāpate na tvad etāny anyo viśvā jātāni pari tā babhūva |
GV01rv_hn10u:2767: RV_10,121.10c yatkāmās te juhumas tan no astu vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2768: RV_10,122.01a vasuṃ na citramahasaṃ gṛṇīṣe vāmaṃ śevam atithim adviṣeṇyam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2769: RV_10,122.01c sa rāsate śurudho viśvadhāyaso 'gnir hotā gṛhapatiḥ suvīryam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2770: RV_10,122.02a juṣāṇo agne prati harya me vaco viśvāni vidvān vayunāni sukrato |
GV01rv_hn10u:2771: RV_10,122.02c ghṛtanirṇig brahmaṇe gātum eraya tava devā ajanayann anu vratam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2772: RV_10,122.03a sapta dhāmāni pariyann amartyo dāśad dāśuṣe sukṛte māmahasva |
GV01rv_hn10u:2773: RV_10,122.03c suvīreṇa rayiṇāgne svābhuvā yas ta ānaṭ samidhā taṃ juṣasva ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2774: RV_10,122.04a yajñasya ketum prathamam purohitaṃ haviṣmanta īḷate sapta vājinam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2775: RV_10,122.04c śṛṇvantam agniṃ ghṛtapṛṣṭham ukṣaṇam pṛṇantaṃ devam pṛṇate suvīryam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2776: RV_10,122.05a tvaṃ dūtaḥ prathamo vareṇyaḥ sa hūyamāno amṛtāya matsva |
GV01rv_hn10u:2777: RV_10,122.05c tvām marjayan maruto dāśuṣo gṛhe tvāṃ stomebhir bhṛgavo vi rurucuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2778: RV_10,122.06a iṣaṃ duhan sudughāṃ viśvadhāyasaṃ yajñapriye yajamānāya sukrato |
GV01rv_hn10u:2779: RV_10,122.06c agne ghṛtasnus trir ṛtāni dīdyad vartir yajñam pariyan sukratūyase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2780: RV_10,122.07a tvām id asyā uṣaso vyuṣṭiṣu dūtaṃ kṛṇvānā ayajanta mānuṣāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2781: RV_10,122.07c tvāṃ devā mahayāyyāya vāvṛdhur ājyam agne nimṛjanto adhvare ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2782: RV_10,122.08a ni tvā vasiṣṭhā ahvanta vājinaṃ gṛṇanto agne vidatheṣu vedhasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2783: RV_10,122.08c rāyas poṣaṃ yajamāneṣu dhāraya yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2784: RV_10,123.01a ayaṃ venaś codayat pṛśnigarbhā jyotirjarāyū rajaso vimāne |
GV01rv_hn10u:2785: RV_10,123.01c imam apāṃ saṃgame sūryasya śiśuṃ na viprā matibhī rihanti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2786: RV_10,123.02a samudrād ūrmim ud iyarti veno nabhojāḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ haryatasya darśi |
GV01rv_hn10u:2787: RV_10,123.02c ṛtasya sānāv adhi viṣṭapi bhrāṭ samānaṃ yonim abhy anūṣata vrāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2788: RV_10,123.03a samānam pūrvīr abhi vāvaśānās tiṣṭhan vatsasya mātaraḥ sanīḷāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2789: RV_10,123.03c ṛtasya sānāv adhi cakramāṇā rihanti madhvo amṛtasya vāṇīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2790: RV_10,123.04a jānanto rūpam akṛpanta viprā mṛgasya ghoṣam mahiṣasya hi gman |
GV01rv_hn10u:2791: RV_10,123.04c ṛtena yanto adhi sindhum asthur vidad gandharvo amṛtāni nāma ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2792: RV_10,123.05a apsarā jāram upasiṣmiyāṇā yoṣā bibharti parame vyoman |
GV01rv_hn10u:2793: RV_10,123.05c carat priyasya yoniṣu priyaḥ san sīdat pakṣe hiraṇyaye sa venaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2794: RV_10,123.06a nāke suparṇam upa yat patantaṃ hṛdā venanto abhy acakṣata tvā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2795: RV_10,123.06c hiraṇyapakṣaṃ varuṇasya dūtaṃ yamasya yonau śakunam bhuraṇyum ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2796: RV_10,123.07a ūrdhvo gandharvo adhi nāke asthāt pratyaṅ citrā bibhrad asyāyudhāni |
GV01rv_hn10u:2797: RV_10,123.07c vasāno atkaṃ surabhiṃ dṛśe kaṃ svar ṇa nāma janata priyāṇi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2798: RV_10,123.08a drapsaḥ samudram abhi yaj jigāti paśyan gṛdhrasya cakṣasā vidharman |
GV01rv_hn10u:2799: RV_10,123.08c bhānuḥ śukreṇa śociṣā cakānas tṛtīye cakre rajasi priyāṇi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2800: RV_10,124.01a imaṃ no agna upa yajñam ehi pañcayāmaṃ trivṛtaṃ saptatantum |
GV01rv_hn10u:2801: RV_10,124.01c aso havyavāḷ uta naḥ purogā jyog eva dīrghaṃ tama āśayiṣṭhāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2802: RV_10,124.02a adevād devaḥ pracatā guhā yan prapaśyamāno amṛtatvam emi |
GV01rv_hn10u:2803: RV_10,124.02c śivaṃ yat santam aśivo jahāmi svāt sakhyād araṇīṃ nābhim emi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2804: RV_10,124.03a paśyann anyasyā atithiṃ vayāyā ṛtasya dhāma vi mime purūṇi |
GV01rv_hn10u:2805: RV_10,124.03c śaṃsāmi pitre asurāya śevam ayajñiyād yajñiyam bhāgam emi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2806: RV_10,124.04a bahvīḥ samā akaram antar asminn indraṃ vṛṇānaḥ pitaraṃ jahāmi |
GV01rv_hn10u:2807: RV_10,124.04c agniḥ somo varuṇas te cyavante paryāvard rāṣṭraṃ tad avāmy āyan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2808: RV_10,124.05a nirmāyā u tye asurā abhūvan tvaṃ ca mā varuṇa kāmayāse |
GV01rv_hn10u:2809: RV_10,124.05c ṛtena rājann anṛtaṃ viviñcan mama rāṣṭrasyādhipatyam ehi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2810: RV_10,124.06a idaṃ svar idam id āsa vāmam ayam prakāśa urv antarikṣam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2811: RV_10,124.06c hanāva vṛtraṃ nirehi soma haviṣ ṭvā santaṃ haviṣā yajāma ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2812: RV_10,124.07a kaviḥ kavitvā divi rūpam āsajad aprabhūtī varuṇo nir apaḥ sṛjat |
GV01rv_hn10u:2813: RV_10,124.07c kṣemaṃ kṛṇvānā janayo na sindhavas tā asya varṇaṃ śucayo bharibhrati ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2814: RV_10,124.08a tā asya jyeṣṭham indriyaṃ sacante tā īm ā kṣeti svadhayā madantīḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2815: RV_10,124.08c tā īṃ viśo na rājānaṃ vṛṇānā bībhatsuvo apa vṛtrād atiṣṭhan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2816: RV_10,124.09a bībhatsūnāṃ sayujaṃ haṃsam āhur apāṃ divyānāṃ sakhye carantam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2817: RV_10,124.09c anuṣṭubham anu carcūryamāṇam indraṃ ni cikyuḥ kavayo manīṣā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2818: RV_10,125.01a ahaṃ rudrebhir vasubhiś carāmy aham ādityair uta viśvadevaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2819: RV_10,125.01c aham mitrāvaruṇobhā bibharmy aham indrāgnī aham aśvinobhā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2820: RV_10,125.02a ahaṃ somam āhanasam bibharmy ahaṃ tvaṣṭāram uta pūṣaṇam bhagam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2821: RV_10,125.02c ahaṃ dadhāmi draviṇaṃ haviṣmate suprāvye yajamānāya sunvate ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2822: RV_10,125.03a ahaṃ rāṣṭrī saṃgamanī vasūnāṃ cikituṣī prathamā yajñiyānām |
GV01rv_hn10u:2823: RV_10,125.03c tām mā devā vy adadhuḥ purutrā bhūristhātrām bhūry āveśayantīm ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2824: RV_10,125.04a mayā so annam atti yo vipaśyati yaḥ prāṇiti ya īṃ śṛṇoty uktam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2825: RV_10,125.04c amantavo māṃ ta upa kṣiyanti śrudhi śruta śraddhivaṃ te vadāmi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2826: RV_10,125.05a aham eva svayam idaṃ vadāmi juṣṭaṃ devebhir uta mānuṣebhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2827: RV_10,125.05c yaṃ kāmaye taṃ-tam ugraṃ kṛṇomi tam brahmāṇaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ taṃ sumedhām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2828: RV_10,125.06a ahaṃ rudrāya dhanur ā tanomi brahmadviṣe śarave hantavā u |
GV01rv_hn10u:2829: RV_10,125.06c ahaṃ janāya samadaṃ kṛṇomy ahaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī ā viveśa ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2830: RV_10,125.07a ahaṃ suve pitaram asya mūrdhan mama yonir apsv antaḥ samudre |
GV01rv_hn10u:2831: RV_10,125.07c tato vi tiṣṭhe bhuvanānu viśvotāmūṃ dyāṃ varṣmaṇopa spṛśāmi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2832: RV_10,125.08a aham eva vāta iva pra vāmy ārabhamāṇā bhuvanāni viśvā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2833: RV_10,125.08c paro divā para enā pṛthivyaitāvatī mahinā sam babhūva ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2834: RV_10,126.01a na tam aṃho na duritaṃ devāso aṣṭa martyam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2835: RV_10,126.01c sajoṣaso yam aryamā mitro nayanti varuṇo ati dviṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2836: RV_10,126.02a tad dhi vayaṃ vṛṇīmahe varuṇa mitrāryaman |
GV01rv_hn10u:2837: RV_10,126.02c yenā nir aṃhaso yūyam pātha nethā ca martyam ati dviṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2838: RV_10,126.03a te nūnaṃ no 'yam ūtaye varuṇo mitro aryamā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2839: RV_10,126.03c nayiṣṭhā u no neṣaṇi parṣiṣṭhā u naḥ parṣaṇy ati dviṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2840: RV_10,126.04a yūyaṃ viśvam pari pātha varuṇo mitro aryamā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2841: RV_10,126.04c yuṣmākaṃ śarmaṇi priye syāma supraṇītayo 'ti dviṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2842: RV_10,126.05a ādityāso ati sridho varuṇo mitro aryamā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2843: RV_10,126.05c ugram marudbhī rudraṃ huvemendram agniṃ svastaye 'ti dviṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2844: RV_10,126.06a netāra ū ṣu ṇas tiro varuṇo mitro aryamā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2845: RV_10,126.06c ati viśvāni duritā rājānaś carṣaṇīnām ati dviṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2846: RV_10,126.07a śunam asmabhyam ūtaye varuṇo mitro aryamā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2847: RV_10,126.07c śarma yacchantu sapratha ādityāso yad īmahe ati dviṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2848: RV_10,126.08a yathā ha tyad vasavo gauryaṃ cit padi ṣitām amuñcatā yajatrāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2849: RV_10,126.08c evo ṣv asman muñcatā vy aṃhaḥ pra tāry agne prataraṃ na āyuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2850: RV_10,127.01a rātrī vy akhyad āyatī purutrā devy akṣabhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2852: RV_10,127.02a orv aprā amartyā nivato devy udvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2854: RV_10,127.03a nir u svasāram askṛtoṣasaṃ devy āyatī |
GV01rv_hn10u:2856: RV_10,127.04a sā no adya yasyā vayaṃ ni te yāmann avikṣmahi |
GV01rv_hn10u:2858: RV_10,127.05a ni grāmāso avikṣata ni padvanto ni pakṣiṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2860: RV_10,127.06a yāvayā vṛkyaṃ vṛkaṃ yavaya stenam ūrmye |
GV01rv_hn10u:2862: RV_10,127.07a upa mā pepiśat tamaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ vyaktam asthita |
GV01rv_hn10u:2864: RV_10,127.08a upa te gā ivākaraṃ vṛṇīṣva duhitar divaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2866: RV_10,128.01a mamāgne varco vihaveṣv astu vayaṃ tvendhānās tanvam puṣema |
GV01rv_hn10u:2867: RV_10,128.01c mahyaṃ namantām pradiśaś catasras tvayādhyakṣeṇa pṛtanā jayema ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2868: RV_10,128.02a mama devā vihave santu sarva indravanto maruto viṣṇur agniḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2869: RV_10,128.02c mamāntarikṣam urulokam astu mahyaṃ vātaḥ pavatāṃ kāme asmin ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2870: RV_10,128.03a mayi devā draviṇam ā yajantām mayy āśīr astu mayi devahūtiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2871: RV_10,128.03c daivyā hotāro vanuṣanta pūrve 'riṣṭāḥ syāma tanvā suvīrāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2872: RV_10,128.04a mahyaṃ yajantu mama yāni havyākūtiḥ satyā manaso me astu |
GV01rv_hn10u:2873: RV_10,128.04c eno mā ni gāṃ katamac canāhaṃ viśve devāso adhi vocatā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2874: RV_10,128.05a devīḥ ṣaḷ urvīr uru naḥ kṛṇota viśve devāsa iha vīrayadhvam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2875: RV_10,128.05c mā hāsmahi prajayā mā tanūbhir mā radhāma dviṣate soma rājan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2876: RV_10,128.06a agne manyum pratinudan pareṣām adabdho gopāḥ pari pāhi nas tvam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2877: RV_10,128.06c pratyañco yantu nigutaḥ punas te 'maiṣāṃ cittam prabudhāṃ vi neśat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2878: RV_10,128.07a dhātā dhātṝṇām bhuvanasya yas patir devaṃ trātāram abhimātiṣāham |
GV01rv_hn10u:2879: RV_10,128.07c imaṃ yajñam aśvinobhā bṛhaspatir devāḥ pāntu yajamānaṃ nyarthāt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2880: RV_10,128.08a uruvyacā no mahiṣaḥ śarma yaṃsad asmin have puruhūtaḥ purukṣuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2881: RV_10,128.08c sa naḥ prajāyai haryaśva mṛḷayendra mā no rīriṣo mā parā dāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2882: RV_10,128.09a ye naḥ sapatnā apa te bhavantv indrāgnibhyām ava bādhāmahe tān |
GV01rv_hn10u:2883: RV_10,128.09c vasavo rudrā ādityā uparispṛśam mograṃ cettāram adhirājam akran ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2884: RV_10,129.01a nāsad āsīn no sad āsīt tadānīṃ nāsīd rajo no vyomā paro yat |
GV01rv_hn10u:2885: RV_10,129.01c kim āvarīvaḥ kuha kasya śarmann ambhaḥ kim āsīd gahanaṃ gabhīram ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2886: RV_10,129.02a na mṛtyur āsīd amṛtaṃ na tarhi na rātryā ahna āsīt praketaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2887: RV_10,129.02c ānīd avātaṃ svadhayā tad ekaṃ tasmād dhānyan na paraḥ kiṃ canāsa ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2888: RV_10,129.03a tama āsīt tamasā gūḷham agre 'praketaṃ salilaṃ sarvam ā idam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2889: RV_10,129.03c tucchyenābhv apihitaṃ yad āsīt tapasas tan mahinājāyataikam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2890: RV_10,129.04a kāmas tad agre sam avartatādhi manaso retaḥ prathamaṃ yad āsīt |
GV01rv_hn10u:2891: RV_10,129.04c sato bandhum asati nir avindan hṛdi pratīṣyā kavayo manīṣā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2892: RV_10,129.05a tiraścīno vitato raśmir eṣām adhaḥ svid āsī3d upari svid āsī3t |
GV01rv_hn10u:2893: RV_10,129.05c retodhā āsan mahimāna āsan svadhā avastāt prayatiḥ parastāt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2894: RV_10,129.06a ko addhā veda ka iha pra vocat kuta ājātā kuta iyaṃ visṛṣṭiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2895: RV_10,129.06c arvāg devā asya visarjanenāthā ko veda yata ābabhūva ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2896: RV_10,129.07a iyaṃ visṛṣṭir yata ābabhūva yadi vā dadhe yadi vā na |
GV01rv_hn10u:2897: RV_10,129.07c yo asyādhyakṣaḥ parame vyoman so aṅga veda yadi vā na veda ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2898: RV_10,130.01a yo yajño viśvatas tantubhis tata ekaśataṃ devakarmebhir āyataḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2899: RV_10,130.01c ime vayanti pitaro ya āyayuḥ pra vayāpa vayety āsate tate ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2900: RV_10,130.02a pumāṃ enaṃ tanuta ut kṛṇatti pumān vi tatne adhi nāke asmin |
GV01rv_hn10u:2901: RV_10,130.02c ime mayūkhā upa sedur ū sadaḥ sāmāni cakrus tasarāṇy otave ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2902: RV_10,130.03a kāsīt pramā pratimā kiṃ nidānam ājyaṃ kim āsīt paridhiḥ ka āsīt |
GV01rv_hn10u:2903: RV_10,130.03c chandaḥ kim āsīt praugaṃ kim ukthaṃ yad devā devam ayajanta viśve ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2904: RV_10,130.04a agner gāyatry abhavat sayugvoṣṇihayā savitā sam babhūva |
GV01rv_hn10u:2905: RV_10,130.04c anuṣṭubhā soma ukthair mahasvān bṛhaspater bṛhatī vācam āvat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2906: RV_10,130.05a virāṇ mitrāvaruṇayor abhiśrīr indrasya triṣṭub iha bhāgo ahnaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2907: RV_10,130.05c viśvān devāñ jagaty ā viveśa tena cākḷpra ṛṣayo manuṣyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2908: RV_10,130.06a cākḷpre tena ṛṣayo manuṣyā yajñe jāte pitaro naḥ purāṇe |
GV01rv_hn10u:2909: RV_10,130.06c paśyan manye manasā cakṣasā tān ya imaṃ yajñam ayajanta pūrve ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2910: RV_10,130.07a sahastomāḥ sahachandasa āvṛtaḥ sahapramā ṛṣayaḥ sapta daivyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2911: RV_10,130.07c pūrveṣām panthām anudṛśya dhīrā anvālebhire rathyo na raśmīn ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2912: RV_10,131.01a apa prāca indra viśvāṃ amitrān apāpāco abhibhūte nudasva |
GV01rv_hn10u:2913: RV_10,131.01c apodīco apa śūrādharāca urau yathā tava śarman madema ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2914: RV_10,131.02a kuvid aṅga yavamanto yavaṃ cid yathā dānty anupūrvaṃ viyūya |
GV01rv_hn10u:2915: RV_10,131.02c ihehaiṣāṃ kṛṇuhi bhojanāni ye barhiṣo namovṛktiṃ na jagmuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2916: RV_10,131.03a nahi sthūry ṛtuthā yātam asti nota śravo vivide saṃgameṣu |
GV01rv_hn10u:2917: RV_10,131.03c gavyanta indraṃ sakhyāya viprā aśvāyanto vṛṣaṇaṃ vājayantaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2918: RV_10,131.04a yuvaṃ surāmam aśvinā namucāv āsure sacā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2919: RV_10,131.04c vipipānā śubhas patī indraṃ karmasv āvatam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2920: RV_10,131.05a putram iva pitarāv aśvinobhendrāvathuḥ kāvyair daṃsanābhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2921: RV_10,131.05c yat surāmaṃ vy apibaḥ śacībhiḥ sarasvatī tvā maghavann abhiṣṇak ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2922: RV_10,131.06a indraḥ sutrāmā svavāṃ avobhiḥ sumṛḷīko bhavatu viśvavedāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2923: RV_10,131.06c bādhatāṃ dveṣo abhayaṃ kṛṇotu suvīryasya patayaḥ syāma ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2924: RV_10,131.07a tasya vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyasyāpi bhadre saumanase syāma |
GV01rv_hn10u:2925: RV_10,131.07c sa sutrāmā svavāṃ indro asme ārāc cid dveṣaḥ sanutar yuyotu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2926: RV_10,132.01a ījānam id dyaur gūrtāvasur ījānam bhūmir abhi prabhūṣaṇi |
GV01rv_hn10u:2927: RV_10,132.01c ījānaṃ devāv aśvināv abhi sumnair avardhatām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2928: RV_10,132.02a tā vām mitrāvaruṇā dhārayatkṣitī suṣumneṣitatvatā yajāmasi |
GV01rv_hn10u:2929: RV_10,132.02c yuvoḥ krāṇāya sakhyair abhi ṣyāma rakṣasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2930: RV_10,132.03a adhā cin nu yad didhiṣāmahe vām abhi priyaṃ rekṇaḥ patyamānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2931: RV_10,132.03c dadvāṃ vā yat puṣyati rekṇaḥ sam v āran nakir asya maghāni ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2932: RV_10,132.04a asāv anyo asura sūyata dyaus tvaṃ viśveṣāṃ varuṇāsi rājā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2934: RV_10,132.05a asmin sv etac chakapūta eno hite mitre nigatān hanti vīrān |
GV01rv_hn10u:2935: RV_10,132.05c avor vā yad dhāt tanūṣv avaḥ priyāsu yajñiyāsv arvā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2936: RV_10,132.06a yuvor hi mātāditir vicetasā dyaur na bhūmiḥ payasā pupūtani |
GV01rv_hn10u:2937: RV_10,132.06c ava priyā didiṣṭana sūro ninikta raśmibhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2938: RV_10,132.07a yuvaṃ hy apnarājāv asīdataṃ tiṣṭhad rathaṃ na dhūrṣadaṃ vanarṣadam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2939: RV_10,132.07c tā naḥ kaṇūkayantīr nṛmedhas tatre aṃhasaḥ sumedhas tatre aṃhasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2940: RV_10,133.01a pro ṣv asmai puroratham indrāya śūṣam arcata |
GV01rv_hn10u:2942: 133.01c abhīke cid u lokakṛt saṃge samatsu vṛtrahāsmākam bodhi coditā nabhantām anyakeṣāṃ jyākā adhi dhanvasu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2943: RV_10,133.02a tvaṃ sindhūṃr avāsṛjo 'dharāco ahann ahim |
GV01rv_hn10u:2945: 133.02c aśatrur indra jajñiṣe viśvam puṣyasi vāryaṃ taṃ tvā pari ṣvajāmahe nabhantām anyakeṣāṃ jyākā adhi dhanvasu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2946: RV_10,133.03a vi ṣu viśvā arātayo 'ryo naśanta no dhiyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2948: 133.03c astāsi śatrave vadhaṃ yo na indra jighāṃsati yā te rātir dadir vasu nabhantām anyakeṣāṃ jyākā adhi dhanvasu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2949: RV_10,133.04a yo na indrābhito jano vṛkāyur ādideśati |
GV01rv_hn10u:2950: RV_10,133.04c adhaspadaṃ tam īṃ kṛdhi vibādho asi sāsahir nabhantām anyakeṣāṃ jyākā adhi dhanvasu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2951: RV_10,133.05a yo na indrābhidāsati sanābhir yaś ca niṣṭyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2953: 133.05c ava tasya balaṃ tira mahīva dyaur adha tmanā nabhantām anyakeṣāṃ jyākā adhi dhanvasu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2954: RV_10,133.06a vayam indra tvāyavaḥ sakhitvam ā rabhāmahe |
GV01rv_hn10u:2955: RV_10,133.06c ṛtasya naḥ pathā nayāti viśvāni duritā nabhantām anyakeṣāṃ jyākā adhi dhanvasu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2956: RV_10,133.07a asmabhyaṃ su tvam indra tāṃ śikṣa yā dohate prati varaṃ jaritre |
GV01rv_hn10u:2957: RV_10,133.07c acchidrodhnī pīpayad yathā naḥ sahasradhārā payasā mahī gauḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2958: RV_10,134.01a ubhe yad indra rodasī āpaprāthoṣā iva |
GV01rv_hn10u:2960: 134.01c mahāntaṃ tvā mahīnāṃ samrājaṃ carṣaṇīnāṃ devī janitry ajījanad bhadrā janitry ajījanat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2961: RV_10,134.02a ava sma durhaṇāyato martasya tanuhi sthiram |
GV01rv_hn10u:2963: 134.02c adhaspadaṃ tam īṃ kṛdhi yo asmāṃ ādideśati devī janitry ajījanad bhadrā janitry ajījanat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2964: RV_10,134.03a ava tyā bṛhatīr iṣo viśvaścandrā amitrahan |
GV01rv_hn10u:2966: 134.03c śacībhiḥ śakra dhūnuhīndra viśvābhir ūtibhir devī janitry ajījanad bhadrā janitry ajījanat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2967: RV_10,134.04a ava yat tvaṃ śatakratav indra viśvāni dhūnuṣe |
GV01rv_hn10u:2969: 134.04c rayiṃ na sunvate sacā sahasriṇībhir ūtibhir devī janitry ajījanad bhadrā janitry ajījanat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2970: RV_10,134.05a ava svedā ivābhito viṣvak patantu didyavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2972: 134.05c dūrvāyā iva tantavo vy asmad etu durmatir devī janitry ajījanad bhadrā janitry ajījanat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2973: RV_10,134.06a dīrghaṃ hy aṅkuśaṃ yathā śaktim bibharṣi mantumaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2975: 134.06c pūrveṇa maghavan padājo vayāṃ yathā yamo devī janitry ajījanad bhadrā janitry ajījanat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2976: RV_10,134.07a nakir devā minīmasi nakir ā yopayāmasi mantraśrutyaṃ carāmasi |
GV01rv_hn10u:2977: RV_10,134.07c pakṣebhir apikakṣebhir atrābhi saṃ rabhāmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2978: RV_10,135.01a yasmin vṛkṣe supalāśe devaiḥ sampibate yamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2979: RV_10,135.01c atrā no viśpatiḥ pitā purāṇāṃ anu venati ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2981: RV_10,135.02c asūyann abhy acākaśaṃ tasmā aspṛhayam punaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2982: RV_10,135.03a yaṃ kumāra navaṃ ratham acakram manasākṛṇoḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:2983: RV_10,135.03c ekeṣaṃ viśvataḥ prāñcam apaśyann adhi tiṣṭhasi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2984: RV_10,135.04a yaṃ kumāra prāvartayo rathaṃ viprebhyas pari |
GV01rv_hn10u:2985: RV_10,135.04c taṃ sāmānu prāvartata sam ito nāvy āhitam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2986: RV_10,135.05a kaḥ kumāram ajanayad rathaṃ ko nir avartayat |
GV01rv_hn10u:2987: RV_10,135.05c kaḥ svit tad adya no brūyād anudeyī yathābhavat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2988: RV_10,135.06a yathābhavad anudeyī tato agram ajāyata |
GV01rv_hn10u:2989: RV_10,135.06c purastād budhna ātataḥ paścān nirayaṇaṃ kṛtam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2990: RV_10,135.07a idaṃ yamasya sādanaṃ devamānaṃ yad ucyate |
GV01rv_hn10u:2991: RV_10,135.07c iyam asya dhamyate nāḷīr ayaṃ gīrbhiḥ pariṣkṛtaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2992: RV_10,136.01a keśy agniṃ keśī viṣaṃ keśī bibharti rodasī |
GV01rv_hn10u:2993: RV_10,136.01c keśī viśvaṃ svar dṛśe keśīdaṃ jyotir ucyate ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2994: RV_10,136.02a munayo vātaraśanāḥ piśaṅgā vasate malā |
GV01rv_hn10u:2995: RV_10,136.02c vātasyānu dhrājiṃ yanti yad devāso avikṣata ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2996: RV_10,136.03a unmaditā mauneyena vātāṃ ā tasthimā vayam |
GV01rv_hn10u:2997: RV_10,136.03c śarīred asmākaṃ yūyam martāso abhi paśyatha ||
GV01rv_hn10u:2999: RV_10,136.04c munir devasya-devasya saukṛtyāya sakhā hitaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3000: RV_10,136.05a vātasyāśvo vāyoḥ sakhātho deveṣito muniḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3001: RV_10,136.05c ubhau samudrāv ā kṣeti yaś ca pūrva utāparaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3002: RV_10,136.06a apsarasāṃ gandharvāṇām mṛgāṇāṃ caraṇe caran |
GV01rv_hn10u:3003: RV_10,136.06c keśī ketasya vidvān sakhā svādur madintamaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3004: RV_10,136.07a vāyur asmā upāmanthat pinaṣṭi smā kunannamā |
GV01rv_hn10u:3005: RV_10,136.07c keśī viṣasya pātreṇa yad rudreṇāpibat saha ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3006: RV_10,137.01a uta devā avahitaṃ devā un nayathā punaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3007: RV_10,137.01c utāgaś cakruṣaṃ devā devā jīvayathā punaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3008: RV_10,137.02a dvāv imau vātau vāta ā sindhor ā parāvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3009: RV_10,137.02c dakṣaṃ te anya ā vātu parānyo vātu yad rapaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3010: RV_10,137.03a ā vāta vāhi bheṣajaṃ vi vāta vāhi yad rapaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3011: RV_10,137.03c tvaṃ hi viśvabheṣajo devānāṃ dūta īyase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3012: RV_10,137.04a ā tvāgamaṃ śantātibhir atho ariṣṭatātibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3013: RV_10,137.04c dakṣaṃ te bhadram ābhārṣam parā yakṣmaṃ suvāmi te ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3014: RV_10,137.05a trāyantām iha devās trāyatām marutāṃ gaṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3015: RV_10,137.05c trāyantāṃ viśvā bhūtāni yathāyam arapā asat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3016: RV_10,137.06a āpa id vā u bheṣajīr āpo amīvacātanīḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3017: RV_10,137.06c āpaḥ sarvasya bheṣajīs tās te kṛṇvantu bheṣajam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3018: RV_10,137.07a hastābhyāṃ daśaśākhābhyāṃ jihvā vācaḥ purogavī |
GV01rv_hn10u:3019: RV_10,137.07c anāmayitnubhyāṃ tvā tābhyāṃ tvopa spṛśāmasi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3020: RV_10,138.01a tava tya indra sakhyeṣu vahnaya ṛtam manvānā vy adardirur valam |
GV01rv_hn10u:3021: RV_10,138.01c yatrā daśasyann uṣaso riṇann apaḥ kutsāya manmann ahyaś ca daṃsayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3022: RV_10,138.02a avāsṛjaḥ prasvaḥ śvañcayo girīn ud āja usrā apibo madhu priyam |
GV01rv_hn10u:3023: RV_10,138.02c avardhayo vanino asya daṃsasā śuśoca sūrya ṛtajātayā girā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3024: RV_10,138.03a vi sūryo madhye amucad rathaṃ divo vidad dāsāya pratimānam āryaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3025: RV_10,138.03c dṛḷhāni pipror asurasya māyina indro vy āsyac cakṛvāṃ ṛjiśvanā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3026: RV_10,138.04a anādhṛṣṭāni dhṛṣito vy āsyan nidhīṃr adevāṃ amṛṇad ayāsyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3027: RV_10,138.04c māseva sūryo vasu puryam ā dade gṛṇānaḥ śatrūṃr aśṛṇād virukmatā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3028: RV_10,138.05a ayuddhaseno vibhvā vibhindatā dāśad vṛtrahā tujyāni tejate |
GV01rv_hn10u:3029: RV_10,138.05c indrasya vajrād abibhed abhiśnathaḥ prākrāmac chundhyūr ajahād uṣā anaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3030: RV_10,138.06a etā tyā te śrutyāni kevalā yad eka ekam akṛṇor ayajñam |
GV01rv_hn10u:3031: RV_10,138.06c māsāṃ vidhānam adadhā adhi dyavi tvayā vibhinnam bharati pradhim pitā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3032: RV_10,139.01a sūryaraśmir harikeśaḥ purastāt savitā jyotir ud ayāṃ ajasram |
GV01rv_hn10u:3033: RV_10,139.01c tasya pūṣā prasave yāti vidvān sampaśyan viśvā bhuvanāni gopāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3034: RV_10,139.02a nṛcakṣā eṣa divo madhya āsta āpaprivān rodasī antarikṣam |
GV01rv_hn10u:3035: RV_10,139.02c sa viśvācīr abhi caṣṭe ghṛtācīr antarā pūrvam aparaṃ ca ketum ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3036: RV_10,139.03a rāyo budhnaḥ saṃgamano vasūnāṃ viśvā rūpābhi caṣṭe śacībhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3037: RV_10,139.03c deva iva savitā satyadharmendro na tasthau samare dhanānām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3038: RV_10,139.04a viśvāvasuṃ soma gandharvam āpo dadṛśuṣīs tad ṛtenā vy āyan |
GV01rv_hn10u:3039: RV_10,139.04c tad anvavaid indro rārahāṇa āsām pari sūryasya paridhīṃr apaśyat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3040: RV_10,139.05a viśvāvasur abhi tan no gṛṇātu divyo gandharvo rajaso vimānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3041: RV_10,139.05c yad vā ghā satyam uta yan na vidma dhiyo hinvāno dhiya in no avyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3042: RV_10,139.06a sasnim avindac caraṇe nadīnām apāvṛṇod duro aśmavrajānām |
GV01rv_hn10u:3043: RV_10,139.06c prāsāṃ gandharvo amṛtāni vocad indro dakṣam pari jānād ahīnām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3044: RV_10,140.01a agne tava śravo vayo mahi bhrājante arcayo vibhāvaso |
GV01rv_hn10u:3045: RV_10,140.01c bṛhadbhāno śavasā vājam ukthyaṃ dadhāsi dāśuṣe kave ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3046: RV_10,140.02a pāvakavarcāḥ śukravarcā anūnavarcā ud iyarṣi bhānunā |
GV01rv_hn10u:3047: RV_10,140.02c putro mātarā vicarann upāvasi pṛṇakṣi rodasī ubhe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3048: RV_10,140.03a ūrjo napāj jātavedaḥ suśastibhir mandasva dhītibhir hitaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3049: RV_10,140.03c tve iṣaḥ saṃ dadhur bhūrivarpasaś citrotayo vāmajātāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3050: RV_10,140.04a irajyann agne prathayasva jantubhir asme rāyo amartya |
GV01rv_hn10u:3051: RV_10,140.04c sa darśatasya vapuṣo vi rājasi pṛṇakṣi sānasiṃ kratum ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3052: RV_10,140.05a iṣkartāram adhvarasya pracetasaṃ kṣayantaṃ rādhaso mahaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3053: RV_10,140.05c rātiṃ vāmasya subhagām mahīm iṣaṃ dadhāsi sānasiṃ rayim ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3054: RV_10,140.06a ṛtāvānam mahiṣaṃ viśvadarśatam agniṃ sumnāya dadhire puro janāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3055: RV_10,140.06c śrutkarṇaṃ saprathastamaṃ tvā girā daivyam mānuṣā yugā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3056: RV_10,141.01a agne acchā vadeha naḥ pratyaṅ naḥ sumanā bhava |
GV01rv_hn10u:3057: RV_10,141.01c pra no yaccha viśas pate dhanadā asi nas tvam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3058: RV_10,141.02a pra no yacchatv aryamā pra bhagaḥ pra bṛhaspatiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3059: RV_10,141.02c pra devāḥ prota sūnṛtā rāyo devī dadātu naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3060: RV_10,141.03a somaṃ rājānam avase 'gniṃ gīrbhir havāmahe |
GV01rv_hn10u:3061: RV_10,141.03c ādityān viṣṇuṃ sūryam brahmāṇaṃ ca bṛhaspatim ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3063: RV_10,141.04c yathā naḥ sarva ij janaḥ saṃgatyāṃ sumanā asat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3064: RV_10,141.05a aryamaṇam bṛhaspatim indraṃ dānāya codaya |
GV01rv_hn10u:3065: RV_10,141.05c vātaṃ viṣṇuṃ sarasvatīṃ savitāraṃ ca vājinam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3066: RV_10,141.06a tvaṃ no agne agnibhir brahma yajñaṃ ca vardhaya |
GV01rv_hn10u:3067: RV_10,141.06c tvaṃ no devatātaye rāyo dānāya codaya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3068: RV_10,142.01a ayam agne jaritā tve abhūd api sahasaḥ sūno nahy anyad asty āpyam |
GV01rv_hn10u:3069: RV_10,142.01c bhadraṃ hi śarma trivarūtham asti ta āre hiṃsānām apa didyum ā kṛdhi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3070: RV_10,142.02a pravat te agne janimā pitūyataḥ sācīva viśvā bhuvanā ny ṛñjase |
GV01rv_hn10u:3071: RV_10,142.02c pra saptayaḥ pra saniṣanta no dhiyaḥ puraś caranti paśupā iva tmanā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3072: RV_10,142.03a uta vā u pari vṛṇakṣi bapsad bahor agna ulapasya svadhāvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3073: RV_10,142.03c uta khilyā urvarāṇām bhavanti mā te hetiṃ taviṣīṃ cukrudhāma ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3074: RV_10,142.04a yad udvato nivato yāsi bapsat pṛthag eṣi pragardhinīva senā |
GV01rv_hn10u:3075: RV_10,142.04c yadā te vāto anuvāti śocir vapteva śmaśru vapasi pra bhūma ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3076: RV_10,142.05a praty asya śreṇayo dadṛśra ekaṃ niyānam bahavo rathāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3077: RV_10,142.05c bāhū yad agne anumarmṛjāno nyaṅṅ uttānām anveṣi bhūmim ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3078: RV_10,142.06a ut te śuṣmā jihatām ut te arcir ut te agne śaśamānasya vājāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3079: RV_10,142.06c uc chvañcasva ni nama vardhamāna ā tvādya viśve vasavaḥ sadantu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3080: RV_10,142.07a apām idaṃ nyayanaṃ samudrasya niveśanam |
GV01rv_hn10u:3081: RV_10,142.07c anyaṃ kṛṇuṣvetaḥ panthāṃ tena yāhi vaśāṃ anu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3082: RV_10,142.08a āyane te parāyaṇe dūrvā rohantu puṣpiṇīḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3083: RV_10,142.08c hradāś ca puṇḍarīkāṇi samudrasya gṛhā ime ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3084: RV_10,143.01a tyaṃ cid atrim ṛtajuram artham aśvaṃ na yātave |
GV01rv_hn10u:3085: RV_10,143.01c kakṣīvantaṃ yadī punā rathaṃ na kṛṇutho navam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3086: RV_10,143.02a tyaṃ cid aśvaṃ na vājinam areṇavo yam atnata |
GV01rv_hn10u:3087: RV_10,143.02c dṛḷhaṃ granthiṃ na vi ṣyatam atriṃ yaviṣṭham ā rajaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3088: RV_10,143.03a narā daṃsiṣṭhāv atraye śubhrā siṣāsataṃ dhiyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3089: RV_10,143.03c athā hi vāṃ divo narā puna stomo na viśase ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3090: RV_10,143.04a cite tad vāṃ surādhasā rātiḥ sumatir aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn10u:3091: RV_10,143.04c ā yan naḥ sadane pṛthau samane parṣatho narā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3092: RV_10,143.05a yuvam bhujyuṃ samudra ā rajasaḥ pāra īṅkhitam |
GV01rv_hn10u:3093: RV_10,143.05c yātam acchā patatribhir nāsatyā sātaye kṛtam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3094: RV_10,143.06a ā vāṃ sumnaiḥ śaṃyū iva maṃhiṣṭhā viśvavedasā |
GV01rv_hn10u:3095: RV_10,143.06c sam asme bhūṣataṃ narotsaṃ na pipyuṣīr iṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3096: RV_10,144.01a ayaṃ hi te amartya indur atyo na patyate |
GV01rv_hn10u:3098: RV_10,144.02a ayam asmāsu kāvya ṛbhur vajro dāsvate |
GV01rv_hn10u:3099: RV_10,144.02c ayam bibharty ūrdhvakṛśanam madam ṛbhur na kṛtvyam madam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3100: RV_10,144.03a ghṛṣuḥ śyenāya kṛtvana āsu svāsu vaṃsagaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3102: RV_10,144.04a yaṃ suparṇaḥ parāvataḥ śyenasya putra ābharat |
GV01rv_hn10u:3104: RV_10,144.05a yaṃ te śyenaś cārum avṛkam padābharad aruṇam mānam andhasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3105: RV_10,144.05c enā vayo vi tāry āyur jīvasa enā jāgāra bandhutā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3106: RV_10,144.06a evā tad indra indunā deveṣu cid dhārayāte mahi tyajaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3107: RV_10,144.06c kratvā vayo vi tāry āyuḥ sukrato kratvāyam asmad ā sutaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3108: RV_10,145.01a imāṃ khanāmy oṣadhiṃ vīrudham balavattamām |
GV01rv_hn10u:3109: RV_10,145.01c yayā sapatnīm bādhate yayā saṃvindate patim ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3111: RV_10,145.02c sapatnīm me parā dhama patim me kevalaṃ kuru ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3113: RV_10,145.03c athā sapatnī yā mamādharā sādharābhyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3114: RV_10,145.04a nahy asyā nāma gṛbhṇāmi no asmin ramate jane |
GV01rv_hn10u:3115: RV_10,145.04c parām eva parāvataṃ sapatnīṃ gamayāmasi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3116: RV_10,145.05a aham asmi sahamānātha tvam asi sāsahiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3117: RV_10,145.05c ubhe sahasvatī bhūtvī sapatnīm me sahāvahai ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3118: RV_10,145.06a upa te 'dhāṃ sahamānām abhi tvādhāṃ sahīyasā |
GV01rv_hn10u:3119: RV_10,145.06c mām anu pra te mano vatsaṃ gaur iva dhāvatu pathā vār iva dhāvatu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3120: RV_10,146.01a araṇyāny araṇyāny asau yā preva naśyasi |
GV01rv_hn10u:3121: RV_10,146.01c kathā grāmaṃ na pṛcchasi na tvā bhīr iva vindatī3ṃ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3122: RV_10,146.02a vṛṣāravāya vadate yad upāvati ciccikaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3123: RV_10,146.02c āghāṭibhir iva dhāvayann araṇyānir mahīyate ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3124: RV_10,146.03a uta gāva ivādanty uta veśmeva dṛśyate |
GV01rv_hn10u:3125: RV_10,146.03c uto araṇyāniḥ sāyaṃ śakaṭīr iva sarjati ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3126: RV_10,146.04a gām aṅgaiṣa ā hvayati dārv aṅgaiṣo apāvadhīt |
GV01rv_hn10u:3127: RV_10,146.04c vasann araṇyānyāṃ sāyam akrukṣad iti manyate ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3128: RV_10,146.05a na vā araṇyānir hanty anyaś cen nābhigacchati |
GV01rv_hn10u:3129: RV_10,146.05c svādoḥ phalasya jagdhvāya yathākāmaṃ ni padyate ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3131: RV_10,146.06c prāham mṛgāṇām mātaram araṇyānim aśaṃsiṣam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3132: RV_10,147.01a śrat te dadhāmi prathamāya manyave 'han yad vṛtraṃ naryaṃ viver apaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3133: RV_10,147.01c ubhe yat tvā bhavato rodasī anu rejate śuṣmāt pṛthivī cid adrivaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3134: RV_10,147.02a tvam māyābhir anavadya māyinaṃ śravasyatā manasā vṛtram ardayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3135: RV_10,147.02c tvām in naro vṛṇate gaviṣṭiṣu tvāṃ viśvāsu havyāsv iṣṭiṣu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3136: RV_10,147.03a aiṣu cākandhi puruhūta sūriṣu vṛdhāso ye maghavann ānaśur magham |
GV01rv_hn10u:3137: RV_10,147.03c arcanti toke tanaye pariṣṭiṣu medhasātā vājinam ahraye dhane ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3138: RV_10,147.04a sa in nu rāyaḥ subhṛtasya cākanan madaṃ yo asya raṃhyaṃ ciketati |
GV01rv_hn10u:3139: RV_10,147.04c tvāvṛdho maghavan dāśvadhvaro makṣū sa vājam bharate dhanā nṛbhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3140: RV_10,147.05a tvaṃ śardhāya mahinā gṛṇāna uru kṛdhi maghavañ chagdhi rāyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3141: RV_10,147.05c tvaṃ no mitro varuṇo na māyī pitvo na dasma dayase vibhaktā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3142: RV_10,148.01a suṣvāṇāsa indra stumasi tvā sasavāṃsaś ca tuvinṛmṇa vājam |
GV01rv_hn10u:3143: RV_10,148.01c ā no bhara suvitaṃ yasya cākan tmanā tanā sanuyāma tvotāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3144: RV_10,148.02a ṛṣvas tvam indra śūra jāto dāsīr viśaḥ sūryeṇa sahyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3145: RV_10,148.02c guhā hitaṃ guhyaṃ gūḷham apsu bibhṛmasi prasravaṇe na somam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3146: RV_10,148.03a aryo vā giro abhy arca vidvān ṛṣīṇāṃ vipraḥ sumatiṃ cakānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3147: RV_10,148.03c te syāma ye raṇayanta somair enota tubhyaṃ rathoḷha bhakṣaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3148: RV_10,148.04a imā brahmendra tubhyaṃ śaṃsi dā nṛbhyo nṛṇāṃ śūra śavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3149: RV_10,148.04c tebhir bhava sakratur yeṣu cākann uta trāyasva gṛṇata uta stīn ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3150: RV_10,148.05a śrudhī havam indra śūra pṛthyā uta stavase venyasyārkaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3151: RV_10,148.05c ā yas te yoniṃ ghṛtavantam asvār ūrmir na nimnair dravayanta vakvāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3152: RV_10,149.01a savitā yantraiḥ pṛthivīm aramṇād askambhane savitā dyām adṛṃhat |
GV01rv_hn10u:3153: RV_10,149.01c aśvam ivādhukṣad dhunim antarikṣam atūrte baddhaṃ savitā samudram ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3154: RV_10,149.02a yatrā samudra skabhito vy aunad apāṃ napāt savitā tasya veda |
GV01rv_hn10u:3155: RV_10,149.02c ato bhūr ata ā utthitaṃ rajo 'to dyāvāpṛthivī aprathetām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3156: RV_10,149.03a paścedam anyad abhavad yajatram amartyasya bhuvanasya bhūnā |
GV01rv_hn10u:3157: RV_10,149.03c suparṇo aṅga savitur garutmān pūrvo jātaḥ sa u asyānu dharma ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3158: RV_10,149.04a gāva iva grāmaṃ yūyudhir ivāśvān vāśreva vatsaṃ sumanā duhānā |
GV01rv_hn10u:3159: RV_10,149.04c patir iva jāyām abhi no ny etu dhartā divaḥ savitā viśvavāraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3160: RV_10,149.05a hiraṇyastūpaḥ savitar yathā tvāṅgiraso juhve vāje asmin |
GV01rv_hn10u:3161: RV_10,149.05c evā tvārcann avase vandamānaḥ somasyevāṃśum prati jāgarāham ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3162: RV_10,150.01a samiddhaś cit sam idhyase devebhyo havyavāhana |
GV01rv_hn10u:3163: RV_10,150.01c ādityai rudrair vasubhir na ā gahi mṛḷīkāya na ā gahi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3164: RV_10,150.02a imaṃ yajñam idaṃ vaco jujuṣāṇa upāgahi |
GV01rv_hn10u:3165: RV_10,150.02c martāsas tvā samidhāna havāmahe mṛḷīkāya havāmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3166: RV_10,150.03a tvām u jātavedasaṃ viśvavāraṃ gṛṇe dhiyā |
GV01rv_hn10u:3167: RV_10,150.03c agne devāṃ ā vaha naḥ priyavratān mṛḷīkāya priyavratān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3168: RV_10,150.04a agnir devo devānām abhavat purohito 'gnim manuṣyā ṛṣayaḥ sam īdhire |
GV01rv_hn10u:3169: RV_10,150.04c agnim maho dhanasātāv ahaṃ huve mṛḷīkaṃ dhanasātaye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3170: RV_10,150.05a agnir atrim bharadvājaṃ gaviṣṭhiram prāvan naḥ kaṇvaṃ trasadasyum āhave |
GV01rv_hn10u:3171: RV_10,150.05c agniṃ vasiṣṭho havate purohito mṛḷīkāya purohitaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3172: RV_10,151.01a śraddhayāgniḥ sam idhyate śraddhayā hūyate haviḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3173: RV_10,151.01c śraddhām bhagasya mūrdhani vacasā vedayāmasi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3174: RV_10,151.02a priyaṃ śraddhe dadataḥ priyaṃ śraddhe didāsataḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3175: RV_10,151.02c priyam bhojeṣu yajvasv idam ma uditaṃ kṛdhi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3176: RV_10,151.03a yathā devā asureṣu śraddhām ugreṣu cakrire |
GV01rv_hn10u:3177: RV_10,151.03c evam bhojeṣu yajvasv asmākam uditaṃ kṛdhi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3178: RV_10,151.04a śraddhāṃ devā yajamānā vāyugopā upāsate |
GV01rv_hn10u:3179: RV_10,151.04c śraddhāṃ hṛdayyayākūtyā śraddhayā vindate vasu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3180: RV_10,151.05a śraddhām prātar havāmahe śraddhām madhyandinam pari |
GV01rv_hn10u:3181: RV_10,151.05c śraddhāṃ sūryasya nimruci śraddhe śrad dhāpayeha naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3182: RV_10,152.01a śāsa itthā mahāṃ asy amitrakhādo adbhutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3183: RV_10,152.01c na yasya hanyate sakhā na jīyate kadā cana ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3184: RV_10,152.02a svastidā viśas patir vṛtrahā vimṛdho vaśī |
GV01rv_hn10u:3185: RV_10,152.02c vṛṣendraḥ pura etu naḥ somapā abhayaṅkaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3186: RV_10,152.03a vi rakṣo vi mṛdho jahi vi vṛtrasya hanū ruja |
GV01rv_hn10u:3187: RV_10,152.03c vi manyum indra vṛtrahann amitrasyābhidāsataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3188: RV_10,152.04a vi na indra mṛdho jahi nīcā yaccha pṛtanyataḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3189: RV_10,152.04c yo asmāṃ abhidāsaty adharaṃ gamayā tamaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3190: RV_10,152.05a apendra dviṣato mano 'pa jijyāsato vadham |
GV01rv_hn10u:3191: RV_10,152.05c vi manyoḥ śarma yaccha varīyo yavayā vadham ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3192: RV_10,153.01a īṅkhayantīr apasyuva indraṃ jātam upāsate |
GV01rv_hn10u:3194: RV_10,153.02a tvam indra balād adhi sahaso jāta ojasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3196: RV_10,153.03a tvam indrāsi vṛtrahā vy antarikṣam atiraḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3198: RV_10,153.04a tvam indra sajoṣasam arkam bibharṣi bāhvoḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3200: RV_10,153.05a tvam indrābhibhūr asi viśvā jātāny ojasā |
GV01rv_hn10u:3202: RV_10,154.01a soma ekebhyaḥ pavate ghṛtam eka upāsate |
GV01rv_hn10u:3203: RV_10,154.01c yebhyo madhu pradhāvati tāṃś cid evāpi gacchatāt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3204: RV_10,154.02a tapasā ye anādhṛṣyās tapasā ye svar yayuḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3205: RV_10,154.02c tapo ye cakrire mahas tāṃś cid evāpi gacchatāt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3206: RV_10,154.03a ye yudhyante pradhaneṣu śūrāso ye tanūtyajaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3207: RV_10,154.03c ye vā sahasradakṣiṇās tāṃś cid evāpi gacchatāt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3208: RV_10,154.04a ye cit pūrva ṛtasāpa ṛtāvāna ṛtāvṛdhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3209: RV_10,154.04c pitṝn tapasvato yama tāṃś cid evāpi gacchatāt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3210: RV_10,154.05a sahasraṇīthāḥ kavayo ye gopāyanti sūryam |
GV01rv_hn10u:3211: RV_10,154.05c ṛṣīn tapasvato yama tapojāṃ api gacchatāt ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3212: RV_10,155.01a arāyi kāṇe vikaṭe giriṃ gaccha sadānve |
GV01rv_hn10u:3213: RV_10,155.01c śirimbiṭhasya satvabhis tebhiṣ ṭvā cātayāmasi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3214: RV_10,155.02a catto itaś cattāmutaḥ sarvā bhrūṇāny āruṣī |
GV01rv_hn10u:3215: RV_10,155.02c arāyyam brahmaṇas pate tīkṣṇaśṛṇgodṛṣann ihi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3216: RV_10,155.03a ado yad dāru plavate sindhoḥ pāre apūruṣam |
GV01rv_hn10u:3217: RV_10,155.03c tad ā rabhasva durhaṇo tena gaccha parastaram ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3218: RV_10,155.04a yad dha prācīr ajagantoro maṇḍūradhāṇikīḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3219: RV_10,155.04c hatā indrasya śatravaḥ sarve budbudayāśavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3220: RV_10,155.05a parīme gām aneṣata pary agnim ahṛṣata |
GV01rv_hn10u:3221: RV_10,155.05c deveṣv akrata śravaḥ ka imāṃ ā dadharṣati ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3222: RV_10,156.01a agniṃ hinvantu no dhiyaḥ saptim āśum ivājiṣu |
GV01rv_hn10u:3224: RV_10,156.02a yayā gā ākarāmahe senayāgne tavotyā |
GV01rv_hn10u:3226: RV_10,156.03a āgne sthūraṃ rayim bhara pṛthuṃ gomantam aśvinam |
GV01rv_hn10u:3228: RV_10,156.04a agne nakṣatram ajaram ā sūryaṃ rohayo divi |
GV01rv_hn10u:3230: RV_10,156.05a agne ketur viśām asi preṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭha upasthasat |
GV01rv_hn10u:3232: RV_10,157.01a imā nu kam bhuvanā sīṣadhāmendraś ca viśve ca devāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3233: RV_10,157.02a yajñaṃ ca nas tanvaṃ ca prajāṃ cādityair indraḥ saha cīkḷpāti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3234: RV_10,157.03a ādityair indraḥ sagaṇo marudbhir asmākam bhūtv avitā tanūnām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3235: RV_10,157.04a hatvāya devā asurān yad āyan devā devatvam abhirakṣamāṇāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3236: RV_10,157.05a pratyañcam arkam anayañ chacībhir ād it svadhām iṣirām pary apaśyan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3237: RV_10,158.01a sūryo no divas pātu vāto antarikṣāt |
GV01rv_hn10u:3239: RV_10,158.02a joṣā savitar yasya te haraḥ śataṃ savāṃ arhati |
GV01rv_hn10u:3241: RV_10,158.03a cakṣur no devaḥ savitā cakṣur na uta parvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3243: RV_10,158.04a cakṣur no dhehi cakṣuṣe cakṣur vikhyai tanūbhyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3244: RV_10,158.04c saṃ cedaṃ vi ca paśyema ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3245: RV_10,158.05a susaṃdṛśaṃ tvā vayam prati paśyema sūrya |
GV01rv_hn10u:3247: RV_10,159.01a ud asau sūryo agād ud ayam māmako bhagaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3248: RV_10,159.01c ahaṃ tad vidvalā patim abhy asākṣi viṣāsahiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3249: RV_10,159.02a ahaṃ ketur aham mūrdhāham ugrā vivācanī |
GV01rv_hn10u:3250: RV_10,159.02c mamed anu kratum patiḥ sehānāyā upācaret ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3251: RV_10,159.03a mama putrāḥ śatruhaṇo 'tho me duhitā virāṭ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3252: RV_10,159.03c utāham asmi saṃjayā patyau me śloka uttamaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3253: RV_10,159.04a yenendro haviṣā kṛtvy abhavad dyumny uttamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3254: RV_10,159.04c idaṃ tad akri devā asapatnā kilābhuvam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3256: RV_10,159.05c āvṛkṣam anyāsāṃ varco rādho astheyasām iva ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3257: RV_10,159.06a sam ajaiṣam imā ahaṃ sapatnīr abhibhūvarī |
GV01rv_hn10u:3258: RV_10,159.06c yathāham asya vīrasya virājāni janasya ca ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3259: RV_10,160.01a tīvrasyābhivayaso asya pāhi sarvarathā vi harī iha muñca |
GV01rv_hn10u:3260: RV_10,160.01c indra mā tvā yajamānāso anye ni rīraman tubhyam ime sutāsaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3261: RV_10,160.02a tubhyaṃ sutās tubhyam u sotvāsas tvāṃ giraḥ śvātryā ā hvayanti |
GV01rv_hn10u:3262: RV_10,160.02c indredam adya savanaṃ juṣāṇo viśvasya vidvāṃ iha pāhi somam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3263: RV_10,160.03a ya uśatā manasā somam asmai sarvahṛdā devakāmaḥ sunoti |
GV01rv_hn10u:3264: RV_10,160.03c na gā indras tasya parā dadāti praśastam ic cārum asmai kṛṇoti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3265: RV_10,160.04a anuspaṣṭo bhavaty eṣo asya yo asmai revān na sunoti somam |
GV01rv_hn10u:3266: RV_10,160.04c nir aratnau maghavā taṃ dadhāti brahmadviṣo hanty anānudiṣṭaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3267: RV_10,160.05a aśvāyanto gavyanto vājayanto havāmahe tvopagantavā u |
GV01rv_hn10u:3268: RV_10,160.05c ābhūṣantas te sumatau navāyāṃ vayam indra tvā śunaṃ huvema ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3269: RV_10,161.01a muñcāmi tvā haviṣā jīvanāya kam ajñātayakṣmād uta rājayakṣmāt |
GV01rv_hn10u:3270: RV_10,161.01c grāhir jagrāha yadi vaitad enaṃ tasyā indrāgnī pra mumuktam enam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3271: RV_10,161.02a yadi kṣitāyur yadi vā pareto yadi mṛtyor antikaṃ nīta eva |
GV01rv_hn10u:3272: RV_10,161.02c tam ā harāmi nirṛter upasthād aspārṣam enaṃ śataśāradāya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3273: RV_10,161.03a sahasrākṣeṇa śataśāradena śatāyuṣā haviṣāhārṣam enam |
GV01rv_hn10u:3274: RV_10,161.03c śataṃ yathemaṃ śarado nayātīndro viśvasya duritasya pāram ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3275: RV_10,161.04a śataṃ jīva śarado vardhamānaḥ śataṃ hemantāñ chatam u vasantān |
GV01rv_hn10u:3276: RV_10,161.04c śatam indrāgnī savitā bṛhaspatiḥ śatāyuṣā haviṣemam punar duḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3277: RV_10,161.05a āhārṣaṃ tvāvidaṃ tvā punar āgāḥ punarnava |
GV01rv_hn10u:3278: RV_10,161.05c sarvāṅga sarvaṃ te cakṣuḥ sarvam āyuś ca te 'vidam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3279: RV_10,162.01a brahmaṇāgniḥ saṃvidāno rakṣohā bādhatām itaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3280: RV_10,162.01c amīvā yas te garbhaṃ durṇāmā yonim āśaye ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3281: RV_10,162.02a yas te garbham amīvā durṇāmā yonim āśaye |
GV01rv_hn10u:3282: RV_10,162.02c agniṣ ṭam brahmaṇā saha niṣ kravyādam anīnaśat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3283: RV_10,162.03a yas te hanti patayantaṃ niṣatsnuṃ yaḥ sarīsṛpam |
GV01rv_hn10u:3284: RV_10,162.03c jātaṃ yas te jighāṃsati tam ito nāśayāmasi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3285: RV_10,162.04a yas ta ūrū viharaty antarā dampatī śaye |
GV01rv_hn10u:3286: RV_10,162.04c yoniṃ yo antar āreḷhi tam ito nāśayāmasi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3287: RV_10,162.05a yas tvā bhrātā patir bhūtvā jāro bhūtvā nipadyate |
GV01rv_hn10u:3288: RV_10,162.05c prajāṃ yas te jighāṃsati tam ito nāśayāmasi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3289: RV_10,162.06a yas tvā svapnena tamasā mohayitvā nipadyate |
GV01rv_hn10u:3290: RV_10,162.06c prajāṃ yas te jighāṃsati tam ito nāśayāmasi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3291: RV_10,163.01a akṣībhyāṃ te nāsikābhyāṃ karṇābhyāṃ chubukād adhi |
GV01rv_hn10u:3292: RV_10,163.01c yakṣmaṃ śīrṣaṇyam mastiṣkāj jihvāyā vi vṛhāmi te ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3293: RV_10,163.02a grīvābhyas ta uṣṇihābhyaḥ kīkasābhyo anūkyāt |
GV01rv_hn10u:3294: RV_10,163.02c yakṣmaṃ doṣaṇyam aṃsābhyām bāhubhyāṃ vi vṛhāmi te ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3295: RV_10,163.03a āntrebhyas te gudābhyo vaniṣṭhor hṛdayād adhi |
GV01rv_hn10u:3296: RV_10,163.03c yakṣmam matasnābhyāṃ yaknaḥ plāśibhyo vi vṛhāmi te ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3297: RV_10,163.04a ūrubhyāṃ te aṣṭhīvadbhyām pārṣṇibhyām prapadābhyām |
GV01rv_hn10u:3298: RV_10,163.04c yakṣmaṃ śroṇibhyām bhāsadād bhaṃsaso vi vṛhāmi te ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3299: RV_10,163.05a mehanād vanaṅkaraṇāl lomabhyas te nakhebhyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3300: RV_10,163.05c yakṣmaṃ sarvasmād ātmanas tam idaṃ vi vṛhāmi te ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3302: RV_10,163.06c yakṣmaṃ sarvasmād ātmanas tam idaṃ vi vṛhāmi te ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3303: RV_10,164.01a apehi manasas pate 'pa krāma paraś cara |
GV01rv_hn10u:3304: RV_10,164.01c paro nirṛtyā ā cakṣva bahudhā jīvato manaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3305: RV_10,164.02a bhadraṃ vai varaṃ vṛṇate bhadraṃ yuñjanti dakṣiṇam |
GV01rv_hn10u:3306: RV_10,164.02c bhadraṃ vaivasvate cakṣur bahutrā jīvato manaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3307: RV_10,164.03a yad āśasā niḥśasābhiśasopārima jāgrato yat svapantaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3308: RV_10,164.03c agnir viśvāny apa duṣkṛtāny ajuṣṭāny āre asmad dadhātu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3309: RV_10,164.04a yad indra brahmaṇas pate 'bhidrohaṃ carāmasi |
GV01rv_hn10u:3310: RV_10,164.04c pracetā na āṅgiraso dviṣatām pātv aṃhasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3312: RV_10,164.05c jāgratsvapnaḥ saṃkalpaḥ pāpo yaṃ dviṣmas taṃ sa ṛcchatu yo no dveṣṭi tam ṛcchatu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3313: RV_10,165.01a devāḥ kapota iṣito yad icchan dūto nirṛtyā idam ājagāma |
GV01rv_hn10u:3314: RV_10,165.01c tasmā arcāma kṛṇavāma niṣkṛtiṃ śaṃ no astu dvipade śaṃ catuṣpade ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3315: RV_10,165.02a śivaḥ kapota iṣito no astv anāgā devāḥ śakuno gṛheṣu |
GV01rv_hn10u:3316: RV_10,165.02c agnir hi vipro juṣatāṃ havir naḥ pari hetiḥ pakṣiṇī no vṛṇaktu ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3317: RV_10,165.03a hetiḥ pakṣiṇī na dabhāty asmān āṣṭryām padaṃ kṛṇute agnidhāne |
GV01rv_hn10u:3318: RV_10,165.03c śaṃ no gobhyaś ca puruṣebhyaś cāstu mā no hiṃsīd iha devāḥ kapotaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3319: RV_10,165.04a yad ulūko vadati mogham etad yat kapotaḥ padam agnau kṛṇoti |
GV01rv_hn10u:3320: RV_10,165.04c yasya dūtaḥ prahita eṣa etat tasmai yamāya namo astu mṛtyave ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3321: RV_10,165.05a ṛcā kapotaṃ nudata praṇodam iṣam madantaḥ pari gāṃ nayadhvam |
GV01rv_hn10u:3322: RV_10,165.05c saṃyopayanto duritāni viśvā hitvā na ūrjam pra patāt patiṣṭhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3323: RV_10,166.01a ṛṣabham mā samānānāṃ sapatnānāṃ viṣāsahim |
GV01rv_hn10u:3324: RV_10,166.01c hantāraṃ śatrūṇāṃ kṛdhi virājaṃ gopatiṃ gavām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3325: RV_10,166.02a aham asmi sapatnahendra ivāriṣṭo akṣataḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3326: RV_10,166.02c adhaḥ sapatnā me pador ime sarve abhiṣṭhitāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3327: RV_10,166.03a atraiva vo 'pi nahyāmy ubhe ārtnī iva jyayā |
GV01rv_hn10u:3328: RV_10,166.03c vācas pate ni ṣedhemān yathā mad adharaṃ vadān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3329: RV_10,166.04a abhibhūr aham āgamaṃ viśvakarmeṇa dhāmnā |
GV01rv_hn10u:3330: RV_10,166.04c ā vaś cittam ā vo vratam ā vo 'haṃ samitiṃ dade ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3331: RV_10,166.05a yogakṣemaṃ va ādāyāham bhūyāsam uttama ā vo mūrdhānam akramīm |
GV01rv_hn10u:3332: RV_10,166.05d adhaspadān ma ud vadata maṇḍūkā ivodakān maṇḍūkā udakād iva ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3333: RV_10,167.01a tubhyedam indra pari ṣicyate madhu tvaṃ sutasya kalaśasya rājasi |
GV01rv_hn10u:3334: RV_10,167.01c tvaṃ rayim puruvīrām u nas kṛdhi tvaṃ tapaḥ paritapyājayaḥ svaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3335: RV_10,167.02a svarjitam mahi mandānam andhaso havāmahe pari śakraṃ sutāṃ upa |
GV01rv_hn10u:3336: RV_10,167.02c imaṃ no yajñam iha bodhy ā gahi spṛdho jayantam maghavānam īmahe ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3337: RV_10,167.03a somasya rājño varuṇasya dharmaṇi bṛhaspater anumatyā u śarmaṇi |
GV01rv_hn10u:3338: RV_10,167.03c tavāham adya maghavann upastutau dhātar vidhātaḥ kalaśāṃ abhakṣayam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3339: RV_10,167.04a prasūto bhakṣam akaraṃ carāv api stomaṃ cemam prathamaḥ sūrir un mṛje |
GV01rv_hn10u:3340: RV_10,167.04c sute sātena yady āgamaṃ vām prati viśvāmitrajamadagnī dame ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3341: RV_10,168.01a vātasya nu mahimānaṃ rathasya rujann eti stanayann asya ghoṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3342: RV_10,168.01c divispṛg yāty aruṇāni kṛṇvann uto eti pṛthivyā reṇum asyan ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3343: RV_10,168.02a sam prerate anu vātasya viṣṭhā ainaṃ gacchanti samanaṃ na yoṣāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3344: RV_10,168.02c tābhiḥ sayuk sarathaṃ deva īyate 'sya viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3345: RV_10,168.03a antarikṣe pathibhir īyamāno na ni viśate katamac canāhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3346: RV_10,168.03c apāṃ sakhā prathamajā ṛtāvā kva svij jātaḥ kuta ā babhūva ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3347: RV_10,168.04a ātmā devānām bhuvanasya garbho yathāvaśaṃ carati deva eṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3348: RV_10,168.04c ghoṣā id asya śṛṇvire na rūpaṃ tasmai vātāya haviṣā vidhema ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3349: RV_10,169.01a mayobhūr vāto abhi vātūsrā ūrjasvatīr oṣadhīr ā riśantām |
GV01rv_hn10u:3350: RV_10,169.01c pīvasvatīr jīvadhanyāḥ pibantv avasāya padvate rudra mṛḷa ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3351: RV_10,169.02a yāḥ sarūpā virūpā ekarūpā yāsām agnir iṣṭyā nāmāni veda |
GV01rv_hn10u:3352: RV_10,169.02c yā aṅgirasas tapaseha cakrus tābhyaḥ parjanya mahi śarma yaccha ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3353: RV_10,169.03a yā deveṣu tanvam airayanta yāsāṃ somo viśvā rūpāṇi veda |
GV01rv_hn10u:3354: RV_10,169.03c tā asmabhyam payasā pinvamānāḥ prajāvatīr indra goṣṭhe rirīhi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3355: RV_10,169.04a prajāpatir mahyam etā rarāṇo viśvair devaiḥ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3356: RV_10,169.04c śivāḥ satīr upa no goṣṭham ākas tāsāṃ vayam prajayā saṃ sadema ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3357: RV_10,170.01a vibhrāḍ bṛhat pibatu somyam madhv āyur dadhad yajñapatāv avihrutam |
GV01rv_hn10u:3358: RV_10,170.01c vātajūto yo abhirakṣati tmanā prajāḥ pupoṣa purudhā vi rājati ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3359: RV_10,170.02a vibhrāḍ bṛhat subhṛtaṃ vājasātamaṃ dharman divo dharuṇe satyam arpitam |
GV01rv_hn10u:3360: RV_10,170.02c amitrahā vṛtrahā dasyuhantamaṃ jyotir jajñe asurahā sapatnahā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3361: RV_10,170.03a idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ jyotiṣāṃ jyotir uttamaṃ viśvajid dhanajid ucyate bṛhat |
GV01rv_hn10u:3362: RV_10,170.03c viśvabhrāḍ bhrājo mahi sūryo dṛśa uru paprathe saha ojo acyutam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3363: RV_10,170.04a vibhrājañ jyotiṣā svar agaccho rocanaṃ divaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3364: RV_10,170.04c yenemā viśvā bhuvanāny ābhṛtā viśvakarmaṇā viśvadevyāvatā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3365: RV_10,171.01a tvaṃ tyam iṭato ratham indra prāvaḥ sutāvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3367: RV_10,171.02a tvam makhasya dodhataḥ śiro 'va tvaco bharaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3369: RV_10,171.03a tvaṃ tyam indra martyam āstrabudhnāya venyam |
GV01rv_hn10u:3371: RV_10,171.04a tvaṃ tyam indra sūryam paścā santam puras kṛdhi |
GV01rv_hn10u:3373: RV_10,172.01a ā yāhi vanasā saha gāvaḥ sacanta vartaniṃ yad ūdhabhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3374: RV_10,172.02a ā yāhi vasvyā dhiyā maṃhiṣṭho jārayanmakhaḥ sudānubhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3375: RV_10,172.03a pitubhṛto na tantum it sudānavaḥ prati dadhmo yajāmasi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3376: RV_10,172.04a uṣā apa svasus tamaḥ saṃ vartayati vartaniṃ sujātatā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3377: RV_10,173.01a ā tvāhārṣam antar edhi dhruvas tiṣṭhāvicācaliḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3378: RV_10,173.01c viśas tvā sarvā vāñchantu mā tvad rāṣṭram adhi bhraśat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3379: RV_10,173.02a ihaivaidhi māpa cyoṣṭhāḥ parvata ivāvicācaliḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3380: RV_10,173.02c indra iveha dhruvas tiṣṭheha rāṣṭram u dhāraya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3381: RV_10,173.03a imam indro adīdharad dhruvaṃ dhruveṇa haviṣā |
GV01rv_hn10u:3382: RV_10,173.03c tasmai somo adhi bravat tasmā u brahmaṇas patiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3383: RV_10,173.04a dhruvā dyaur dhruvā pṛthivī dhruvāsaḥ parvatā ime |
GV01rv_hn10u:3384: RV_10,173.04c dhruvaṃ viśvam idaṃ jagad dhruvo rājā viśām ayam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3385: RV_10,173.05a dhruvaṃ te rājā varuṇo dhruvaṃ devo bṛhaspatiḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3386: RV_10,173.05c dhruvaṃ ta indraś cāgniś ca rāṣṭraṃ dhārayatāṃ dhruvam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3387: RV_10,173.06a dhruvaṃ dhruveṇa haviṣābhi somam mṛśāmasi |
GV01rv_hn10u:3388: RV_10,173.06c atho ta indraḥ kevalīr viśo balihṛtas karat ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3390: RV_10,174.01c tenāsmān brahmaṇas pate 'bhi rāṣṭrāya vartaya ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3391: RV_10,174.02a abhivṛtya sapatnān abhi yā no arātayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3392: RV_10,174.02c abhi pṛtanyantaṃ tiṣṭhābhi yo na irasyati ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3393: RV_10,174.03a abhi tvā devaḥ savitābhi somo avīvṛtat |
GV01rv_hn10u:3394: RV_10,174.03c abhi tvā viśvā bhūtāny abhīvarto yathāsasi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3395: RV_10,174.04a yenendro haviṣā kṛtvy abhavad dyumny uttamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3396: RV_10,174.04c idaṃ tad akri devā asapatnaḥ kilābhuvam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3398: RV_10,174.05c yathāham eṣām bhūtānāṃ virājāni janasya ca ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3399: RV_10,175.01a pra vo grāvāṇaḥ savitā devaḥ suvatu dharmaṇā |
GV01rv_hn10u:3401: RV_10,175.02a grāvāṇo apa ducchunām apa sedhata durmatim |
GV01rv_hn10u:3403: RV_10,175.03a grāvāṇa upareṣv ā mahīyante sajoṣasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3405: RV_10,175.04a grāvāṇaḥ savitā nu vo devaḥ suvatu dharmaṇā |
GV01rv_hn10u:3407: RV_10,176.01a pra sūnava ṛbhūṇām bṛhan navanta vṛjanā |
GV01rv_hn10u:3408: RV_10,176.01c kṣāmā ye viśvadhāyaso 'śnan dhenuṃ na mātaram ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3409: RV_10,176.02a pra devaṃ devyā dhiyā bharatā jātavedasam |
GV01rv_hn10u:3411: RV_10,176.03a ayam u ṣya pra devayur hotā yajñāya nīyate |
GV01rv_hn10u:3412: RV_10,176.03c ratho na yor abhīvṛto ghṛṇīvāñ cetati tmanā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3413: RV_10,176.04a ayam agnir uruṣyaty amṛtād iva janmanaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3414: RV_10,176.04c sahasaś cit sahīyān devo jīvātave kṛtaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3415: RV_10,177.01a pataṅgam aktam asurasya māyayā hṛdā paśyanti manasā vipaścitaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3416: RV_10,177.01c samudre antaḥ kavayo vi cakṣate marīcīnām padam icchanti vedhasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3417: RV_10,177.02a pataṅgo vācam manasā bibharti tāṃ gandharvo 'vadad garbhe antaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3418: RV_10,177.02c tāṃ dyotamānāṃ svaryam manīṣām ṛtasya pade kavayo ni pānti ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3419: RV_10,177.03a apaśyaṃ gopām anipadyamānam ā ca parā ca pathibhiś carantam |
GV01rv_hn10u:3420: RV_10,177.03c sa sadhrīcīḥ sa viṣūcīr vasāna ā varīvarti bhuvaneṣv antaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3421: RV_10,178.01a tyam ū ṣu vājinaṃ devajūtaṃ sahāvānaṃ tarutāraṃ rathānām |
GV01rv_hn10u:3422: RV_10,178.01c ariṣṭanemim pṛtanājam āśuṃ svastaye tārkṣyam ihā huvema ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3423: RV_10,178.02a indrasyeva rātim ājohuvānāḥ svastaye nāvam ivā ruhema |
GV01rv_hn10u:3424: RV_10,178.02c urvī na pṛthvī bahule gabhīre mā vām etau mā paretau riṣāma ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3425: RV_10,178.03a sadyaś cid yaḥ śavasā pañca kṛṣṭīḥ sūrya iva jyotiṣāpas tatāna |
GV01rv_hn10u:3426: RV_10,178.03c sahasrasāḥ śatasā asya raṃhir na smā varante yuvatiṃ na śaryām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3427: RV_10,179.01a ut tiṣṭhatāva paśyatendrasya bhāgam ṛtviyam |
GV01rv_hn10u:3428: RV_10,179.01c yadi śrāto juhotana yady aśrāto mamattana ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3429: RV_10,179.02a śrātaṃ havir o ṣv indra pra yāhi jagāma sūro adhvano vimadhyam |
GV01rv_hn10u:3430: RV_10,179.02c pari tvāsate nidhibhiḥ sakhāyaḥ kulapā na vrājapatiṃ carantam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3431: RV_10,179.03a śrātam manya ūdhani śrātam agnau suśrātam manye tad ṛtaṃ navīyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3432: RV_10,179.03c mādhyandinasya savanasya dadhnaḥ pibendra vajrin purukṛj juṣāṇaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3433: RV_10,180.01a pra sasāhiṣe puruhūta śatrūñ jyeṣṭhas te śuṣma iha rātir astu |
GV01rv_hn10u:3434: RV_10,180.01c indrā bhara dakṣiṇenā vasūni patiḥ sindhūnām asi revatīnām ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3435: RV_10,180.02a mṛgo na bhīmaḥ kucaro giriṣṭhāḥ parāvata ā jaganthā parasyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3436: RV_10,180.02c sṛkaṃ saṃśāya pavim indra tigmaṃ vi śatrūn tāḷhi vi mṛdho nudasva ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3437: RV_10,180.03a indra kṣatram abhi vāmam ojo 'jāyathā vṛṣabha carṣaṇīnām |
GV01rv_hn10u:3438: RV_10,180.03c apānudo janam amitrayantam uruṃ devebhyo akṛṇor u lokam ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3439: RV_10,181.01a prathaś ca yasya saprathaś ca nāmānuṣṭubhasya haviṣo havir yat |
GV01rv_hn10u:3440: RV_10,181.01c dhātur dyutānāt savituś ca viṣṇo rathantaram ā jabhārā vasiṣṭhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3441: RV_10,181.02a avindan te atihitaṃ yad āsīd yajñasya dhāma paramaṃ guhā yat |
GV01rv_hn10u:3442: RV_10,181.02c dhātur dyutānāt savituś ca viṣṇor bharadvājo bṛhad ā cakre agneḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3443: RV_10,181.03a te 'vindan manasā dīdhyānā yaju ṣkannam prathamaṃ devayānam |
GV01rv_hn10u:3444: RV_10,181.03c dhātur dyutānāt savituś ca viṣṇor ā sūryād abharan gharmam ete ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3445: RV_10,182.01a bṛhaspatir nayatu durgahā tiraḥ punar neṣad aghaśaṃsāya manma |
GV01rv_hn10u:3446: RV_10,182.01c kṣipad aśastim apa durmatiṃ hann athā karad yajamānāya śaṃ yoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3447: RV_10,182.02a narāśaṃso no 'vatu prayāje śaṃ no astv anuyājo haveṣu |
GV01rv_hn10u:3448: RV_10,182.02c kṣipad aśastim apa durmatiṃ hann athā karad yajamānāya śaṃ yoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3449: RV_10,182.03a tapurmūrdhā tapatu rakṣaso ye brahmadviṣaḥ śarave hantavā u |
GV01rv_hn10u:3450: RV_10,182.03c kṣipad aśastim apa durmatiṃ hann athā karad yajamānāya śaṃ yoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3451: RV_10,183.01a apaśyaṃ tvā manasā cekitānaṃ tapaso jātaṃ tapaso vibhūtam |
GV01rv_hn10u:3452: RV_10,183.01c iha prajām iha rayiṃ rarāṇaḥ pra jāyasva prajayā putrakāma ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3453: RV_10,183.02a apaśyaṃ tvā manasā dīdhyānāṃ svāyāṃ tanū ṛtvye nādhamānām |
GV01rv_hn10u:3454: RV_10,183.02c upa mām uccā yuvatir babhūyāḥ pra jāyasva prajayā putrakāme ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3455: RV_10,183.03a ahaṃ garbham adadhām oṣadhīṣv ahaṃ viśveṣu bhuvaneṣv antaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3456: RV_10,183.03c aham prajā ajanayam pṛthivyām ahaṃ janibhyo aparīṣu putrān ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3457: RV_10,184.01a viṣṇur yoniṃ kalpayatu tvaṣṭā rūpāṇi piṃśatu |
GV01rv_hn10u:3458: RV_10,184.01c ā siñcatu prajāpatir dhātā garbhaṃ dadhātu te ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3459: RV_10,184.02a garbhaṃ dhehi sinīvāli garbhaṃ dhehi sarasvati |
GV01rv_hn10u:3460: RV_10,184.02c garbhaṃ te aśvinau devāv ā dhattām puṣkarasrajā ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3461: RV_10,184.03a hiraṇyayī araṇī yaṃ nirmanthato aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn10u:3462: RV_10,184.03c taṃ te garbhaṃ havāmahe daśame māsi sūtave ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3463: RV_10,185.01a mahi trīṇām avo 'stu dyukṣam mitrasyāryamṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3465: RV_10,185.02a nahi teṣām amā cana nādhvasu vāraṇeṣu |
GV01rv_hn10u:3467: RV_10,185.03a yasmai putrāso aditeḥ pra jīvase martyāya |
GV01rv_hn10u:3469: RV_10,186.01a vāta ā vātu bheṣajaṃ śambhu mayobhu no hṛde |
GV01rv_hn10u:3471: RV_10,186.02a uta vāta pitāsi na uta bhrātota naḥ sakhā |
GV01rv_hn10u:3473: RV_10,186.03a yad ado vāta te gṛhe 'mṛtasya nidhir hitaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3475: RV_10,187.01a prāgnaye vācam īraya vṛṣabhāya kṣitīnām |
GV01rv_hn10u:3476: RV_10,187.01c sa naḥ parṣad ati dviṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3477: RV_10,187.02a yaḥ parasyāḥ parāvatas tiro dhanvātirocate |
GV01rv_hn10u:3478: RV_10,187.02c sa naḥ parṣad ati dviṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3479: RV_10,187.03a yo rakṣāṃsi nijūrvati vṛṣā śukreṇa śociṣā |
GV01rv_hn10u:3480: RV_10,187.03c sa naḥ parṣad ati dviṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3481: RV_10,187.04a yo viśvābhi vipaśyati bhuvanā saṃ ca paśyati |
GV01rv_hn10u:3482: RV_10,187.04c sa naḥ parṣad ati dviṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3483: RV_10,187.05a yo asya pāre rajasaḥ śukro agnir ajāyata |
GV01rv_hn10u:3484: RV_10,187.05c sa naḥ parṣad ati dviṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3485: RV_10,188.01a pra nūnaṃ jātavedasam aśvaṃ hinota vājinam |
GV01rv_hn10u:3487: RV_10,188.02a asya pra jātavedaso vipravīrasya mīḷhuṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3489: RV_10,188.03a yā ruco jātavedaso devatrā havyavāhanīḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3491: RV_10,189.01a āyaṃ gauḥ pṛśnir akramīd asadan mātaram puraḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3493: RV_10,189.02a antaś carati rocanāsya prāṇād apānatī |
GV01rv_hn10u:3495: RV_10,189.03a triṃśad dhāma vi rājati vāk pataṅgāya dhīyate |
GV01rv_hn10u:3497: RV_10,190.01a ṛtaṃ ca satyaṃ cābhīddhāt tapaso 'dhy ajāyata |
GV01rv_hn10u:3498: RV_10,190.01c tato rātry ajāyata tataḥ samudro arṇavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3499: RV_10,190.02a samudrād arṇavād adhi saṃvatsaro ajāyata |
GV01rv_hn10u:3500: RV_10,190.02c ahorātrāṇi vidadhad viśvasya miṣato vaśī ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3502: RV_10,190.03c divaṃ ca pṛthivīṃ cāntarikṣam atho svaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3503: RV_10,191.01a saṃ-sam id yuvase vṛṣann agne viśvāny arya ā |
GV01rv_hn10u:3504: RV_10,191.01c iḷas pade sam idhyase sa no vasūny ā bhara ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3505: RV_10,191.02a saṃ gacchadhvaṃ saṃ vadadhvaṃ saṃ vo manāṃsi jānatām |
GV01rv_hn10u:3506: RV_10,191.02c devā bhāgaṃ yathā pūrve saṃjānānā upāsate ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3507: RV_10,191.03a samāno mantraḥ samitiḥ samānī samānam manaḥ saha cittam eṣām |
GV01rv_hn10u:3508: RV_10,191.03c samānam mantram abhi mantraye vaḥ samānena vo haviṣā juhomi ||
GV01rv_hn10u:3509: RV_10,191.04a samānī va ākūtiḥ samānā hṛdayāni vaḥ |
GV01rv_hn10u:3510: RV_10,191.04c samānam astu vo mano yathā vaḥ susahāsati ||
